ka@#// mar bya bar bshad pa'o// dang por bsgrub par bya zhing de'i 'og tu dngos grub kyi mchog bzang po rig 'dzani dang/ phyogs kyi bdag po dang/ nor gyi char dang/ gter/
chen po dang/ yid bzhin gyi nor bu dang/ bum pa bzang po la sogs pa dang/ gnod sbyin mo'i sgrub pa dang/ sha za mo dang/ sa la'joms ma la sogs pa gsungs pa rnams 'grub ste//

sangs rgyas nyid kyang 'grub na/ tha mal pa 'byungamo bran du bya ba rnams lta smos kyang ci dgos te/ de'i mod la 'grub par 'gyur ro// 'byung po 'dul byed kyi rlung chen po la ni sgrubal bo rtag tu khro
bo'i zlos pa la gnas na slob dpon la rtsod pa dang/ lha thams cangaskyong pa dang/ dam pa'i chos stong pa dang/ thams cad du dam tshig nyams pa dang/ med pa dang/ sngags dang/ rgyud sangs
pas kyang gal te 'dod na nges par de'i mod la myur du 'grub par 'gyur bar khro bo khyod kyis gsungs so// bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje 'chang khro bo'i bdag pos 'di skad ces gsungs so// de nas
'dir mchog tu gsang ba chen po 'byung po 'dul ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po'i sgrub pa'i thabs gsus pa/ dang po ra zhige bklag ba tsam gyis 'grub par byed pa/ bran podang bram mo thamasarung sgrub pabyed
pa dpal rdo rje 'chang khro bo'abadag po bzlas pa tsamaM gyis myur du 'grub par byed pa/ don yod cing bgegs 'joms la grubapar byed pa'i sngags kyi tshig rnams so// oM hAhUMka tshu ka Tu/
chage mo hU~M hU~MhU~M// khro bo 'di dang bcas pas brgyad brgya bzlas pa tsam gyis myur du 'ong ste thams cad bran dang bran mor 'gyur ro// gal tem 'ongs na spyi bo 'gasangashang bskams te 'di//
rigs dang rang ga rigs brgyud rlag par 'gyur ro// 'byung mo'i gzugs ba lang gi ga'u wang gos bros te/ rkang pa g.yon pas mnan nas stong phrag brgyad bzlas na skad cig de la kye ma kye ma zhes/
zer zhing 'ong ste/ 'gum mo 'khum mo// kye sgrub pa po bka' rtsi stsol zhes zer ro// sgrub pa pos kyi 'byung mo bangag ga khol mo gyis shig ces skyas na de khol mo'i las thams cad byed do// gro
ba'i shun pa la ba lang go gi'u wang gis gzugs bar n bris te rkang pa g.yon pas mnan nas stong phrag brgyad bzlas na de'i mod la 'ong ngo// gal te de'i mod la ma 'ongs na nyungos gar gyis kha la

bsnun tsang sgra chen pos bsgul na 'byung mo de rims drag pos 'chi'o// byare gso ba ni mar dang sbrang rtsi khar bcug na mar 'tsho'o// 'byung mo 'dis bran mo'alas byang tsang sgrub pa po bdag zhing dang
gsum la ges ngang/ rgyun dang/ bza' ba nyi ma re re steraro// gtsug lag khang gi sgor song ste stong phrag brgyad bzlas na 'das ba glang ma'i blo gros zhes bya bar 'byung mi nga // phongs pa la/

gtor ma byin na sdug pa ngas tsa byi zhes pa'o// ma gyis shig ces bsgo na ma dang 'dra bar yongs su skyong zhing bdag nyid dang lnga la gos dang/ rgyan dang/ bza' ba la sogs pa ster re// 'byung po 'dul
ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las/ branamo sgrub pa'i chog rgyas pa'i le'u rdzogs so///de nas mchog tu gsang ba shin tugasang barma po 'byung po 'dul
ba'i rgyud chen po las/ 'byung mo sgrub pa'i thabs kyi chog rgyas par bishad par bya ste/ dbul po rnams la yanapa'i don du dngos grub kyi sgrub pa'i thabs khro bo nyid kyis gsungs pa// del 'byuyo
rnams kyi ming bshad pa/ rgyan can ma dang/ rna can ma dang/ dongashal can ma ngang/ seng ge ma dang/ rgod byed ma dang/ gang byed ma dang/ dga' ba ma dang/ 'dodapa'i dbang phyug ma dang/ lha
mo rnams so// 'byung mo brgyad po rnams chung mar donangu gnyer ram/ mar gtar ram/ yang na sring bor gtor na sgrub pa po dang gcig par song// mtshan mo dang nyin mo dus gsum du stong phrag brgyad

bzlas nas/ bzlas pa'i mthar mchod pa chen po byas nas gu gul gyi bdug pa byin te bzlas na/ de nas nam phyed kyi dus su rgyun tsanam nges par 'ong ngo// 'ongs pa la tsan dan gyi tshul yon chab bya na dga'
bar 'gyur ro// ma dang/ sring mo dang/ chung mar 'gyur te/ gang mngon par 'dod pa de smra bar bya'o// gal te mar gyur na ma 'khor brgyad brgyu'i ges dang/ rgyan dang/ bza' ba la sogs pa ster ro/

gal te chung mar gyur na ni dang tshe stong stong ster zhing/ dngul chu dang bcud kyis len ster ro// gal te srang mor gyur na med pag tshad stong nas bud med bzang mo blangs nas ster zhing/ dngul chudang bcud kyis

khen ster la/ lha' gter ster ro// mtshan mo dur khrod du song ste khri bzlas nas/ bzlas pa'i mthar rna cha ngang dngoshal can gyi 'byung ma nges par 'ong ngo/ 'ongs pa la khrag gi mchod yon byin na dga' bar/

'gyur ro// ma byas shagaces bson ma dang 'dra bar yongs su skyong bar byed de// mtshan mo lha khang stong par song ste khri bzlas na 'byung mo ngoshal can myur du 'ong ngo// 'ongs pa la chags pa smyung na chung mar

'gyur ro// 'gro ba bcu gnyis yongs su skyong bar byed tsang dang tshitaM shu rtsa lnga dang ras zung gcig ster ro// de nas seng ge ma'i sgrub thabs bshad pa/ mtshan mo lang ga gcig pa song so khri bablus n

rang nyid 'ongs shing/ kye sgrub pa po bka' drisAl zhes zhing/ sgrub pa pos chung ma gyis shig ces bso na lha'i dngul chu dang bcud kyis len ster zhing/ deng tsha brgyung ngang ras thungagatsag stangaro//

denas rgod byed ma' sgrub thabs bshad pa/ phyag na rdo rje'i khang par song ste phyag na rdo rje dang nye bar 'dab ma la bris la/ ka ra wA ra'i me tog byin de nam phyed kyi bar du bzlas na rang nyid rdo rje
'chang gi khyim du mi par 'ong ngo// 'ongs pa la tsan dan gyi chu'i mchod yon byin na/ kye sgrub pa po bka' du stsol zhes smra'o// sgrub pa pos bdag gamangag gzhug kyis shog ces brjod na rtag tu sa
su 'brang zhing ras dang/ rgyan dang 2 bza' ba la sogs pa ster ro// de ma lus pa zang par byas te// gal te cung zad bzhag na phyis 'byung bar ma 'gyur ro// mtshan mo gzhal yas khangaskyor
Tha Da @#// par byed do/ de nas gar byengama'i sgrub pa'i thabs bshad b/ chub 'dus pa'i 'gram du song ste// brgyad stong bzlas chos nyi ma bdunan mchod pa chen po byas la nyi ma/
shar btsam gyis bzlas pa rdzogs par skyu ste/ tsan dan gyi bdug khabyin nas khang bzlas na nam phyed kyi res nanges par 'ong ngo// 'ongs pa la 'dod pas longs sungan chung mar 'gyur ro// lha'i gser
srang brgyamal du deng nas tho rangs kyis 'gro'o// de bzhin du nyi ma re re rtag tu gnas par 'gyur ro// de'ang ma lus par zang pabyas te/ gal te cung zad lus na phyin chad 'byung bar ma'agyur
ro// de nas branaechanamo slab pa'i thabs kyi chog rgyas pa dngos grub sna tshogs grub par byed pa/ bzlos pa tsam gyis rtag tu 'grubatsang sbyin sreg gi las mi dgos la/ sngon du bson
pa byas pas phyag na rdo rjes ji ltar gsungs pa ltar skad cig de la 'grub pa'i dga' byed ma sgrub pa'i thabs bshad pa/ mtshan mo rang gi khyim sgo'abazlas na nyin gsum na nges par 'ong byed/
bran mo'i las byed cing sa bon thams cad dang/ shing ga las dang/ khyim gyi bya ba la sogs pa sgrub par byed do// de nas 'dod pa'i dbang phyug ma'i sgrub pa'i thabs bshad pa/ sha'i bras
khyer tem mo'i gnas su song nas mtshan mo 'dangashas bya ba byas te lan stong bzlas na ma bdunan nges par 'ong ngo// 'ongs pa la khrag gi mchong 'on byonan bdag po bka' ci stsal zhes smra bar
byed do// sgrub pa pos lhamo chung mar gyur cig ces sbas na chung mar 'gyur zhing re pa thams cad skong la rgyal srong ser ba byed do// de nas lha mo'i sgrub pa'i thabs bshad pa/ mtshan mowa lo'i
khang pa' song sa snyan bshams pa/ tsan dan dkarapo dang sna ma'i ma tog gis mchodatsang gu gul gyi bedug pa byin nas stong phrag brgyad bzlas na bzlas pa'i cha thar nges par 'ong ngo// 'ongs pa la
'khyud pa dang/ 'byas pa dang/ ltar dga' ba 'dod pa byas na lha mo gsar gyi mdogacan gzhon nu ma rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa chung mar 'gyur ro// dang tshabargyad dang/ ras zung gcig dang/
gnas rnams dang/ bza' ba bzang po rnams 'khor dang bcas pa la ser ro// 'di de kyis rnam thos sras kyi khang par 'adug na gsang ba'i mtha' dang/ bzlas pa'i mtha' la shan du gyur ba rdzas
blangs nas star bar byeng do// bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang gis de skad ces gsungs so// 'byung bo'adul ba'i rgyud chen po las/ 'byung mo brgyad kyi sgrub pa'i thabs kyi tshig rgyas pa'i le'u 'o//
dpal rdo rje'achangal phyag 'tshal lo// de nas shin tu'ada' bar dga' ba'i sgrub pa'i thabs lha chen po thams cad gsopar byed pa'i sngags kyi chog gsungs pa//
o hanahan/ sarba mA ra ya badzale hU~MphaT/ de nas 'di bshad pa tsam gyis stong gsum gya stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rdo rje rnonapo 'bar ba'i 'phrang ba'akhrugs pas gang bar gyur to//
dang@#// hUha na paNA/ danas ' bshad pa tsam gyis tshangs pa dang/ khyab 'jug dang/ dbang phyugachen po la sogs pa 'jig rten ba'i lha thams cad dang/ rig 'dzin du ma dang/
klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ 'byung po dang/ yi dgas dang/ lha'i bu mo dang/ sha za dang/ dra the dang/ mi 'am ci deng/ lto 'phye chen po dang/ nam mkha' lding rnams dum bu brgyang byas te/
dgug par 'gyur ro// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'ajam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' ngag tu med pa'i 'khor der 'dus pa rnams ngo mtshar
du gyur te 'di skad ces smras so// dpal rdo rje 'chang khro'o bdag kho tshan pa ma 'ongs pa'i tshem 'ongs pa'i dus na/ bdug pa dang wA thams nga tshar gcod pa ni legs so legs so// de nas lha'i
bu mo rnams langs te 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor der dpal rdo rje 'chang gyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te rang gi snying po phul ba/ o hi/ zla ba'i lha mo'i 'o// oMng+ga// thag le mchog ma'i 'o/
o/ gser gyi 'phreng ba ma'i 'o// o// 'khyil ba'i 'phreng ba ma'i ro// oM hUM/ rin chen 'phra ba ma'ilo// oM sa/ rtsom pa ma' 'i// oM su/ brang na gnas pa ma'i 'o//
o ba/ dpal rgyan mchi'o// de nas lha'i bu mo brgyad kyi dngos grub kyi sgrub pa thams cad kyi tshig bshad pa/ ri'i rtse mol song ste 'bum bzlas na 'grub par 'gyur ro// dems zla ba nya la

dzaltar 'byor pa'i mchod pa byas nas mar gyi mar me rab tu sbar nas mtshan thog thag khazlasan tho rangs lha mo rang nyid 'ong go/ 'ongs pa la tsan dan gyi chu'i mchodayon byin na duga' tshig sla bar byed do//
sgrub pa pos bdag gi chung ma gyis shog ces smras na dngos grub kyi rjes dang/ dngul chu dang/ bdud kyis len la sogs pa ster ro// de'i bcud kyis len gyis na lo stong 'tsho'o// de nas khrig/
le mtshog ma'i sgrub thabs bshad pa/ tsanangan dang 'o ma'i zas kyis khri bzlas nas ma bdunan khachod pa rgyas par bya sta/ yar gyi ngo'i tshes brgyad la ri'i rtse mor song la mtshan thog thag bzlas
na tho rangs nges por 'ong ste cung zad rgod pas chags pa byas nas mdun du sdod do// 'khyud pa dang 'o byas shing dga' bas chags par byas nas 'di ltar 'grub par 'gyur te/ gang 'dod pa de ster
zhing rgyab tu zhon na mtho ris su'ang 'khyerab byed do// gzhan yang rgyal srid stagabar byed do// de nas gser gyi 'phreng ba ma'i sgrub thabs bshang pa/ chu bo 'dus pa'i 'gram du song ste kim

bdumadu stong phrag brgyad brgyadabazlas nas nyi ma bdun pa la mchod ba rgyas par byas te/ gu gul gyi bdug pa byin nas mtshan thog thog bzlas na de'i tho rangs nges par 'ong ste 'dong pa thams cang sngon
par byed do// de nas 'khyil ba'i phra ba ma'i sgrub pa'i thabs kyi tshig rgyas par bshang ba/ tshes grangs ma ngagos shang rgyu skar yang ma degos la sbyang ba'ang mi dgos pa'i grub par
byed pa ste/ ri'i rtse mor song ste khri bzlas na de nam phyed na nges par 'ong// chung mar gyural dong tshe stong ster zhing/ dngul chu dang/ bdud kyisalen dang/ grub

pa'i rdzas seraro// de nas rin chen 'phyang ba ma'i sgrub thabs bshad pa/ lha'i khang par song ste zla ba gcig tu stong phrag brgyad brgyad bzlas nas zla ba de'i tha ma la zla ba nya'i bar du bzlas na
nam phyed na rkang gdub kyi sgra chen pos 'ong ngo/ 'ongs pa la me tog gi mchod yon byin na/ lha mo legs par 'ongs sam zhes smras nabadag po bdag gis ci bya zhes zer te/ sgrub ba pos
chung ma gyis shig ces bsgon/ chung ma las byed tshang lha mos 'dod pa sbyin par byed do// la stong 'tsho bar byed do// de nas rtsom pa mo'asgrib pa'i thabs bshad pa/ tshes gcig la
brtsams temachod khabyas nas tsan dan gyi sa dkyil 'khor byas te/ gu gul gyi bdug pa sbyin zhing dus gsum du stong phrag brgyad brgyad bzlas shang/ blab nya la mchod pa chen po byas nas
mtshan blogathag bzlas nas nges par 'ong/ gal te myur du ma 'das na 'chi bar 'gyur// 'ongs pa na chung mar 'gyural/ dngul chudang bcud kyis len ster zhing ji ltar 'a dod pas grwa
bar khyed la lo khri'atsho'ido/ gang ga 'chib na rgyal rigs su skye'o// de nas brang na gnas pa'i sgrub pa'i thabs bshad// mtshan mo lha'i khang par song ste/ tsananganagyi bdug ba sbyin
zhing khri khri bzlas nas zla ba de 'das pa dang/ jilA'abyor pa'i mchod pa byas nas mtshan thog thag bzlas na tho rangs myur du 'ong ngo// 'ongs pa la me tog gi stan phyir zhing legs par 'ongs so
zhes brjod na sgrub pa po bka' ristsol zhes zer ro// sgrub pa pos chung ma gyis shig ces smas na dngul chu dang/ bcud kyis len dang/ dngos grub kyi rdzas ster ro// gzhan gyi bud med
la mngon par 'grod pa spang bar bya ste/ le stong phrag lnga 'tsho// mtshan mo gcig gtsang sbra byas te gro ba'i 'dab ma la gur kum rgyas dpal gyi rgyu sman bris te tshan ngan gyi bdug pa srogatsang
bzlas la/ blo bde'i tha ma la mchod pa rgya cher byas te re zhig bzlas na nam byed na nges par 'ong ngo// 'ongs pa la myur du chags par byas na dga' bar 'gyur te/ dbyig dang/ gserang/
mu tig la sogs pa ster ro// ma re re thos bzang po stengazhing dngul chudang bcud kyis len ster bar byed do// bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so// lha'i bu mo rnams kyi tshog rgyas pa'i le'u/
de nas gsang ba pa'i ba ngag po phyag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsungs so// gal te lha'i bu mo rnams ma grub na de'i tshe'agro ba 'di dang bcas te bzla bar bya'o//
kaA ka/ chage mo hU~M dza/ phaT khrobo 'od dang bcas te bzlas pa tsam gyis spyi bo 'gas shing dum bu brgyad du 'dzag go/ sngags 'dis btsang bar bya'o// oM ban d+hu bamad+ha
han han/ tshige mo hU~MphaT/ sngags 'dis dbang du bya'o// o tsal tshul/ che ge mo sa ma a na la hU~M phaT/ lha kho thams cad sgrub pa'o// de nas 'di'i naMmo rnams
la phan ba'i don du lcamo brgyad kyi phyag rgya rab tu bshad par bya ste/ dngos grub sna tshogs grub par byed pa/ dkon mchog gsum gnas par byed b/ sngags bzlas pa bde bar grub pa'i
phyag rgyu khro bo nyid kyis bshad pa/ rgyud rnams kyi nang nas mchog tu gyur pa 'byung bo 'dul byed kyis gsungs pa 'di nyid la myur du bde ba sbyin pa'i lha mo rnams grub par byed pa/ bzlas pa
T+Tha tsam gyis 'byung mo rnams dang/ sring mo dang/ de bzhin du chung ma dang bran mo sgrub par byed pa// khro be zlos pa rnams la 'jig rten 'di'i bde ba sbyin pa'i bsnyen bkur mar sgrub pa'i thabs
so khu tshur so song bcangs te lag pa gnyis ka pad+ma 'khor ba'i tshul du byas nas/ gung mo'i song mo khab ltar byas pa brkyang ba ni lha mo brgyad po'i phyi'i bde ba thams cad sgrib par byed pa'o/
lag pa gnyis ka sor mo gtsug ga stang du gcig bskyon pa'i sbyor bas bzung ba na lha'i bu mo thams cad dbang du byed pa'i phyag rgya ste/ 'bar byed cing mngon du phyogs pa'i bying la//
thams cad du 'dod pa sgrubapar byed pa'i phyag rgya'o// lag pa gnyis ka pad+ma 'khor ba'i sbyor bas gzung ba ni lha'i bu mo thams cad rmongs par pyodapa'i phyag rgya ste/ btsangs pa tsam gyis skad
ba tsag de nyid la branamor 'gyur ro// oM sarba a ba sa ras ra/ o A gats+tsha hAdza? dza/ sngags 'das lha'i bu mo thams cad bod par bya'o// oM sam+basid+d+hib+ho gi shwa ra swA hA/ nyabar/
byed pa'i sngags so// oM kA ma pra mi swA hA/ mngon du byed pa'i sngags so// oM ba hAhAhU~Mdza dza/ lha'i bu mo thams cad rmongs par byed pa'i sngagasaso// 'byung po 'dul ba'i rgyud
chen po las/ lha'i bu mo rnams sgrubapa chog rgyas pa'i le'u'o// donas gnod sbyin mo thams cad langs te/ dpal rdo rje 'chang gi zhabs la spyi bos phyag 'tshal
terang gi snying po phul ba/ oM nA gats+tshasu ra sund ra swA hA/ sdug gu mdzes ma'o// oM namo harin ma sAhA/ ad 'phrog ma'i 'o/ bo kan ka ci thun dri ya swA hA/ gser ldan ma'i
'o o A gats+tshakAmashA dza swA hA/ 'dod pa'i dbang phyug ma'i go/ or tapa yaM swA hA/ rganam/ o panAl nA hA/ pad+ma ma'i 'o// o nartimahAtinaMsu rupa ma ti sA yA/
gar byed ma'i 'a// mo a nu ra gi ni mi thu ni swA hA/ rjes su chags ma'i 'o// de nas gnod sbyin mo brgyad kyi sgrub pa'i thabs kyi chog rgyas par bshad pa/ ngo rdzab chang gi khyim du song ste gu
gul gyi bdug pa sbyin zhing dus gsum du stong phrag re bzlasan zla ba ga tsag gnang du nges par 'ong/ 'ongs pa la tsan dan gyi chus mtsho mo byin na ma dang/ sring mo dang/ chung ma'i las
byed do// gal te mar gyur nasoms sun dbyung bar mi bya ste// dngul chudang bcud kyis le naser zhing me re re dong tshe stongaster ro// gal te srong bor gyur na ni grub pa'i
rdzas dang/ dngul chu dang/ bcudakyis len ster zhing lha'i bu mo bzang mo blangs nas steral/ 'das pa dang/ ma 'ongs pa dang/ da ltar byung ba smra bar byed do// gal tachung mar
gyur na bsam pa thams cad rdzogs par byed tsang nor gyi bdag po chen po byad do// de nas yode 'phrog ma'i sgrubapa'i thabs bshad pa/ rmubo'i 'gram du song sa tsan dan gyis maN+Dal 'bar
byugs te/ mchod pa shin tu chen po byas na a ka ru'i bdug pa sbyin zhing ma bdun du khribazlas nas nyim bdun pa la mchod pa rgyas bar byas te/ nam phyed kyi bar du bzlas na de na nges par
gal te ma 'ongs na 'chibara'agyur ro// bka' stsol cig ces smra bar byed tsang/ des bdag gi bran kho gyis shig ces bsgo na 'khor brgyad brgya'i zhal tabyed cing ngong tsho brgya nyim re la ster
ta des kyang ma lus par thad par bya'o// gal te rung thung 'jog na phyin chad 'byung bar m 'gyur ro// de nas gser ldan ma'i sgrub pa'i thabs bshad pa/ ba ru ra'angeshing gnas pasong ste/
nya dang shas sgrubatsang chang yang byanenas bdag nyid kyang btung zhing lcags par gnas par bzla bar bya sta/ stong phrag re re bzlas so// de bzhin du nyi ma bdunapa'i mtshan mo bsgrub par bya ste/
srong nam byed kyi bar du bzlas na nam phyang na rgyan thams capakyis brgyan te 'khor brgyad brgyas bskor nas rang nyid 'ong ngo// 'ongs pa la chags pa byas na chung mar 'gyur ro// 'kherab cugartis
kyi gso dang/ rgyan dang/ bza' ba bzang po rnams nyin gcig bzhin du ster zhing dong tshe brgyad ster ro// de nas 'dod pa'i dbang phyug ma'i sgrub pa'i thabs bshad pa/ gro ga'i 'angab ma la
ba lang go ga'u wang gis gzugs bar n bris de gcig pu stan la 'dug la stong phrag le ra bzlas so// de nas zla ba'i tha ma la mchod pa rgyas par byas te mar gyi mar me rab tu sbar nas/
mo sa bar gyur pas bzlas na mtshan mo de'i phyed na nges par 'ong ngo// 'ongs pa la chags pas longs sad na chung mar 'gyur ro// lha'i rgyan mal ngu dor tu tho rangs kyis 'gro bar 'gyur ro//
gzhan gyi chung ma la ma bgrod par ya nga bya ste/ gal tabaklong na rnam par 'dzems par byed do// de nas rgan mo'i sgrub thabs bshad pa/ gser gyi mdog can rgyun thams cad kyis brgyan
ma lag na ul thogs pa/ gzhon nu ma ras la rim dr-is tas ma'i me tog gis mchong tsang gu gul gyi bdug pa byin la stong phrag brgyad brgyadabablus te/ blab tha ma la dza ltar 'byed pa'i
mchod pa byas nas mar gyi mar me rab tu sbyar te/ ji srid nam phyed kyi bar du bzlas na nam phyeng na nges par 'ong ngo/ 'ongs pa la dga' bas chags pa byas na chung mar 'gyur ro// sgrub pa po
'khor dang bcas pa yongs su skyong bar byad tsang/ lhasa'adod par bya ba'i zas dang/ dngul chudang/ bcud kyis len ster zhing dong tshe nyishu rtsa lnga ster bar byed do//
de nas pad+mama'i sgrub thabs bshad pa/ rang gi khyim du mgo'i gnas su tsan dan gyi dkyil 'khor byas te/ gu gul gyi bangug pa sbyin zhing zla ba khyad du bablobar bya'o// de nas zla ba 1 la 'byor

ba'i mchodapa byas ti rdzasaMd nam phyed kyi bar du bzlas na nam phyung na nges par 'ong ngo// 'ongs pa la chags ba byas na chung mar 'gyur te/ lha chos 'dod pa ster zhing dngul chu dang bcud kyis len
ster bar byed do// de nas gang byed mi sgrub pa'i thabs bshangapa/ a sho ka'angeshang gi rtsar song ste bsgrub par bya'o// gsha' bza' ba dang/ sa dang/ droding/ me tog sbyin zhing
stong phrag brgyad bzlas na zla ba gcig gi nang du nges par 'ong nge// mdor bsdus na 'ongs na ma dang/ srang mi dang/ rlung ma 'gyur ro// gal te chung mar gyur na bza' ba dang/ bas zung re dang
dngul chu dang/ bdud kyis len ster zhing dong tshe brgyad ster bar byed do// gal te mar gyuranabaza' ba bzang bo dang ras zung re ster zhing gser srang brgyastar ro// gal te sring mo gyur na
dbag tshad stong nas bud med bzang mo blangs nas ster zhing gos dang/ rgyan dang/ bza' ba bzang po ster ro// dngul chu dang bcud kyis len yang ster bar byed de// de nas sringamo sgrub pa'i/
thabs bshad b/ gur kum gyis gro ga'i 'dab ma la gnod sbyin mo'agazugs bris te/ de nas tshes gtsug nas brtsams nas sos dang/ me tog dang/ mar ma sbyin zhing dus gsum du
bzlas pa byas nas zlo ba nyal ji ltar 'byed pa'i mchod pa byas te mar gyi mar me rab tu sbyar nas mtshan thog thag bzlas na de'i tho rangs nges par 'ong ngo// 'ongs pa la 'dod pas longs sbyang n

chung mar 'gyur ro// lha'i dong tshe stong ster zhing dngul chu dang bcud kyis len ster zhing lo stong 'tsho'o// 'byung po 'dul ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las/ gnod sbyin mo'i sgrub pa'i thabs kyi cho
ga rgyas pa'i le'u'o/// de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po phyag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsungs so// gal tedam tshig la ma gnas na khro bo 'didang bcas ta dgug pa'i phyir
bzla bar bya// lo tshu ka chu ka chu che ge mo yakI Ni dza dza/ khro bo 'du dang bcas te sngags stong bzlas na myur du 'ong// gal te myur du ma 'ongs na mig dang spyi bo 'gas shing de'i mod la 'chi

ste dmyal ba chen po brgyadi du khyung do/ de nas khro bo'i phyag rgyu'i mtshan nyid bshad pa/ khu tshur so sor bcangs to mthe'u chung gnyis 'khyud nas mdzub mo gnyis brkyang ste bkug pa 'di ni khro bo'i
mi phyad pa'i lcags kyu'i phyag rgya'o// phyag rgya'adis 'jig rten gsum yang 'gugs par byed do// de nas gnod sbyin mo'i phyag rgya bshad pa/ gung mo'i ser mo gnyis mi mnyam par byas te
srin lag rnam par brkyang zhange mdzub mo gnyis sbyar bar byas nas/ mthe chung gnyis snying por byas pa ni gnod sbyin kho thams rung kyi rtsa ba'i phyag rgyudam pa ste/ 'di
btsangs pa tsam gyis gnod sbyin mo thams cad 'ong ngo// phyag rgya'ang tong la mthe bong g.yas pas bod par bya'o// o d+haA gtsu A gats+tsha/ sarba yakA Na sAhA/ bod pa'i sngags so// phyag

rgya 'di nyide las mthe bong g.yonang sa sar gtang par bya'o// oM ak+ShaA gats+tsha A gats+tsha/ che ge mo yakI NaM/ shrI g+ho pu mar ga nam ya swA hA/ khu tshur so so nga bcangs te gung mo'i so so rab tu

brkyang ba na gnod sbyin mo thams cad mngon du phyogs par byed pa'i phyag rgya'o// oM ma hAyakaM b+hu mi thu na pra ye swA hA/ khu tshu mtshan bacangs la mtha'u chung brkyang ste dgug par gnod sbyin mo tham
cad bar byed pa'i phyag rgya'o// yaM kAm b+hog shA risA hA/ khu tshung phamatshun bsnol te lag pa gnyis mdzub mo gcig gi steng du gcig bskyon pa'i sbyor bgazhag pa ni gnod sbyin mo thams cad kyi
dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o kI/ sAng po'o// khu tshur phan tshun bcangs te mdzub mo dang gung mo baa ni gnod sbyin mo thams cad kyi bdug pa dang/ ma tog dang/ dri deng/ mar ma'i phyag rgya'o//
o sajam no harapra ye swA hA/ 'byung po 'dul ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las/ gnod sbyin mo'i sgrubapa'i thabs kyi chog rgyas pa'i le'u 'o///de nas klu'i rgyal mo rnams
wa/ langs te 'khor gyi dkyil 'khorader/ dpal rdo'achang gzhabs la spyi bos mngon par btung nas rang gnyayophul ba/ o a/ mo lu/ a nan mu khri pu/ shuphu bsu kho mu khaM shu 3i

phu pad+mam Nayu/ a bu ma hApadam Ni yu/ rnyi phu kano Ta mu khaM phu/ so phu shang ki ni phu/ dzu phu dza la mu kha phye tshu phu du ma ma kha phu/ klu mo brgyad kyi sgrub pa'i thabs kyi cho ga rgyas par bshad
pa klu'i khang par song ste 'bum bzlas pas sngon du bsnyen pa byas par 'gyur ro// klu mo rnams dga' bar 'gyur zhing klu mo thams cad 'tshig par 'agyur ro// yar ngo' tshis banu la klu'i khang
par chu 'bogs te/ bdug pa dang/ dridang/ me tog dang/ 'o ma rnams kyis ji ltar brjod pa'i mchod pa byas te/ de nas klu mo brgyad stong phrag re re bzlas na myur du klu mo'abu mo rnams rang gi

khyim nas 'ong ngo// 'ongs ba la legs par 'ongs so zhes brjod tsange/ bdag gi chung ma rgyase shogeces bsnyon nyim re re dang tsho brgyad brgyad so sor ster bar byed do// che ge mo 'tsho bar shog cig/
che ge mo sod tsage ces bya ba la sogs pa thams cad grub pa byed de// rlubo 'dus pa'i 'gram dusong ste 'o ma'i bza' bas stong phrag brgyad bzlas na/ bzlas pa'imathar klu'i bu mo bzang mo 'o 'ongs

pa la spyi bor ma tog sbyin zhing chung mar gyis shig ces bsgo bar bya'o// lha'i bza' ba bzang po dang dong tshol lnganyim ra ster bar byed do// klu'i gnas su mtshan mo song ste stong phrag brgyad bzlas na
bzlas pa'i mthar skad cig de nyid la klu mo spyi bo'i nad chen po dang tshabaragyur pas 'ong zhing/ sdug pa ngasaci bya zhes sa bar byed do// nga mar gyur cig ces sa na/ bdag

nyid dang lnga la ras dang/ rgyanangang/ bza' ba la sogs pa ster zhing dong tshe lnga lnga ster// mtshan mo pa'itshal du song ste stong phrag brgyad bzlas na klu'i bu mo rnams myur du 'ong/ 'ongs pa la
chags pa byas na chung mar 'gyur ro// dong tshabargyad brgyang ster te des kyang ma lus par thad par bya'o// gal te rung zad 'jog na phyin chad 'byung bar 'gyur ro// mtshan mo chub 'angus pa'i 'gram
du song ste stong phrag brgyad bzlas na brdzus pa'i mtha'al klu'i bu mo ngas par 'ongang// 'ongs pa la gsar gyi par gdam byin te legs par ngos so zhes brjod cing bdag gi chung ma gyis shig ces bsgo

na/ nya ma re regasangasrang re ra sbyin par byed do// mtshan kho rgya mtsho chen porasong snya stong phrag brgyad bzlas na de nam bzlas pa'i mtha' la ku'i bu mo 'ong ngo// 'ongs pa la bdag gi chung ma rgyus shig
ces bsgo na dong tsho gcig dang ras zung gcig ste bar byed do// klu'i khang par song ste lta ba nub tsam du chu zhugs te stong phrag brgyad bzlas nade nas bzlos pa'i tha ma la klu'i bu mo 'ong go//
ba la spyi bor me tog byin te legs par 'ongs so zhes brjod cing chungam gyis shig ces bsgo na/ dong tshe brgyad dang lha'i zas bzang po stabar byed do// mtshan mo klu'i khang pa song ste mtshan thog

'awa//thag bzlas na de'i khongs rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan te klu'i bu mo yang cig de la 'ong ngo// 'ongs pa la me tog ngang tshan ngan gyi mchod yon byin te legs so zhes brjod tsang chung ba gyis shig ces bsgon/
lha'i dngul tshudang/ bcud kyis len dang/ grub pa'i rdzas ster zhing bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed la rgyal sring ltar bar byed do// mtshan mo klu'i gnas su song ste khri bzlas na
klu'i bu mo nges par 'ong ngo// klu 'ongs pa la myur du chags par byas nas chung ma rgyas shig ces bsgo na/ khyim re re dang brgyad dang/ lha'i bza' ba bzang po dang/ gos rnams ser ba byed do/

mtshan mo klu'i khang par song la stong phrag brgyad bzlas na/ nge nas bzlas pa'i tha ma la klu'i bu mo ranges pa 'ong ngo/ 'ongs pa la klu'i me tog spyi bor byinen chung mar 'gyur zhing/ lha'i ras dang/
rgyan dang/ bza' ba la sogs pa ster ro/ de nas klu mo'i dam tshig gi sngags bshad pa o lu/ A gats+tshan gan[G ]/ bod pa'i sngags so// oM oM phu/ spos dang me tog gi sngags
so oM lu/ sa pu drading mchodao ragyi sngags so// sa yu/ yaM phu/ haMyu/ ba phu/ klu mo thams cad kyi dam tshig gi sngags so// phu A gats+tshA u gtsA/ oM hUM phu nA ya swA hA/
slar gtang ba'i sngags so// de nas klu mo rnams kyi phyag rgya'i mtshan nyid bshad pa/ thal mo mnyam par byas te sor mo rnams mgo bo'i tshul du sbyar la mdzub mo kha bsgyurabs mthe bo'i sor
mo brkyang ba ni klu mo thams cad kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o// las thams cang byed cing grub pa'o// dgug pa'i phyag rgya dang/ slar gatang ba ngang/ mchod pa'i phyag rgya ni khu

tshur so so bcas te/ mthe'u chung gi sor mo mthe bas mnan nas sor mo lhag ma brkyang ba ni klu mo thams cad kyi phyag rgyago/ 'byung po 'dul ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las/ klu mo rnams kyi sgrub
pa'i thabs kyi chog rgyas pa'i le'u 'o// gde nas gsang ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes khro zhing gsol te khro bo 'ongadang bcas nas gsungs pa/ o d+ha ra Na badza hU~Mche ge mo na gi/
A kar a swAhUMphaT phaT/ de nas 'di bshad pa tsam gyis klu thams cad brgyal zhing 'gyel te spyi bo nang chen pos sha'i// gal te dam tshig las 'das na khro bo 'di dang bcas te bzlas pas sgyur
du'ang zhing dmyal ba chen po brgyad du ltung bar 'gyur ro zhes/ dpal rdo rje 'chang gis gsungs so// 'byung po 'dul ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las/ klu mo rnams sgrub par byed pa'i chog rgyas
pa'i le'u'o// de nas 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor ram 'amar mo drug langs te// bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje 'chang gi zhabs la spyi bos bdunas rang gi snying po phul
ba oM ma no hariswA hA/ oM su b+ha ga sA/ oM bangesha la ne traHswA hA/ oM su ra h+pha lo sA hA/ o asho mu khaM swA hA/ o pa theg ramu khaM swA hA/ donas ma rem tsa mo drug gi sgrub pa'i
thabs kyi tshig rgyas par bshad pa/ ri'i rtse mo la song ste stong phrag brgyang bzlas nam 'am tsa mi drug gi bzlas pa rdzogs pa dang mchod pa shin tuchen po byas te/ ba lang kaM sha dang gu gul dang
ldan pa'i bdug pas bdugatsang ji srid nam phyed kyi bar du bzlas na nam phyed na nges pa 'ong// dela'ajigs pa ma byas nakyi sgrub pa po bka'adu stsol zhes su bar byed do// sgrub pa pos
kyang[>pazang mo bdag gi chung ma gyis shig ces sas nas/ rgyab tuzhonan lha'i 'jig rten du 'khyer bar byed tsang bza' ba bzang postar bar byed do// de nas sgrub pa'i thabs phyi ma bshad/
pa ri'i drung ngam gtsug lag khang du khri bzlas na bzlas pa'i mtha' la rang nyid 'ong zhing/ lha mo lag pa 'jam pos rkang ba la nyug par byed cing/ myur du chagos ba byas nachud mar 'gyur
zhing dong tshabargyad dang gos zung gcig sterab r byed do/ rlu bo'i 'gram du song nas khri bzlas nas ya nga mtshan thog thag bzlas na tho rangs nges par 'ongado 'ongs nas rlung mar 'gyur zhing
nyim re re dong tshalnga lnga ster bar byed do// mtshan mo chubo 'dus pa'i 'gram du stong phrag brkyang bzlas na bzlas pa'i mtha' la nges par 'ong zhing ltakhar byed do// nyim gnyis pa la mdun du
'dug cing gtam sa bar byed do// 1ma gsum pa la chags pa spyad na nges par 'grubatsang chung ma'i las thams cad byed la dong tshebargyad dang ras phrugs gcig ster bar byed do// nyin gcig

bzhin du ri'i rtse mor sha zazhing khri khri bzlas na lha mo'i gzugs kyis myur du 'ongs shing mdun du sdod do// 'khyud cing 'o khyas tem sna bas chags pa byas na chung mar 'gyur/bzhon ngura'i rtse mjashazazha za 'a
ta dongo tshabargyad stong nam zhing lhas mngon par 'dod pa'i bza' ba ster bar byed do// 'byung po 'dul ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las/ mi 'am tsa'i bu mo sgrub pa'i thabs kyi cho ga rgyas
pa'i le 'u 'o// de nas gsang ba'i bdag po phyag na rdo rjes 'ad skad ces bka' stsal to// dbang phyug chen po lha chen po khyod nyon cig/ 'jig rten gsum gyi bdag
skya/ po lha rnams kyis 'da' bar bya ba ma yin pa mngag gzhug ma lus pa sgrub par byed pa// ma rungs pa rnams dang lha rnams la bstan par bya// de nas dbang phyug chen po lhachen pos 'di skad
ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das mi phyad pa bstan pa/ 'jig rten gsum gyi lha rnams kyis 'da' bar bya ba ma yin pa sgrub pa'i thabs kyi tshe ga rgyas pa'i le'u dang/ phyag rgya dang/ sngag/
kyi rim par phye ba bshad du gsol/ danas 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de na gnas pa rnams kyis/ lha chen po la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ shan gdul dka' ba rnams 'dul bar byed pa
gsol ba btab pa ni legs so legs so// de nas rdo rje 'chang khro bo'i bdag po chen pos 'di skad ces gsungs so// khro bo' dikyil 'khor dam pan// gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// rtababs
bzhi yas rnam par brgyan// cha rnams bar drug dag dang ldan// rdo rjer bas mdzes pa 'o// de yi dbus su drag po che// rdo rje khro bo dgod byab// 'bar ba'abrang ba 'khrug cing gsal//
bskal pa mtha'ama'i me 'od 'dra// lha chen mig san sbyara'adrazhing// thod pa'i phreng bas rgyan du byas// drag shul bzhadatsacher 'jigs pa// 'jig rtenagasum po 'jig mdzad pa'o//
bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yas logs su// lha chen po ni bro bya ste// bzho mu tig ltar dkar zhing// de bzhinadakar po dung 'dra zhing/ mag gsum pa la lag bzhipa// zhi zhing lag pa gon
pa na// mdung rtse gsum la thogs pa'o// g.yon pa'i phyogs kyi char ni// sred med bu ni bro phye ste// g.yas pa na ni rje yapa dung// g.yon na 'khor lo gsal shing go/ rgyab tu brgya byin
rgyal po ste// de bzhin smin drug mdun du 'o// tshangs ba lag na gdugs 'a ni pa// kha ba che tog kund dang// zla 'dra brgya byin madun bri ste// rang gi stan la 'khod par ro// yang na
sngags pas mu tig dang// ba ma zhi 'dradakar po ni// rdzayab thogs par sminadrug b+baM// tshangs pa kha dog dmar po bri// brgyaban kha dog ser po bri// rgyan kun gyis na rnam spras shing//
rdza yab thogs pamakhyab 'jug bri// dbazhin khyu mchog la zhon par// lha chen po ni bri bya ste// kun 'agyod lag na'akhongal can/ ngang pa la zhon bri bar bya// brgya byine glang chen zhonapa ste//
saMnajug rma bya zhon pa 'o// phyi rol dang ni grwa rnams su// 'byung mo brgyad ni bri bar bya/ pad+ma can dang pad chen dang// rnam 'byungam dang lha 'joms ma// 'brog
ma mchog dang rin po che// rgyun ma 'gro ba skyong ma rnams// dbal gyi sgra yis rab grags pagi/ 'byung mo chanamo brgyad po sta// par can dang pad can m// pad dkarapo ltabu'abri/
rnam 'byung ma dang lha 'joms ma// kha dog dmar por bri bar bya// 'byung mo bzhi rnams mtshungs par ni// gseragyi mdog tu bri bar bya// rdzu 'phrul che ldan 'byung lo brgyad// jiltar
bstana bzhi n de legs tra// de nas 'dir dkyil 'khor gyi chog bshad pa/ rdo rje slob dpon bdag nyid ma tog sngon po'i 'phrang bas brgyan cing gtsug tor sngon po bcings nas rdzas sngon bo thur
gcig bgos te/ sngon bzhin du khro bo'i saMng po 'di brjod pa bya ste/ sems can kun la phan don du// myur du dngos grub sbyin mdzad pa// grub pa'i rje rdza khro bo ste// wa nyid dam
tshig la bzhugs shig/ oM hUM badzaphaTas/ 'di brjod pa tsam gyis lha thams cad grub par byed do// de nas 'dab rdo rdzogasor ba bshad pa/ 'di ltar yi ge hU~M zlos shing phyag na rdo rjes
ka gsungs pa ltar/ lha thams cid gzhom zhing lha'i bu mo thams cad dang/ gnod sbyin mo dang/ klu mo dang/ 'byung mo rdzu 'phrul chen mo can rnams skad tsag de nyid la gzhom par bya ste//

rdo rje gasor ba'i sbyor ba dang ldan pas/ oM badzra dIpI ma hAkro d+ha hand gapa tshum ra ya hUM hUMphaT phaT/ brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas te skad cig de nyung la lha thams cad gso nga rung 'khrug par byang ngo//
hU~MhU~M phaT phaT/ sbyor ba 'dis kyang nges par sangs rgyas rnams kyang zhig par byed do// de nas slob ma gzhug par bya ste// khro bo'i phyag rgya go chabyas pa sngags 'dis dbab par bya'o//
mo bkro d+ha hU~M hU~Ma dz+wa la/ ma la a ku la/ g+ho Sha Na badz+dza a/ 'di brjod pa tsam gyis phyi rel gyi dbab pa dang/ dgug pa dang/ ltung bar bya ba rnams nus par 'gyur ro// de
nas 'byung po 'dul ba'i rgyud chen po las/ khro bo'i dkyil 'khor gyi chog rgyas bar bshad pa/ o b+haTasang harAdzad+hir hi/ khro bo'i mingun du'o// oM hu[é ]/ ma hApad ba ti da nur ba
na d+ha ra hU~M/ rgyab tu'o// o phub hU~Mti/ oM kusho d+ha ra Ni hU~Mdza/ lho ru'o// hU~Mbu sur hari Natsanam Ni dedzad+ha ra Ni hU~M/ g.yon du'o// o Tabar har Na put+pahar hU~M/ me tog dbang
ldan gyi grwa ru'o// o shar tAshA ri pa hes hU~M/ sos mi'i grwa ru'o// o Ta b+ha yoN gnang+ha hasta hU~M/ dra bdenubral du'o// o'u dze gangapA linaAdA pa ta hU~M/ mar marlung du'o// de

nas 'byung lo brgyad kyi phyag rgya'i chog rgyas par bshad pa/ khu tshur yan tshunabacangs tamadzub mo gnyis brkyang ba ni seng ge 'i rgyal mtshan ma'i phyag rgya'o// lag pa g.yon pa khu tshur bcangs te
gung mo rkyang ba na yod bzhin gyi nor bu'i rgyal mtshan gyi phyag rgya'o// phyag rgya 'di nying rkang pa'i phyogs su gzhag pa ni gzhu dang mda'i phyag rgyago/ lag pa galas
khu tshur bcangs te mdzub mo bskyang ba nas bstsal ba na lcags kyu'i phyag rgya'// thal mo mnyam par byas te ma dzub mo gnyis bkug pa naMme tog ga phyag rgya'o// sor mo rnams phan tshun 'khyud de
mdzub mo gnyis brkyang ba ni smos kyi phyag rgya'o// lag paso sor bskyang so dpung pa'i rtsa ba gnyis su gzhagapa na de'i phyag rgya'o// lag pa g.yas pa khu tshur brtangs te gung mo'i so mo rab tu
brkyang ba na mar ma'i phyag rgya'o// 'byung po 'dul ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las/ khro bo'i dkyil 'khor gyi tshig rgyas pa'i le'u 'o///de nas 'byung po brgyad kyi sgrub
pa'i thabs kyi chog rgyas par bshad pa/ mo dza// gzhan gyis mi thub pa'o// oM hU~M// rgyal ba'i 'o// oM hUMdza rdzogs byed kyi'o// oM su pra/ dur khrod kyi
bdag po'igo/ oM rudza/ rig sngags kyi dbang phyugaga'o// u0f00 hi/ hU~M// 'byung po'i dbang phyug gi'o// oM oM dza// mngag gzhug mchog gi'o// 'byung po gzhan gyis

ma thub pa'i sgrub pa'i b bshad pe/ rdo rje'achang gi khyim du song ste sngon du'abum bzlas te sngon du bsnyen pa byas par 'gyur ro// de nas zla ba nya la mchod pa rgya chen po byas taji ltar gsungs pa'i
'bras chan dkarapo dang/ sbrang rtsa dang/ zho dang/ bu ram dang/ 'o ma dang/ sha rnams kyis mchod cing gu gul gyi bdug pa byin nas mtshan thog thag bzlasan tho rangs nges par 'ong ngo//
gal te nges par ma 'ongs na skad cig de la 'chi'o/ 'ongs na bsgo ba don med khar mi byed do// sgrub ba bos mngag ga zhug gyis shig ces bsgo na de phanachadamangag gzhug gi las byed l/ ril

'dzin pa'i rgyal srid ster bar byed cing dgra thams cad tshar gcod par byed do// zla ba'i lhamo blangs nas ste gzhung rgyab tu zhonanalha'i 'dzagi rten du'ang 'khyer bar byed do// brgyabyan nyid kyang ster bar
byed tsang bskal pa bdun 'tsho'o// de nas rgyal ba'i sgrub pa'i thabs bshad pa/ mtshan mo sbyin byeng ma'i mdun du song ste/ nyim re re stong phrag brgyad brgyad bslus na nyi ma bdun pa la mchod
pa rgyas par byas te/ gtor ma sbyin zhing gu gul gyi bangagu pa byin nas bzlas na/ bzlas pa'i mtha' la nges par 'ong ste/ kye sgrub pa po bka' stsol zhes smra bar byed do// sgrub pa pos
mngag gzhug gyis shig ces bsgo nas rgyab tuzhonanaglang ba rigs pa rnams su'ang khyer bar byed tsang/ gzhan yang rgyal srid stabalo lo lnga stong 'tsho'o// de nas rdzogs byed kyi sgrib pa'i
thabs bshad pa/ rdo rje'achang gi pho brang du song statim bdun du stong phrag brgyad brgyad bzlas nas nyim bdun pa la mchod pa rgyas par byas te/ 'bras chan dkar po dang zhes dzaltar gsungs
bya// pa ltar byin nas/ ji sridinamakhyad kyi bar du bzlas nanam phyedanarang nyid 'ong ngo// 'ongs pa la me tog gi mchod yon byin na dga' bar 'gyur te rgyal srid ster bar byed do////
bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed cing lo stong 'tsho'i// ji srid 'tsho ba de srid du mngag gzhug gi las byed do// che ge mo 'tsho bar gyis shig/ che ge mo sod cig ces sas na de dag
thams cad byed do// kun turdzogs byang kyu sgrub pa'i thabs bshad pa/ sku gdung dang bcas pa'i mchod rten gyi drung khri bzlas na ston du bsnyen pa byas par 'gyur ro// de nas zla ba nyal ji ltar
sku 'byor pa'i mchod pa byas te/ ji srid nam phyed kyi bar du bzlas mnam phyed na rings par 'ongs nas mdunadu sdodad// kyi sdug pa ngas ci bya zhes smra bar byed do// sgrub pa pos mngag gzhug gyis
shog ces bsgon de yan chad mngag gzhug ga las thams cad byed do// gnod sbyin gyi bu mo bzang mo blangs nas ster zhing gtor thams cad stopal lhas 'dod pa'i bza' ba ster ro// nyin gcig/

bzhin du ras dmar po zung re ste zhing dong tshe lnga steral lo lnga brgya'atshe'i// de nas dur khrod kyi bdag po'i sgrub pa'i thabs kyi chog rgyas par bshad pa/ mtshan mo dur khrod du song ste nyi ma bdun du
stong phrag brgyad bzlas na nyim bdun pa la 'byung po la sha dang/ nya dang/ til dang/ 'dzam bu tidang/ mngar gsum thanagyis grol ba'i ril bu dang/ sha kham tshad du gtubs pa bsregs
nas mar la brjos la 'dzam bu tig dang/ 'bras chan dang/ zho dang/ bu ram dang/ 'o thug dang/ sran tshod dang/ snum 'khur rnams kyis ji ltar gsungs pa byin nas gu gul gyi bdug
pa'i ng byin te/ ji sridi nam phyed kyi bar du bzlas naha ha zhes bya ba'i sa thos par byed do// 'jigs par ma byas na rang gi 'khor gyi tshogs kyis yongs su bskongata'ong// 'ongs pa la gtor
ma byonan dga' bar 'gyur ta'abyung po' mngag gzhug byed do// nyi ma re re dang tsho brgyad brgyud sku zhang dgra thams cad 'joms te lo lnga stong 'tsho'o// de nas rigs kyi dbang phyug gi sgrub pa'i
thabs bshad pa/ lha'i khang par song ste so sa dmar po dang/ me tog dmar po dang/ gu gul gyi bdug pa snyan zhing khri bzlas na sngon du bsenapa byas par 'agyur ro// mtshan mo nag po'-i tshes
bcu bzhi la nya dang/ sha dang/ til dang/ 'dzam bu ti dang/ 'bras chan dmar pos ji lta bar sgrub rung/ du ru ka dang me tog sbyon te/ ji srid nam phyad kyi bar du bzlas na nam phyed na snang
bachen bo dang/ 'jigs par byed pa'i gzugs kyis 'ong ste/ de la 'jigs par ma byas na sdug pa ru bya zhes su bar byed do// sgrub pa pos mngag gzhug gyis shig ces bsgo na/ nyi
ma re dus gsum du deng lnga lnga ster bar byed do// lhas mngon par 'dod pa'i bza' ba ster bar byed tsang lo lnga stong 'tsho'o// de nas 'byung po dbang phyug gi sgrub par thabs bshad pa/ mtshan M
'a@#// mo lang ga gcig par song ste/ gcig pu nub gsum du 'bros rmanadamar po dang/ 1dang/ shas gtor m sbyin zhing ra skyes kyi[︽]sha dang/ gu gul dang/ sbrang rtsi dang ldan/
pa'i bdug pas bdug tsang stong phrag brgyad bzlas na nyes dang po la lam du mthong ba byed do// nyim gnyis pa la rang nyid mthong bar byed do// 3ma gsum pa la rings par 'ong zhing mdun du 'jug
nas 'di skad sba bar byed do// bka' rtsi stsol/ de nas sgrub pa pos mngag gzhug gyis shig ces brjod par bya'o// rtag tu phyi bzhin 'brang bar 'gyur zhing/ rang nyid song nas mi zad
pa'i gter star zhing 'angs pa dang/ ma 'ongs pa dang/ de ltar byung pa rnams sa bar byed do// gos dang/ rgyan dang/ bza' ba bzang po rnams ster bar byed cing lo nyis stong 'tshob
byed do// de nas pho 1 mchog gi sgrub pa'i thabs bshad pa/ rdordzo'achang gi khang par song ste nag po' tshes bcu bzhi la khri bzlas nas nyi ma bdun pa la sgrub pa brtsam par bya ste/ tsan dan

gyi dkyil 'khor bsgrub par byas nas gu gul gyi bdug pa sbyin zhing me tog dkar bo dang/ 'bras tshan dkar po dbal mang dbukhrug sbyin zhing ku sha'i khri la bdug ste/ mar gyi mar me rab tu sbar nas mtshan mo
ji srid nam phyed kyi bar du bzlas na mngag gzhug mchog rang nyid 'ong ste/ 'ongs pa la tsan dan gyi mchod yon byin na/ kyi sgrub pa po bdag gi tsar+ya zhes sna bar byang do// de nas sgrub pa pos
0/ bdag gi mngag gzhug gyis shagaces bsgo na/ de yachadamadzag gzhug par 'gyur zhing lhas mngon par 'dod pa'i bza' ba ster ro// dngul chudabcud kyis len ster zhing ga tar red par
byang la rgyab tu zhon nas mtho ris su'anga'akhyer bar byed tsang/ gzhan yang rgyal srid ster bar byed do// 'byung po 'dul ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las/ mngag gzhug sgrub pa'i chog rgyas
pa'i le'u'o//de nas 'dir yang dag par bshad pa ni/ dngos grub sna tshogs sgrub par byed pa slob dpon rnams la phan pa'i don du ji ltar gsunges ba mngag
gzhug pa'i thabs te/ bstan par bya ba ma yin pa'i le lo can dang/ sdig pa byed pa dang/ rdzun du smra ba dang/ tshul 'chos can dang/ dbul po dang/ nad kyis gdungs pa dang/
tshe thung ba dang/ sems mi brtanapa'i mi rnams kyang sbyang bar mi bya ste/ gal te longs sbyod dang/ nor dang/ grags pa 'dod na'ang skad cig gis phun sumatshogs par star ro//
sngags 'das dngul chu dang/ bcud kyis len pa'i dngos grub dang/ lha'i rgyal srid kyi dngos grub kyang grub par byed na/ mi rnams kyi rgyal srid grub par byed pa lta smos kyang tsha dgos
te de bzhin du 'di lha' khri tsho thams cad skad cig tsam gyis grub par byed do// gsang sngags 'di ni bklags pas grub par byed cing shin tu brtson 'grus dman pa rnams la'angaji ltar
nga@#// bde ba ltar myur du grub bar byed tsang/ sems can thams cad la bdeb rab tusbyin pa/ yi ge bzhi po tshar gasangab/ dngos grub thams cad ster bar byed/
in dbaklags pa tsam gyis mngon par grub par byed ba ste/ 'dil the tshom mi bya'o// 'byung po 'dul ba'i rgyud chen po las/ dngos grubakyi sgrub pa'i tsheg rgyas pa'i le'u'o//
de nas 'byung po 'dul ba'i rgyud chen po las/ 'byung po brgyad kyi phyag rgya'i mtshan nyid bshad pa/ so mo rnams phan tshun 'khyud de/ gung mo bskyang nas khab ltar gzung ba ni 'byung po
chen po gzhan gyis ma thub pa'i phyag rgyago/ phyag rgya'ang nyadilas gumo bkugatsangemadzub mo brkyang nas bkug pa ni rgyal ba'i phyag rgya'o// phyag rgya 'di nyid las mdzub mo g.yon pa bskyil zhing

mthe'u chung brkyang ste so sor gzung ba ni rdzogs byed kyi phyag rgya// sor mo phan tshuna'akhyud de gzung ba ni kun tu rdzogs par byed pa'i phyag rgya'o// phyag rgya 'di nyid las mthe'u chung dang mthe bong nang
dubakug ste gzung ba ni dur khrodakyi bdag po'i phyag rgya'o// mthe'u chung gnyis rab tu brkyang ste gzung ba na rigs kyi dbang phyug gi phyag rgya// thal mo kha sbyar tamadzub mo gnyis bkug pa naM
pho nya mchog gi phyag rgya'o// 'byung po 'dul ba'i rgyudakyirgyal po chen po las/ 'byung po'i rgyal po chen po brgyad kyi phyag rgya'i mtshan nyid rdzogs so//
bdag kho phyag na rdo rjel/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rdo rje slob dpon la phan pa'i don du bsenabakur ma'i sgrub pa'i thabs dpal chen po zhes bya ba'i 'byung mo rdo rje slob
dbon gyis bsgrub par bya ste/ 'byung mo rnams kyis yidel dga' ba skyedatsang phan tshun tshim par byed pa'o// de nas 'byung po 'dul ba'i rgyuda chen po las/ 'byung mo dpal chen mo'i sgrubapa'i thabs
kyi chog rgyas pa re bshad pa/ dbol khro bo'idag po bcom ldan 'das kyi mdun du 'bum bzlas nasdonangubasnyen pa byas par 'gyur ro// de nas gla ba nyal ji ltar 'byor pa'i mchod pa byos te/
gu gul gyi bdug pa sbyin zhing mtshan thog thag bzlas so// de nas tho rangs nges par 'ong ngo// 'ongs pa la tsan dan gyi mchod yon sbyin zhing legs par 'ongs so zhes brjongan/ kye sgrub pa po
bka' stsol zhes pa'o// sgrub pa pos bdag nyid kyi chung ma gyis shig ces brjod na lha'i dngul chudang bcud kyis len ster zhing/ dngos grub kyi rdzas dang/ gteradang/ rgyal srang rnams
ster bar byed do// zhiba'i sgrub pa'i thabs kyi chog rgyas ba dang po'o/// de nas gzhan yang nan tur gyis sgrub pa'i thabs bshad pa/ grog 'dab ma la 'byung mo dbal chen
mo bros te/ mtshan mo gcer bur gyur pas dpal rdo rje'achang gimadun du stong phrag brgyad bzlas na myur du'ong ngo// 'od s ba lo chags pa byas n dga' bar 'gyur ro// 'jig rtanagasumagyi
rgyal srid kyang ster bar byed do// brgya byin yang ster ro// rgyab tu zhonan mthorasi su'ang 'khyerazhing lo khri 'tsho'o// gal te ma gruban mig dang spyi bo 'gas shang bskams la/

skad cig de nyidal u0f8bchi'o zhes khro ba nyid kyis gsungs so// gur kum gyis mang bris te rkang pa g.yon pas mnan nas rdo rje gasor zhing yi ge hU~MhU~M phaT phaT lanamadun brjod mabarjod pa gyur pas nges par
skad cig gis 'chibar byed do// 'byung po 'dul ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal bo chen po las/ sgrub pa'i thabs kyi tshig rgyas pa'o/// gu gul gyi bdug pa sbyin zhing gtor ma bshams te ras
dkarapo bkab la sngags 'dilan gsum brjod do// dab saM b+hu ta ma hi ta/ pra Ni pa ta ya/ ba ba dzaed pra thog pra thag ma hA b+hUtu/ sA sa nam/ tu tragatsA tis ni nge ba a la ye tunadI tete/
tsa tu khe/ e ka laM gi wa/ de ba a ya ta ni wa/ shrI g+ho gats+tshano/ b+hu tAnam ma sa ma ya/ pra ti pa la nu ya/ ya da sa i bon gtsA tA til+li Na/ murtani/ su la yod/ b+hu tAnA ri ra waM na
ra kaM pa ted/ ya thaya tha/ sA sa ni gtsAn/ ya tha su kha swAhA/ rdo rje slob dpon gyis sa rnams nye bar bsdu bar bya'o// 'byung po 'dul ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las/ rim par phyab
gnyis pa rdzogs te/ 'byung po 'dul ba zhes bya ba'i rgyud stong phrag bcu drug pa las ji snyed pa rnams rdzogs so// rgya gar gyi mkhan po bud+d+ha A ka ra bamadang/ lo
tsa ba dge slong chos kyi shes rab kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o//// @#/ rgya gar skad du/ AranAlAm ba ra d+ha ra badzra pA Ni kal nA/
ma d+ha ra Ni/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa lag na rdo rje gos sngonabo rumany+tsa tshog zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rjegos
sngon po can/ sangs rgyas gang+gA'i klung ga bye ba phrag 'bum gyi bye ma snyed kyis rjes su gnang pa/ mche ba gtsigs pa dang 'tsham pa/ mog me mdag gi phung po 'dra ba/ dbugs me lce ltar
'bar ba/ 'jigs pa'i nga ro can/ lag pa dang rkang pa klu nor rgyas kyi bus brgyan pa/ klanagapo se ral khar thogs pa/ klu dga' bo dang nyang ga' bo 'bar bas rna cha byas pa/ sbrul
'bar ba'i rin po che'i cod pan thogasal/ sbrul gdug pa 'bar pa za ba/ bzhin rgyas pa/ smin ma dang dpral ba bsdus pa/ a sos ma marlumanan pa/ gshin rje'i cha byad can/
lce glog ltar 'agyu ba/ gsus po chu sbrul za ba/ lag pa brdabs pa'i sgras 'jigs par byed pa/ klu'i rgyal po 'dab bzang ska rags su btsangs pa/ a la la zhes sgrog par byed pa/
rgya mtsho'i zabs su dpag tshad brgyad khri yod pa rkang pa'i pus moraphyin pa/ dbang po dang nyi ma phrag pa la bskur ba/ klu thams cad rlag par byed pa/ gang rgyangs chen po sgrogs pas kun tu
/@#// 'khrugs par byed pa/ gshin rje'i gzugs can/ khams gsum pa 'jigs par byed pa/ klu rnams 'chi bar byed pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de nas sangs rgyas[}]

bcom ldan 'angs gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyis gsungs pa'i rig sngags 'di brjod par bya'o// tad+ya thA/ b+ho b+ho panan ga/ a d+hipa ta ye/ a dananAlaM ba rang+ha dzasha rA re/ badzad Na h+pha de yan/
ya sa ma ti/ kra ma 7/ uN sAng nam b+ha ba ti/ tad+ya thA/ bud+d+ha bud+d+hA/ ba bud+d+hA ba bu/ mA ti kra ma tha/ har har/ nAgA nAn/ pra har pra har/ nAgAnAn/ tshan tshan+ti/ nA ga srid
A naM kA b+hin+da b+hin+da/ nAg ma Ni pi Ne maN+Da/ nA ga sha re rANi/ bso ya/ nA gon ya nA naM/ tad+yathA/ hUMphaT/ nA ga bo de ra ya hU~M phaT/ na ga ko tasA da na pa phaT/ ni lwa ba sa na a phaT/
a pra ti ha ta ba lA a pha// pa ra kro mA ya yatwA/ kr-i tAn tA ya phaT kr-i tan rU pa la phar/ roNaN pa pha// tA sa nA ya paN+Da/ kus+sa Dong sA da na ya pha3/ pra tapa ngeshA tsa/ ba nesha ka rA ya
paT/ ya a pa smA ra/ ba nA sha ka ra ya phaT/ has has/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ ma ra ya ma ra ya/ nAsha ya nA shayaM/ sachapahU~M phanisha ka ra ya phaT/ sarba sha tuMsaM btarab sha ka ra a phaT/
rA ra d+har/ badzapA NaMrAdzA pa ya ti swAhA/ de'i chog laganod sbyin gyis zin pa la ni chul sngags kyis btabal gtor mgatangabar 'gyur ro// klu bzlog par bya na skyagashad kyi lcag ma/
00 'am bal po sa'u'i lcag mas bya'o// ya dgus dang brjod byed rnams la ni skud pas bya'o// rims nad med par bya ba dang/ gzhogs phyed na ba dang/ ma ka 'chus pa 4na skud pa sngon/
pos bya'o// nor 'dod na zhag gcig sbyang ba byas te pog por gyis bdugs na/ rmalam du dug ba dang mi dge ba'i don thams cad ston la gser gyi dang tsho bdun stong sbyin par byed do//
rgyas btab pa ragrol bar 'dong na thal bas bya'o// sgo lcags dbye bar 'dod nanyudakar gyis bya'o// 'jigs pa thams cad las srung palas namerarong pa 'am thal ba 'am/
yungs kar gyis bya'o// nad kyis 'jigs pa thams cad la ni skud pa sngon po las srung ba'i mdud pa byas te mgul du btags na srung ba'i mchog tu 'gyur ro// byis pa gdon gyis nyon
ba thams capal naMtshon sna lnga'iskung pa mgul du btags na srung ba'i mchog tu 'gyur ro// chom rkun bzlog par 'dod nasas bya'o// dug la na rtswa ku shas byab par bya'o// bdag srung ba
lani yod kyis sam chus bya'o// gzhan srung b.lan skud pa sngon pos bya'o// las de thams cad la sngags brjod pa ni sngags lan gsum mam/ bdun nam/ bcu bzhi 'am/ nyi shu rtsa
gtsag gam/ brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas par bya'o// de ltar byas na 'grub par 'gyur ro// mchod rtenasku gdung dang ldan pa'i drung du me tog sngon pos mchod de/ sngags stong bzlas brjod byas
@#/// na 'grub par 'gyur ro// 'phags pa lag na rdo rdzogs sngon po can zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so/// rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzanagaN+Dadang/ la
tsa ba ban klu'i dbang pos bsgyur///dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen bo lag na rdo rje drag po la phyag 'tshal lo// o
mutsal sogA/ mu kha so sAhA/ mo hani sAhA/ dan+ti'i sIhA/ chog ni khyor bgangal bzlas pa byas te 'thungs nas sems bzhin du nyal na lag na rdo rje s rmi lam bstan par 'gyur ro// rmi lam
bathong bzhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so// 1// 'thags pa lag na rdo rje'i mtshan brgyad pa gsang sngags dang bcas pa/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub
sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lagan rje rdzo 'khor gyi nang nas langs te/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su thal mo
sbyar ba btung nas/ bcom ldan 'dra la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das sems can rnams kyi don gyi slad du rig pa mchog ga tshog rgyas pa chen po gsang ba dang bcas pa/ gsang
nadang bcas pa bdag gis bshad lags kyis/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po ri pho brang lcang lo can du mas la sems can rnams gdul bar 'tshal lo// de skatshes gsol nas/
bcom ldan 'das kyis/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces paka' stsal to// lag na rdo rje gang khyod kyis rig pa mchog gi chog rgyas pa chen po ' bshadab na khyod gtumapa
yin/ bstan par daka' ba yin/ shin tu thub par dka' ba yin/ 'phags pa'i tshul med pa yin te/ lag na rdo rje khyod kyis rig pa mchog gi chog rgyas pa chen po bshad pa gang yin pa dedag
thams cad ni gsang ba med par las mi byed do// lag na rdo rje de bas na rdo rje'i rigs 'du dang ragi pa mchog gi chog rgyas pa chen po 'di bde blag tu 'grub par bya ba'i phyir/ khyod kyi ming brgyud
pa gsang ba gsang sngags kyi 'khor dang bcas pa gang thos na mtshams med pa lta byed pa'i ng sdig pa 'byang bar 'gyur ba dang/ yag na rdordzi khyod kyang mthong bar 'gyur ba dang/ bgegs dang log

'dren thams cad kyang 'byang bar 'gyur ba dang/ log 'drenubye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi rnams kyang phyogs bcur 'byer bar 'gyur ba dang/ gangashes na tshangs par mi spyad pa'i ng
tshangs par spyod par 'gyur ba dang/ thub par ma byas pa'i ng thub par byas par 'gyur ba dang/ sbyang bar m byas pa'i ng snang ba byas par 'gyur ba dang/ dag sbyong ma yin pa'i ng dge sbyong gi 'bras
bu dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyang de la srung bar mdzad pa dang/ las kyi dngos grub kyang stsol bar 'gyur ba bshad par bya'o// de nas bcom
ldan 'das lag na rdo rjes/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la gtugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gi ming/
brgyad pa gsang ba gsang sngags kyi 'khor dang bcas pa rnams gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lagan rdo rjengs bshad kyis nyon cig/ 'di lta ste/ khyed ni glang
bo che'i rna btsan An/ khyod ni rgyun bzang po dang ldan pa yin/ khyod ni rnam par gnon pa yin/ khyod ni rinapo che'i 'byung gnas yin/ khyod ni bangan pa nyang yin/ khyong na gzugs sdugapa'i
rgyan dang ldan pa yin/ khyed ni 'bar ba'i mi lce dang ldan pa yin/ khyodan gzugs mdzes ba yin no// khyod kyi ming 'di dag mkhas pa drag gis thos na/ bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig/
brgya stong phrag bdun gyi bar du sems can romyal bar skye bar ma 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyang de 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshomangunan bzhugs shing de dag de la chos
ston bar mdzad do// chos bstan ba nges na de dga' ldan gyi lha rnams kyi nang skye bar 'gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang thabs cig tu gnas par 'gyur

ro na mo bud+d+hA s+ya na mo d+harmas+ya/ nam / saM gA s+ya/ na mo badzAyA Nis+ya/ tad+ya thA/ an+d+he/ man+d+he/ kha ran+d+he/ so ma so ma su khaM/ hiri hiraM/ mi ri ki ra/ b+ho ri bo sa ni saMng+gan/
sarba kAr+ya Ni sA d+ha ya mtshub paH sAhA/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen polag nardo rje s/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das legs
so 'di ltar gsang ba chen po bka' stsal ba gang lags pa de ni legs te/ bcom ldan 'das de da lags so// dade lags te/ bcom ldan 'angs rig pa mchog sgrub pa na bzlas
brjod bgyid pa drang sgrub pa'i tshemachod pa bgyis la gang brgyad pa bklag par bagyi'o// bklags nabadag bstod par 'gyur te/ dga' nas dngos grub stsal bar 'atshal sgo/ bge
kyang 'byung bar mi 'gyur la/ lha rnams kyang dga' nas myur du dngos grub stsol bar bgyid do// nyal ba'i tshabaklags na rmi lam ngan pa mthong bar mi 'gyur/ sku gdung dang ldan pa'i
mchod rten gyi drung du lano'abum du bzlos brjod bgyis na sdig pa thams cad las grol bar 'gyur ro// mtshams med pa lnga bgyid pa'i ng bskal pa bzang por byang chubo soms par 'gyur
ngo zhes bdag mchi'o/ lan 'bum bzlas brjod bgyis na slob dpon du 'gyur re// lag na rdo rje'i mtshan brgyad pa gsang sngags dang bcas pa rdzogs so//
pa!/ ts+tsha// rgya gar skad du/ badza bde ra Na nA ma d+haraNi/ bod skad du/ rdo rje s rnamapar 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang byang rtsub mas dpa' thams cad
la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje la bzhugs te/ sangs rgyas kyi mthus lag na rdo rjes lus thams cad jo rdzar
byin gyisabarlabs nas rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// de nas lag nango sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs dang/ byang chub sems dpa' thams
cad kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis/ rdo rma khro bo las byung ba rdo rje snying pos rab tu smras te/ mi chod pa/ mi shigs pa/ bdenapa/ sra ba/ brtan pa/ thams cad du thogs pa med pa/
thamasacad du ma phab pa/ sems can thams cang skrag par byed pa/ sems can thams cad 'jil bar byed pa/ rig sngags thams ca du gcod par byed pa/ rig sngags thams cad
gnon par byed pa/ las thams cad 'joms par byed pa/ gzhan gyi las thams cad 'jig par byed pa/ gdon thams cad rlag par byed pa/ gdon thams cad las thar par byed pa/
'byung po thams cad 'gugs par byed pa/ rig sngags kyi las thams cad byed du 'jug pa/ ma grub pa rnams grub par byed pa/ grub pa rnams myudam za bar byed pa/ 'dodapa
thamos cad rab tu spyin pa/ sems can thams cad srungab/ zhi ba/ rgyas pa/ soms nyamathams cad rengs par byed pa/ rmugs par byed pa'i gsang sngags kyimathu chen po 'ad
sangs rgyas kyi mthus lag na rdo rje rab tu sa so// na morat+na trayA a/ na ma ts+tshAbadzrapA Na ye/ ma hAyak+Sha se nA pa ta ye/ tad+yathA/ oM tru Ta tu Ta/ tro Ta ya tro Ta ya/ spo Ta soN/ so

ya spo Ta ya/ g+ho ts+tshAg+ha N+Na/ g+ha N+Napa ya g+hAts+tshapa a/ sarba satwA naM/ bo d+ha ya borAya/ saM bo d+ha ya saM bo d+ha ya/ b+ha ma b+hum/ saM b+ham ya saM b+hAm ya/ sarba b+hU tAnaM/ ku'u kuN+Da/ saM ku ya saM ku
ma saN sha tunaM g+ha g+haT+Ta/ saM g+hatshul saM g+hal ya/ sa'i btsubadzab= so Ta ya badzabadza/ ka ra ya badzabadza/ ma Ta ma badza badzra/ ma tha badzab/ atsA As nil badza/ su badzra
a sAhA/ haru/ naru phul+la/ gri ku/ ma lotsu/ ku ruku/ badzabi dza yA ya swAhA/ kI la ko lA a sAhA/ kaT ka Ta/ ma Ta ma Ta/ ra Ta ra Ta/ mo Ta na/ pra mo Ta nA ya swAhA/

tsa ra na tsir/ hAre har/ sa ra sa ra/ mA ra ya ma ra ya/ badzrabodAr ya sAhA/ ts+tshani ts+tshan+ti/ b+hin+d+ra b+hin+d+ra/ ma hA kI li kI la ya sAA/ ban+d+ha ban/ kro dko d+ma badzra kI li kA la a swAhA/ tsuru
tsungutsaNA kI li kI lA ya swAhA/ dus ya tres ma badzAkAlo kA la yo sAhA/ har har/ badzad+har la sAhA/ pra har lnga har/ badzapra bany+tsanA ya sAhA/ ma tisi ra badzra/ spu tiso re badza/ pra

tisaM rab dza/ ma hAbadza/ a pra ti ha ta badza/ a mo g+ha badza/ a tibadza/ shwa aMbadzaa sAhA/ d+har d+ha ra/ d+hiraM d+hiraM/ d+hu ru d+hu ru/ sarba badzra su khaMA parta ya swahA/ a mu kaMm ra ya phaT/
nam/ sa man+tabats+tsha/ sarbab 46ba brtaye ma hab le ka Tab ta tsa le/ atsale/ maN+Dal ma e/ a ti badzra/ ma hAb le be ga ra Na/ a dza ti/ dz+wa la dz+wa la/
ti Ti ti Ni/ pa ga le da had ha/ te dzob ti/ til tili/ ban+tapan/ ma hAb le/ badzaku sha dzA lA ya swAhA/ na mo ratatAA a ka namash+tsaN+Da badzra pA Na ye/ ma hA yak+Sha se nA pa ta ye/ tad+yag/

o har ha ra badzra/ ma tha ma tha badza/ d+hu na d+hu na badza da ha da habadza/ patsa pa tsa badza/ d+har d+ha ra badzra/ d+hu raya d+hAr la badza/ daru Na dA Nob dza/ na tsun+da badza/ b+hin+da b+hin+d+ribadza hU~Mya/
na mats+tsha badzakro d+hA ya/ chu lu hulu/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/ ban+d+ha ban/ han ha na/ a mr-i te hUMphaT/ sdig pa thams cang byang byas nas// sdug bsngal thams cad mad par byed// rgyud do cog
gi rtsa ba ni// dpal kun gyis milegs par brgyan// sems can dbang po nyams pa dang// tshe zad pa dang tshe nyams dag/ phunasum tshogs min gang chugs dang// lha rnams rgyab
kyis phyogs pa dang// mdza' sdug skye bo sdang ba dang// bran bza' la sogs gtses pa dang// phan tshun mthun pa ma yin dang// nor 'grib pas ni gnod pa dang// mya ngan ngal dang gnod pa
dang// 'jigs pa dngan 'khongs pa dang// gza' dang rgyu skar byad ltams dang// ma bzang gdon gyis nyen pa dang// mya nganangal las byung ba yi// rmilam stag pa mthong na yang/ des rab
bkrus gtsang ma yin// mdo sde dam pa mnyan par bya// gang dag yod dge sems dang zhing// gtsang ma'i gos kyis rab brgyan te// zab mo sangs rgyas stod yul ba// mdo sde 'di ni nyan/
byed na// mdo sde 'di yi gzi brjid kyis// srog chags dag ni thams cad kyis// mi bzad pa ya nang rnams kyang// de dag thams cad zhi bar blta// tshe dang bsod nams 'phel bar 'gyur/
sngog pa kun las rnam par grol// nor bu yungs kar dur ba dang// rin chen mdatsan danabacas// shel dang rdo rjem tog dang// rlumaM gsaram yang na ni// dngul gyi bum pa dag kyang rung/
gtsang ma'i gos kyis dkri zhing dag/ lan grangs nyi shu rtsa gcig gam// yang na lanagrangs brgya rtsa brgyad// rdo rje rnam 'joms bzlas nas ni// rgyal po rtag tukhrus gyis shig/ rdo rjes
rnam par 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so///rgyagar gyi mkhan po dzan mi tradang/ dAn shA la dang/ bod kyi lo tsa ba banang+ge ye shes sdes bsgyur nge zhus tegatan
la phab pa//@#// rgya gar skad du/ Arum badzame ru sha kha ra ku tu gur d+hAr Ni/ bod skadadu/ 'phags pa rdo rje'arirob ngar po'i rtse mo'i
khang pa brtsegs pa'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdagogiso thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'angs rdo rje'i lhan po'i rtse mo'i
khang pa brtsegs pa rdo rje chen po'i tangeng 'dzin gyi sa gnas/ rdo rje chan po'i dpag bsam gyi shing ljon pas legs par brgyanapa/ rdodrachen po'i rdzong ga rani po cha'i par 'i
kyis snang bar byas pa/ sa phyogs rdo rje chen po'abye ma bdal ba/ jo rje chen por byin gyis brlabs pa/ 'khor gyi khyams rdo rje nganabo las byas pa/ lha'i dbang po brgya pan gyi rdo rje chen po'i
seng ge 'i khri bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag stong gis rnam par mdzes pa/ chos bstan pa dang cho'aphrul can/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis byin gyis brlabasal/ tshes thams
cad kyi mnyam pa nyid la 'jug pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis nges par 'byung ba na/ byang chub sems dpa' byab khrag khrig 'bum phrag brgyad du rtsa bzhithams cad kyang skye ba gcig gis
thogs pa/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldeg pa/ mthu chen po thob pa/ rdo rje chanapo'i rnam par thar pa'i dang nge 'dzin gyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam pa 'phrul
bdang rmo 'phrul chen po kun tu ston pa sems kyi skad cig thang cig yud tsam cig la sems can thams cad kyi sems dang spyod pa'i rjes su 'jug pa'i chos bstan pa sna tshogs mnyam pa nyidasnyan M
cang rgya che la zab pa dang/ spobs pa dang/ cho 'phrul dang ldan pa/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing du marade bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa rgya chen po'i sngo nagyis mchod pa ngang/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo
dang/ gzungs dang/ ting nge 'dzinadang/ dbang dang/ mngon par shes pa dang/ ma 'dres pa dang/ byang chub kyi yan lag dang/ lam dang/ sa bdudang/ pha rol tu phyin pa dang//
thabs la mkhas pa dang/ bsdu ba'i dngos po dang/ byams pa dang/ snying rje dang/ dga' ba dang/ btang snyoms dang/ byams pa'i stobs dang/ dben pa dang/ yongs su byang ba'i

sems kyi rgyun dang ldan pa sha stag la 'di lta ste byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje snying po zhes bya ba dang/ rdo rje'i mig dang/ rdzordza'i lus dang/ rdo rje blo gros dang/ lag na rdo

rjedang/ ngo rdzo 'dus pa dang/ de rjemathu bo tshe dang/ rdo rje rnam par 'phrul pa dang/ rdo rje bartsegs pa dang/ rdo rje phung po dang/ rdo rjeng ro dang/ rdordzabazang po dang/ byang chub sems dpa' semA
dpa' chen po rdo rje tog ces bya ba dang/ de dag la sogs pa byang chub sams dpa' bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi dang/ 1na thos nabo rab tu mang po thams cad kyang dgra bcom
pa zag pa zad pa/ srid par kun tu sbyor bzad pa/ yang dag pa'i shes pas soms shin tu rnam par grol ba/ rdzu'aphrul gyi stobs dang tsho'aphrul bsam gyis mi khyab pas rnam par
'phrul pa'i mthu chen po thob pa/ ltakha chags pa med pa/ thams cad kyang dri ma dang bralab/ kun nas nyon mongs pa'i bag chags kyi sa bon nges par bsregs bshastag la 'di lta ste/
tshodang ldan pa sha radAti'i bu dang/ tshe dang ldan pa byams ma'i bu gang po dang/ tshodang ldan pa ka pa na dang/ tshe dang ldan ng rab 'byor dang/ tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po/
dang/ tshodang ldan pa skul byed dang/ tshod ldan pa dga' byed dang/ tshe dang ldan pa ga ya 'od srungs dang/ tshe dang ldan pa 'od srungs chen po dang/ tshe dang ldan pa steng rgyas 'od srungs dang/
de dag la sogs pa nyan thos chen po rab tu mang po dang/ lha'i bu dbang phyuganapo la sogs pa gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu grangs med dpag tu mad gzhal du med pa dag dang/ mi mjed
kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang/ lha'i bu tshangs pa bzang po la sogs patshangosaras kyi lha'i bu rnams dang/ lha'i bu rab 'thab bral g.yog 'thab bral kyi lha'i dris kyi lha'i budang bcas pa dang/
yongs su dga' ldan dang/ 'phrul dga' dang/ gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin lha'i bu thams cad kyi 'khor can dang/ lha ma yin gyi dbang po thags bzangs dris
dang/ stobs can dang/ rab saMm dang/ sagacan dang/ rnam par snang byed dang/ de dag la sogs pa lha ma yin gyi dbang po tshang med grangs med dpag tumed pa rnams dang/ klu'i rgyal
pa rgya mtshodang/ ma dros pa dang/ 'jog po dang/ nor rgyas kyi bu dang/ dung skyong dang/ stobs kyi rgyudang/ pad+ma dang/ pad+ma chen po dang/ mtha' yas dang/ de dag la sogs pa klu'i

rgyalapo tshad med grangs med dpag tu medadag dang/ ma 'o ma cu'i rgyal po lnga pa mi 'a ma'i rgyal po'agamog bum can dang/ dri za'i rgyal po gtsug phud lnga pa dri za'i rgyal po'i g.yog du ma can dang//
rig sngags 'chang gi rgyal po don thams cad grub pa rig sngags 'chang gi rgyal po'i g.yog du ma can dang/ nam mkha' lding gi rgyal po gsar mig nam mkha' lding ga rgyal po'i g.yog du ma can

dang/ gnod sbyin gyi rgyal bo rinabo rnam thos kyi bunor bu bzang dang/ gang ba bzang dang/ gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po lngas rtson gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po'i g.yog du ma can dang/ 'phrog ma bu lnga brgya'i
g.yog can dang/ 'jig rten gyi ma bdunadang/ sring mo chen mo bdunadang/ drang srong chen po bdun dang/ bar snang la rgyu ba'i rgyu skar dang/ gza'i lha thams cad drang/ phyogs kyi lha rnams
dang/ phyogs mtshams kyi lha rnams dang/ sa'i lha dang/ rabyangs can dang// 'byung po rnams dang/ bgegs rnams dang/ loga'adren rnams dang/ yi dwags dang/ 'byung po
rdzu 'phrul chen po rnams dang/ ri'i rgyal po thams cad dang/ 'jig rten skyong ba myulha g.yog rgya mtsho'alhathams cad dngabacas pa dang/ 'phags skyes po dang/ mig mi bzang dang/ lag
na be conadang/ bden bral dang/ me'i lha dang/ rlung gi lha chen po bdunadang/ dbang bdagachung ma dang bcas pa tshogs bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma'i 'khor can dang/ sridamed kyi bu
g.yog dang bcas pa dang/ byin pa bo dang/ 'phrang bcan dang/ lcags can dang/ tshogs kyi bdag po chen po dang/ sngonata la dang/ log 'dren dbang po bgegs log

'dren gyi g.yog du ma can dang/ shangegaseb kyi lha drug nu dang/ srang mo bzhi ming po dang bcas pa dang/ ma bdunadang/ rdo tshalcags kyu can dang/ rdo rje lu gu rgyud dang/ rdo rje po 11mo drug cu rtsa bzhi
dang/ rdo rje'i sbi dang/ lag bzang dang/ gtsug gis 'gro rdo rje'i rigs kyi 'khor du ma dang bcas pa dang/ de ma yin pa gzhan yang sangs rgyas dang/ chos dang/ dge 'dun la mngon par dad pa'i
lha dang/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ driza dang/ lha ma yin dang/ nam mkha' lding dang/ mi 'am ci dang/ lto 'phye chen po dang/ 'byung pa dang/ yi dgas dang/ sha za dang/ so byed dang/
brjod byed dang/ sgrub pa dang/ sbrul 'dzin bcas dang/ gnon bo tshang mang dpag tu mad grangs med pa rnams dang/ lha'i bu nyi ma dang/ lca'abu zla ba dang/ dus tshigs kyi ltadang/ nub ka'i
lha dang/ dus kyi lha thams cad dang/ gnam sa'i lhathams cad dang yang thabs cige ge/ de ltar yang bcom ldan 'ongs de chos kyi 'khor lo shan dubaskor/ sas rgyas kyi mdzad pa jishani dachos
su mthar phyin/ bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs shin tu yongs su rdzogs/ thams cang mkhyen pa nyid dang/ byang chub chen po dang/ pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ sa bzhes pas ni shin tulos
su bzung/ skyes bu chen po'i mtshan 'bar ba sum cu gnyis kyis na sku brgyan/ dpe byad bzang po brgyadanus niyan lag dang nyid lag thams tsanga rnam par spras/ drugatsug ni sems can thams
kyis bltar mi mthong/ bdud kyi tshang ma thams cad nadakrugs/ de kho na nyid mkhyen pa nyade na ris par thugs su chud/ sbyan rnam pa la nimanga'/ rnam pa thams cangamakhyen pa'i mchog
dang na ldan/ thams cad mkhyapa'i a shes dang ni ldan/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad ni ldan/ bdud dang/ phas kyi rgol ba dang/ nganapa'itshogs can gyi tshogs thams cang na bcom/
brjod pa'i sgra dang tshigs su bcad pani'aphags/ khyu mchog dang seng ge 'i sgra ni sgrog/ ma rig pa'i mun pa ni kun tu bsal/ bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag grangs med dpag
tumed par sbyin pa dang/ tshul khrims dang/ bzod pa dang/ brtson 'grus dang/ bsam gtan dang/ shes rab dang/ thabs dang/ stobs dang/ smon lam dang/ ye shes kyi ya
rol tu phyin pa dang/ dka' ba spyad pas mngon par grub pa'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum du rtsa gnyis dang/ dpa byad bzang po brgyud nus su brgyan pas na mdzes shing/ rinapo chardo rje'i

pad+ma'i snying po'i seng ge 'i khri la nangezhugs te/ gdan rin po che dang/ rdo rje'i paru'i sing go'i khri re reb tsam rdo rje dang/ rin po che dang/ mu tig dang ldan pa'i dril bu g.yer ka'adra ba du ma
bya@#// sil sil sgra 'byung ba/ rdo dang rin po chadu ma'i stegs bu la rtsa ba legs par brten pa/ de dang rinapo che du ma'i chun gyi kha nas byung ba'i mu tig dmar po'i 'phreng ba
dang ldan pa'i snam rten dang bcas pa/ rin po chadu ma'ipa'i snying po la chags pa'i rin po che ke ke rudang/ ke ke ru chen po dang/ an da tshul dang/ mthon ka chen po dang/ dunalas du ma'i 'od
zer 'barabs snang bar gyur pas kun tumadzes pa/ rin po changang ngo rje'i thur mas brgyan pa'i gdugs lu bas bstod pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du mas grib mar bsgribs shing bskyabs pa/
dpag bsam gyi ngeshing du mas mdzes par byas pa rgya cheb la bzhugs te/ gser gyi ri bo ltar dpal gyis 'barab/ nyim song bas lhag pa'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor 'byor pas sa phyogs mdzes
par gyur pa/ bla ba nya ba ltar 'ajig rten kun gyis mthong na dga' b/ dpag bsam gya shing ljon pa chen po ltar sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyis yang dag par rgyas par chos ston te tshangs pa spyod
pa thog mar dge ba/ bar du dge ba/ tha mar dge ba/ don bzang po/ tshig 'bru bzang po/ ma 'dres pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ yongs su dag pa/ yongs su dkar ba yang dag par
Aston to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyi gtsug gi mtshams kyi mdzod spu nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kun tu ston pa zhes byaba'i 'od zer gyi dra ba chen po byung ste/ 'od zer gyi dra ba des/
stong gsum gyi stong chen po' jig rtenagyi khams 'di sang bas gsal bar byas par gyur to// gang+gA'i klung ga bye ma janyid pa dang mnyam pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag thams cad kyang snang ba des
gsal bar gyur to// sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag nas nigs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag bzhugs pa de dag kyang seng ge 'i khro du ma bkod pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i gzhal med khang rnams na chos
ston to// nyan thos chen po de dag dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag dang thabs cig go/ dge slong dang/ dge slong ma dang/ dge bsnyen dang/ dge bsnyen ma dang/
lha dang/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ dri za dang/ lha ma yin dang/ nam mkha' lding dang// mi 'am ci dang/ lto 'phye chen po rnams dung byung thabs cig go/ de dag thams cad kyang rdo rje'i lhan kho
chen po'i rtse mo'i khang pa brtsags pa'i gzungs yang dag par rab tu ston to// de dag thams cad kyang kun tusnang ngo/ skad cig de la sems can de dag thams cad bdab thams cad kyis
tshacig par gyurato// 'on ba rnams ni sgra thos so// long ba rnams nimig thob bo// skyonapa rnams na drenapa rnyed do// nad pa rnams ni sos par gyur to// sbrum ma rnams ni bde bar b tsas
so/ sems can dmyal ba thams cad kyi sdug bsngal rnams ni mid par gyur to/[{]yudatsami re la duda'agro'i skye gnas dang/ yags kyi skye gnas dang/ gshin rdzo'i 'o jig rten rnams kyi ming
cha @#// yang mi grag par gyur to// 'jig rtan gyi bar gang dag mun pa mun nag dang/ mun pa mun nag chen por 'dug pa de dag thams cad kyang gsal bar snang bar gyur to//
can dang sems can gang dag skyes pa de dag thams cungadang/ sems can gzhan 'dir skyes pa rnams kyang gcig gis gcig shes so// de nas sems can de dag thams cad kyis ngo mtshar rmad du
byung ba'i chos kyi dga' ba thobs bdab mchog gis tsham par gyur nas kun tu bltas pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyus mthong sta/ de dag gis
gser gyi mchod sdong ltar dpal gyis 'bar zhing rang gi gzi brjid kyis mngon par 'phags pa de mthong nas de nyid la skyabs su dong ngo// skyabs su dong ma thag tu de dag thams cad de bzhin
gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khorade nyid du bdag son pa snyam du shes so// snangab des bdud kyi khyim thams cad kun tu 'bar/ rab tu 'bar/ kun tu rab tu mched tsang 'bar te me lce

gcig tu gyur par kun tu snarang// bdud kyi ris kyi lha de dag kyang skad cig de la nyam thag pa'i sgrarangu zhing skrag nas byer ro// bdud sdig can yang bzhan bzang po ni ni po gyur cing lus rngul nas bdun
kyi rjes kyi lha'i bu thams cad la smras pa/ grogs po dag bdud kyi khyim thams cad kun tu 'bar/ rab tu 'bar/ kun tu rab tu mchong cing 'bar te me lce gcig tu gyur ba dang/ dge sbyong go'u ta
mgarab kyi rtse mo'i khang pa brtsegs pa mchos bstanab 'di la ltos/ des bdag cag phung ngo// mtho btsums so// phyogs gang na gnas su gtol med do// longs la dge sbyong go ta ma de'i gan du
dong ste bdud kyi yul 'di thal bar byas par ma gyur kyi bar du gzhom mo// de skad ces sas pa dang/ bdud kyi ngos kyi lha'i bu de dag thams cad kyis rje bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes smras nas//
rang rang gi gnas su dong sta/ lag na mtshon cha sna tshogs can/ lus la go tshasna tshogs pa/ chapyad dang rgyan sna tshogs can/ mche ba mi bzad par 'jigs su rung ba/ bzhin mi sdug par
bsgyur ba/ mig dang/ bzhin dang/ sgra kun tu'abar zhing rab tu 'bar ba dag skadacig de nyid la gcig tu 'dus nas/ bdud sdig can g la ba der dong ste phyin nas bdud sdig can la 'di skad
ris sbas so// bzhengs bzhengs thog mar bzhud la jatsim du dge sbyong go'u ta ma nyan thos dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang bcas pa datsa nis kyang phyis bdagacag gi yul du gnodapa
rlung zad kyang ma skyed pa dang/ bdag cag gi yul gnod pa'i m 'gyur bar deng nyid du phye mar bag go/ rnam par gzhom mo// de nas bdud sngagacan dga' zhing mgu stangashin tu dga' bas

spu'i khung bu khyabanas skad cig de nyid la bdudakyi ris kyi lha'i bu thams cad dang lhan tsan+d+rig tu bdud kyi rnam par 'phrul pa chen po dang/ bdudakyi sde chen pos bar snang dpag tshad stong phrag brgyud
[s/]ka@#/ ]cu rtsa bzhirekhyab par byas te/ dung dang/ rnga dang/ rdza rnga dang/ 'khar rnga dang/ rgyudagacig pa dang/ lcags kyi sol khrol dang/ ngabo che rdung zhing shu hu zhes bya ba dang/
bzhis bya ba dang/ thung zhig zung zhig/ sodatsag sod tsakaces bya ba sa 'byin cing gshol dang/ gtun shing dang/ gtunarkang nyag dang/ phur bu dang/ rdo rje rtse gag pa dang/ mda' bo che
dang/ mdung thung dang/ rtse gsum pa dang/ ral gri dang/ 'khor lo dang/ gzhu dang/ mda' la sogs pa'i mtshon cha lag na thogs shing / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste skad cig de nyid
lam la la zhes bya ba'i sgra phyung nas/ bcom ldan 'das la mtshon cha thams cad kyi char phab pa dang/ sas rgyas kyi mthus mtshon cha de dag thams cad ma tog gi gdugs kyi saMn chen por gyur par
snang ngo// bdud kyi sgra de dag thams cad kyang sangs rgyas kyi sgra dang/ chos kyi sgra dang/ dge bdun gyi sgra dang/ yang dag par 'gro ba'i sku rnams su grag go/ bdud sdig can ni zhags pa lnga'i
b.runges pas bdag nyid bcings par mthong ngo// de nas bdud kyi ris kyi lha'i bu de dag thams cad kyis/ bcom ldan 'das kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi mi'aphrul ngo mtshar chen po de mthong nas ngo mtshar du
ska gyur cing dga' ba thob ste bcom ldan 'das de nyid la skyabs su dong ngo/ bdud sdig can ni bdag nyid dgrol bar 'dong na'agrol ma nus te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi khams su
bcom ldan 'das kyi sbyan sngashang rtsa ba nas bcad pa bzhin du rdo rje'i 'khor gyi khyams chen por 'gyel to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i byams pa chen po'i thugs dang/ thugs rje chen
pos brgyan pa'i spyan gyis de bzhinagshegs pa'i 'khor gyi khyams thams cad du gathagos nas/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjel 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// gsang ba pa'i

bdag bo lag na rdo rje badud sdogazhan 'di'i khoragyi khyams 'di nas slobal stanal zhog ste/ rdo rje rnam par thar pa'i sgo tshadapo'i ting nga'adzin gyi rnam par 'phrul pa'i byin gyis b+l+larlabs bsam
gyis mi khyab par bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad 'joms par byed pa zhes bya ba gang gis bdud kyi ris kyi lha'i bu 'di deg dang/ bdud sdig can 'disangs rgyas la skyabs su 'dong pa dang/ gzhan
yang gang dag snang ba bgegs dang/ log 'dren dang/ midags dang/ brjedabyed dang/ 'byung bo dang/ gdon dang/ nam mkha' 'gro ma dang/ sgrub pa dang/ sprul 'dzinabs dang/
gnon bodang/ zas su btsas pa thab lasogs pa snang ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ rab tu sdang ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan la ma gus pa dang/ dbazhin gshegs

ba'i chos nyid khong dum chud pa de dag thams cad gang gisi'atshud pa dang/ dkona mchog gsum l skyabs su 'gro bar byed pa'i ng ston tsagi/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ des ngan 'gro log par ltung bar 'gro ba'i
[z]/ @#// phyir ro// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' mnyan nas/ rinapo chapa'i rdo rje'i stan las langs te bla gos
phrag pa gcig tu gzaranas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga rin po cha'i pad+ma'i sdong po la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyarab btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la tshul
dang 'dra ba'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do// sems can kun gyi nyanamongs pa// gzhig pa'i slad du 'dren par byung// khyod ni bdud rnams kun las rgyal// 'jig
rten rtsa lag gcig pu khyod// thar pa'i grongakhyer 'jug pa'i lam/ ashes ma lus khyod gcig pus// yang dag bdes nas thugs rje yis// snyan pa'i gsung gis bstanapa mdzad/
khyod sngon sbyin dang tshul khrims dang// bzodadang brtson 'grus bsam gtan dang// shes rab la sogs yon tan gyis// bdag mdzad slad kyis sems can btsud// khyod kyis chos rnams
skye med par// bshad cing de bzhin rnam bya yang/ 'bras bur dogs pa ma mchis pa// kye ma mgonapo khyod kyis bshad// 'khor lo yan lag bcu gnyis pa// khyod nyidamkhyen nas rab tu
bskor// mu stags can dang bdud btul te// chos kyi snang bgasal bar mdzad// nyon mongs drag chen rnam kun tu// ye shes rdo rjes rab bcom nas// sus kyang thob par magyur pa
0/ byang chub bla na med pa brnyes// gang gis mtshan yang rdzogs pa gi/ byang chub sa bonanyid 'gyur ba// khyodan 'jig rten mchog gcig pu// dam pa rab sbyin bdag po lags// khyod ni mgonapo
khyed nipa// khyod skyabs khyod ni dpung gnyenalags// thugs rje chen po yoshes nyid// mya ngan 'das nas gcig pu khyod// khyod nyid gshegs nas sems can rnams// sems can dmyal
las rnam par dgrol// rang gi sku yang yongs btang nas// khyed kyis srog chags rnams kyang bsrungs// lus can kun gyis ma thob pa'i// bshes khyod kyis b.res gyur nas// grol/
te 'jig rtan rnams kyang grol// kye ma khyod ni rtsa lag bzang// mgon po khyod kyi 'od theb gyi// dra bas 'jig rtenakhams khyab ste// mya ngan 'das las lhag pa bde// lus can kun
gyas thob par mdzad// khyed kyi 'od kyi gabIs bcom pas// gza' rnams kun dang dgung zla dang/ gdugs rnams dang ni zhugs rnams dang// nor bu lam bar ma gyur to// de nas
gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdordzas tshul dang 'dra ba'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bastod nas kyang rinapo tsha'ipad+ma'i snying po la 'dug ste/ bcom ldan 'adas
legs so zhes gsol nas rdo rje'i rnam par thar pa'i sgo chen po'i ting nge 'dza nabadud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad 'joms par byed pa zhes bya ba la snyoms par zhugs so// gsang ba pa'i bdag
bo lag na rdo rjes rdo rje'i rnam par thar pa'i sgo chen po'i ting nge 'dzin bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad 'joms par byed pa zhes bya ba 'di la snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu//
de nas de'i tshostong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rtanagyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tukamos/ kun turab tu g.yos te/ shar phyogs mthonanub phyogs dma'/ nub phyogs mtho na shar phyogs
dma'/ lho phyogs mthon byang phyogs dma'/ byang phyogs mtho na lho phyogs dma'/ stang mthon 'ogag dma'/ 'og mtho na steng dma' bar gyur to// phyogs thams cad dang phyogs
rgyu mtshams thams cad kyang dga' ba dang yad bde ba skyes par gyur nas/ lham me/ lhan ne/ lhang nge'o// gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje'i yan lag dang nying lag gi mtshams thams cad
nas rdo rje kun tu 'bar ba/ rab tu 'bar ba/ kun turab tu mchodacing 'barab/ ma lce gcig tu gyur pa dag byung bar kun tusnang ngo// rdo rje 'bar ba'i snang ba des phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten
khams tshad med grangs med dpag tu med pa ji snyed pa dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te tshangs par spyod pa/ thog mar dge
ba bar du dge ba/ bla mar dge ba/ don bzang po/ tshig 'bru bzang po/ ma 'dres pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ yongs su dag pa/ yongs su byang ba/ yang dag par ston pa//
0 nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dunadang bcas pa dengag gi 'khor gyi khyams rgya che ba dag na kun tu snang/ byang chub sems dpa' dadag thams cad kyang d bzhin
gshegs pa de dag gi spyan snga na/ rdo rje'ababa'isang ba rgya chen po dus snang bar gyur nas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'adas de dag la so sor zhus pa/ bcom ldan 'das snang ba rgya chen po kun tu
