gda' ba 'di su'ilags/ de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'angs de dag gis so so'i byang chub sems dpa'i da dug la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu dag de bzhin gshegs
pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba mi mjedakyi 'dzag rten gyi khams nar rab kyi steng na chos ston to// bcom ldan 'das des bdud sdig can zhags
pa 'khatsang ba lngas bcings te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'gyel ba gzigs nus/ byang chub sems dpa' sams dpa' chen po gsang ba'i bdag po lag mjo rdzazhes bya ba la 'di skad du/

gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo khyod kyis rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa'i rmo 'phrul ston cig ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu dag 'di ni rdo rje'i rnam par thar pa'i sgo chen po'i ting nge
'dzan la snyoms par zhugs te/ de'i rdo rje'i rnam par 'phrul pa chen po'abyin gyis brlabs so// de skad ces bka' stsal to/ dbazhin gshegs pa dgrabcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
sangs rgyas de dag gis gnang nas/ rigs kyi bu de dag thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag la phyag 'tshal te/
byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rnam par 'phrul pa'i cho'aphrul bsam gyis mi khyab pas 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir lhags nas/ bcom ldama'adas de bzhin gshegs
pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shakya thub pa dang/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la mchodapa'i sngon dang/ gdugs kyi spronedang/ rgyan 'grang ga swAn dang/ dbu
rgyan gyi sngon dang/ me tog gi sprin dang/ na bza'i sngon chen pos mchod pa chen po byas nas nam mkha'i dkyil na 'khod bzhinadu/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la lan bdunabaskor ba byas
te pus mo g.yas pa'i lha ngaranapo che'i paru'i rdo rje'i snyan la btsugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das la logs su lta zhing bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal ba dang/ dbazhin gshegs pas
gnang nas rang rang gi rinapo cha'i pad+ma'i rdo rje'i stan dadag la 'khod par gyur to// de'i tshe shar phyogs logs na 'jig rten gyi khams rdo rje tog ces bya bdunadapazhinagshegs pa dgra bcom pa

ka yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rdo rje'i snying pos rab tu 'joms pa zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes te/ 'di ltar rdo rje'i ri rib chen po'i rtse mo'i khang pa brtsigs pa'igazungs 'di
0zi/ nyid las brtsams te chos kyang ston to// rdo rje 'bar pa'i snang ba des kyang 'jig rten gyi khams jisod pa de dag thams cad kun nas snang bar gyurato// de nas 'jig rtenagyi khams de nubyang chub
sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdoNa'i snying po zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa de'i 'khor gyi khyams su 'dus te 'dug par gyur pa des ngomatshar de mthong nas/ de bzhin gshegs parogra
bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rdo rje'isang pos rab tu 'joms pa zhes bya ba de la zhus te/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'bar ba'i snangab 'di lta bu gang gis 'jig rten gyi khams 'di
thams cad sang bar gyurata/ sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal thams cad rgyun chad cing sems can dmyal ba dang/ dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang/ yi dwags dang/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten
gyi sdug bsngal thams cad mi gda' bar gyur/ lha dang/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ dri za dang/ lha ma yin dang/ nam mkha' snang dang/ mi 'am cad ng/ lto 'phye chen po la sogs pa
'jig rten na rdzu 'phrul che zhing dbang cha bar grags pa thams cad kyang kun nas mchod pa'i u0f97ma chen pos dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes te/ nub phyogs su mchi bar ganga' ba 'di su'i lags/
de nas dbazhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rdo rje'i snying pos rab tu'joms pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i snying po de la 'di/
nga@#// skad ces bka'astsal to// rigs kyi bu nub phyogs kyi legs na mi mjed kyi 'jig rtenagyi khams nad bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas

shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba rdo rje chen po'ir reb kyi rtse mo'i khang pa brtsegs pa na/ rdo chen po re reb kyi rtse mo'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i gzungs zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs ston to// bcom ldan
'das des spyi gtsug gi mtshoms kyi mdzod spu nas 'od zer gyi dra ba chen po byung ste/ 'od zer gyi dra ba chen po des 'jig rten gyi khams der bdud sdig can bskul ma thag tu kun tu khros nas lha'i bu
thams cad dang/ gzhan yang bdud kyi ngos kyi lha'i bu rnams dang/ dpung gi tshogs chen po dang lhan tsag tu bcom ldan 'das de la gtse ba'i phyir lhags pa dang/ de yang sangs rgyas kyi mthus de
tsa bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi khyams de nyid du zhugs pa lnga'i b.rung bas bcings nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'gyel te/ de la thugs brtse ba'i phyir bcom ldan 'adas des byang chub
sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la ston cig par baka'alung byin nas/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag maron+dades rdo rjes rnam par thar pa'i sgo chen po zhes bya
ba'i ting nge 'dzinel snyoms par zhugs te/ yanalag dang nying lag gi mtshams thams rung nas rdo rje rnams bstan te/ 'di ni rdo rje de dag nyid kyi rdo rje'abar ba'i snang ba'o// rigs kyi bu rdo rje

'bar ba'i snang ba des kyang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams tshad medagrangs med dpag tu med pa rnams su 'jig rten gyi khams gang+ga'i klung gi bye ba dang mnyam pa ji snyed pa snang bar byas te/ 'jig/
rten gyi khams de dug nusangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag bzhugs pa de dag thams cad kyang bskul/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de dag kyang bskul bas ngo mtshar
thob par gyur pa dag gis/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'isangs rgyas de dag la'ang so so zhus so// rigs kyi bu de nyid kyi mthus bcom ldan 'adas de bzhin
gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de'i sbyan snga nu'adugatsang bstanabakur byed pa'i ng mthong ngo// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang/ de bzhin gshegrwa
pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rdo rje'i snying bos rab tu'joms pa de la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' na po rdo rje'i snying pos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom
ldan 'das bdag 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjangader de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dgapar rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub ba de la blta ba dang/ phyag bgyi ba dang/ bsAn bkur
bgyi ba dang/ gsang ba pa'i badag po lagan rdo rje de'ang blta bar bgyi ba'i slad dumachi'o// de skad ces gsol pa dang/ dbazhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
[5 ]@#// rdo rje'i snying pos rab tu 'joms pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i snying po de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu de'i dus la bab
khan par shes na song zhig de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i snying po bcom ldan 'das des gnang nas/ btsem ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rdo rje'i snying pos rab tu 'joms pa de la lanabadun bskor ba byas te/ 'jig rten gyi khams da nas mi snang par gyur nas/ nam mkha'i dkyil gyi lam nas
byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu dang lhan cig tu byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par 'phrul pa chen po dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul chen pos 'jig
rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad dang lhan cig skyab na/ bsod nams kyi tshogs chen po bsags pa las grub pas ni
pa' rini po che de dag las 'od zer 'di lta ste/ sngon po dang/ sorapo dang dmar po dang/ ljang sngon dang/ ljang ser dang btsed ka dang/ shel dang/ dngul dang/ nor bu dang//
mu tig dang/ gser dang/ pad+ma rA ga dang/ rdo'i snying po dang/ ke ke ru dang/ ke ke ra chen po dang/ an da rol dang/ mthon ka chen podang/ run las dang/ go mu tu ra ga dang/ mu tig
00 dmar po'i kha dog lta burnams byung ste/ de dag gis thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams la lan 'bum phrag dumar bskor ba byas te/ stong gi bar snang khyab par byas nas/ lha'i
snang bas snang bar byas te 'dus nas 'ja' lta bur gyute/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa'i zhabs mtshan thams cad
phun sum tshogs pa/ 'jam pa/ mnyenapa/ rab tu gzhon pa/ sha rgyas pa/ snum pa de lang bu gnyis kyi rtsa mi mngon pa/ par gsar du kha phye ba lta bu/ dung dang/ tadang/
rdo rje dang/ rgyal mtshan dang/ lcags kyu dang/ pad+ma dang/ chu srinamaka ma'i mnadang ldan pa gnyis la lan 'bum phrag du mar bskor ba byas nas nub par gyur to// nam mkha'i dkyil

na 'od zerare re'i rtse mo las pad+ma bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag brgyad cu tshadashing rta'i 'phang lo tsam la/ rin po ches bangunagyi rgyulas byung ba 'ang lha ste/ gser gyi rgyulas byung ba dang/
and rnal dang/ dngul dang/ byu ru dang/ shel dang/ ke ke ru dang/ dunalas kyi rgyu las byung ba dag 'thonato// dalas gser gyi rgyu las byung ba'i par rnams kyi 'dab ma ni an da tshul gyi/
rgyu las byung ba dag go/ snying po nidangul gyi rgyu las byung ba'o// ze ba na byu ru'i rgyu las byung ba'o// tshub shel gyi rgyu las byung ba'o// ze'u 'bru ni ke ke ru'i rgyu las byung ba'o//
anang nAlegyi rgyu las byung ba'i pad+ma rnams kyi 'dab ma ni dngul gyi rgyu las byung ba dag go/ snying po na byu ru'i rgyu las byung ba'o// ze ba ningashelagyi rgyu las byung ba'o// rlab ni

ca ke ke ru'i rgyu las byung ba'o// ze'u 'bru ni ngun las kyi rgyu las byung ba'o// dngul gyi rgyu las byung ba'i pad+ma rnams kyi 'dab ma ni byu ru'i rgyu las byung ba dag go/ snying po rnashel gyi rgyu las byung

ba'o// zi ba ni ke ke ru'i rgyulas byung ba'o// nuban donalas kyi sprulas byung ba'o// ze'u 'bru ni gser gyi rgyu las byung ba'o// byu ru'i rgyu las byung ba'i pad+ma rnams kyi 'dab ma ni shel gyi rgyu

zla las byung ba dag go/ snying po na ke ke ru'i rgyu las byung ba'o// the ba ni ngun las kyi rgyu las byung ba'o// rlub ni gsar gyi rgyu las byung ba'o// ze'u'apra na and rnyil gyi rgyu las byung ba'o//
shel gyi rgyu las byung ba'i par rnams kyi 'dab ma na ke ke ru'i rgyu las byung ba'o// sIrje po ni junalas kyi rgyu las byung ba'o// the banags gyi rgyulas byung ba'o/ chub ni and ril gyi rgyu
las byung ba'o// the'u 'bru na dngul gyi rgyu las byung ba'o// ko ke ru'i rgyu las byung ba'ipa rnams kyi 'dab ma nangunalas kyi rgyu las byung ba dag go/ snying po nags kyi rgyu las byung ba'o//
bya ba ni and rnal gyi rgyu las byung ba'o// chub dngul gyi rgyulas byungaba'o// ze'u 'bru ni byu ru'i rgyu las byung ba// ngun las kyi sprulas byungaba'i pa rnams kyi 'dabamanagasor gyi rgyu las
byungab dag go/ snying bo nian da d+hil gyi rgyu las byung ba'o// bye ba na dengul gyi rgyu las byung ba'o// chu ban byu ru'i rgyu las byung ba'o// ze'u 'bru nishel gyi rgyu lasazungaba'o// dbazhin
du sbyar te/ de ltar rin po che rnam pa du ma'i rgyu las byung ba'i pad+madag go/ rin po che'ipad+mare re la'ang sa bcu la rab tu gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po na tumadzes
pa'i spyodalam phunasum tshogs pa dag ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// byang chub sems dpa' re re'i lte ba nas kyang 'od zer 'bum 'bum byung ngo/ 'od zer gyi rtse mo re re las kyang
rinapo chathamasacud kyi rgyu las byung ba'ikhang pa brtsegs pa nor bu dang rin po rnam pas tshogs kyi stegs bus bskor ba/ shel gyi rgyu las byung ba'i zla bas smras pa'i khang branagyi rtse mo la
seng ge 'i rnaba'i steng na rin po tsho'i rgyalamtshan dang/ bdan dang/ rnam par rgyal ba'i ba dan sbyangs pas nam mkha' kun tu khebs pa/ par rAg dang/ and tshul dang/ mar gad dang/
bi ma dang/ rdo'i snying po dang/ stug dang/ ke keg shulas byas pa'i ka ba chen po'i klad la 'dzam bu chupo'i gser gyi shing las gcod pa lta bu'i tshogs bkod pas rnam par spras te mdzes
par byos pa/ dngul las byas pa'i phug ron gyi 'phreng gi mtha' mu tig dmar po dang ldan pa'i dril bu g.yor ka'adra ba sbyangs pa'i sgras sad par gyuran/ rab tu dga' zhing dregs pa'i phug
don dang/ bya bang dang/ rna tsodang/ ra stegs dang/ rmabya'i nga ro dag gis nyams dga' ba/ khyams dang 'dunakhang chen po'i nyen kor stags busabaskor bas/
mdzes par byas pa/ ni bo cha rnam pa sna tshogs lasabyas pa'i sgo khang can/ shel gyi rgyu las byas pa'i stegs bu dang ldan pa/ bkra shis kyi gser gyi bum pa du ma nas spos chu dri zhime
pos chag chag btab pa/ rdzing chen po 'gram gyi na'u gsingamaragud kyi rgyu las byung ba ka tsalaMn da'i gos ltareg na bde bas mdzes pa'i phyogs nabade bar nyal ba'i ngang pa dang/
khrung khrung dang/ ngur pa dang/ ka lan ta ka khyu gnas pa/ gser gyi phye ma bdal ba'i gtos chen po rin po chesna bdun gyi them skas kyi 'phrang bas brgyan pa/ yan lag brgyad dang ldan
pa'i chus yongs su gang ba grangs 'bumathog du mas kun nas yongs su bskor ba dag byung// rdzing bu re ra nas kyang rin po che'i pad+ma bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu rtsa dgu byung
nga rin po che'i bad+ma re ra'i snying po la'ang sil snyan dang/ phag rdob pa dang/ glu dbyangs rnams kyi sgra byung bas lha'i bu mo dag glu len gar byed cing yongs su sbyang ngo// sil snyan dang/
phag rdzob pa dang/ glu dbyangs kyi sgra byung ba dedag las kyang tshigs su bcud la 'di lta bu 'di dag byung go/ sbyin dang tshul khrims kyis ni gang zhig dpag med cing// de bzhin bzod dang
brtson 'grus dag gi stobs ldan la// bsam gtan gyis ni zhi zhing dbang gyis kun 'byor pa// ye shes sgron ma de la skyabs su 'dong bar gyis// bsam gyis mi khyab stobs dang skyon/
lama rnams dang ldan// thabs dang byang chub yan lag ting 'a dzan rnams kyi bdag/ rnam par grol ba'i lam dang stobs bcu ldan pa// thubapagang yin de la mchod phyir dongabar gyis//
'dam rdzab nas ni pad+ma rgyas pa ji bzhin du// gang zhig nyon mongs 'dam gyis rtag par ma gos pa// tshe dang skye ba'asdug bsngal rnam par bsal ba yi// rgyal ba 'jig rten mgonabo de la
blta phyir deng// gcig kyang ma ldan par gyur pa gang zhig gus// skye dgu rnams kyi gti mug sgo glegs rnams bshig cing// sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi spyod pa rab zhi ba// shAkya'itog
ldan de la skyabs su 'dong bar gyis// de ltar khang pa brtsegs pa dpag bsam gyi shing ljon pas legs par brgyan pa rnam pa sna tshog bye bakhrag khrig 'bum phrag dum nam mkha'i dkyil na kun
tu snang ste/ khacig tu rin po che'i sngon gyi char 'bab par kun tu snang ngo// kha cig tu ni me tog gi gdugs kyi snga nagyi char/ kha cig tu na gosharinaTitsanangan dang/ spos dang/ byug pa
dang/ phyi ma'i sngon gyi char/ kha cig tu na gos kyi 'phrang ba'i sprin rgya char/ kha cig tunakasha ka'i ras dang/ du ku la'ires dang/ za 'gag par kyi char/ khacig du ningapag bsam
lan @#// gyi shing ljon pa'i sgo nagyi char/ khatshig tu ni me tog pad+ma dang/ ut+pal dang/ pad+ma dkar bo dang/ dri mchog dang/ a timuk+ta ka dang/ ka tsa land dang mahAka/
'anid dang/ btang bzung dang/ btang bzung chen po dang/ many+dzasha ka dang/ maN+Dasha ka chen po dang/ mnad rab dang/ man dar ba chen po'i sngon gyi char mngon par bab bo// me togagi char da

dag las drigang byung ba des sangs rgyas kyi zhingetshad mdagrangs med pa gang dag gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul dang mnyam pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams rgyas par khyab bo// 'jig rten gyi khamA
dag na sems can gang dag 'gro ba drug tu skyes pa de dag thams cad dridis mchog tu bde bas tshim zhing sems dga' bar gyur te/ sdug bsngal thams cad dang bral nas phan tshuna'adri ba dang/ 'jig

rtenagyi khams mi mjed denabyang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i snying po byang chub sems dba'i tsho'aphrul sna tshogs ston pa rgyang ring po nas mthong ngo// de dag gis de nas mthong nas kyang phyag 'tshal to//
skyes bu dam pa de la phyag 'tshal ma thag tu sems can gang dag ngan 'gro log par ltung bar 'dodapa de dag kyang mchog tu bde ba dang/ dga' ba dang/ rangs pa dang/ dad pa thob nas skad cige
de nyid la ngan 'gro log par ltung ba las grol te sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams kyi nang du skyes nas bar snang la 'khod de/ de dag gis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa dang/ gsang ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rje dang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i snying po la mchod pa sngon chen pos mchong nas lan
'bum phrag du ma mtha' yas mu med par baskor ba byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sde rdzo 'khor gyi khyams chen po thams cad dang ldan pa la lan bdun bskor ba byas nas lha rnams bar snang las

babs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngararangarang gi rinapo che'i gzhal med khangagi khang pa brtsegs pa dag na lha'i bu mo bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma dang lhan cig tu sil snyan dang/ phag rdzob
pa dang/ glu dbyangs kyi sgra 'byin cing tshul dang 'dra ba'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod de// gang slad ngan 'gro mchog tu sdug bsngal 'khrugs pa yo de/
ming yang bde gshegs stobs kyis deng du med mdzad dang// bsod nams maldan sems can rnams la'ang rgyal ba mchog/ byams pa mdzad ma kye ma ngo mtshoparmad du byung// bangag
cag rnams kyi rmongs pa'i snying gas bslabs pa yi// sdig pa'i las gshin tu brgyud dka' sna tshogs pa// de dag thub pa'i bya dag nga rang glo bur du// skad cig tu ni ji ltar rnam par
par 'gyur// ji ltar gdugs kyis mun pa mun nag kun bcom dang/ ji ltar zhugs 'bar bas ni ras rnams srog pa dang// gsar mas shing bal ltar yang sprin 'thob ji bzhin du/
de ltar 'gro ba'i sdig pa bde bar gshegs kyis bcom// bde gshegs sras po mthong ngam thos sam dran gyur na// lhan cig skyes dbang 'od zer dra bas sdig 'phrog
pa 'gro ba yongs kyi srid pa'i spros pa zhig pa ya// thugs dang rtag tu ldan zhing skyo bar 'gyur ma ma'// mag dang mgo dang sing dang sha khrag tshil rnams dang// srog dang sdug dang/
bu rnams rtswa ltar bar nas ni// mi mtshungs sems can don phyir thugs rjes thugs brlan pa// 'jig rten mgon sras de dag rnams la phyaga'atshul la// yi dgas rtogs lo chu dang
ro brgya'i zas rnams dang/ de bzhin skyo bo nor 'dod snying dang ldan pa la// thugs rje spyod cing rnam pa sna tshogs tshim mdzad pa// byang chub sams dpa'i khyu mchog de la skyabs su
tsho mchi// gang dag mnar med pa yang rab tu bsal mdzad pas// mchog tu tshabs sems can dmyal ba'ang bsil bar 'gyur// rang bad ma gzigs sems can brtson thugs
ldan pa// 'jig rtanamagonasras mnyam mo dade la phyag 'tshal lo// gang dag srid par 'khor ba'i srid pa'i skyon las grol// stong pa gsum yang las kyi 'bras bu mi 'dor zhig/
yashes ma yis rtog pa bsregs kyang thugs rjes brlan// spyod pa brtagamad dbang ldan de la phyag 'tshal lo// kye ma dpal ldan rdo rje snying po bdagshegs sras// mtshan gyi
mtshanubatab sku las 'od stong mang byung ba'i// drib rnams dang sna tshogs klu yis bdag cag sam// skad cig gsanangamyal las sum cu'i lha dbang gyur// bdag cag rnams kyis rgyal
dang rgyal sras rnams dang ni// de dag rnams kyis gsungs pa mchog tu zhi chos la// gus bstod dge ba rgya chen de ring gangathob pa// des myur 'jig rtenathams cad bde gshegs thob
par shog/ de ltar tshul dang 'dra ba'i tshugs su bcad pa rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la bstod nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang ste/ de dag rang rang gi rinapo che'i gzhal med khang
gi khang pa brtsigs pa rnams su 'khod de chos nyan pa'i phyir phyogs gtsag tu 'khod do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje snying pos byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu
'phrul gyi cho'aphrul chen po 'di lta bu 'di bstan nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa dang/ gsang ba pa'i bdag/
po lag na rdo rdzodang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdo rje'i 'khor gyi khyams chen po dang ldan pa la mchod pa'i sprin chen po rnams kyis mchod nas/ ting nge 'dzin de las langs te bar snang las
babs nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang lhan cig tulana'abum phrag du ma mtha' yas mu med par bskor ba byas nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga ran po cha'i
[2]@#// pad+ma'i snying po la btsugs te/ bla gos phrag pa gtsag tugazar nas bcom ldan 'das la ltalo/ rigs kyi bu de dag thams cad kyang dga' ba dang mgu ba skyes nas/
de bzhinadu bcom ldan 'das la lta'o// bltas nas kyang sgra skad kyi nga ro gcig tu bcom ldan 'das la tshul dang 'druba'i tshogs su btsang pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do// dran pa'i
gzhus 'phangs pa la shes rab mnga' mang gis// ma 'phangs mthur ldan bdud bzhi pham mdzad cing// 'jig rtenanyon mongs nyen pa'i mun pa bsal mdzad nas// bla ma sprin mang blab
bzhin du lhang nge 'o// dam chos 'od mang gti mug bcom pa'i dra ba yis// 'dul ba'i par gnas rnams kha phya nas// ye shesanam mkha' che la dri mang 'bar ba'i gzugs// rtim
ji bzhin gdung bar bgyi ba'i bdud sde gdungs// mu stegs can gyi nga rgyal mtha' dag pham mdzad cing// 'gro ba'i 'dod chags rab gdung ma lus rab zhi mdzad/ dge ba'i lo tog/
rtsa chen yang dag 'phel mdzad pa// dge ba'i char ba phabacing 'brug ltar sgrag tugasol// mgon po mu stagasatsan gyi wa brgya pham mdzad cing// bdud rnams bcom sta pyang chub dam pa
rab brnyes nas// ma 'dres bsags pa'ibaden pa'i stobs kyi mthu mnga' ba// skya ba'i 'jigs lamar bgrol sangage ji bzhin sgrogs// spyod pa zabacing brtan la brtag pas mi dpog
pa[：]sems can gnas gyur stobs dang ting 'a dzananor bu bkram// dri med chos lhan 'adul ba'i re bo rnams 'dzin pa// ye shes rgya mtsho mchog khyod sku dgu mchog gtso ba// tshul khrims
bzang po'i rtse ba sbyin pa'i chus btab 'phel// byams dang bzod pa'i me tog yal ga 'khrungs pa mdzes// byang chub lam gyi yan lag 'bru chags 'dod byas bstan// bsod nams
dpag bsam shing khyod da rang ga las byung// sum cu rtsa gnyis 'bar ba'i mtshan gyis yan lag brgyan// dpe byadabazang mchog rin chen man shel gyis bskor cing// sa dang dbang dang dam
chos phur pa partanabatab pa// lhun po bzhan du mi g.yo khyodan 'gro la mdzes// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje snying pos/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
chen po de dag dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das la tshul dang 'dra ba'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang ste rin po'i pad+ma'i snying po la phyogs
gtsag tu 'dug go/ rigs kyi bu de dag thams cad kyang chos nyan pa'i phyir de bzhin du rin po che'i pad+ma'i snying po dag la 'khod do// de bzhin du sbyar te/ de ltar lho phyogs na de bzhin gshegs
pa ragra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dpal gyi sAng po brtsegs pa rnam par bsgrags pa'i rgyal po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhinge 'dzag rten gyi khams dpal byung ba nas//
byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i tog ces bya ba byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du mas yongs su bskor te mdun du bdar ba nas///
'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir 'ongs te/ bcom ldan 'adas kyis gnang nas rigs kyi bu de dag dang lhan tsag tu rin po che'apapa'i snying po la phyogs gcig tu 'dug pa'i bar du'o// de bzhin
zladunub phyogs na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag pa rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyus tshe dpag med kyisangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can zhes bya ba de nas/
byang chub sams dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ces bya ba dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mthu chen thob pa byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag
khrig 'bum phrag du mas yongs su bskor te mdun du bdar ba nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir 'ongs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang nas srin po che'i pad+ma'i snying po la 'dug
tsang rigs kyi bu de dag thams cad kyang chos nyan pa'i phyir de bzhinadu rin po che'i pad+ma'i snying po dag la 'khod pa'i bar du'o// de bzhin du byang phyogs na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
a pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos mchog rang bzhin gyis rnam par nges pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba thams cad 'byung ba nas/ byang chub
sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rin po che'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du mas yongs su bskor te mdunadu bdar ba nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams/
mi mjed 'dir 'ongs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang nas rin po che'i pa'i snying po la 'dug cing/ rigs kyi bu de dag thams cad kyang chos nyan pa'i phyir de bzhin du ranapo che pad+mab song
po dag la 'khod pa'i bar du'o// de bzhin du byang shar gyi phyogs na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yon tan mtha' yas rab
gsal dbang phyug rgyal po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhinge 'jig rtenagyi khams dpal brtsegs nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros brtan pa zhes bya ba byung chub sems dpa'
bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du mas yongs su bskor te mdun du bdar ba nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir 'ongs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang nas rin po che'i pa'i snying
po la 'dug rung/ rigs kyi bu de dag thams cad kyang chos nyan pa'i phyir de bzhin duran po che'i pa'i snying po dag la 'khod pa'i bar du'o// de bzhin du shar lho'i mtshams na bcom ldan
'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dbang po'i tog gi rgyal mtshan gyi rgyal po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams the tsom dang bral ba nas
/@#// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros bzang po zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du mas yongs su bskor te mdun dubadar ba/
nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir 'ongs te/ bcom ldan 'adas kyis gnang nas rin po che'i pad+ma'i snying po la 'dug cing/ rigs kyi bu de dag thams cad kyang chos nyan pa'i phyirade
bzhin du rin po che'i pad+ma'i sdong po dag la 'khod pa'i bar du'o// de bzhin du lho nub kyi phyogs na bcom ldanu'adas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
rin chen rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rtenagyi khams rAni po du brtsigs pa nas/ byang chub sams dpa' sems dpa' chen po rani rman blo gros zhes bya ba byang
chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du mas yongs su bskor te mdunang bdar ba nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir 'ongs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang nas
nyenapa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pa dag dang lhan tsig tu rinapo che'i pad+ma'i snying po la 'dug tsung/ rigs kyi bu dodag thams cad kyang chos nyan pa'i phyir dbazhinadu dzapo
che'i pad+ma'i snying po dag la 'khod pa'i bar du'o// de bzhin du'og gi phyogs na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen pangal
0 ]rab tu gnas pa'i ri dbang gi rgyal po sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams pad bkod pa nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i blo gros zhes bya ba byang chub semA
pa' bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du mas yongs su bskor te mdunadubadar ba nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir 'ongs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang nasarin po che pad+ma'i snying/
po la 'dug cing/ rigs kyi bu de dag thams cad kyang chos nyan pa'i phyired bzhin durinapo che'ipad+ma'i snying po dag la 'khod pa'i bar du'o// de bzhin du stang gyi phyogasan bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag pa rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas g.yul las rnam par rgyal ba'i dpal gyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rtenagyi khams bdud kyi tsher mdakrugs panas/ byang rlung
sams dpa' sems dapa' chen po bdud kyi sgrib pa las rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du mas yongs su bskor te mdun dubadarabo nas/ 'jig
rten gyi khams mi mjed 'duge 'ongs te/ bcom ldan 'adas kyis gnang nas rin po che'i pa'i sAng po la 'dug cung/ rigs kyi 'de dag thams cad kyang chos nyan pa'i phyired bzhin du rin po pa'i pad+ma'i
sAng po dag la 'khod pa'i bar du'o// de nas de'i tsho stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams mimajed 'dir byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa du mabastan pas
gzhal medakhang dang/ me tog ga sngon dang/ rini po che'i sprin dang/ phye ma'i nadang/ spos dang/ byug pa dang/ gdugs dang/ rgyal mtshan dang/ ba danadang/
rnam par rgyal ba'i ba danagyi sngon dang/ rinapo che'i snyug dang/ rdo'i snying po dang/ ba dang/ and ril dang/ byu rudang/ mar gdadang/ mu tig dmarapo dang/ 'dzam bu chu bo'i gsar gyi
sngan dang/ dpag bsam gyi reshing ljon pa dang/ rin po che'i par du mas khebs pa'i rdzong gis legs par brgyan par gyur to// 'jig rten gyi khamasa'adi ji lta ba de bzhin duphyogs bcu'i
nga tsho'ajig rten gyi khams tshad med grangs med bsam gyis mkhyabatsang dpag tu med pa gzhal du medacibarjod du med bang gtog pa'i klung ga bye ma snyad las ni 'das pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams dag na/

gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje'i rnam par tharapa'i sgo chen po'i teng nge 'dzin rnam par 'phrul pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis de bzhin du legs par brgyan par kun tu snang ngo// 'jig rten gyi khams de
dag na de bzhin gshegasapadagra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang dag bzhugs ta'atshozhing gzhes pa dedag thams cad de na bzhugs bzhin du phyag g.yas pa gser gyi kha dog lta bu
brkyang ste 'jam zhangeganyen la rab tu gzhon zhing/ pad+madang yal ga gzhon sha chags shing 'jam pa'i sor mo'i nges can gdugs dang/ rgyal mtshan dang/ lcags kyu dang/ bum pa dang/ tadang/
sgo khang dang/ gzhal med khang dang/ dung dang/ rdodzad ng/ pad+madang/ dpal be'udang/ 'khor lo'i metshanagyis brgyanapa/ tshorabs bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma nas sbyin pa'i pha rol
du byon pa yongs su rdzogs par mdzad pa'i rgyamathun pas mngon par grub pa'i depabyad bzang pos rnam par sbas pa/ sen mo zangs 'dra zhing rgyas la snyam zhing srab pa'i nor bu'omadongs kyi me tog
gi 'od zer gyis khrigs ma mdzes par gyurapa/ sams tsanathams cad l mi 'gos pa sngon pa dang med pangamathunapa'i phyag rnams kyis/ gsangab pa'i bdag po lagan rdo rdzol yang dag par
gzengs bstod pa dang/ yang dag par dga' bar bya ba'i phyir stsal byugs nas dus gcig tusgra skadakyi nga rogacig gis 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad gokhara mdzad cing 'di skacas/ kye rigs
kyi bu gang gi phyungabadud sdig can dang/ gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la ma dad tsang snga ba'i bgegs dang log 'drenadrag shul can drag shul gyi sems dang ldanub/ sams na
thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba gcopa'i phyir zhugs pa thams cad tshar bcad pa rnam par gzhig pa dang/ de bzhin dubyang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyod pa sems zhum
ba brtsona'agrus brtan po ma yin pa'i go cha bgos pa rnams kyang yang dag par gazengs bstod pa dang/ rab tu dga' bar byas pa nas khams gsum par gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad kyi
bar dag kyang mya ngan las 'das pa thob par bya ba dang/ sangs rgyas dang/ chos dang/ dge 'dun gyi rigs mgacod par phyi'i/ khyod rdo rje'i rnam par thar pa'i sgo chen/
po'i ting nge 'dzin bsod nams dang ye shes kyatshegasabasam gyis ma khyab pa bsags pa/ yongs su rdzogs pasagrub pa'i mtshan dang dpe byad bzangapos sasapa/ tang ba'adzanedang/
[& ]dbang dang/ gzungs dang/ stobs dang/ byang chub kyi yan lag dang/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyud pa'i mthu grub pa/ sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal dang nyon mongs pa'i
slab pa nye bar zhi ba/ sems can dmyal ba dang/ dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang/ ya rtags dang/ gshan rje'i 'jig rten du ltung ba'i 'jigs pa'i dus kyi tsher ma ma lus par 'don pa dang/
lha dang/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ dri wadang/ lham yin dang/ nam mkha' lding dang/ mi'am ci dang/ lta'aphye chen po dang/ dge slong dang/ dge slong ma dang/ dge bstan dang/
tsha dge bsnyen ma la sogs pa'i 'khor mngon par dga' bcan dag la ngomatshar rmad du byung ba'i dga' bdum kun tu spyod pa la snyoms par zhugs pa ni legs so legs so zhes bka' stsal to//
de ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje gzengs bstod de rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas rang rang gi phyag bskums te/ rang rang ga byang chub saMms
dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams chos nyan du gzud pa'i phyir 'jig rten gyi khams ma mjed 'du'i bkye// de dag gis gnang bas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag thams//
cad kyis kyang/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag la phyag 'tshal nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par 'phrul pa'i byin gyi rlabs chen
po dang/ byang chub sams dpa'i rnam par 'phrul pa chen pos jitsam du skyes bu stobs dang ldan pas lag pa bskumasapa las bskyang ba dang/ brkyang ba las bskums patsam gyis skad cig thang cig
udatsam de la'ajig rten gyi khams mo mdzad der phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang ste bzhi po 'i pad+ma'i snying po dag la phyogs gcig tu khod pa'i bar du'o/ dn gnas bcom ldan 'angs de
bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pas/ de'i tshigasang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjel 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// gsang bapa'i phingag po
lag na rdo rje badud sdig can 'di rdo rje'i zhagasapas btsas pa 'dilas khrel la/ tshanas kyang sangs rgyas la skyabs su 'gro bar 'gyur ba dang/ chos la skyabs su 'gro bar 'agyur ba dang/
dge 'dun la skyabs su 'gro bar 'gyur ba dang/ gzhan yang gang dag lha dang/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ grib dang/ lham yin dang/ nam mkha' lding dang/ mi'am ci dang/ lto'@
@#// chen po dang/ mi dang/ ma ma yin pa gang dag dzatsam du de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la gnas par 'gyur ba dang/ de bzhinagshegs pa'i bstan pa la zhugs nas kyang/
kyi tsunas khong duchud par 'gyur ba deltar gyis shog/ de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar manyan nas/ bcom ldan 'angs la legs so
legs so zhes gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ yang rdo rje'i rnam par thar pa'i sgomanapo'i ting nge'adzin bdudakyidakyil 'khor thams cad 'joms par byed
pa zhes byab la snyoms par zhugs so// gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes rdo rje'i rnamaparathar pa'i sgo chen po'i ting nge 'dzin bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad 'joms par byed pa zhes bya ba
la snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu/ de nas de'itshostong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu rab tugayos te/ 'gul/ rab tu 'gul/ kun tu rab tu 'gul to//
chem chem/ rab tuchem cham/ kun tu rab tu chem chem mo// gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo ja'ang me lce 'bar ba gcig tugyur// 'bar/ rab tu 'bar/ kun turab tumard cing
'bar te/ 'jigs su rung ba'i mchab rnon po drag po gzangs can ngajigs panaposkyed pa gtsugs te/ mchab mnan nas me lce chen po ltar sna ras zhinga'ajigasa'ajigs ltar 'dug ste/
mi bzad pa rnab las 'phyang ba'i sbrul dug 'thor dang/ ba lang sna lta bu dang/ gzar bu ltar bu dang/ sbrulachen po kha gdangs pa'i kha nas byung ba'i mchab 'i rtse mo nas dug drag po 'bar ba'abyung
ba'i tshog sakya'aphreng bas bzhin dul 'barab lag pa stong phrag dum la rdo rjedang/ zhags pa dang/ gtun shing dang/ gtunashang/danyag dang/ ral gri dang/ 'khor lo dang lcags
sgrog la sogs pa thogs pa'i mtshonaNa'irtsa mo la me stag rab tu 'phro ba'i snang bas/ stong gsum gyi steng chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyakhongs su gtogs pa'i gnod sbyin dang/ srin po
dang/ yi dgas dang/ sha za dang/ mtsho dang/ 'byung po'i gdonadang/ bgegs dang/ log 'dren la sogs pa sdang ba rab tu sdang ba'i sems can skrag par byed pa/ ridags kyidabang/
po'i pags pa khrag dngabacasapa sham thabs su bgos pa/ sprul chen po'i lus kyis rgya gram du dam du bcings pa/ 'jigs pa bas kyang 'jigs par byed pa/ 'tshabadag kyang skrag par byed pa/
khams gsum pa thams cad kyis bsdus pa lta bu'i lus dang ldan pa'i khro bor gyur nas/ lus kyi tshigs thams cad las kyang khro bo kha dog du ma 'di lta ste/ kha dog sngonapodang/ serapo dang/
dmar po dang/ dkarapo dang/ nagaposte/ thamasacad kyang rdo rje'i rang bzhinacan/ khro gnyer mamanyam pas rnam par spras pa'i gnyer ma'i khrim gnyer can gyi dpral ba'i dbyas nas me stag lta bu'i
rdul gyi thigs pa rtsub po 'dzag pa las dug 'chang ba rnam pa sna tshogs kun tu byung bas yanalag dang/ hring lag kun tudakras pa'i mngon rtags can du gyur cing rdo rjadrag shul can
du snang ste/ mche bas mi bzad par 'dug pa'i kha gdangs pa las hahazhes gdamo rtagad 'byung zhing/ 'jig pa'i dus kyi rlung gisachar pa dang bcas pa'i sprinadakrugs pa las char gyi rgyunarags pa
'bab pas yongs su gang bas rgya mtshodakrugs nas rlabs chen po g.yo ba dang/ rta rgodama'akha nas ma byung ba lta bu'i hU~Mzhes bya ba zab cing brtanapas sgruba'i 'byung po'i tshigs 'jigs skrag ste
'byer zhing 'thor nasasngangs taskyabs su 'dong zhing 'dud pas nyi ma stong bas 'barab 'i lus rnams mthong ba na/ sna sgar skur can zhom pa lta bu bu ga zab mo'i sbubs kyi nang nas sbrul sna
tshogs 'khyil ba'i gtsug gi nor bu'i 'od kyis 'gram pa rnam par madzes pa/ glog stong 'dus pa ltar sarazhing dmar ba'i mig gi'obras bu'i 'od zer gyis sla'i tshegasartsubatsang gshoral gyin du
'greng ba rtse mo brgyan cing 'dres te gsal par gyur pa/ sbrul gyi gdengs ka stong gis gdugs byas shing/ sbrul rnam pa sna tshogs kyi deshal dang/ skarigs dang/ dpung rgyan dang/ gdu
bu dang/ rnams lus brgyan ba/ rdo rje'abar ba dra ma med cing srog shul can mi bzad pa lag mthogs pa/ mdzub mo rnams las hU~Mzhes bya ba'i sang ge'i sgra chen po dag gis bgegs dang log
'dren thams cad kun tu sdigs bdag 'thon te/ gangade dag gi mgo dang kha rnams nas gnam grum pa lta bu'i sgra chen po'i tshogs las me lce chen po 'bar ba'i tshog sakyi snangab byung ste/ des
sdang ba'i bgegs dang log 'dren la sogs pa drag shul can drag shul kyi sems dang ldan pa/ sdig pa can sdog pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ sdang btsan sdang ba'i sems dang ldan pa rnams/
tshig par byed ngo// rmongs par byed do// 'tshog pa byed de/ mi bzad pa/ drug pa/ rtsub pa/ sdug bsngal ba/ yid du mi 'ong ba'i tshor ba myong bar byed do// de dag tshor bas nyan
pas dkon mchog gsum la skyabasasu dong ngo// de'i tshobadud sdig can gyis bgegs dang log 'dren de dag tshe ba chen pos nyenato/ dkon mchog gsum la skyabasasu dong ba mthong nasal jigA/

sngangs skrag ste skyabs ma rnyedunas rlung drag pos bskyod pa'i shinge bzhin du 'dar/ rab tu'adaratedu par 'dod na'ang ngu ma nus nas ri mo bzhin du lus thams cad g.yo ba med par gyur to// de nas gsang
ba pa'i bdag po lagan rdo rjesangs rgyas kyi mthus bdud sdig can 'dul bar byad de sdangab gdan dang/ bgags dang/ log 'drenathams cad dang/ bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad 'jomA
par byed pa/ rdodra'a rnam par thar pa'i sgo chen po'i nang nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ dalta bu'i gzugs su 'dug pa'i rkang pa gnyis las khro bo 'bar zhing 'jigs 'jigs ltar 'dug
pa drag shul gyi gzugs can sangage'i sgra chen po hU~Mzhes bya ba 'di gnyis phyung ste/ dganyis skar mda' bzhin du nam mkha'i dkyil du rgyang ring du 'phur tanam mkha' la gnas
pa'i shugs kyis/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhinagshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la lan 'bum phrag du ma mtha' yas mu med pa bskor ba byas te/
gsang ba pa'i bdag po lagan jo rdzala'ang skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu tsabagyi bka' stsolatsag/ de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje cang mi smra bar 'dug ste/ yang dpral ba'i dkyil
k+Sha nas rdo rje khro bo'ajigs pa chen po'agazugs can mchab mi bzad pa drag pasa' jigs su rung ba'i kha gdangs te/ mchum rungs par bsgyur ba'i kha nas dus kyi them 'jag pa'i tsho rnam par 'thor ba'i
rlung drag po' shugs kyis rab tu bskyod pa'i sngonanag po' tshogs rab tu sgrog pas rnam par dkrugs pa'i rgya mtsho chen po'i sgra drag po lta bu hU~Mzhes bya ba'asingage'i sgras gang ba/ bgags dang
la log 'dranathams cad 'ajigs nas 'bros shing skyidalu gnas phyogs sladapa'i byed pa/ lag pa dang/ rkang pa dang/ son mo dang/ migadang/ ag tshom dang/ sgra thams cad ro rdza'abar bar
snang bas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rtenagyi khams thams cad rgyas par 'gengs pa/ gzigs brjod thams cad kyi gzi brjodi rnams rang ga gadza brjid kyis zil durlag par byed tsang//
rgyang ring dubyed pa'i rdo rje'abarab snang ba des rgyus dang/ gza' dang/ skar ma dang/ nor bu rnams kyi 'od lham mer ma yin/ ldan neram yin/ lhang nger ma yin par byed pa/ gang khyim dang/
zla ba rdzu 'phrul cheb/ dbangachab r grags pa/ mthu cheba'ang lham meram yin/ lhan ner ma yon/ lhang nger ma yin par byed pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od dung/ byang chub sems
dba'asams dpa' chen po sa bcul rab tu gnas pa rnams kyi 'od m gtogs pa'od gzhan thams cad 'od mog mog po 'byed pa gzhan phyung ngo// de nas rdojakhro bo des bcom ldan 'ongs de
bzhinagshegs pa dgu bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs par sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la lana'abum phrag du ma mtha' yas mu med par basko babyas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang nas gsang
bapa'i bdagapo laganurdo rdzol 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi'u bgyi bka' stsol cig/ de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po lagan rdo rjes/ khro bon po rdo rje khro bo dedag la 'di skad ces smras
so skyes bu dam pa dag dengal bdud sdig can dkonamag gsum la skyabs su 'dzin du chug cig/ 'di dam tshig la gnas par gyis shig/ gzhan yang gang dag snang bgadon dang/
bgegs dang/ log 'drenal sogs pa drag shul can drag shul gyi sems dang ldan pa/ sdig pa can sdog pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ sdang ba can sdang ba'i sems dang ldan pa dag dang de bzhin
gshegs pa'i bstan pa la ma'ajug pa dang/ mi rtogs pa dang/ yid mi ches pa thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstanapa la gnas par gyis shig dang/ des/
sems can thams cad kyi yunarang po'adzinadang/ phan pa dang/ bde bar 'agyur ro// de skad ces snas pa dang/ khro bo chen pordakhro bodi dag gis gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje'i tshig/
mnyananas de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa'i ng bzung ste/ dus gcig tu sgra skad kyi nga rogatsug tuseng ge 'i sgra chen po hU~Mzhes bya bas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rtanagyikhams rgyas par/
'gengasashang/ tha/sang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag sus so// sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshAl lo// chos la phyag 'tshal lo// dge 'dunal phyag 'tshal lo// yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
nyan thos dang/ rang sangs rgyas dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang bcas pa bdun po dag la phyag 'tshal lo// gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje dragapo la phyag 'tshal lo//
rig sngags kyi rgyal po chen po rdo rje'i lcags kyu la phyag 'tshwa lo// rdo rje'ilug rgyud laphyaga'atshal lo// rdo rje'i gnam lcags la phyag 'tshal lo// rdo rje shugs la phyag 'tshal lo//
rdo rje brtson la phyag 'tshal lo// rje rdzayanalag dmaral phyag 'tshal lo// stobs po tshul phyag 'atsAl lo// rdo rjes rnamapar 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo// 'gro lding ba la phyag 'tshal lo//

rdo rje pho nya mo drug cu rtsa bzhal phyag 'tshal lo// rdordza khrobo rnams la phyag 'tshal l// tad+ya thA/ oM traT draT/ droT ya tro Ta ya/ spu Ta spu Ta/ spo Ta ya spo Ta ya/ mo Ta mo tsa/ mo tsa ya mo rnga ya/
g+hasnu ts+tsa/ g+haN+Na pa ya g+hAN+Na pa ya/ sazasatAnaM/ tras tras/ dus ya tus ma/ b+ham zlum/ saMsbrum ya saMb+ha mi ya/ sarbab+hU tAn/ kun ya ku ya/ saMku ya saM kuTA ya/ sarbasha tan/

g+hag+haNo/ si g+haNA asaM g+haNAya/ saN+Dabad+debadzrab dza/ spo Ta ya badzrab dze/ ka Ta ya badzra badzra/ ma Ta ya badzrab dzra/ utsuT yaM 'dzA badzra/ han badza badza/ dahabadzabadzra/ pa tsa badzA
badze/ ma tha badzabadza/ utusAd ma ma hAbadzAbadzra/ d+hu rab dzrapA NaM pra yi/ ku haka su/ has has/ ma hAT Ta Ta hAs/ kha tsug tu rgyamatshe'arlabs 'khrugs pa lta bur zabatsang 'jigs
su rung ba'i hU~Mzhes bya ba'i sangage'i sgra sdang ba rab tu sngang ba bgags dang log 'dren kun tu skrag par byadapa dang/ snang ba thams cad gazhom dugasol/ 'dzems su stsal du gsol//
AhU~MphaT/ badzab rapra nga spo tsa/ bsgrubaparabya ba lha dang/ lham inadang/ lto 'phye chen po drang/ gnod sbyin dang/ sranipo dang/ yaM ngags dang/ sha za dang/ ma mo dang/ 'byung po dang/
gdon gyi tshog samathar 'byin pa 'byerab ro mdzad pahU~M[%]yaN/ hahaphaT/ a mo g+ha phaT/ rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyilhakhang khyim dang bcas pa/ budang/ chung ma dang/ phyugs dang/ rtsa lag
dang bcas pa g.yo ba bgyidadu stsal du gsol/ hU~MhU~M phaT/ 'byer bar b gyid du stsal du gsol/ shud+hulaT// sum curtsa gsum gyi lha khang khyim dang bcas pa/ bu dang/
chung ma dang/ phyugs dang/ rtsa lag dang bcas pa g.yo bar bgyid dustsal dugasol/ hU~MhU~MphaT/ 'byar bar bgyid du stsal du gsol/ hAhU~MphaT/ lha'i dbang po brgyabyi khang khyim dang bcasapa
bu dang/ chung ma dang/ phyugs dang/ rtsa lag dang bcas pa g.yo bar bgyidadustsal dugasol/ hU~MhU~MpaN+Da/ 'thab bral gyi lha khang khyim dang bcas pa/ bu dang/ chung ma dang/ phyugs
dang/ rtsa lag dang bcas pagayo bar bgyod dustsal du gsol/ hU~MhUMphaT/ dga' ldanus+saM lha khang khyim dang bcas pa/ bu dang/ chung ma dang/ phyugs dang/ rtsa lag dang bcas pa g.yo
bar bgyid du stsal dugasol/ hU~MhU~Mya// 'phrula dga'i lha khang khyim dang bcas pa/ bu dang/ chung ma dang/ phyugs dang/ rtsa lag dang bcas pa g.yo bar b gyid du stsal du gsol/
uhU~MphaT/ gzhan ' phrul dbang byed kyi lha khang khyimo dang bcas pa/ budang/ chung ma drang/ phyugs dang/ rtsa lag dang bcas pa g.yo bar bgyid du stsal du gsol/ h+phahuphaT/ de bzhin
sku du'od gasal dang tshangasarasi nas/ gnas gtsang ma'i rose 'og man gyi bar gyi lha khang khyim dang bcos pa/ bu dang/ chung ma dang/ phyugs dang/ rtsa lag dang bcas pa go bar bgyid dusul
du gsol/ hU~MhU~M phaT/ 'byer ba bgyid dustsal dugasol/ rig sngags 'chang grub pa rnams rengs par mdzad dugasol/ rmugs par mdzad dugasol/ rmongs par mdzad du gsol/ gnu
bar gsol/ gcad du gsol/ gzhig tugasol/ rnam par gzhig tugasol/ monan du gsol/ hU~MhU~MphaT/ o khrobo khro bo chen po rnam par bkrab/ saraskya bo/ nag po/ dmar po/
sarapo/ mi pham pa/ rtag tu'abarab 'i khro bo/ su ru sur su ra/ mu ru mu rumar/ tu ru tur 'u/ sgyu ru gyur klu ru/ d+hu ru d+hu raru ra/ tha rathar thar/ b+har b+har b+har/ har har har/
ya ra ya ra/ mar ma ra/ ku hu lu hu/ tsal tsal/ ma la mol/ lu tshu lutsu/ sad+ma TAlA ma ma hU~M/ bu lu lulu/ linatsalo hasaM lenataM/ mu lu langalAs/ tsu lu tsu len tuM/ ma pu lan
taM ma lu rub/ ku ba puSh+Ta/ lo rgyusUrag+haN+Ta/ spuba'itsu/ surusur/ mu ru mu ru/ su mu sumu ru/ a kaTe/ bi ka Te/ ni ka Te/ ka Na bke rje/ nika rtse/ katsang+kaNe/ dzam bi dza ya/
dzayan+ti/ bi dzayan+ti/ tamed+mesaM/ ma hAtAmod si/ glu tang+ga ma gluta/ ba ra ya Ne/ sdang ba rnams la rjes su 'doms pa/ ma dul ba rnams 'dul ba/ drag shul can rnams 'byor ba mdzad/
pa dpa' bo rnams kyi nangan dpa' b/ des pa rnams kyi ning nadis pa/ mgrub pa rnams grub par mdzad pa/ grub pa rnams chud mi za bar mdzad pa/ sems can thams cad la phan pa mdzad
pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gnas bsngags pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad la bsnyan baskur mdzad pa/ rdodra'i rigs kyi rig sngags thams cad kyis byin
gyisabarlabs pa tshur gshegs tshur gshegs/ rdo rje rab kyi rtse mo'i khang pa brtsigs panabcom ldan 'dus kyi spyan sngar lha dang/ klodang/ gnod sbyin dang/ dro ba dang/ lham yaMnadang/ nam mkha'
lding dang/ mi 'amatsadang/ lto 'phye chen po la sogs pa thams cad kyi mdun du dmatshigagangabacas pa de rjes su bskyang dugasol/ rjes su bskyang du gsol/ gshegs su gsol/ myur du
gshegs su gsol/ bdag gi las rnams myur ba myurapar bsgrub tugasol/ skrag par byed pa rdo rje'adzin pa lag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo// chur hur/ grubapa drag po lag na rdo rjebaka' stsol

cig swAhA/ shanir grub par byed pa lasAhA/ rdo rje chanapo la sAhU~M/ rdo rje phur pa la sAhA/ rdo rje 'joms pa la swAhA/ rdordzas byin gyis brlabs pa lasAhA/ nordza kilikale lasAhA/drag po ka la ka li la
sAka dam be ki li ki li lasahA/byis pa kil li la tsA// sangs rgyas thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa lasAnA/ bdag ga gnodapa dang/ nad 'gob thams cad dang/ rims thams cad med pamadzod
cigasAhA/ de nas rdo rje khro bochen pos ngang skad ces sas pa dang/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tugayos te/ phyogs dang phyogasa mtshams thams cad dang//

[ze ]dbazhin dubar snang la rdo rje'i skar mda' chen po' be cona'abab par snang ngo// gnam grub pa'i sgra chen po'ang grag go/ kun nas sa chen po 'dagrum par kun tusnang ngo// sachen po'i sar ga de dag/

nas yanalag brgyad dang ldan pan+d+rinu'i rgyun gyen du byungang// chu'i rgyunade dag gis rnam par 'jig pa'i dus kyi rlabazhin dus chen po thams cad kun tu gang bar snang ngo// gang dag sa'i 'og na gnas
pa'i klachen bo dang/ lhachen po dang/ lha ma yone chen pa dang/ de dag thams cad kyang sa'i 'og nas 'thonatsang/ rab drung du'athon tegyen du byun gnas bcom ldan 'adas la skyabs su dong ngo/
denasadrag shul can drag shul gyi sems dang ldan pa/ snang bsngaba'i sems dang ldan pa 'byung po dang/ bgegs dang/ log 'dren gang dag 'khod pa de dag kyang kun tu 'bar/ rab tu
'bar zhing/ kun rab tu'abar tem lce gcig tu gyur pa dag gis rangarang gi lus kun tu rnam par 'joms par shes te/ dadag sdug bsngal ma bzadra cang drag la rtsub pos nyananas hahazhes
bya ba'i ngu skad 'then te tshig 'di skad ces smras so// gsang ba pa'i bdag po bdag cag skadatsug gis srog kyang ma mchis par 'gyur du bgyidan/ 'jigasapa rmanapor lhung ba'adilas yongs
su bskyab tugasol bgegs dang log 'drena rnams dzaltab de bzhin du gzhan 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan thams can gnas pa dang/ raMdang/ rlubo dang/ lteng ka dang/ rdzong dang/
dur khrod dang/ shing dang/ thabs po dang/ khronaparnying pa dang/ btung ba dang/ lam gyi bzhi mdo dang/ sumamado dang/ gtsug lag khang zhags pa dang/ gnas dang/
lha khang na gnas pa de dag thams cad kyis kyang gsang ba pa'i bdag po lagan rdzordzo'ajigs pa chen po ltung ba 'di las yongs su bskyab tu gsol/ yongs subaskyab tu gsol zhes ched du brjod par du
tsho brjod do// da bzhinangulha'i khang pa thams cad g.yos/ rab tu g.yos/ kun turab tu g.yos te/ mog mog por gyuratsang 'od madapar kun tu snang ngo// bdud kyi khyim thams cad kyang kun tu
'bar zhing kun turab tu mched cing 'bab te ma rtse gcig tu gyur par snang// gang dag bdud kyi ris kyi lha'i bu de dag thams cad kyang jo rjekhrib chen pos sngangs skrag ste rang rang gi mgo
de rdzo rnams kyis rnam par 'joms pa mthong nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa dang/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po
lag na rdo rje l skyabs su dong ngo// bdud sdig can yang shan tu sdug bsngal ba'i tshor bas nyam thagatsang skag la zhum ste/ gnod pas sngangs nas sangs rgyas la skyabs su dong ngo// chos la
skyabs su song ngo// dge 'dunal skyabs su song// gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje l phyag 'tshal te/ khrongochan po rdo rjekhrobod ngag la 'di skad ces snasaso// rigs kyi bu dag
yongs su skyobs shig/ yongs su skyobs shig/ bdag nam byang chub kyi snying po la 'jug gi bar du sangs rgyas la skyabs su 'gro'o// chos la skyabs su 'gro'o// dge 'dun la skyabs su
'groge/ sems can thams cad kyi don gyi phyire pha lta bu dang/ ma lta bu dang/ spun lta bu dang/ gnyen lta bu dang snag gi gnyena mtshams lta bur 'gyur bar byang chub tu sems bskyed do//
bdag dung phyanachangasems can thams cad kyi pha dang/ ma dang/ sbyin dang/ gnyanadang sbagageganyon mtshams su 'gyur bar bya'o// lus dang/ ngag ngang/ yadi kyi las cung zad gang
ci byed de sems can thams cad bla na med pa'i ye shes thob par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo// bdag dbugs phyung nas gzhan yang dbugs dbyung go/ bdag grol nas gzhan yang
ngagrel lo// bdag mya ngan las 'das nas gzhan yang mya ngan las bzla'o// rus pa dang/ rkangadang/ khrag dang/ sha dang/ nyams mthu dang/ srog gas kyang sems can thams cad
la rim gror bya'o/ mchod par bya'o// rjod par bya'o// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang/ 'phags pa nyan thos dang/ rang sangs rgyas dang/ slob dpon dang/ bla
ma'i gnas thams cad la'ang bstanabakur bya'o// bsti stang bya'o// rim gror bya'o/ mchod par bya'o// de nas bdud sdig can gyis dkona mchog gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba bzung
cha@#// ste byang chub kyi sems rin po bskyed pa dang/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor dngomatshar du gyur te/ dga' pa thob nas sgra skad kyi nga ro gcig tu 'di skad ces smras so//
gang gi phyir na bdud khyed kyisi/ soms can kun la bdaba'i phyir// bla med byang chub sems bskyed pa// bdag cag rjes su yi rang ngo// rin chen sems 'dus mi ring bar// rnam 'dren
sangs rgyas gyur nas ni// sems can shani tusdug bsngal kun// mya ngan las nobazla bar gyis// rgyal ba'i mchog 'di jibazhinadu// skye dgu thams cad gdul ba'abyas// stobs po
chadang ldan pa yaMs// bdud bzha pa dag gdul bar gyis// de skad ces smras pa dang/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor chen po de sangs rgyas kyi mthus rang rang gi lag go snyam pa na ma tog
gi phur ma thogs par shas/ me tog gi phur ma de dag gis bcom ldan 'adas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa dang/ gsangab pa'i
bdag po lag na rdo rjedung/ khro bo chen po rdo rje'i khro bo de dag dang/ byang chub samasadapa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i snying po dang/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams nas 'dus pa'i byang chub
sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag la gtor ba dang/ dbang sangs rgyas kyi mthus me tog tsha gzhal med khang chen por gyur to// bdud sdig can ni mchog dub bsam par gyur nas/
0 sangs rgyas rjesasu dran pa sgom zhing rang gi bsod nams kyi rnam par smin pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi mthu dung/ de bzhin gshegs pa rjes su sems pas mdunadu rin po che'i gzhal med khang chen po dpag
bsam gyi shang du mas tshag mangs ris brgyud du bres pa/ rin po ngadang/ nor bu dang/ mu tig dang/ dung dang/ man shel dang/ byu rudang/ mar gdu dang/ bo kladang/ and rol
dang mthon ka chen po dang/ ke ke ru dang/ ke ke ru chen po dang/ de rdzudang/ rdo cha chen po dang/ dun las dang/ dun las chen po dang/ 'dzam bu'i chubo'i gsar gyi dra bas rnam par spras pa/
gdugs dang/ rgyal mtshan dang/ badran dang/ rnam par rgyal ba'ab dan bsgrengs pas legs par brgyanapa/ me togaga'aphreng bas klubs pa/ pog snod du ma nas bdug pa dri zhim po'i
ngad kyis dri zhim par byas pa/ phyi ma drazhim po'i bsgo bas bsgos pa lha'i bu mo 'bum phrag du ma sal snyan dang/ phag rdzob pa dang/ glu lenatsang gar byed pa/ rdzing bu yan lag brgyad
dang ldan pa'icha can 'abum phrag du ma'i dbus nas rin po chasna tshogs kyi pad+madang/ ku mu tadang/ pad+madakarapo dang/ ut+pal dang/ drimatshog byung bas mdzes par byas pa'i phyogs dang ldan pa
byun gnas / de mchog tu dga' ba dang/ rangs pa dang/ yid bde ba skyes pa des gus pa thams cad kyis de blangs nas bdud kyimathu chen po dang/ bdud kyi rnam par 'phrul pachen po dang/ bdud
kyi rdzu 'phrul chen pos lag pa gnyis kas spyi bo la blangs te/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gsab pa'i bdag po lag na rje rdzal dga' nga dang mchedapa'i phyir phul te/
tshul dang 'dra ba'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstodado// 'jig rten dag la dbang byed dbang gis 'byoragyur pa// stobs bcu'i sras rab mchog ldan khyed la brten nas su/
byang chub phyir na chegs bral dri med byang chub sems// sems can bde sgrub gtor dang 'dra babadag gas thob// bdag mgo gti mug mun pas= chen dri med gyur// srid pa'i 'dod
tshags rab tu zhi zhing spros dang bral// mya ngan 'das pa'i drang po'i lem nibadag la bstan// sems dmyal mi bzad thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'agyur// sngog bral 'jig rtanamagon la
skyabs su ma song ba// kye ma dman pa yunarang ji lte slasashog ku// derang thub dbang sras po rnams la bsod nams dang// dad dang snying rje ting 'dzin thob nas ngo mtshar gyur// samadog
gcig purasangs rgyas myur du grub par shog/ gcig pus 'gro ba ma lus mya nganabazlobar bya// srid pa gzhan n kun turgyutshobadag bgi yod// rang phan 'jug dang dge bshes bral bar
ma gyur cig/ de nas bdud sdig can gyis tshul dang 'dra ba'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjel mngon par bstod nas rang ma smra bar gyur to// de
nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po laganadzo rjes/ khro bomanapo rdo rje khro bo de dag la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu dag snang ba dang gdan dang/ bgegs dang/ log 'drenade
dag thams cad gang gis sems can thams cad la rnam par rtsom pa las rnam par ma 'tshab dang/ bgegs mi byed pa dang/ dkona mchog gsum la skyabasu'agro bar 'gyurab r de bzhin gshegrwa
pa' rim tshig 'dzani du chug cig/ rigs kyi bu dag 'di dag la mi 'jigs pa'i ng byin cig/ de sems can thams cad kyi don dang/ phan pa dang/ bde ba dang/ mya nganalas das pa
bla nam pa'i ng mthong bar 'gyur ro// de skad ces smras pa dang/ khro boNan po rdo rmakhro bo de dag gis/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje l legs so zhes tatshig la mngon par dga'
nas yang lha dang/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ dra bre dang lha ma yin dang/ nam mkha' ldangadang/ mi 'am ci dang/ lto 'phye chen po la sogs pa de dag thams cad dang/ sdang
ba bgegs dang/ log 'dren dang/ ma mo dang/ ya degs dang/ sha za dang/ 'byung po dang/ gdon dang/ brjed byang dung/ srul po dang/ lus srul po dang/ rolangs dang/
mkha' 'gro dang/ sgrub pa dang/ sbrul 'dzin bcas pa la sogs pa de dag thams cad/ gdon gyi tshogs de dag thams cad kyis rdo rje chen po 'bab pas dkrugs pa'i mtshochen po zab mo
glong 'khyol ba/ 'ura'ur sgra 'byung ba lta bur drag cing rgyunArang pa'i skad gsang mthonapos 'angaskad ces smras so// sdang ba 'byung po dang/ gdon dang/
bgegs dang/ log 'dren la sogs pa drag shul dang ga shul gyi sinu dang ldan pa sdig pa can sdig pa'i sams dang ldan pa/ sdang ba can sdang ba'i sems dang ldan pa khyed thams cad nyon
cig/ khyed kyis deng phan chad sems can gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la zhugs pa dag dang/ de la sogs pa gang drag gsang sngags sgrub bam/ klog pa de dag la
bgegs 'byung bar ma bye zhing 'tshabar mi bya ste/ sgrub pa dang rjes su mthun par stobs sbyin par bya'o// sems can gang dag dam tshig la ma zhugs pa de ngag la bsrung bar bya/ zhi
ba dang bde lags su 'gyur ba dang/ chung pa spang bo dang dug gzhil ba dang/ dug gsad pa dang/ rig sngags 'grub par sbyin par bya'o// sbrang rtsi dang/ tshagis ma ngang/
sgog pa dang/ ke'u dang/ gtor ma dang/ 'byung po dang/ mi bgrungs pa rnams kyisasha dang zas zos kyang skyon du ma gzung zhing nyes par mi brtsi'o// de nas sdang ba 'byung po dang/
bgegs dang/ log 'dren la sogs pa thams cad ces bya ba nas/ sgra skad kyi nga rogacig gis 'di skad ces smras so zhes bya ba'i bar dusbyar ro// rigs kyi bu dag bka' lung
byistsal ba de bzhin du sbyar bar bgyi'o// deng sladachadasangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang/ chos dang/ dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi'o// sems can thams cad kyi don du bla na med pa/
yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do// de nas gsang ba pa'i badrag po lag na rdo rje s/ khro bon po rdo rje khro bo chen po de dag dang/ snang ba bgegs dang/ log 'dren
dang/ 'byung po dang/ gdon gyi tshogs de dag thams cud la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ rig sngags kyi las dang/ dam tshig dang/ phyag rgyathams cad 'dzin du bcug go/ gsang
ba pa'i bdag po lagan rdo rje'ang rdzordzo' rnam par thar pa'i sgo chen po'i ting nge 'a dzani de las langs so// de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje l
'di skad ces smas so// rigs kyi bu gang la gnas nas khyod kyis rdzu 'phrul gyi tsho'aphrul 'di lta bu 'di bstanapa dang/ bdud sngagi can yang byang chub tu sems bskyed pa drang
gzhan yang sdang ba gdon dang/ 'byung pa dang/ bgegs dang/ log 'dronathamasacad dam tshig la bkodatsang byang chub kyi sems 'dzin du bcug pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di'i ming ci zhes bya/
de skad ces smras pa dang/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje s/ tshodang ldan shA ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so// btsun pa sha radu ti'i bu ting nge 'dzana'adi ni ming dang/ yi ge dang
sgra skad kyis rtogs par bya ba ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang mang ngam/ gzugs sam/ dbyibs sam/ gnas sam/ mnyam par bzhag pa 'o ma/
nyis g.yengs pa'i ng rung ste/ ting nge 'dzin ces bya ba'i sa dgang yang med do// gang la ming med pa dang/ gzugs med pa dang/ dbyibs mang pa dang/ gnas med pa dang/ mnyam par
gzhag pa med pa dang/ g.yeng ba med pa 'dabatsunapa shur dwa ti'i bu ting nge 'dzani'adi'i ming ru zhes bya zhes dul dzasnyam du sems/ yang btsunapa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gsal bar byed pa 'di//
bdag la gsal bar byed pa ma yin/ gzhan la gsal bar byed pa ma yin/ gnyis ka la gsal bar byed pa ma yin no// 'on kyang gsal bar byed par brtags pa yod do// de la
gsal bar byed pa ni gsal bar byed pa'i bdag nyid kyis stong/ bdag ni bdag gis stong/ gzhan yang gzhan gyi bdag nyid kyis stong/ gnyis ka'ang gnyis ka'angag nyid kyis
stong ste/ yang dag pa ma yin pa kun tu brtags pa'i phyir ro/ 'ditse zhes bya ba'i yi ge gnyis kyi tshig de'ang tshig gi bdag nyid kyis stong ste/ ya gi'angayi ge ma yin no// de ltar nartenatsang
'brel par 'byung ba'i don rtogs par byed pa yin no// don brjod pa nang nga gang nas kyang mi 'ong/ gang du'ang mo 'gro mod kaM/ gzhan gyi dbang la brten pa'i phyiram gor btags pa'i ng
yodado// yongs su btags pa yane pa'i phyir btags pa'i ng stong pa'o// rtanatsang 'brel par 'byung ba'i phyir gzhan gyi dbang nyid stong pa'o// sgyu dang rkyenalas byung ba'i phyir rten cing
'brel par 'byung ba'ang stong pa'o// glo bur du rgyu dang rkyen gyis bskyed pa'i phyir 'byung ba'i bdag nyid kyis stong ngo// dal rtenatsange 'brel par 'byung banIrang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong//
rang gi mtshan nyid stongapa gangayanapa dmtshan nyid med pa'o// mtshan nyid med pa gang yin pa de dbazhin nyade de// dubazhin nyid gang yin pa de ma nor ba de bzhin nyid de// ma nor ba de bzhin nyid

gang yanipa dgazhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyidi do// gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid gang yonapa de ting nge 'dzinato// ting nge 'a dzan gang yin de rtogs pa'o// rtogs pa gang yanepa de stong pa nyade do//
stong pa nyid gang yin pa de lhag mthong ngo// lhag mthong gang yin pa de zhi gnas so// zhi gnas gang yin pa de rnam par thar pa'o// rnam par tharapa gang yane pa de dbuma'i lam yin no// dbu
ma'i lam gang yonapa de lamatha' gcig med/ mtha' gnyis mad/ gzung ba mad/ 'dzin pa po med/ 'dzan pa med/ chad pa mdu/ rtag pa mod/ skye ba med/ 'gag pa mad
rtog pa med/ rnam par rtog pa med/ rang dbang med/ gzhan gyi dbang med/ 'gro ba med/ 'ong ba med/ kun nas nyon mongs pa med/ rnam par byang ba meng/ 'du ba mad/ 'bral
nyu/ ba med do// de nalcag mthong yin no// lhag mthong gang yin pa de la phung po rnams med/ khams rnams med/ dbang po rnams med/ skye mchang rnams mer/ yul
rnams mod/ yul du gdags pa med/ las med/ las kyi 'bras bu med do// gang la las med cing las kyi 'bras bu med pa de bla namad pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo//
bla named pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub gang yane pa dablan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas so// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang yin pa de chos so//
chos gang yin pa de ma skye ma 'chi'o// mi skye mi 'chab gang min padanam mkha' dang mnyam pa nyid du khong du chud par bya'o// btsunapa shar dwa ti'i bus smras pa/ rigs kyi bukhyod kyis ting nge
'dzin bstan pa 'dan shin tu thob ste/ 'di la nyan b+bes dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'gro ba'ang mngan/ 'jig rtenapa'i mu stegs can dang/ phas kyi rgol ba thams cad lta smos kyang
tsadagos/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'dzinadage ba'i rtsa ba ma bskyed pa dang/ mos pa chung ba thams cad kyisashes par daka' ba ste/ gzhan dun 'di de bzhin gshegs pa'ispyan yul du gyur pa
rnam gtogs so// de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyananadimaMgs pa med pa gnas pa med pa'o// de skad ces smras pa dang/ gsangab pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes/ tshodang ldan po shAr
ba 7/ rUti'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so// btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu dbazhinagshegs pa zhes bya ba de na de bzhin nyid kyi mtshan nyid de// stong pa nyid gdum pa de la de bzhin gshegs pa med de//
de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan nyidamed de// shu redwata'abugasnus pa/ rigs kyi bu gal ted bzhinagshegs pa mtshan nyid med pa yanan dre la ji ltar skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu
gnyis dang ldan zhang/ de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bstan cing dpo byad bzang po brgyud nus sku legs par brgyan/ ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gsum rnam par gzhag par lta dzaltar/
de bzhin gshegs pa bla named pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas/ gsang ba pa'i bdagabo lag na rdo rjes smras pa/ btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bumyas bu

chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis zhes bya ba de na kun rdzob kyi brda'i tshig go/ rgyan ces bya ba de naspros pa'i yi ge dang sgra'o// dpe byad bzang po zhes bya bad na sgyu ma dang rmalamang ngo bo nyadakyimtshan
nyade do// yang ngag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ces bya ba de na nam mkha'i ngob nyadekyi mtshan nyid do// sku gsum rnam par gzhag pa zhes bya ba dan tshogs gnyis kyis sprul pa'i mtshan nying ngo//
btsun pa shar dwa ti'i bu yang 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i gsang ba'i lul te/ de la sku'i gsang ba zhes bya ba de na bsod nams chen po' rgyu mthunapa'i mtshan nyiding// bsod nams kyi
[p ]@#// rgyumathun pa gang yonepa de de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzogs par longs spyod pa'i sku ste/ 'du'ing de bzhinagshegs pa'i sku'i 'phrin las dang sku'i gsang ba'o// btsun/
bsha ra dwa ti'i bu gsung zhes bya ba de na kun rdzob don dam pa gnyis kyi mtshan nyid do// kun rdzob dang don dram pa gnyis kyi mtshan nyid gangayonapa de de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa'i sku/ 3
rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba chad pa med pa dang rtag pa med par 'jug pa thugs su chud pa/ yade kya rnam par shes pa'i lam gyis 'jug pa bsam gtan goms par byas pas shes par
bya ba ste/ dmags pa med pa/ kun nas nyon mongs pa dang rnam par bya bas stongs/ lus kya yul ma u0f00na pa/ ngag gi spyod yul ma yin pa/ yid kyi rang gi ngobo'i yul ma yin pa gang
yan pa don de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi sku nam ma(kha'i khams su yang dag par 'du ba'o// dbazhinagashegasapalasku gsum rnam par gzhag pa de ltar blta bar bya'o// btsunapa sha ra dwa
ti'i bugazhanayang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i gsang ba gang yin pa de nachos kyasku'o// chos kyi sku gang yin pa de nuchos rnams kyi dbu ma'i lam du blta'o// dbu ma'i lam gangayanapa de
nam si mi'atshab ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung yang rung/ ma byung yang rung tshes kyi sku 'dona gnas pa nyid do// btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu bsod nams kyi rgyu mthun pa zhes bya bde

pa30 ni pha rol tu phyin pa dag gi rnam grangs su gtogs pa'o// de la pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba de'ang bsod nams kyi spyamathun pa nyid dubalta'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ btsun pa sha ra nga 'i bu sbyin

pa'i pha rol duphyin pa zhes bya ba de ni phyi nang gi dngos po rnam pa gnyis mos su gtang bar bya'o// de la phyi zhes bya bar nakun rdzobakyitshig go/ nang zhes bya ba de ni denangam pa'i tshig go/ de la
phyis byapa de naMgang zas 'dod pa rnams la zas dang/ skom 'dod pa rnams dang/ dbazhin du bran po dang/ bran mo dang/ las byed pa dang/ no shas 'tshob dang/ glangapo chedang//
rta drang/ shing rtadang/ sa dang/ mgo dang/ lag pa dang/ rkang pa dang/ mig dang/ sha dang/ khrag dang/ rkangadang/ tshil dang/ rus pa'i bar du sbyin pa ste/ de'ang thabs kyi pha rol
tu phyin pas yongs su zin pas yongs su bsngos pa rnam par smin pa lam re ba dang/ rgyu nom pa dang/ rgya che ba dang/ rang gis bsti stangadu byas te rnam pa thams cad sems can thams cad la sbyin
pa'i dzin phyi'// nang gi nichos sbyin pa// nge'ang rnam pa gnyis te/ rtanacing 'brelapara'abyung pa la 'jug par yang dag par gazhol ba dang/ sbyin pa'i gtam dang/ tshul khrims kyi
gtam dang/ bzodapa'i gtam dngo/ ban 'grus dang/ bsam gtan dang/ shes rab dang/ thabs dang/ stobs dang/ smon lam dang/ yashis kyi gtam dang/ sAng rjes yongs
su thon pa thabs kyi pha rol tu phyin par yang dag par 'duba'o// gzhan yang nang ga sbyin pa nigang 'damathar ra dzan pa dang/ skya badra'agag par yongs su rtog pa dang/
rnam par rtog pa dang/ shes pa dang/ shes bya rnam par sbyangs pa dga' bas yongs su zin pa'i stobs kyi pha rol tuphyin par yang dag pa 'dub ste/ 'donaches kyi sbyin pa'o// gang 'di nying
la lus dang/ ngag dang/ yod rgod pa med pa dang/ khengs pa med pa dang/ lus rnam par g.yeng ba med pa drang/ ngag rnam par g.yeng ba med pa dang/ ya rnam par gayang bamadapar
shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su zin pa/ gtsug tu nyon mongs pa med pa gnas pa/ btang snyoms kyis yongs su zanipa thabs kyi pha rol tu phyin par yang dag par badung 'danatshul
khrims kyi yarol tu phyin pa'o// gong 'de di larang ga lus dang srog la ma ltabar bsod nams dang/ bsod nams ma yin pa dang/ chos dang/ chos ma yin pa dang/ bden pa dang/
bden pa ma yin pa dang/ g.yo bdang/ mi g.yo ba'i dngos po rnam par sbyon gzhung byams pas yongs su zin pa shes rab kyi pha rol tuphyin par yang dag par 'du ba 'di na 'dir bzod pa'i la
rol tu phyin pa'o// gang sbyin pa dang/ tshul khrims dang/ bzod pa dang/ ting nge 'dzin thob par bya ba'i phyir sems spro zhing rtsom pa dang/ yongs su ma skyo bar rtag tu gnas pa med pa dang/
de dmigs pa med pa dang/ byams pas yongs su zinapa ye shes kyipha rol tu phyin par yang dag par 'du ba 'dun 'dir brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di naM
bsod nams kyi tshogs te/ dbazhin gshegs pa'i rdzogs par longs spyod pa'i sku'i gsang ba grub bar byed pa'o// btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang ye shes kyi tshogs ni gang la
rol tu phyin pa bzhapa 'di dag nyidardzogs pa ste/ pha rol tu phyin pa rnams 'byed pa ded/ 'grel pa dang/ gsal ba'abyed pa dang/ del gzhol zhing mi rtag pa dang// bdag med pa
dung stong pa dang/ gsob dang/ gsog dang/ dngos po med pa dang/ dngos po thams cad dngos po med par yang dag par ston to// mdorab sdu ba nu'adod chags dang/ zhe sdang
dang gtamug dang/ nyon mongs pa dang/ nye ba'i nyon mongs pa sel cing chos kyi dbyings nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang mnyam par yang dag par ston ti dmigs pa dang bral ba
'ad ni 'dir bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// de bzhin nyid dang/ stong pa nyid dang/ mtha' las 'dus pa stong pa nyid dang/ phyi ma'i mtha' stongapa nyade dang/ chos kyidabyangs kyi
rang gi ngo bo nyid gang yin pa 'don 'di shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// btsun pa shArd ti'i bu 'din yo shes kyi tshogs so// bsod nams kyi tshigs dang ye shes kyi tshig
dang tshogs 'di gnyis n byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos dang/ shes pa dang/ shes bya mtha' dag dang/ bla namadapa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par
rtogs par byed pa ste/ btsunapa gar du ti'abu 'din di bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i gsang ba dag gas mdego bsdus te bstan pa'o// rgyucheram par dbye ba ni gal te dbazhin gshegs
nyad kyi sku tshe'i tshod bskal par bzhugs te bstanAcing bshad kyang mthar phyin par mi 'gyur ro// sku'i gsang ba ji lta ba bzhin du gsung gi gsang ba'ang de bzhin no// thugs kyi gsang ba
blon de bzhin gshegs pas rnam pa dang/ so so'i rnam pa dang/ kha dog dang/ rtags drab/ dbyibs dang/ ngag gi rnam par rtog pa'i spyod yul dang/ bya ba tha dad pa'i sbyor ba rnams
kyis kyang bstan par m spyodamod kyi/ 'on kyang dbazhin gshegs pa'i so so rang ga rag pa'i thugs kyi gsang ba yin par shes par bya'o// btsunapa shA ra dwa ti'i bu da na de'i phyir rnam
grangs 'das kyang de ltarig par bya ste/ bdag cag lta bu byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas pa rnams kyis bstan pa lta smos kyang ca dgos/ 'on kyang de bzhin gshegs
pa' byon gyi rlabs kyis sems can gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa'i bsam pa dang/ lhag pa'i bsam pa dang/ mos pa dang/ blo gros dang/ blo dang/ rtogs pa dang/ mngon
par 'dod pa mtha' yas mu med pa dang/ sems kyi rgyun rnam pa tha dad pa sna tshogs kyi rjes su 'gro ba'i spyod yul dang/ skye gnas sna tshogs dang/ lhan tsage skyes pa'i las sna tshogs dang/
mashes pa dang/ ma rig pa'i mun pa dang/ mi snang ba dang/ mun nag dang/ 'grobalnga dang/ 'gro ba drug dang/ khams gsum pa thog ma dang/ dbus dang/ 'jig par gnas pa
sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su ma chadapar gnas pa dus gsum dang/ phyogs la mgo rmongs pa skya bo dang rgyab la sogs pa nab dang/ nadadung/ mya ngan dang/ smra sngags
'don pa dang/ sdug bsngal ba dang/ yid mi bdeb dang/ 'khrug pa la sogs pas nyan gtsag bzhin du bcom pa'i sems can rnams kyi sems can gyi khams ma brgal ba bsgral ba
dang ma grol ba dgrol ba dang/ dbugs ma phyin pa dbugs dbyung ba dang/ yodras su mya ngan las ma 'das pa yongs su mya ngan las bzla ba dang/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la gzud pa dang/
gnas pa thams cad gyur ba'i lamal dgod pa dang/ mya ngan las 'das pa shin tubadab/ don dam pa/ zhi ba/ 'khrug pa med pa/ dge ba/ nad med pa dang/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan
'das rnams kyi so so rang gi rog pa'i ye shes kyi dbyings kyi mnyam pa nyid kyis mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa/ rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la sbyor
nga@#// ba dang/ yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa dang/ yang dag par gzengs bstod pa dang/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar bya ba dang/ dga' ba dang/ ras pa dang//bdang/ yang dag par 'angag 'ang
mgu ba'i sa la yang dag par gzud pa dang/ chos rtogs pa'i khyadapar brjod pa dang/ rgyumatshochen po ltar 'dul ba'i sems can yongs su sminapar bya pa'i dus dang tshur las mi 'da' bar bya ba
dang/ dadag la rgyude'i dbang du byas te skye bo'i tshogs chen po' don dang/ phan pa dang/ bde ba dang/ lha dang/ ma rnams kyi don dang/ theg pa rman po bran mod pa'i chos kyi tshul gtsag nas
gcig tu brgyud de gnas par bya ba dang/ gcig nas gtsug tulung byin pas thos pa dang/ bsam pa dang/ sgom pa las byungaba'i shes rab dang/ ye shes goms pa rnal 'byor dugyurab 'i
rgyad kyi rgyun mi gcad pa dang/ skal ba yod la yongs su ma smin pa yongs su smin par byaba'i 'os su gyur pa'i nganagyi phyir/ phyogs tsam gyi sgo gtsag mdunangu byas te 'a jug par byed pa cung zad
cig bshadupa bya'o// de skad ces smras pa dang/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu mchog tungo mtshar du gyuranang rmadadu byung bar gyur te dga' ba thob nas/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje
la 'daskad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu legs so lags so// gang gi phyakho bo cag lta bu'i nyi tshiba'ishes pa dang ldan pa gzhan gyis sgra bsgrags pa'i rjes su 'gro ba' nyan thos rnams l
chos zab mo'i tshig gi don 'dulta bu gsal bar byas pa nirags kyi bu khyod yang legs so// lag na rdo rjes smras pa/ btsunapa shA ra dwa ti'i bude de bzhin te/ jiskad smras pa dbazhin no//

btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu ting nge 'dzani'adi'i ming tsazhes bya ba zhes de skad zer ba ni ting nge 'dzin 'di'i ming rdo rje'i rnam par thar pa'i sgo chen po zhes bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag g.yas pa
gser gyi kha dog can barkyang ste/ phyagagayas pa 'jam zhing mnyenal shan tu gzhonashachags pa gsang ba pa'i bdag polag nardo rje'i mgo la bzhag ste/ chadadubaka' stsal pa 'di de ga kyang
ched du bka' stsal to// gsang ba pa'i bdag po lagan rdo rje khyod kyis gang mdo tsA zab mo 'dalta bu 'dogasang ba pa tshig gi don bzhin du sems can thams cad la lung bstan cang bshad de
bkrol zhing rnam par phya b.legs so legs so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhinagshegs pa dgra bcomapa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pas lag na rdo rjel ji ltar legs so
zhes bya ba byin pa dbazhin du/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis kyang gasab ba'i bdag bo lag na rdo rje'i mgol phyag bzhag ste/ ched du
paka' stsal pa 'dod kyang chedadubaka' stsal cing legs so zhes bya ba byonete/ rigs kya bu chos kyi rnam grangs 'da'ajig rten gyi khams mang po dganamanga'adzinapa'i ng dkonanarab tu
gsal borabyed pa ltar smos/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes chos kyi rnam grangs 'di beshad pa na/ lha'i bu gang+gA'i klung tshad med/ grangs med dpag tu

[4/]chad pa'i bye ma'i rdul phra rab kyi rdulalasangashan tu'adas pa steng chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba skyes so// dge slong dang/ dge slong ma dang/ dge bsnyen dang/ dge
bstanam dang/ lha dang/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ dIb dang/ lha ma yin dang/ nam mkha'alding dang/ mi 'am ci dang/ lte 'phye chen po dang/ ma dang/ ma ma yin pa rab tu mang po dag rnamaM
pa thob par gyur te// dbas kyang ches mang ba'i sems can rnams na phyur ma ldog pa nyid bya ba'i phyir sprin mdangs dag gang

bkyang ches mang ba'i sems can rnams ni phyir mi ldog pa nyide dubya ba'i phyir ban med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyes so//la da ngam yin pa sas rgyas kyi zhi gzhan dapag tu mad sung grangs medal brjod du med pa'i yang brjod dumad pa dbad rAkak+ku'u
pas/ tshu g.yos so/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la'ang chos kyi dgab pa dang mchod pa'i phyir nam mkha'i dkyil na ja rnams ma brdungs par kun nas sgra byung ngo// byang chub sems dapa'irdzu
'phrul gyis gzhal med khang gyi khang pa brtsegs pa rnams su kun nas sa'i snyan dang pheg rdob pa dang/ glu dbyangs blangs pas lha'i bu mo rnams gar byed de// spos dang byug pa dang/
bdug pa dang/ phyi ma dang/ gosadang/ gdugs dang/ rgyal mtshan dang/ ba dan ngang/ dpag bsam gyi shing ljon pa dang/ rin po chadang/ mu tig gi rgyun 'phrangangang/ ma rtog pad+ma
dang/ ku mu ta dang/ ut+pal dang/ dri mchog dang/ sna ma'i me tog dang/ pa ra shaka dang/ pa sha ka chen po dung/ btang bzung dang/ btang bzung chen po dang/ mnadar ba dang/ man
dar ba chen po dang/ maN+Dasha kadang/ many+dzasha ka chen po dang/ kun nas skyes dang/ kun nas sus chen po'i ma tog gi char gyi pan kun nas mngon par bab bo// sos myu'i char gyi spron yang
mngon par bab pa'o// de nas tshangs pa dang/ khyab 'jug dang/ dbang phyug chen po dang/ brgya byin dang/ 'jig rten skyong ba dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ rnam mkha' lding dang/ ma 'am dang
lto 'phya chen po dang ma mo'i gdonagyi tshogs dang/ 'byung po dang/ brjed byang dang/ skam byed dang/ sgrub pa dang/ sbrul 'dzin bcas dang/ gnon po dang/ ma mo dang/ yi dgas
dang sha za dang/ bram ze'i srin po dang/ mkha' 'gro mo dang/ phyogs drung phyogs mtshams dang/ mkhar dang/ ri deng/ sa'i lha la sogs pa snang pa gdon bgegrwa dang/ leg
'dren thams cad dang/ de ma yin pa gzhan yang lha dang/ mi dang/ mi ma yin pa dag bla gos rnams phrag pa gcig tu gzar te/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha ngas la btsugs nas/ bcom
#// ldan 'das ga la ba der logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'adas la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gang gis bdag cag gzer cung
bar gzir pas rig sngags 'chang thams cad la dngos grub stsol ba dang/ dam tshig thams cad 'dzin du 'jug pa la yang dag par gnang bar bgyid par 'gyur bar ng gi snying po 'di
bdag cag la bstan du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshangs pa la sogs pa lha'i tshogs de dag la lags so zhus bya ba byin to/ grogs po dag gang gi phyir khyed cag 'ad ltar
sems can thams cad l phan pa'i phyir zhugs pa nilegs so legs so// de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung zhig dang/ ngas khyedarang rang gi snying po bstan par bya'o/ de
dag gis kyang/ bcom ldan 'das la legs so legs so zhes gsol to// bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i rnga bo chadang/ rgya mtshodang/ smone chen po'i sgra lta bu'i gsung tshangs pa chen po'i
smra bas lhag pa sna tshogs pa stan cing rgya che la brab pa/ thog ma dang/ bar dang/ tha mar dge ba/ sems can thams cad kyi snying du 'thadapa/ gsal ba/ 'jebs pa/ dag pa/ mnyen
pa/ snyan pa/ brjod pa'i tshig khams gsum pa thams cad la go bar byed pa/ de bzhinagshegs pa'i seng ge 'i sgra bla na med pa des grub pa'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag gsungs so//
'bu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// tad+ya thu/ rdzaya dza ya/ dza yA ba pa/ tsalo tsale/ mi la ma li/ lu chu 'du cu/ dza ye

bi dzaye/ dza yan+ti/ ba dzayan+taM/ a dza te/ a pa rA dzate/ tang te/ sarba duShastam b+ha naM/ dzam b+hanaM/ mo ha sha te ka rAle/ ke yu re/ sarba bud+d+ha a d+hiSh+Tha te/ pA ts+tshar ba sa ni/ paN
sha ba ri/ shA a ma ATaya saad ts+tsha tu g.ya/ par ba de/ pad+mamA la na badzra ang ku sha/ badzramA te/ badzrapA tAl/ shu la nidzad+hare/ hihitihi ba dzapa Ni/ po de/ badzra/
pA NaM/ badzashul ni/ tsakra rgyu re/ hahi/ badzrapA NaM/ hahabadzapA Ni/ hahahahi/ hehehehe/ badzrapA NaM/ ka la ka la/ ba la ba la/ ra la ra la/ d+ham d+ha ma/ sa ra sa ra/ wAdAn+taAhA/
la ma la/ tshile de le/ de dal/ da ma li/ dzAle/ ma hAdzA le/ dzA la taM/ pra dz+wa li ta/ trar thag gi tha re/ mu ku ti/ kA me/ kA ma me/ grub pa'i tshigs kyis phyag byas ma/ lha thams
cad snying kun tu'ajug par byed ma/ sems can thams cad kyi snying 'bags ma/ snang ba rab tu sdang ba thams cad kyi snying 'joms ma/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po rjes su skyong
ma byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi snying po la 'jug ma tshugasheg/ dam tshig rjes su skyongs shig/ sems can thamasacad kyi snying rnams khug la dam tshig la khod tsag/ thams
/@#// cad mkhyen pa la phyag 'tshal la sAhA/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo satwA/ traT tra Ta/ so Ta ya swAhA/ gyen dulta la sAhA/ rnam par lta lasAhA/
chu srinal sAhA/ me la sAhA/ tshangs pa la sAhA/ khyab 'jug la sAhA/ drag po rnams la sAhA/ brgya byin la sahA/ 'jig rten skyong ba rnams la sAhA/ thams cad la sAhA/ lha rnams lasAhA/
'tsho'i nor rnams la sAhA/ ma mo rnams la sAhA/ mtshan rnams la sAhA/ bgegs dang log 'dren thams cad la sAhA/ sa la sAhA/ dbyangs can la sAhA/ lha dang/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/
dri za dang/ lham yin dang/ nam mkha' lding dang/ mi 'am ci dang/ lto 'phye chen po thams rud dang/ srin po la sogs pa khams gsum thams cad du gtogs pa'i soms can thams cad la sAhA/
tshur shog tshur shog/ dam tshig rjes su skyongs shig/ ku ru ku ru/ sa ras ra/ tiSh+ThatiSh+Tha/ han han/ da ha ha/ pa tsa pa tsa/ hU~MyU paM/ tsan+tul/ ma tang ga/ Tom ni/ puk+ka si/ dbazhin
gshegs pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// bdag la gsang sngags kyi gzhi rnams grub par gyur cig swAhA/ de bzhin gshegs pas rang ga snying po dang/ lha thams cad kyi snying po 'di gsungs

pan/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor do'adzag sngangs skrag par gyuranas/ cha shangag tshal rlung drag po chen pos bskyod de rtsa ba bcad pa bzhin du g.yo zhing 'gul lasAng tshig ste/ rdo rje'i phur bus
[z]btab pa bzhin du blugasashang zha/sa la 'gre zhing skyabs btsal ba'i phyir 'dushes tsam gyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la 'bod pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis/ gsang ba pa'i bangagapo
lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu lha'i 'khor 'di slong zhig/ ngas dam tshig 'diyongs su 'dzin du gzhug go/ rig sngags grub pa 'byor par byed pa'i snying po la
gzhol ba bsgrags so// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes gsang ba pa'i snying po 'dis lha'i 'khor de dag thams nadabaslang nge// dkonamadog
gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rjadrag po la phyag 'tshal lo// o li kal/ badzakI li kI la ya sAhA/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ni bdag gi snying po
