mchog tugasang b.lags te/ rig sngags thams cad 'grub par bgyidapa lags so// des na bdag kyang drangs nas gzhan gyis ma btang bar mchi'o// dbang du mchi'o// dngos grub
stsal bar bgyi'o// lung bzhin bgyi'o/ bsrung bgyi'o// dpal bskyed par bgyi'o// bgegs dang log 'dren thams cad rnam par bshig go/ sems can thams cad gdul bar
bgyi// 'byung po thams cad rnam par bshag par bgyi'o// nad thams cad bsal bar bgyi'o// sngon gyi las kyi rnam par smin pa ni ma gtogs so// bcom ldan 'das bdag gi snying
po mchog tugasang ba 'di nas bskal pa grangs ma mchis pa gsum dudaka' ba spyod pa chen po brgyad pa na/ gnod pa bgyid pa bgags dang leg 'dren thams cad kyis//
rnam pa gtses pa'i tshe/ bcom ldan 'das dbazhin gshegs pa ragrabcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rgya mtsho mchog 'dzin ma ltar blos rnam par bsgyings shanga rnam par rol pa
mngon shes dri zhami snang dpal gyis bdag la bsrung ba'i slad du stsal to// gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes snying po mchog tugasang ba 'ad smras ma thag tu 'khor da thams rud bsam gtan
gyi dga' b dang bde bas tsham par gyur te/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje'i dam tshig gi bstan pa la gnas so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka'
stsal pa/ kun dga' bo khyed kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di zung zhig/ chongs shig/ lhogs shig/ 'dzan du chug cig/ kun rlab par gyis shog/ gzhan dag la'ang rgya cher yang dag par rab
tu ston cig dang/ des sems can mang po la yun ring por phan pa dang/ bde ba dang/ thamar dbazhin gshegs pa'i bshes blan med pa/ chags pa med pa/ sgab pa med pa thogarung
rtogs pa 'gyur ro// su chos kyi rnam gras 'di 'chang ba dang/ klog pa dang/ 'dzan du 'jug pa dang/ kun chub par byed pa dang/ gzhan dag la'ang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston pa
dang mchodapa dang/ yi ger 'drab dang/ yi ger 'bri 'jug pa dang/ kha ton byed pa dang/ nyan pa dang/ sams pa de ring por ma thogs par branamed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byung
rtsub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// 'dunas niam byang chub kyi sa po la 'dug gi bar du ngan 'gro log par ltung bar 'gro bar mi 'gyur ro// rigs ngama' ba rnams su skye bar
mi 'gyur/ dbul po'i rigs rnams su skye bar mi 'gyur te/ shes rab med par yang ma yani/ ma dul bar ma yin/ tshothung bar ma yin zhing/ tshe rabs tshe rabs su tsherabs dran pa
'gyur ro// byang chub kyi sems brjed par mi 'gyur ro// thos pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro// rab tudabon pa la mngon par dga' bar 'gyur ro// 'khor ngan pa can ma yin par 'gyur ro//
tshig gzung bar 'os dang snyan par 'gyur ro// skal ba bzang zhing gzugs bzang bar 'gyur ro// shes rab chen po dang// spobs pa rin po dang/ dbang dang ldan par 'gyur ro//
de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyes par bya ba la mkhas par 'gyur ro// dge ba'i bshes gnyenagyis yongs su thon par 'gyur ro// sdig pa'i grogs po yongs su song bar 'agyur/
pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba la mkhas par 'gyur ro// sems can thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa du ba la mkhas par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi zheng che zhing mtha' yas
/@#// pal rdzu 'phrul dang ldan par 'gyur ro// nam byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug gi bar du du byang chub kyi sems ma brjed par 'gyur ro// tshe 'di la nga la bgegs dang/ leg
[+ ]'drenadang/ rig sngags 'chang grub pa dang/ 'byung po dag dung/ gdenagyi tshogs dang/ ma mo dang/ yi dgas dang/ sha zad ng/ lha dang/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ driza dang/ lha
ma yin dang/ nam mkha' lding dang/ mi 'am tsa dang/ lta'aphye chen po la sogs pa thams cad kyis ma thul bar 'gyur ro// de'i las kyi sgrub pa thams cad byang bar 'gyur ro// nad thams cad
dang bral bar 'gyur ro// sngon gyi las kyi rnam par smin pa ma gtogs par 'chiba'i dus byed par ma 'gyur ro// de la rig sngags thams cad kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro// de la lha thams
cad kyang srung zhing sodapa dang yongs su skyob par 'gyur ro// de'i rtsom pa thams cad kyang sla bar 'gyur ro// 'jig rten pa dang/ 'jig rten las 'das pa dang/ dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi
dam tshig la zhugs par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'dasal/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'daming tsalags//
khad ji ltar gzung bar bgya ]bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ kun dga' bo da' phyir khyod kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'dabyang chub sams dpa' thams cad kyi mchod pa'i snganang bstan
pa zhes bya bar zung zhig// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo sbrub pa med pa skol pa zhes bya bar yang zung zhig/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi dbyings la mkhas pa zhes
bya ba yang zung zhig/ bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad 'joms par byed pa zhes bya bar yad zungazhig/ bdud kyi phyogs 'dul ba zhes bya bar yang thung zhig/ rtanatsang 'brel par
'byung pa la 'jug pa rab tu rtogs pa zhes bya bar yang cung zhig/ dam pa'i chos kyi phyag rgya'i mtshan nyidatses bya bar yang thung zhig/ rig sngags dang/ dkyil 'khor dang/ phyag rgyudang/
dam tshig thams cad la rab tu'ajog pa zhes bya bar yabazung zhag/ lag na rdo rje'i rnam par thar pa'i ting nge 'dzan gyi cho 'phrul zhes bya bar yang thung zhig/ rdo rje'i ri rab chen po'i rtsa mo'i
khang pa brtsegs pa'i gzungs zhes bya bar yang zung zhig/ de nas tshodang ldan pa kun dga' bos/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la legs so zhes gsol te mngon par dga' nas cung
mo sna bar gyur to// de nas byams pa la sogs pa bskal pa bzang po'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i
snying po la sogs pa phyogs bcu'i 'a jig rten gyi khams nas 'dus pa de dag thams cangadang/ lha dang/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ drawa dang/ lha ma yin dang/ nam mkha' lding dang/
mi 'am ci dang/ lto 'phye chen po dang/ mi dang/ mi ma yin pa de dag thams cad dang/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de bcom ldan 'das lag na rdo rjes gsungs pa/
la mngonaparab stod do// 'phags pa rdo rje'i rirab chen po'i rtse mo'akhang pa brtsegs pa'i gzungs rdzogs so/// rgya gar gyi mkhan po shA len dra bo d+hi dang/ dzAn saM/
dang / zhu chen gyi le tsa ba ban d+he ye shes sdes bsgyuratsang zhus te/ skad gsar bcad kyis kyang brtses nas gtan la phab pa k+Sha/ rgya garaM
skad du/ Ar+ya badzraa dza ta a na la pra mo hanan ma d+hA ra Ni/ bod skadadu/ 'phags pa rdo rjesaM pham pa me ltar rab tu rmongs byed ces bya ba'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems
dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rinapo che'i khang pa brtsigs pa can gyi rigangs ri sul gyi mchog/ ri rab kyi
a smad dang sked ltar gser gyi rdo sna tshogs kyis gang zhang ra'ur bres pa 'bar ba/ rin po che'i rdo duma'i 'od sna tshogs 'ja' lta bu byung ba'i rdo leb yangs pa/ me tog dri zhim po bkrag zhing
ma dang bdug pa dri zhim pa mang pos phug gi nang dang nags bsgos pa/ gdugs dang/ a ka ru dang/ phyi ma dang/ dril bu dang/ bar samadzes par byas pa'i ri bo mchog la bzhugs
de nabcom ldan 'das lha rnams dang/ lha'i bu rnams dang/ lha ma yin rnams dang/ lha ma yin gyi bu rnams dang rlung lha rnams dang/ nam mkha' ldang rnams dang/ klu rnams dang/ gnod
sbyin rnams dang/ mi 'am rtsi rnams dang/ srin po rnams dang/ dra the rnams drang/ rig sngags 'chang grub pa rnams dang/ 'byung po rnams dang/ log 'dren rnams dang/ sha za rnams dang
snang ba dang/ ma snang ba'i ma mo'i tshigs khyab par byed pa rgya chen po dag gis dpa da lnga brgyar 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du gyur par 'dus te/ dan gnasapa'i byang chub sems dpa'i
bdun khri lnga stong dang/ dge slong khra nyas stong lnga brgya dang thabs tshug go/ bcom ldan 'das na chos ston te gnas par bdeb mnyan nabadab/ 'khor ba las nges par 'byung ba'i
chos ston to// de nalha rnams dang/ lha'i bu rnams dang/ lha ma yin rnams dang/ lha ma yin gyi bu rnams dang/ rlung lha rnams dang/ rlung lha'i bu rnams dang/ nam mkha' lding rnams
dang/ klu rnams dang/ gnod sbyin rnams dang/ mi 'am tsa rnams dang/ srin po rnams dang/ srin po'i bu rnams dang/ dri za rnams dang/ rig sngags 'chang grub pa rnams dang/
'byung po rnams dang/ log 'dren rnams dang/ shaza rnams dang/ snang ba dang/ mi snang ba'i ma mo' tshogs rnams dang/ 'byung po' tshogs rnams rnam par rgyu zhing ku+o dang/ 'jigs
pa dang/ nyam thag pa'i sgra 'byin to// bcom ldan 'das dbazhinagshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pas smra de dag gsan/
nas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// kyabazhinabazangs dag ci'i phyir ku co dang/ 'jigs pa dang/ nyam thag pa dang/ 'khrug pa'i sgra 'byini/ dadag kas gsol pa/ bcom ldan
'das bdag cag nadabang du bgyis te/ gnod pa dang brang bas bkug nang drangs te mthobatsams na/ bcom ldan 'das bskyab tu gsol/ de skad ces gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan
'das kyis thams cad kyi steng gi dkya'i 'khor yangs pa ston pa'i mchog gi blo gros dang/ blo dang/ las dang/ las kyimatha' dang ldan pa/ sa chon po las sa gzhan thob pa rgyal ba tu
nye ste/ sakyi rgyal srid la dbang bskur ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rjes su dgongs par mdzad pa tsam gyis 'ongs te/ rdorje'i zom ltar dbung mgo yangs pa/ rdo
tshal rdzaltar mkhregs pa'i rtsed pan 'od zer 'tsher ba can/ rdo rje'i dpung rgyan dang ldan pa/ lus mkhregasashang sra ba/ lag na rdo rjedung/ zhags pa dang/ lag brtan po 'bar ba thogs
pa rdo rje phur bu sra bas rab tu 'joms par byed pa/ mthu chen po g.yog bzhi 'bum lnga khri dang ldan pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'di kun tu snang bar byed cing/ rdo rje'i rigs kyi gzhon nu
dang rdo be con dang/ rdo rje'i snying po dang/ rdo rje'i tog dang/ rdo rje'i snang ba dang/ rdordzasngon po dang/ rin po'i rdo rdzongang/ gsang ba'i de rje dang/ 'khor lo rdo rje la sogs pa dang/
rdo rje'i dmag dpon chen po rnams dang/ dmag skyong rnams dang/ sa skyong rnams dang/ rdo rjerig pa'i rgyal po yang dag pa dang/ yang dag pa ma yin pa yang dag par rtogs pa rnams dang//
rdo rje'i yum rnams dang/ deN+Da rnam par 'dren pa rnams dang lhan cig tu rdo rje gzhon nu'i gdon rnams dang/ rdo rje ganonapo rnams dang/ jo dzarmalam ngan byed rnams yang dag pa bskul/
rnam par bskul zhing 'khor gyi khyams chen por 'dus pa kun snang ba byed/ rnam par snang bar byed/ gsal bar byed/ rnam par gsal bar byed/ rab tu dga' bar byed/
yang dag par baskul/ so sor bskul zhing bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste/ bla gos phung nas zhabs la codapagyis gtugs te lan gsum du bskor ba byas nas thal mo sbyar
te phyogs gcig tshu'adug go/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rjes su ya rang ba mdzad de/ rdo rje'achang khyedasong la lha rnams dang/ lha'i bu rnams dung/ lham yin rnams dang/ lha
ma yazhigyi bu rnams dang/ rlung lha rnams dang/ rlung lha'i bu rnams dang nam mkha' ldi rnams dang/ nam mkha'alding gabu rnams dang 'dusapa chen po'i bar dag sgra 'byin tsang ma
thag pa skyong ba rnams kyi bsam ba rdzogs par gyis shig/ de nas rdo rje'achang stan las langs te/ lha dang/ lham yanadang/ rlung lha dang/ nam mkha' lding dang//
'byung po' tshogs kyi nang du song nas rjes su ston tsang/ do mtshon cha'ame sgron zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ rdzu 'phrul gyis stong gsum kyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten
gyi khams su me lce 'bar ba'i 'od 'phro ba dang 2 mo stag rnam par 'phro ba dang/ lce'abebs pa'i glog rnams kyis 'jig rten gyi khams nams gzir to// de nas bskal pa chen por sngar
zla rmi lam dang/ rludang/ gang+ga'i klung gi bye ma'i grangs kyi tshad tsam dag gis mdangs dang/ gawaM brjid dang/ tshangs par spyod pa dang/ gtsang ma dang/ bzod pa dang/ tshul khrims
dang brtul zhugs dang/ dka' thub dang/ rang ga longs spyod thams cad las byung ba lasagrub pa'i rdo rjed byanguchub sams dpa' lag na rdorjid lag tuphyasheno// de nas ngs rgyas
bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi gsung rab kyi chos ston par gyur pa (dgra bcom pa rnams kyi chos dad/ tshul khrims dang/ ting nga'adzanabyed pa/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi pha rol
tu phyin pa dang/ tshul khrims dang/ bzodapa dang/ snying rje byed pa/ sa khas pa a rang ga rdo rjadang/ rigs rig pa dang/ dkyila 'khor dang/ bklags pa'i tshul dugyurapa/
drag po dang/ dbang po dang/ gshin rjedang/ tshulhadang/ lus ngan dang/ rlung lhadang/ nam mkha' lding gdul dka' ba rnams 'dul ba sta/ daltar dalas byungaba'i bcom ldan 'dasakhro
bodrag po rnams rmongs par byed pa/ sgyu dang ldan pa rnams rmugs par byed pa/ sdang ba rnams skyodapa/ rmongs pa rnams 'jig pa/ dam po rnams rtsa danas 'don pa/ rgyas pa rnams sbur
mar rlog pa/ yonapo rnams srong ba/ gcod pa rnams snying rjes byed pa/ 'byung po rnams skrag par byed pa/ srane po rnams sngangs par byed pa/ rang gagasangasngags rnams rdzogs par
byed pa/ gzhan gyi gsang sngags rnams phurabus 'dabs pa/ nus pa rnams ston par byed pa/ gsod par byed pa gsodapa/ gnodapang byed pa phung bar byed pa dader song nas/
lha rnam sad lha'i bu rnams dbangadu byed de/ daltar drag po pa drag po grub pa dang/ khyab 'jug pa khyab 'jug grub pa dang/ lham yane pa lha ma yin grub pa dang/ dedag sbyar bskul/
ba'i dkyil 'khor du'ajug/ skyong bar byer/ mthu ston par byed/ brjod par byed/ rnam par skrag par byed do// stobs bcus dgongs pa bka' stsal pa'i rdordza'achangags ma ma
pa me ltar rab tu rmongs byed ces bya ba'i gzungs dang/ gzungs 'di'i stobs dang/ bden pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyis 'od kyi 'od zer gyi dkyil 'khor chen po las byung ba' 'od zer
[s - ]dbya/ de rnams kyis rdo dang bcas pa'i lag na rdo rdzobaskul nas/ 'od des de rab tu dga' ste rdo rdzolas snang ba bkye ba rnams kyis sa gsum gyi ston gyi skar ma dang zla ba'i 'od
thal du brlag par byas nas/ snang ba gcig pur byed rung rgya mtsho chen po naskums/ ra'i rgyal porarib ni g.yo bar byed/ glog gi 'khoral dang lce 'thibs pa'i 'brug na bsgrags/
sgra drag po na phyung/ bsgyings pa'i sgra ni bsgrags/ skrag par nabyas so// da na dordzam pham pa me ltar rab tu rmongs byed ces bya ba'i gzungs ma lce 'od 'phro chen po khongon 'dug pa/ skra
sgyu tshogs gser dang rin po cha'adrab/ rdordza'achang ba/ rdo rje'i bu mo zhes bya ba'i bcom ldan 'das ma des lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ yang ches mgyogs pa'i shugs 'od 'phro zhing
tshe 'bar ba lta bur drag pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sams dpa' chen po rdzu 'phrul chen po la skyabs su song// de 'ongs pa dang/ 'phags pa rdo rje'achang gis smyos pa/ skal ba chen po
pa dge ma de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sems dang ldan m/ 'di dag la lag tsha dang mthun par bya ba'i stobs byin tsag/ de nas gzungs kyis sa pa/ 'di dag bka' stsal
pa de bzhin du bgyi'o zhes lan gsum tshig tusmras so// thor tshugs gsum ma/ sa gsum dang/ dus gsum dang/ drag po' rtsi gsum dang/ khyab 'jug ga 'kher la dang//
gshin rje'i be conadang/ lus ngan gyi dbyug to dang/ dbang po'adzi rjedung/ tshulha'i zhags pa dang/ log 'dren rnams kyi bgegs dang/ lha ma yin rnams kyi sgyu dang/ rlung lha rnams
klogazi dang/ shugs dang/ grub pa rnams kyi rmongs byed dang/ ma mo'i tshogs rnams kyi gcod pa dang/ klu rnams kyi dam tshig dang/ dug dang/ khro bo dang/ gnod sbyin dang
srin po dang/ mi 'am ci dang/ sha bra dang/ 'byung po dang/ tshangs pa'i srin po dang/ grul bum dang/ bdon bral dang/ gnon po dang/ rolangs kyi skabs su rgol ba rnams dang/
de bzhin du thams cad kyang sbyong zhig/ mig gas 'dzum pa tsam gyis yudatsam la thams cad machod nas/ lag na rdo rjel snying po 'daphul snas pa/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal
lo gnod spyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdodrag po la phyag 'tshal lo// tapyathA/ ta thA ga tas ma d+hi d+har N+NaM/ ma hAA brtaya mUmaM/ a badze/ ku Ta li/ ko Na pu pa kA ku la bsha la/
ka pa la ke shi/ tatsaNi tsi'i me Ni mikacha Ta mu ba rnga Na badzra/ ma hAb d+hul la la/ bu gu pu lu/ su mu su mu/ sa ras ra/ phaT phaT/ su byoto/ pa ga le tsa ti/ dz+wal pang+kale
sarba de ba ga Na/ pra har Na ma[' ]/ sad+d+hAdA ya ke/ su ru ke/ kuru ka/ badzra g+ha Na/ badza dro/ sArapra har Ne/ rany+dzatraya/ di kra la bud+d+ho te/ ba dza d+ha rab shA sa na ki//
a pra ti ha ta pra marda naMswAhA/ gang gsang sngags karjes su drananas klog gam/ sgom mam/ 'dzin pa de thos nangana'agrolog par lhung bar 'gro bar mi 'gyur ro//
'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dkyil 'khor thams cad la mchod pa byas par 'gyur ro// dam tshig dang phyag rgya la zhugs par 'gyur ro// bsam pa dang rjes su yi rang bas
'gugs par byed do// dug dang/ gsang sngags dang/ mdud pa dang/ rdeg pa dang/ 'ching ba'i 'jigs pa la sogs pa rnam par skrag par byed do// de nas lha dang lha'i bu de dgags
de'i mthus bcom ldan 'adas rdo rje 'chang de'i rnam par rol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'adas kyis gsungs pa rnam pa mang po du ma'ang myong nas/ stong ga gnas gtsang ma dang/ 'og man gyi lha ngang/
'jig rten gyi khams gzhan n gnas pa dag gis 'od dang ldan pa'i ma tog dang/ bdug pa'i sprinadang/ rinapo chamang po cher rgya chen pos mchod nas bstod pa snyan pas bstod da/ snyan cing ma
la rdzasgra lta bu dang/ bsal ba dang/ bsod nams kyi tshigs su bcad pa dag kyang smras so/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag dang/ byang chub sems
dpa' dadag dang/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor dedag yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa rdo rje m pham pa ltar rab tuchongs
byed ces bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so//rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzanamatra dang/ dA na shAladang/ zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban d+he ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te/ skangagasar
bcad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa/// @#// rgyagar skad du/ badzasuny+tsaa bra tihatanAmarUr Ni/ bod skadadu/ rdo phra mo
thogs pa med pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub gams dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// bde gshegs khro thams cad l phyag 'tshal lo// 'dis bdag
gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rjerags pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms paruzhugs so// sangs rgyas kyi mthus gsang ba'i bdag po rdzorAhuMzhes bya bas bzhin rab tu 'bar
ba bstan te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du 'dug go/ de'i tshebcom ldan 'das kyi thugs kyi sprul pa las bram ze'i khye'u zhig byung ste/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po la 'di skad ces smras so//
gsang ba'i bdag po/ rig pa'i bdag po/ gzungs kyi bdag go/ lha gnas gsum po dag na lha nyam chung ba dang/ klu nyam chung bal hril gyis gnon pa drag pos rab tugazhom pa'i
gsang sngags dang/ rig sngags dang/ gzungs sngags dam pa rab tu brjod du gsol/ lag nardo rjes smras pa/ bram ze'i khyi'urab tu nyon la yid la zung zhig dang/ ngas bde gshegs
khro bo thams cad kyis rtag tu brjod pa'i yang steng 'di rab tusmras so// na mo ratu dra yA ya/ namash+tsaN+Da badzrapA Na ye/ mahAyakA se nA pa ya/ tad+yathA/ oM ha ra rab dzra

ma tha ma tha badzra/ rnyan d+hu nabadzra/ dahad habadza/ pa tsa pa tsa badza/ d+ha ra d+harab dza/ dar ya d+hAr ya badza/ daruNadaru Na badzra/ Ats+tsha brjod/ b+hin+da b+hin+dabadza/ tshuphawA/ namany+tsa/

badzra kro d+hA ya/ hu lu hulu/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/ ban+d+ha b+hANA/ hanahan/ a ma ti huphaT thA/ bram ze'i khye'u gang la la zhag gas bde gshegs bdud rtsa 'khyil ba'i tshabazung ste/ khro bo thams cad

zla kyi rdo rje'i tshig 'di rab tusla zhing/ ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas rdordzapra mo grangs med pa sprul te phyogs bcur spros na/ sems can thams cad kyi bag chags nganapa byang/ tshe dang bsod namasab
tu rgyas te/ dgra dang/ dug dang/ dus ma yin par 'chib las rnam par tharanas/ gang zhig gis dmigs pa'i rgol ba ngan pa la ma ga d+haswAnegyis bshig pa 'am/ sgyur ratshonapa gsar
gyis bzhes pa bzhin du dmaMgs te/ rdo rje'i tshig 'di sazhing/ rdzaphra mo spros pas de dag gis phung po lnga dbang po lnga myur durlag par 'gyur ro// lhas snyan/ lha'i zla ba gcig gam
lo lngan lham ya mgo'ags par 'gyur ro// dge slong gis snusan/ bdud kyi mtshonacha rnams myur du brtul bar 'agyur ro// mas brjod na/ gangal dmagis pa de mi'i blab gcig kham
mi lo lnga na nges par rlag par gyur ro// bcom ldan 'adas kyis/ lagan rdo rjedung bram ze'i khye'u la legs so zhes bya ba bzhinas mi snang bar gyur to// de nas bram ze'i khye'u des tshangs pa'i
skadabyung ste/ rdordzo'i tshig 'dilha gnas gsum por bsgrags so// rdo phra mo thogs pa med pa'i gzungs rdzogs so/// // rgyug skad du/
Ar+yadasha bapa tsan dr-id ya/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa lag na rdo rje bcu'i snying po/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad ' phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa
gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshodang ldan pa kun dga' bo la
bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo ragis kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje bcu'i ming shes sam/ rusashes sam gsang sngags shes pa de la
byad kyis ma tshugs so// gnod sbyin dag rnam par 'tshebaram 'gyur ro// srin po rnams dang/ lhag ma za ba rnams drang/ bdug pa pa rnams 'tsho bar mi 'gyur ro// phyis 'jogapo rnams
kyang gnodapar 'gyur ro// tad+ya thA/ u ki li ma ka ri/ ma rI tse pA sha par/ u la me/ mi lam/ a li ma/ li che/ i la me le ma/ hak+kad+hik+Sha/ huk+ka/ blubu re/ pra b+ha re/ a laM
phale phu laM phale/ khu khu me ti ma dum/ khar li ri/ sA d+hamA d+ha/ sarbab ka kA le/ banam bka kA le/ kun dga' bo gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje bapo/
bdi dag rtag tubad ga phyi bzhin du 'brang bar gyur nas/ bdag gnyid log pa dang/ myos pa dang/ rab tu myos po' bsrung ba dang/ yongs su bskyab pa dang/ yongs su gzung ba dang/
yongs su bskyang ba dang/ zhi ba dang/ bde legs su 'gyur bar byed par bcom ldan 'adas kyi bkas gsol ba thobag/ 'di lta ste/ rgyalang khyu mchog dang/ 'brog gnas dang/ gangs
gnas dang/ ldas rtsenadang/ nor bu bzang po dang/ grags pa bzang dang/ lus ngan gyi bus mdzes byed dang/ 'phreng ba mdzes dang/ rgyal po chen po chos skyong rnam thos kya bu ste/ gnod
sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rjebcu po 'di dag rtag tubadag gi phyi bzhin 'brang bar gyur nas/ bdag gnyid kyis log pa dang/ myos pa dang/ rab tu myos pa na'ang bsrung ba dang/
yongs su bskyab pa dang/ yongs su gzung ba dang/ yongs subaskyang ba dang/ zhi ba dang/ bdalegs su 'gyur bar byed par batsem ldan 'adas kyi bkas gsol ba thobacigaM/ gsang
sngags kyi gzhi 'di rnams grub par gyur cig swAhA/ tad+yathA/ sar sar Na swA hA/ de la lag najo rdzabcu po de dag gi gsang sngags kyi gzhi rnams ni'adi dag yaniti/ tad+ya thA/ u ta/
[zo/ ]kate/ sangs te/ ud du le/ d+ha d+he/ tate/ tab ta tasAhA/ 7/ khe latsir ne/ rnyed na de sarbadItsadan/ sarbakr-ita/ ka kho jo/ b.rikr-i tanAg ni/ de la rig sngags kyi/
rgyal po chanapo lag na rdo rje b po de dag gi gsang sngags kyi gzhi dam pa ni 'di rnams yin no// tad+yathA/ a le lak+Sha/ ba ke le lake/ a ke/ pa ga lak+Sha swAhA/ tad+yathA/ dutu dutu/ dutu/
tub tu pa tu/ ba tu tu/ gats+tshagats+tsha/ sa pa te/ pa ta hata ye swAhA na mo bya ga lA do bud+d+hA s+ya sang+kAnu mnapa dAsAhA/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ tshodang ldan pa kun
dga' bo dang/ lhadang/ mi dang/ lha ma yin dang/ pr-ithar bcas pa'i 'jig rten ya rangs te/ bcom ldan 'adas kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bastod do// 'phags pa lag na rdo rjabcu'i
snying po rdzogs so// (rgyagar gyi mkhanapo dzan ma tra dang/ du na shA la dang zhunagyi lo tsa ba ban d+he ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/
@#// rgyagar skad du/ Ar+yakuts+tshal mr-i ta hrid ya tsa tur nA ma d+hA ra Ni/ bod skadadu/ 'phags pa bdud rtsi thab sbyor gyi snying po bzhi pa zhes bya ba'i
gzungs/ dkona mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdoN+Dadrag po la phyag 'tshal lo// de nas khro bo chen po bdud rtsa thab sbyor gyis 'khor 'dus pa thams cad
la glang po che'i lta stangs kyis bltas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skadapes gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'di'i sems can rnams ni bsod nams dman pa dang/ tshul
la mi gnas pa dang/ pha ma la ma gus pa dang/ bsod nams chung pa dang/ drad pa amachis pa dang/ grags tshol ba dang/ rtag tu zang zing la brkam pa dang/ rtag tulag 'dren dang/
'tshab dung/ sha ba rnams kyis zin pa lags te/ bgegs dang log 'dren dadag gzhig pa dang/ mthar gtugs pa'i slad du gsang sngags bshad par 'tshal la// de nas bcom ldan
'das kyis/ rdom khro bo la 'daskad ces bka' stsal to// bdudartsa theb sbyor gang khyedasems can thams cad la phan pa'i phyir zhus pa legs so legs so// khyod la de zhin gshegs pas
gnang gi/ sems can thams cad kyi don gyi phyir sngagasashod cig/ de nas khro bo bdud rtsi thab sbyor gyis bcom ldan 'das dngalag na rdo rje'i zhabs la gtugs nas gsang sngags bshad pa/

namorat+na tra yA ya/ namashA ts+tshAbadzrapANaye/ ma hAyak+Sha se nA pa ta ye/ na mo badzagro d+hA ya/ pra dzul te dab+ha/ roT+Tha teka Ta/ b+ha yab+harab m/ asaM musal/ badzapa ra shu pA has ya/ tsag
o hulu hulu/ a mr-i takuts+tshAl ni/ kha kha kha kha/ kha na kha na/ khA da' da/ lA hitAhi/ tiSh+Thata// nohan/ dahad ha/ patsa pa tsa/ shrib+hagro/ ban+tab+hAn/ gardza gardza/ tata
bso Ta ya ba so ya/ b+hag ban/ amr-i ta kun yA/ mAn+tan ta ya badz+dzoN/ sazabag+hAn ba na ya kan/ nabar ya/ ma hAg Na pa ta dzib tAnd/ karAya hUMphaT phaT phaT/ o kro d+hag Na la
taye swAhA/ bdud rtsi thab sbyor gyi gsang sngags dang po'o// na mo ratu trayA ya/ namaMng+g+ha NAbadzra pA Na ya/ ma hAyak+Sha se nA pa taye/ namo ma hAbadzra d+haya dkota ka Ta/ b+har ba ya/ a
sa paNan has ya/ ha he pa ta bta/ d+ha bablub/ kha kha/ khAhitAhi/ a mr-i ta kuN+Da la/ tiSh+Thati/ ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/ han han/ gardza gardza/ ga Na pa ti dzib ta dzIb te an karA ya swAhA/
gsang sngags gnyis pa'o// na mo rat+tatra yA ya/ nam tsA badzra pA Na ye/ ma hAyak+Sha se nA pa ta ye/ na mo badzra kro d+haya/ ba ma la ka na ka/ dzA la klu NiN ya/ ga ga naa mr-i tas dz+ha pA ya/
ralham mya/ a nu le pa na pra yA a/ badzrapA Napra yA ya/ badzrapa na du/ b+ha ga yA/ dab/ na ga yak+shar k+Sha/ rA sapramANan la/ khyimokyago tshar ya/ sha tasin/ pi drung ka ru a/

drirat+tagar b+ho ta ta a/ a mr-i ta kuts+tsalA de e byahidaMt+totaka Ta b+hir pAg ga na brgyud dzAl sprulang bsha naM/ tuphyedu badz+hati/ saM b+hu tao/ kha kha kha kha grab+hagro/ ban+d+hab+hAnaM/ hanahan
gardza gardza/ ba so Ta ya/ dru ka d+haka/ dzAl dzal pra dzul pradzul/ gra sa gra sa/ sazabig+hAn bi nA ya kA naM/ hrad yaM phaT/ gnad+hawasr-id yaM phaT rakAdza?damaM phaT/ bras+sar kas srid yaM pa
sazadzAr grod 'baT//sawadzarahrid yaM laT sajatsa tur thag hrid yaM phaT/ sathanAgAnan sdod laM phaT/ hU~MhU~MphaT/ da had ha/ pa tsa patsa/ u bshaA bsha/ idany+tsame kAt+yaM ru badzad+ha
ra atsA pa ya ti swAhA/ gsang sngags gsum pa'o// na mo badzragro naa/ daMNo taka Ta/ b+hir pA ya/ tangahUM/ khul ulu/ kha kha/ khAhakhA hi/ tiSh+ThatiSh+Tha/ banuban+dAsAhA/ khro pobadun
rtsi thab sbyor gyi gsang sngags bzhi pago/ de nas 'di dag gi snying po don yod pa gang bton pa dang bzlas brjod byas shing bsgrubasan bdag ga gsang sngags thams cadogaton tsang legasabar
a bzlas brjod bgyis pa dang bsgrubs par 'gyur ba de bshad par 'atshal lo// de la 'di ni bdag gi snying po lags so// oM a mr-i ta hU~M phaT/ bdud rtsi thab sbyor gyi snying po'o// rje khro bo
bdud rtsi thab sbyor gyis gsang sngags rnams bshad m thag tus chen po 'di ni rnam pa drug tugayos so// log 'drena rnams kyang skrag ste/ skyabs medacing rtanamadabar gyuranas de bzhinagashegA
pa'i thed dusong ste/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gi skyabs mdzad du gsol/ bdabaragshegs pa bdag cag gi skya'us mdzad du gsol/ zhes daskad du slazhing mgo thur du
gtugs so/ kyi kyi log 'drem rungs pa rnams longs la nga'i ngag nyon cig/ rdordzakun 'bar zhangarab tu'abar la kun tu rab tu'abar bas khyed kyi ma 'ashags sa re/ ngas
ral paser po can rnams kyi gsang sngags kyis lha'i lo stong gi bar du leg 'dren rnams bcom pa dang/ gtubs pa dang/ brdungs pa dang/ gzar ba dang/ bskams pa gang yodapa/
dran par gyis shig/ nga'i mthu dang/ brtson 'grus dang/ pha rol gnonapa chen po dranaparagyisashig/ gang 'digasang sngags 'dzanatsang 'don pa dang/ sgrub pa dang/ desrung ba byed
pa del glugasam tshol cig/ til sbyas pa 'am zas ngan pa za'angarung/ grong ga sa spyod kyang rung ste/ rig pa thams cad sgrub pa la glags ma tshelatsag/ zan za ba'achi'ang khamadang po
sngags kyis btab ste dbul bar bya'o/ nyam 'char ba'i tshilanabadun brjod na de'i phyabazhin rtag tu'abrang ngo// log 'dren rnams kyang glags ma 'tshol la// til dang sran chung dang
'bras dang/ spenatso'ang rung/ snom 'khur bar pa ta dang la phug kyang rung ste/ thams cad kyang zar zani kyang nga'i gsang sngags 'dzinand thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro// gzhan yang
yon tanadapag tumadaparashes par bya'o// 'phags pa bdud rtsi thab sbyor gyi snying po rdzogs so//4// rgya gar skadadu/ bod+hab+hur
TarA dzasto tAman/ bod skadadu/ khro bo'i rgyal po smabartsegs la bstodapa'i sngags/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// o b+har TumahApa T+Thaya/ b+hulatsib+hur ki mnas/ unu
[rs/ ]#// smakhed+ha hU~M phaTapaNasAhA/ phyag 'tshal phyag 'a6la phyag 'tshal bstod// khro la khros pas khro bo che// sangs rgyas sangs rgyas sngar sangs rgyas// chos sku longs skusbrul ]
ba'i sku// skyabartsegs zhes bya bdag phyag 'tshal g/ bskal pa'i ma ltar 'bar dbus na// bdatsa 'i gdan l bzhugs// ljang nag chen po sa ra can// zhal gsum pa la phyag drug
ste g.yas dkar g.yonadamar dbus ljang ba// spyan gsum 'jigs pa'i mchab 'byin// mgatsang bdud rtsi smanabazhin gsol// g.yas pa rdo rjeral gri bsnams// gson pa zhig
ba lcags kyu 'o// kham sdigs mdzub thugs kar bsnol// mgatsang med pa'i las dag brtson// bdug pa sprulatshus dbu lus brgyan// 'a jigs sngangs med par brtul zhugs spyod//
khro rgyal khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// ma gtsang bdagatsang bar mdzad// khro rgyal khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// 'jigs pa kun las skyob pa'i mdzad// khro rgyal khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod//
nad dang rims las bsrung bar mdzad// khro rgyal khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// mgatsangazas dang ma gtsang gos// thams cad sal bar byed pa'i mchog/ lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin gaden//
thams cad m lus dga' ba mdzad// nad dang mis dang dal ka yams// bsrung ba'i las mdzad phyag 'tshal bstod// bdag la bsrung ba mdzad du gsol/ mi gtsang ba rnams gtsang bar
[ze]mdzad// smra ba rnams ni ma smar mdzad// lub rnams niyang bar mdzad// dog pa yangs par mdzad la bstod// khroba'i rgyal po ts+tsha brtse gas khyod// sangs rgyas kun gyis byin gyis mthA//
gang dag khyad la mas rtan rnams// lus bde sems bde dbang po bde// bde ba'i lha la phyag 'tshal la// lus dang sams dag dbang po dag/ dag pa'i lha la phyag 'tshal lo// lus
gtsang sems bgatsang dbang po gtsang// gtsang ba'i lha la phyag 'tshal lo// lus dang sams dang dbang po dang// dngu ba'i lha la phyag 'tshal la// lus gsal sems gsal dbang po gsal/
gsal ba'i lha la phyag 'tshal lo// lha klu yi dgas 'dresri sogs// gnod sbyin 'byung pos 'dithos na// sdug bsngal zhi nas bdabara'agyur// gangs rgyud bzhin dudakarapar 'gyur//
shel dkar bzhin du gtsang bar 'gyur// me long bzhin dugasal bar 'agyur// nam mkha' bzhin du darlobar 'gyur// sa dang mkha' la 'khodapa yi// lha klu la sogs snga brgyad kun// dge
babasam pas 'khod 'gyur te// gzhan la ma gnod zhi bar mdzod// khro bo rgyal po skya brtsegs la bstod pa'i sngags so//@#// rgyagar skad du/
A ma hAb la nAm ma hAyA su// bodaskad du/ 'phags pa stobs po che zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skadabadag/
dgis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'dasar btangabazung chen po na chos ston to// de nas bcom ldan 'das byang chung sems dpa' sems dpa' chin lag nardo rjesangs rgyas//
thams cad kyis bstod tsang bsngags te/ bkur nas mngon par dga' bar byas pa'i ng de nyid du'adug par gyur to// de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag gas sems can rnams dbugs
'byin tsang/ sher phyogasan ma lce kun tu 'bar ba'i 'phreng ba'i bar gangan la bzhugs so// bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yas logs na stobs po cha lag pa bzhi pa/ lag pa gcig nan rje yab thegs/
! lag pa gtsug gis na phyag 'tshal/ g.yas pan na be con thogs/ g.yonapan ni zhags pa thogs pa/ skra kham pa gyen du brdzus pa/ mig dmar ba'o// de'i 'og nan bcom ldan 'das rdo rje
kha' na 'khor dang bcas pa'o// g.yas na ni rig sngags kyi rgyal po gnod mdzes so// g.yon nan bdudartsa thab sbyor ro// de nas snying po rnams ni bla ba kham pa lta bur gzhag go/ snying po na ki
la ko la dang/ 'gro lding ba'i gzungs dang/ lus dmar po dang/ rdorjes rnam par 'joms pa dang/ ro'argyan chen te/ snying po'i mchog go/ rig sngags kyi rgyal po drag po chen po dang nyab na ni

'phags pa mA ma kA'o// 'phags pa bdud rtsi thab sbyor gyi 'og na rdo rje'i lcags kyu dang rdo rdzolu gu rgyud do// sgo'i nang logs su ni khro bo rdo rje'i tha pa dang rdo rje'i btsan gnyis mngon du phyogs par
gzhag go/ g.yonalegs su ni bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyanaras gzigs dbang phyug 'khor dang bcas pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yas logs su ni gos dkar mo'o// de'i 'og tu/
ni sgrol ma dang khro gnyecan no// g.yon du rig sngags kyi rgyal po rtamagron dang/ de la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brgya phrag stong dang ngo// de bzhin dushar phyogs su
na zla ba dang/ nyim dang/ yul 'khor srung dang/ dbang po'o// me'i phyogs na ni mi'i drang srong chen po rnams kyis bskor ba'o// lho phyogs su ni gshin rjadang khyab 'jug go/ bden bral
phyogs su ni srin po'i bdag po ma mos bskor ba'o// nub phyogs su ni klu'i bdag po klu la sogs pas bskor ba'o// rlung gi phyogs su ni rlung lha 'khor dang bcas pa'o// byung phyogs su ni lus
ngan po 'khor dang bcas pa'o// dbang bdag gi phyogs su ni debang bdag tshogs kyis bskor ba'o// lha rnams kyi dbang po brgyabyanadang/ khyab 'jug dang/ tshangs pa chen po/ de lasogA
pa gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu tshad med/ grangs med/ dpag tumad pa dag dang ngo// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'khor dang bcas te snga ma bzhin no// de nas bcom nyudas kyis/
bka' stsal pa/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo dzamado sde 'di sgrub pa po 'di la gsang sngags kyi gzhwa 'ad rgyacher yang dag par bshad par bya'o// dkonamatshog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo//
[7 ]@#// gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rjadrag po la phyag 'tshal lo// oM ka la ka li badzra/ kAlaM kA la ya swAhA/ spyi gtsug la sAhA dpral ba la swAhA/ migal/
sAhA drag shul can l sAhA/ shin tu drag shul can la sAhA/ rdo'i zhags pa la gAhA/ lus dmar po la sAhA/ lag na rdo rje la sAhA/ lag gzhags pa la swAhA/ lag na ral gri la swAhA/
lag na dgra sta la swAhA/ gzhu 'dzan la sAhA/ gtun shing 'dzin la sAhA/ lagan 'kher la la swAhA/ lag namadung rtse gsum la swAhA/ snying po la sahA/ nye ba'i snying po la swAhA/ drag
bo la swAhA/ kilA kA la ya swAhA/ byas pa ka li ko la ya swAhA/ dmar po kA li kI la la swAhA/ stobs po chal sAhA/ ral pa can la sAhA/ gsus 'phyang po la swAhA/ khro bo'atshol pa la swAhA/
gshin rje la sAhA/ srin po la sAhA/ sran po ya mun la sAhA/ drag po chen po la sAhA/ sprin la sAhA/ ra'adzinal sAhA/ ribatang bzung 'dzin la sAhA/ rdo rje'i ba tsen la sAhA/ 'jigs byed
achen po la sAhA/ lus 'jigs byed la sAhA/ sdigs byed la sAhA/ rdo rje'i lu gu rgyud la sAhA/ rdorje'i gtan pa la swAhA/ rdordzalus la swahA/ 'gro lding ba la sAhA/ bdud rtsi la swAhA/
bkab thur 'dzinal AhA/lcags kyu la sAhA/ don yod la sAhA/ gtsug tor rgyalapo pha sAhA/ mdog dkar po la sAhA sngo bsangs mngog la sAhA/ 'phyang po la sAhA/ glang po la sAhA/
ba glanga' ba la gyi lag pa laswAhA/ bdud kyi rnam par 'phrul pa la sAhA/ sbrul gyi ska rags can la sAhA/ rdo rje phur pa la swahA/ lag pa gnyis la sAhA/ a rdordzol sAhA/ 'bar ba'i 'od byed
pa la sAhA/ blo gros brtan pa'i rdo rje lasAhA/ myu gu la sAhA/ 'od pyodal sAhA/ rdo rjes rnam par 'joms pa la sAhA/ rdo rje'i dri ba la sAhA/ ro 'jigs byed la sAhA/ jo rdzakhu tshur la swAhA/

srin rnam par 'thor ba la sAhA/ char ba rnam par ston pa lasAhA/ rdo rje lcags kyul sAhA/ dzelnga'i snying po la swAhA/ rdo rje nyaba'asnying po la sAhA/ mthe bo'i rgyal po la gAhA/ btsan gyi rgyal po la
sA go cha'i rgyal po la sA/ oM d+hAaM/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal la// gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lagan rdo rje drag po la phyag 'tshal lo// o lu hu lu/ tiSh+ThatiSh+Tha
brjob/ han han/ a mr-i te hUMphags swAhA/ oM a mi tehUM phaT swahA/ yul 'khor srung la sAhA/ mig ma bzangal sAhA/ 'phags skyes po la AhA/ lus ngan pa la sahA/ dbang po la sa/
ma lhal sAhA/ drang srong chen po thams cad la sAhA 7mo la sAhA/ zla ba la swAhA/ gshin rjel sAhA/ khyab 'jug la sAhA/ srin po' bdag po la sAhA/ klu'i bdag po la sAhA/ rlung lha
la sAhA/ dbang bdag la sAhA/ dbang bdag gi chung ma la sAhA/ brgya byin la sAhA/ nor lha'i bu le sAhA rdo rje chen po la sAhA/ tshangs pa chen po la sAhA/ sa la sAhA/ dbyangs can l ]
sAhA lhamo dpal lasAhA/ lha mo dka' thub bzlog la sAhA/ ragi sngags chen po stobs po che'i rig sngags kyi rgyal po 'didakyil 'khor gyi gnas su 'tshang zhing yid la
byed nasrung ba dang/ skyob pa dang rtse dpar byed par 'gyur ro// las thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro// sas rgyas dang/ chos dang/ dge 'dun dang/ rang sangs rgyas dang/ 'phags
'a pa nyan thos kyi dge 'dun thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// gnas brtan blo gros chen po bu 'dwa ti'i bu la phyag 'tshal lo// byams pa la sogs pa byang chub sams dpa' thams cad la
phyag 'tshal lo// yang dag par song ba rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// yang dag par zhugs pa rnams la phyag 'tshal// rdo rje'adzini 'khor dang bcas pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ tad+yathA/
mu ni mu ni/ mahAmu naM kilike li/ ma pAki li ki la/ d+hiki/ ka Ta ka Ta ka Na/ ma hAka Ta/ sha ma sha ma sha ma ma hAsha ma/ shA tri'u tIshu dri/ shan shAnashAn+ta/ dan danAdAn/
d+hIr d+hI mIr/ ma hAtshe g+ha dur/ harahi har/ kuku+i kun+ti/ tsan+danats+tsha/ b+hin+da b+hin+dab+han+da/ satshaduSha/ gu mug mu gu mu/ har har har/ patshang ma na de ma ni/ TaNaT//
rna(3/ tshatsatsa tsatsi/ pa tsa pa tsa pa tsA/ da had had ha/ hU~MhU~MhU~M/ hahaha/ phaT phaT phaT/ sha ba rig pa rog bar/ ma tAM gi/ tsaN+Da la/ chungu shu/ dzuzhu juudza zhu/ ha

btuN+Din/ tsali tsilatsali/ phaT phaT ya/ taT+Thitits+tshAtiSh+Tha/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Thatha taSh+Thatha/ mA ti pra ma tha/ ma tIg/ hU~M hU~MhU~M/ hehehe/ gol te ma 'dug na lag pa dang/ rkang pa dang/ kha dang/ ming pa/

dang mag drang/ sAngadang/ ngag thams cad b.rung ngo// dbrog go/ dzAl dzA la dzA la/ du d+hu du drung d+hu/ ba d+hu khaM d+hupaM d+hu/ nil nAl ni lwa ga badzra d+ha ra/ stobs po che zhes bya ba'i snying po dran//
bar gyis shige/ ko Tako ko Ta ni/ sam+b+hab+hU tAnaM badzaAlaM/ badzAtar/ badzaa[¢]hAs/ tshadunatsumacu/ kuruku ru ku ru/ hu'u hu huru/ sems can chen po dran par gyis shig/

hU~M hU~MhU~M/ ha ha ha/ phaT phaT phaT/ tsatsatsanatsaN+NaM ma hA tsaN+Da/ shudu nututu/ mur mu ru mu ru/ grot+tagrogriny+tsa/ badzrapA Ni/ han hanadan/ na ma sarba sha tu tshun/ mAn+titwA ya phaT/ ku ru
kuruku ru/ lag na rdo rje'i las dang 'gal bar ma byed cig/ dam tshig las 'gal bar byas na dam tshig phral ba dang/ dbazhin gshegs pa'i ng bsus par 'gyur ro// gsang sngags kyi gzhi

ni'odi rnams yin no// tsuutsu/ har har/ phuT+Ta phurtswa phun+tu/ tapa ni tapa na ta pa ni/ pa tsa napa tsan pa tsani/ lag na rdo rje'i snying po de bzhin gshegs pas byin gyis brlabs pa dran par gyis shig/
tsal tsa la li/ phu lu phulu phu lu/ phuphu thu/ bcom ldan 'das gal te bdag gi snying po 'di dang 'gal ba bgyis na/ dbazhin gshegs pas rab tu gsungs pa'i mtshams med pa lnga dang
[/ ]@#// ldan par grubatsage/ dar phu/ tsar bu/ nadasu/ rdo rdzo'adzin 'khor dang bcas pa la phyag 'tshal lo// bdag la gsang sngags kyigazhi 'di rnams grub par gyur cig swAhA///
rdo rje 'dzin 'khor dang bcas pa la phyag 'tshal lasAhA/ rdo lnga'adzin gzi brjid chen po la phyag 'tshal lasAhA/ oM hU~MhU~MphaT phaT phaT swAhA/ de nas de'i tshade bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa'i 'od zer kun tu 'bar ba'i snang bas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams las 'das nas bdud kyi khyim thams cad kun tu'abar/
rab tu 'bar/ kun tu rab tu mchedatse 'bar te/ ma rtse gcig tu gyur par kun tu snang ngo// de ltar gyur pa dang/ bdud sngagacan ral gri dang/ 'kher la dang/ gzhudang/ mda' la sogs
pa'i mtshon rnams lag cha thogs te bgegs kyi rnam par 'phrul pa du ma byed do// de nas sadatsag nga nyadi la bdud sdig can bdud kyi ris kyi lha'i bu thams cad dang lhan cig tu bdud kyi rnam par
'phrul pa chen pos bcom ldan 'das ga la bzhugs pa der dong ngo// de nas de ltar gyurapa dang/ khro bo 'chol pa mdog dmar po/ sbrang rtsi ltar mig dmar ser po/ mareb gtsigs pa/ mi
bzad pa/ skra kham pa gyen du brdzes pa/ lag pa g.yas pa na be con thogs pa/ lag pa g.yon pa na rdo rje thogs pa/ sbrul gyis brgyan pa/ stag lpags kyi sham thabs bgos pa/
shar phyogs su'ajig rtenagyi khams gang+gA'i klung nyi shu rtsa gtsug gi bye ma snyed 'angs shing/ de bzhin du lho dang/ nub dang/ byang ga phyogs su'ang kun tu snang go/ de nas bdud sngag can
dang / bgegs bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag brgyakhro bo 'chol pas 'dar bar gyur to// bdud sdig can myos shang gzigs te 'phongs nas srog la mi lta ba dang/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na
rdo rjes zhags pa'i bcing ba lngas bcings so// de ltar gyur pa dang/ da' tshe 'thab bral dang/ dga' ldan dang/ 'phrul dga' dang/ gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams kyis sbos dang//
me tog dang/ rgyal mtshan dang/ ba dan sna tshogs la sogs pas/ bcom ldan 'das la ci nus kyis mchod nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
chen po gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjesangs rgyas thams cad kyis bstod tsang bsngags te mngon par dga' bar byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis rjes su thugs rang ba mdzad pas
sems can thams cad kyi denadang/ lha dang mi rnams kyi don dang/ phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir rig sngags mchog gi rgyud chen po'i nang nas don 'dod pa thams cad sbyin pa zhes bya ba stobs dpag
med pas pha rol gnonapa/ stobs po che stobs chen po'i rig sngags kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag smras so// gang la la zhig 'dzin tum/ 'changangam/ klog gam
kazhan dag la'ang rgya cher yang dag par rab tuston tam/ bsta stangadu byed dam/ bla marabyad dam/ rim gror byed dam/ mchod par byed na dkyil 'khor thams cad
du zhugs par 'gyur ro// pha rol gyis byas pa'i gsang sngags thams cad bshag pa dang/ bcom pa dang/ bskyel bar yang 'gyur// de ltar bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin gyis rig
sngags mchog gi rgyud chen po'i nang nas 'byung ba smras so// de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje bcom ldan 'das kyis rjes su thugs rangs pa mdzad pas/ don 'dod pa thams
cad sbyin pa zhes bya ba stobs dpag tu med pas pha rol gnon pa/ stobs po che'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi smras pa/ o badzra kro d+ham hAb la/ hand tapa tsam tha ba ts+'as ya/ dzaT laM bo d+ha ra/
u tsuSh+Thakro d+ha hU~M phaT sAhA/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la
zhig chos kyi rnam grangs 'dasmis nas 'dzin tam/ 'chang ngam/ klog gam/ gzhan dag la rgyacher yang dag par rab tu ston tam/ rim gror bgyid dam/ mchod par bgyid na dkyil 'khor
thams cad du dbang bskur bar 'gyur ro// gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes yang gsol pa/ stobs po cha'i sang po 'dzin pa la ni gnod sbyin nam/ gnod sbyin gyi bu 'am/ sen po 'am
srid bo'i bu 'am grul bum mam/ grul bum gyi bu 'am/ nam mkha' lding ngam/ nam mkha' lding ga bu 'am/ gru 'am/ klu'i bu 'am/ dri ba 'am dri za'i bu 'am/ sha za 'am/ sha
tha'i bu 'am/ smyo byed dam/ smyo byed kyi bu 'am/ mkha' 'gro 'am/ mkha' 'gro'i bu 'am/ sgrub pa 'am sbrul 'dzin bcas pa la sogs pa dang/ brjod byed dang/ lus srul po
dang rolangs la sogs pa dang/ gnon po'i gdon thams cad dang/ brjod byed la sogs pa'i gdon thams cad kyis ma tshugs par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ gsang
pa ba'i bdag po lagan rdo rjel 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje legs so legs so// stong pa nyid do// don dam pa stong pa nyid de// phyi ma'i mtha'
stong pa nyidado// stong pa nyidi stong pa nyid do// chan po stong pa nyid do// de bzhin nyid stong pa nyid do// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes 'ang skung nyes
gsol to// gang mdo sde 'dirab tuston pa de mchod par bgyi ba dang/ phyag bgyi ba dang/ rim gror bgyi ba dang/ bskor ba bgyi ba 'os su 'gyur ba lags so// de nas bcom ldan
'das lag na rdo rjes stobs dang ga chu med pas pha rol gnonapa stobs po che'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi lcas pa/ o hU~MhU~MhU~M/ phaT phaT phaT/ lag na mdung rtsa gsum thogs pa drag shul cam
hU~MhA/ phaT phaT phaT/ oM tanirtsid/ hU~MhAhU~M/ o o o/ phaT phaT phaT/ stobs po che la sAhA/ oM rdo rje khrob stobs po che/ ha na da ha pa tsa/ ma tha ba ka ra//
ba d+hun sa ma dza Ta laM po da ra/ u kro d+ha hU~M phaT/ mo dz+wa la dzol/ sats+tshadu9/ tsA b+ha ya/ n+taM b+ha ya/ du rA dun ni bAr ya/ bdag la srungs shig srungs shig swAhA/ o a nan+ta/
ba dzaya/ ma hAtsats+tshA/ hU~MphaT sAhA/ o d+hig hU~Mpha// lo grwa 'i ye/ sharo mA la ni/ sa na sin/ shig rna'i sha ni/ oM sam+b+ha ASh+Thadza/ ma hA te dza badzra/ asha ni badzra/ pA sha an pa/
ba/ sarba duSh+Ta/ sto b+ha ya stab+ha la/ hU~M phaT/ oM hU~Mbatab hU~M o a nan+ta/ ba dza ya/ ma hAtsaN+Di/ hU~MphaT/ oM phaT phaT phaT/ badzra kro d+ha hU~M phaT/ oM badzra d+ha ka ri ka ra ka ra/

ts+tsan+da ts+tshin+da/ hU~MphaT/ o badzakod+ha/ ma hA ba la/ d+ha ka rnyake/ [”]dzal dz+wal hU~M phaT/ oM bi pu ra/ rak+Sha badzra paMljar hU~M phaT/ oM ki li ki la/ badzabadzra chur b+hA b+hAn+tAhU~M phaT/ oM badzra kro d+ha ma hA
b.laA karApal/ hU~MphaT/ o badz+dzakro d+ha ma hAb la/ dar da ra/ dAraya pA ra ya hU~M phaT/ oM badzrakhro d+ha ma hUb la/ han han/ da ra da ra/ dAr ya dor ma/ pa Ta ya pa Ta ya/ mo Ta ya mo tsa ya/
hU~Mya Na/ ob dzakro d+ha ma hAb la/ taT ta tsa/ tATaya tA Na ya/ hU~MphaT/ oM badzakro d+ha ma hab la/ dzAl dzAl/ pra dzul pra dz+wa la/ di pya dpya/ dI pa ya dwapa ya/ hUMphaT/ o tsu ru tsu ru//
u tsu kro d+ha/ sha khar sngar hor/ hUMphaN/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po la gan rdo rdzodrag po la phyag 'tshal lo// oM badzakro d+ha ma hAts+tshA/ hand
ha pa tsa ma tha bkaMr/ pa d+hen sa ya/ bcom ldan 'das tshur gshegs tshur gshegs/ pAn han/ har tar/ da ha da ha/ pa tsa pa tsa/ bi d+hun sa ya/ lha dang lha ma yin gyi bangag pos
mchod pa thams cad bdag nyid las byas pa/ gzi brjid chen po/ su ru su ru/ mu ru mu ru/ ku ru ku ru/ spu ru spu ru/ ku kun+d+ra/ ma hAku// ba kucha/ ku na ku na= na Ti na Ni/
shi nisha na/ kha na kha ni/ (kha kha/ khA hikA hi/ ku ru ku ru/ tu Ta tuT/ tu tuts+tshA/ dra/ tra/ tu ru tu ru/ 'byung po'i bdag po/ klu'i bdag po/ lha ma yin gyi grong khyer rnam par
'dzoms par byed pa khro bo 'chol pa stobs po cha/ d+ham d+ham/ ka ra ka ra/ ku ru ku ru/ su ru su ru/ hU~M phaT/ han han/ hU~Mpa/ da had hahU~MphaT/ pa tsa pa tsa hU~MphaT/ bIhU~MhU~M hU~M phaT

phaT phaT swAhA/ oM tsu lu tsu lu swAhA/ oM badzake ma hApa la/ sats+tshadu/ n+taM b+ha ya sod+ha yaM/ mo ha ya mo hayaM/ hUM phaT/ mo har/ sa ra sa ra/ ba sa ra pi sa ra/ g+ha ta ya g+ha ta! o ba sar/
sams a hUM/ oM badzakro d+ha ma hA ba la/ mar gyur/ kha kha lA hikA hi/ nAsha ya nA sha ya hU~M phaT/ hU~M hU~M/ mAmA/ ma ma phaT/ a druka kro d+ha na/ bdag la srungs shig srungs shig swAhA/
oM ma hApa la/ badzad+har/ ka ra ka ra/ ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/ hUMphaT/ sAhU/ o tshu la gra sa/ u rmasA ga ra hUM/ rdo rje'i pho nya mo drugacu rtsa bzhi po de dag kyang bsrung ba dang/
yongs su bsrung ba dang/ bskyab pa dang/ sbrad par byed par 'gyur ro// lag na rdo rjes smras pa/ gang gzungs 'di 'chang ba ni dge bar 'gyur/ dug mi gnod par 'gyur/ shi ba/
sos pa byed par 'gyur/ dgra rnams kyis mi tshugs par 'gyur/ bumang bar 'gyur ro// sa phyogs kyang 'gas par 'gyur ro// gsang sngags thamAtsad kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro//
las thams cad kyang nus par 'gyur ro// gdug pas zin pa rnams lan skyer chus 'tsho bar 'gyur ro// dug thams cad kyang dug ma yin par byed par 'gyur ro// mngal na gnas
pa'i khye'u dang bu mo'ang bde bar btsa' bar 'gyur ro// mdosde 'di zhag gsum bcangs na rgyas par 'gyur ro/ zhag bdun bcangs na zhi ba chen por 'gyur ro// de nas 'byung po'i
bdag po dbang bdag rig sngags 'chang bya ba phrag du mas bskor ba 'khor gyi dkyil 'khord nas langs te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpau0f8b chen po gsang ba pa'i bdag pa
lag na rdo rje'i rkang pa la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo la 'di skad ces smras so// stobs po che'i bstan pa thogs pa med pa//
stobs dpag tu med pas pha rol gnon pa// lag na rdo rje dga' ba dang/ lha dang/ mi dang/ lha ma yin dang/ tshangs pa'i dbang pos phyag byas pa/ gnod sbyin dang/ srin po dang
ro langs dang/ lus srul po 'jigs par byed pa/ skyo byed dang/ sgrod pa dang/ bsod pa dang/ skem byed dang/ sgo glegs dang/ 'khrul 'khor dang/ gtan pa dang/
rdo rjes rnam par 'joms pa/ las thams cad byed pa/ dkyil 'khor gsang ba dang bcas pa/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bshad du gsol/ de nas thams
cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyis/ 'byung po'i bdag po dbang bdag la 'byung po'i bdag po legs so legs so zhes bya ba byin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rdo rje sngar Sha/
rdorje la bzhugs pa'i tshul gyis bzhugs nas/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor la rnam par gzigs nas rdo rjem bzad pa khra bochan po bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad rnam par 'joms
par byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ sems can thams cad la cher snying rdzab zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ 'od brer 'bar zhing snang ba zhes bya ba'i dang nge 'dzin dang//
chos thams cad kyi dga' ba kun tu ston pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'a dzan dang/ bdud thams cad kyi yul 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ phyag rgya'i mtshan nyid ces bya ba'i tang
@#//'dzin dang/ sems can thams cad kyi yul zhes bya ba'i ting nga' dzin dang/ mi g.yo ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ chos kyi sku zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/

i tshes kyi sgo zhes bya ba'i ting nga 'a dzin dang/ stobs po che zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de nas bcom ldan 'das lag na rdo sa rdzom bag can du rdo rje sngaras/ de nas rdo rjepad+ma la gnas pa'i
tshul gyis gnas te/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor la rnam par bltas nas/ rdordzami bzad pa khro bo 'chol pa lus sbrul gyi ska rags kyis brgyan pa dga' bar phyadapa
zhes bya ba'i ting nga 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// zhugs ma thag tu khro bo 'chol pas bgegs bye ba brgyastong phrag du ma 'dar tu gzir ba bdag nyid kyis mthong ngo// de dgatshig
tshabyas nas skye zhing srog btang ste/ srog pa'i bskal pa snyam du sems shing nyam thag pa'i skad kyis ngus te/ byang chub sams dpa lag na rdo rje'i gan du song nas/ bcom ldan 'das yo ngas
su bskyab tu gsol/ byang chub sems dpa' yongs su bskyab tu gsol/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag ni bcom ldan 'das kyi khro bo 'chol pas gathigatsang skyes te 'phongs nas
srog la'ang mi blta'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpaM' chen po lag na rdo rjeting nga'adzin de las langs te/ bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad la smras pa/ kye ma'o khro bo
chen po 'di ni rdzu 'phrul che ba'o// mthu cheba'o// de dag gis 'di skad ces smras so// bcom ldan 'das de de bzhin te/ kya ma'o khro pe chen po 'di nardzu 'phrul chab 'o// mthung ba'o//
de nas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sams dpa' sams dpa' chen po lag na rdo rjesasang ge'i lta stangs kyis bltas nas/ 'byung po'i bdag po khro bo 'chol pa'i dkyil 'khor gsang ba
dang bcas pa sbas pa/ o badzra kro d+ha ma hAb la/ hand dpa tsa ma tha brnyan sa/ dza lo bdar/ u tsukro d+hahAyaN/ a oM A hU~MswAhA/ grogs po dag gang la la zhig khro ba
stobs po ma'adi'i dkyil 'kher du zhugs nade'i don thams cad 'agrub par 'gyur ro// dus ma yin par 'tshubs dus byed pa ram 'gyur ro// de'i lus la drag po'i las dang nad/
thams cad kyis mi tshugs par 'gyur re// da la bgegs dang/ ma dang/ rnam par log 'dren gyis glags rnyed par ma'i gyur ro// skyab thams cad dga' bar 'gyur ro// dgra
thams cad med par 'gyur// 'dir zhugs na gsang sngags thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro// khro bo thams cad kyi cho ga'ang lhun gyis grub pa nyid du 'grub par 'gyurar// khang/
dbang bskur nabakramashes pa thams cad las rnam par grol bar 'gyur ro// dpal gyis byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro// de nas khro bo chen po lan khris sngar spyad pa byas te/
khro bo chen po'i dkyil 'kher byed pa/ byas pa gzo ba/ rgyud shes pa/ gas sbyong gi yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa/ gsum la skyabs su dang ba/ byang chub
kyisams dang ldan pa/ byams pa'i sams dang ldan pa/ snying rdzacan du gyur pa/ dkyil 'khor mthong ba/ dbang bskur ba/ bla ma rnams kyis lung byin pa/ gang bdud thamu
cad dang sdang ba'i sems rnam par 'jig par byed pa/ rig sngags kyi rgyal po stobs po che zhes bya ba 'di 'chang ba dang klog pa de bdud dang dgra thams cad kyis ma tshugs par 'gyur
rgyu gnod sbyin dang/ srin podang/ yi dgas dang/ sha za dang/ lus srul po dang/ mkha' 'gro dang/ brjod byed dang/ sgrub pa dang sbrul ra dzan bcas pa la sogs pa thams cad dang/
tsha/ 'jigs pa thams cad las thar par 'gyur ro// dus ma yin par tshib thams cad las thar par 'gyur ro// gsad pa dang ngatsang ba thams cad las thar par 'gyur ro// gcad pa thams
cad las thar par 'gyur ro// rmugs byed dang/ rangs byed dang/ rmongs byed la sogs pa'i 'jigs pa thams cad las thar par 'gyur ro// klu'i 'jigs pa thams cad las thar par
'gyur ro// bkra ma shis pa thams cad las thar par 'gyur ro// sems can dbul po gang la la zhig chos kyi rnam grangs 'di dus gsum du 'chang ngam/ klog gam/ yid lakhyadam/
rjes su dran par byed na dbul ba'i sdugabasngal thams cad las thar par 'gyur ro// le nyes pa byung ba'i tshe stobs po tshal n bdun bklags na sprin chen po las char 'bab po// gal tachar
mi'i bab na sprin gyi lha rnams kyi srog bsams par 'gyur ro// klu'i rgyal po nag po dang/ klu'i rgyal po 'khor lo dang/ klu'i rgyal po mtha' yas la sogs pa klu'i rgyal po rnams kyis sprin
chen po las char 'babs so// gal te char mi 'babs na srog bskams par 'gyur ro// gong du smos pa'i tshig bzhin du phyogs kyi ma'am/ klung gi ngogs sam/ rgya mtsho 'gram mam/
mchod rten gyi gnas su byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje la mchod pa chen po byas te/ tsan dan dmar po dang/ ka ra wA ra'i me tog dang/ pad+madamar po dang/ a tik+ka
ka' ma tog dang/ rgyal mtshan dang/ ba dan dmar po la sogs pas sam/ bum pa spos chus bkang ba la sogs pas mchod pa byas te/ gang mdesnga 'ad 'chang ba dang klog pa de ga yul
ngo thams cad du zhugs kyang pha rol gyis ma tshugs par 'gyur ro// sems can thams cad dga' bar 'gyur re// bkramashas pa thams cad las rnam par grol bar 'gyur ro//
stobs po chargyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la btags te g.yul ngor song na pha rol gyis mi tshugs par 'gyur ro// gsang sngags gro ga la bris te spyi bor btags na g.yul ngor mtshon cha rnams ma rtos/
bzhin du ltung bar 'gyur ro// de nas bdud des bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te phyogs gcabag tu 'dus nas/ stobs po che zhes bgyi ba tsalags
zhes gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ stobs po zhes bya ban de bzhin gshegs pa'o// stobs po che zhes bya ba'i chos so// stobs po chezhes bya ba na chos kyi phung
bo'i stobs po chazhes bya ba na chos kyi tshul la// stobs po cha zhes bya ba ni theg pa chen po'o// stobs po chazhes bya ba ni lag na rdo rje'o// danas bdud sdig can gyis smras pa/ gsang
ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjelegs so legs so// skyabs su mchi'o// sangs rgyas dang/ chos dang/ dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi'o/ btsam ldan 'das legs so legs so// dge
bsnyen gyi yan lag kha/zung bar bgyi'o// bde dang thar dang mthorasi dang// mkhas pa dag dang sems can ni// dam pa kun la phan pa'i phyir// stobs po che gzung bar bgyi// de nas bdu/
sngagacan chos la dga' zhing yid bad ba dngar ngas pagasaMgasanas/ btsem ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rig sngags kyi rgyal po stobs po chab mdo sde 'di ni sems can
dmyal ba dang/ dud 'gro dang/ yi dgas dang/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi sdug bsngal las tharapar byed pa'o// de bskal pa stong phrag nyishur lha'i rgyal po byed par 'gyur ro// bskalapa
mtha' yas pa gling bzhi la dbang ba'i 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur ro// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la 'jog par byed do// rig sngags kyirgyal po stobs po che'astangs
'di na gtsang sbracan nam/ gtsang sbram dapa 'am/ sbyong bar byas pa'i m/ sbyang bar ma byas pa 'am/ 'khrig pa'i chos la brten pa la'ang 'grub par byed de/ du la bar chad du ma 'gyur
ro[;]nas rab 'byor 'khor de nyidan 'dug par gyur pas/ bcom ldan 'daso rig sngags kyi rgyal po stobs po chang ltar gzung bar b gyi// dam pa na tsa zhig stsol ces gsol pa dang/
bcom ldan 'adas kyis bka'astsal pa/ lag na rdo rjel dri ba drisashage/ rab 'abyog gyis smras pa lag na rdo rjerig sngags kyi rgyal po stobs po changaltar gzung bar bgyi/ dam pa nitsazhig
sbyin par byed/ lag na rdo rjes smras pa/ 'bru sbyin par byed do// gos sbyin par byed do// dngul sbyin b byad do// gser sbyin par byed do// ba glang spyin par byed de// dmangagang 'dzad pa la
dam pa de sbyin par byed de// rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ spyi'i 'bras bu zhes bya ba 'am/ lag na rdo rjes snyas// rab 'byoradadabazhin to/ sems can nyon mongs pas bsgribs pa rnar
'bras bu'i dus su gnas so// 'bras bu'i dus kyis yon tan gyi don du gnas so// yon tan gyi don gyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chupa kyi lam la 'jog par byed do/ pa
'byor gyis smras pa/ lag na rdo rje legs so legasaso// gsang ba'i mtshan nyid ldan pa ste// stobs pochen shes rab ldan// gsang ba'i mtshan nyid phun sum tshogs//
spyin s dbang bskur yod kyang gzhungs// mtshan dang yang dag ldan pa ste// sbyin dang tshul khrims shes rab// rdzu 'phrul che zhing stobs kyang che// dbang char gragasashang bsod nams tshe// yon
tan rtse mo stobs kyi// mdo sde 'di la dbang bskur phyir// sangs rgyas brgyud stong der gshegs so// byang chub sems dpa' lag na rjes mdo sde 'di nyid kyis ma 'jigs pa'i lag pa spyi
bor bzhag ste dge ba byed par 'gyur ro// gang gis gzungs 'dus 'am/ ri 'am/ klung gi ngogs sam/ rgya mtsho'i 'gram du bcas na 'jigs pa thams cad kyi 'jigs pa mang par 'gyur ro//
denas bcom ldan 'das la/ byang chub sems dpa' lagan rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to// sumado sde 'di 'chang ba dang/ klog pa dang/ gzhan dag la'ang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston pa de
bro nadam mchis par lobargya 'tsho baka'agyur ro// lag na rdo rjes yang gsol pa/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i mong tsalags/ 'du ngaltar gazung bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
pa mdo 'di nangabazhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa zhes bya bar zung zhig/ chos kyi nyame zhes bya bar yang zung zhige/ chos kyi zla ba zhes bya bar yang zung zhig/ don thams cad grub pa zhes bya bar yang
zung zhig/ dbazhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi spran ces bya bar yang zung zhig/ sdig pa thams cad byang bar byed pa'i gzungs sngags zhes bya bar yang zung zhig/ rig sngags 'chang thams cad

grub pa'i rgyal po zhes bya bar yang zung zhag/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya bar yang zung zhig/ chos kyi dbyings de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sngon du 'gro ba zhes bya bar yang thung zhig
rig sngags kyi rgyal po stobs po cha zhes bya bar yang thung zhig/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje sumado sde 'di 'dzin pa dang/ 'chang ba dang/ klog pa dang/ yi ger 'bri 'jug pa dang/
bsting stang du byed pa dang/ bla mar byed pa dang/ rim gror byed pa dang/ mchod par byed pa des 'das pa dang/ ma 'ongs pa dang/ daltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams la
mchod pa byas par 'gyur ro// 'dras pa dang/ ma 'ongs pa dang/ daltar byung ba rnams kyi mchod rtan sku gdung dang bcas pa la mchod pa byas par 'gyur ro// lagan rdo rjes gsol pa/ bcom ldan
'das legs so legs so// shin tu zab pa'i chos bstan pa dang/ cho 'phrul gyi yon tan gyi rgyan gyi tshes bstan pa gzung bar bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'adas kyis bka' stsal pa/ lagan rje rje
rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo ga mdo sde 'di 'chang ba dal sdang ba'i sems can rnams chu 'gram gyi shinge ltar m rungs par 'gyur ro// spos dang/ ma tog dang bdug pa dang/ rgyalamtshan
dang/bdan sna tshogs lasogs pasamachod pa byas na bsod nams kyi phung po dpag tu med pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro// del bar tshongam 'byung bar 'gyur ro// mdo sde 'di
gnas bgang yang rung ban 'chang na/ lhadang mir bcas pas mchod pa byed par 'gyur ro// rig sngags kyi rgyal po stobs po che bgags dang rnam pa log 'dren thams cad 'chang ba yod la byed na/
sangs rgyas brgyad stong dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang/ drang srong chen po rnams dang/ lha dang/ klu dang/ drab r bcas pa rnams dgyes dga' 'o// stobs po
che'i gzungs sngags 'di la dgyes pa'i dus kyi tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes mdo sde 'di la gus par mi
byed pa de dag sems can ngamyal ba chen po brgyad pa dag tu skye bar 'gyur ro// gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag mdze rdzasu mdo snga'adra la gus par byed pa dang/ rim gro byed pa dang/ mchod pa byed pa de
bsod nams kyi phung po dpag tu med pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro// yi ger 'dri'am tshagamanyan na phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub kyi lam 'thob par 'gyur ro// lag na rdo rjes gsol pa/ thub pa'i
rmos bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ shan tuphra ba/ shin tu zab pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab pal sems can rnams kyi nang nas gang leg par sams pa dmyos par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'adas kyis bka'
stsal pa/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjesamasacan rnams kyi don gyi phyir mdo sde 'di bshad par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyi sgrib pa bsal ba dang zhi bar bya ba dang/ rgyusapar bya
bdang/ dbang bskur ba dang/ bkram shes pa thams cad las thar bar bya ba dang/ dpal gyis byin gyis brlab par bya ba dang/ sdig pa thams cad byang bar bya ba dang/ sems can ms
cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub par bya ba'i phyir bshad par bya'o// de'i phyirang bzhin gshegs pa brgyad stong dang bar mdzad nas de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa/21
lan gsum bskor ba mdzad de/ thal mo sbyar nas legs par rab tu bshad pa legs so zhes mngon par dgyes par mdzad do// dbazhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas/ sangs rgyas de dag
la slar gsungs pa/ bam ldan 'das dag legs par rab tu bshad pa legs so legs so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsalapa/ stobs po tsha'i gsang ba'i chos bstan pa 'de'i
mthus byang chub sems dpa' lagan rdorjes sdang ba'i bgegs dang rnam par log 'dren thams cad kyisnying 'dar zhing 'gul bar mthong ngo// dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo//
gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen polag na dze rje drag po la phyag 'tshal lo// tad+ya thA/ o han han badzra/ ngahad habadza/ pa tsa pa tsa badzra/ ma tha ma tha da dzraladzul/ su ru su ru//
murukau0f38kaNi/ dza ye bi dzaya/ a dzati a pa rA dza tu da mar si tu pramadzanasAhA/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na
rdo rje rnam par log 'dren thams cad sdigs shig/ chings shig chingasashage/ rnam par choms shog/ ma grub pa rnams grub par gyis shig/ grub pa rnams dul bar gyis shig/ sas
rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad 'bab par gyis shig/ lha dang ku thams cad tshur shog tshur shog// ngas stobs po che tre bo'i mthus dge bar bya'o/ de nas 'jam dpal gzhon
nur gyur ba stan las langs nas/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de legs su thal mo sbyar ba btung nas/
tsha bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'du byad thams cad kyi mi rtag pa'i mtshan nyade ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byang chub
sems dpa' 'jam dpal zhon nur gyur pa nyon cig/ 'du byed thams cad na dri za'i grong khyer dang 'dra'o// 'du byed thams cad naglog dang sprin dang 'dre'o/[..]'du byed thams cad ni
khyim dang dbu ba dang 'dra'o// 'du byed thams cad namar mi dang 'dra'o// 'du byed thams cad na mU'i chubur dang 'dra'o// 'du byed thams cad ni rlu shing dang 'dra'o// 'du byadatha
cad nare mo' rnam pa dang 'dra'o// 'du byed thams cad ni me tog dang 'dra'o// 'du byed thams can na rmalam dang 'dra'o// 'du byed 'di dag ni bad ba dang sdug bsngal gyi 'khol dang 'dra'o//
'dubyed 'di dag ni bde ba dang sdug bsngal gyi klung dang 'dra// 'khrug par 'gyur bas rgya mtshodang 'dra'o// skar ma dang 'dra'o// sems can rnams ni 'du byed 'di dag skye bar m sems//
ma mthong/ ma shes/ ma 'jal gyi/ de bzhin gshegs nyad kyis gzigs so// de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis 'jal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa khyod kyis mkhyen to// 'du byed
thams cad na stong pa nyid du mtshan nyid pacig pa mkhyen to// don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyade dumakhyen te// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi mtshan du mkhyen to// stong pa nyid stong
pa nyid kyi mtshan nyidu mkhyen to// chen pa stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid du mkhyen to// de bzhin nyid stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid du mkhyen to// 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa mtshan nyid 'di nyid
mthong zhing mtshan nyid 'dashes te/ spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams na sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod de// de bzhin du tshul khrims dang/ bzod pa dang/ brtson 'grus dang/
bsam gtan dang/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// mtshan nyid 'di skad shes pa nibyang chub sems dpa' zhes bya// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chan po 'phag/
pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gas/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug ste 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'dasamado/
sde 'di mtshan nyid gang gis na ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa zhes bgyi bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dbazhin gshegs yongs
su mya ngan las 'das pa'i dus kyi tshade bzhin gshegs pa'i las rnams byed par 'agyur ro// mtshan nyid des na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa zhes bya'o// mdo sde 'di yongs su nub
pa'i tshade bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa yongs su nub par 'gyur te/ mtshan nyid des na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sbrul pa zhes bya'o/ domade snga 'di 'tsho zhing sdod na da bzhin gshegs
mi pa'i bstan pa'i ng 'tshozhing sdod de/ mtshan nying des na de bzhin gshegs pa'isprul pa zhes bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyang mngosde 'di nyid la phyag 'tshal te/ mtshan nyid
des na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa zhes bya// de nas 'phags pa spyanaras gzigs dbang phyug bcom ldan 'das la rjes su ya rang nas bka' lung bzhin bgyi zhing sumado sde 'di
'chang ba'i gan du mchi zhes gsol pa dang bcom ldan 'adas kyis bka'astsal pa/ mdo snga'adi nyid kyi mthus sangs rgyas dang/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad ngang/ lha thams cad
0 kyang 'ong ngo// lha thams cad kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// legs so legs so// bdag cag kyang dam pa stsal bar mngon par dga' ste/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thamA
cad kyang dam pa'i ng 'di stsol ba mdzad par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo stobs po che'i gsang ba'i snying po ni sems can thamA
cad la bde ba thams cad sbyin par byed pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'angs la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje s 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das mtshan
nyid gang gis na madre sde 'dres kyi dbyangs sngon du 'gro ba zhes bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad byung nas zhag sum cu rtsa
gnyis lenapa'i nyin mor btang bzung chen por mdo sde 'di nyid kyi tshes bstan te/ mtshan nyid des na chos kyi dbyings sngon du 'gro ba zhes bya'o// mdo sde 'di nyid kyi mthus sangs rgyas
dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad sems dang po bskyed pa la gnas te/ mtshan nyid des na chos kyi dbyings sngon du 'gro ba zhes bya'o// mdo sde 'di nyad kyi mthus lha'i bu grangs med
dpag tu med pa dag rgyun du zhugs par gyur to// rigs kyi bu su mdesnga 'di 'chang ba dang klog pa de la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad sras su 'du shes skyed do// 'kher de nyid du 'chi ba'i
[s/ g]// dus byas nas ngan las 'das pa'i lam la 'jog par mdzad de/ khag des gsol// sangs rgyas 'kher pa bgrodadakarasems can gyi// srid pa'i phur pa 'byin
tsanga shes rab kyis// srid phur sems klung 'dzems shing thub pa yi// chos bstan pas naisdeg 'joms chos legs spyod// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lag na rdo rje legs par
rab tu bshad pa legs so legs so// lag na rdo rjes gsolapa/ sumado snga'adi 'chang ba dang/ klog pa dang/ gzhan dag la'angargyatshayang dag par rab tu ston pas bsod nams kyi phung re/
zhig 'thob par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'a das kyis bka' stsal pa// rigs kyi busumado sde 'di 'chang ba dang/ klog pa dang/ gzhan dag la'ang rgya cher yang dam paparab tu ston pa na ting nge 'a
sku bya ba 'thob par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sams dpa' 'khor dang bcas pa bya ba mthong bar 'gyur// dbazhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
rnams kyisangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag mang po mthong nas/ bsam pa rgya chen pos bsta stang byed par 'gyur ro// bla mar byed par 'gyur ro// rim gror byed par 'gyur 'o// mchod par
byed par 'gyur ro// chos gos dang/ bsod snyoms dang/ mal tshe dang/ naba'i gsos sman dang/ yo byad rnams kyang 'bul lo// bya tshubasam dbangala'ang bad bar sbyar ba sgrub go/ dag
bdun tshigs la'ang rim gro byed par 'gyur ro// dag pa'i rtsa ba de dag kyang thunamed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo bar byed do// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag la bsnyen bkur byed par 'gyur ro// de dag gis chos bstan pa de la'ang bsti stang du byas tanyan to// 'dzani to// klog go/ byang chub sems dpa lag na rdo ji lta
ba dang mtshungs par stobs kyis pha rol gnon par 'gyur ro// stobs po che la rol gnon pa'i khro bo 'di'i mthus bdag dang sems can thams cad/ sAn+tisAn+ti/ sat+tAsan+d+hiswAhA/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
daskad ces bka' stsal pa dang/ 'phags pa byams pa dang/ 'dzam dpal dang/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la sogs pa bskal pakhazang po'i byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang/
byung chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i snying po la sogs pa phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams nas 'dus pa de dag thams cad dang/ lha dang/ kludang/ gnod sbyin dang/ srin po dang/
dri za dang/ lham an dang/ nam mkha' ldang dang/ mi'am ci dang/ lto 'phye chen po dang/ ma deng/ mi ma yin pa de dag thams cad dang/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor dedang/ laganade rje'ang bal
ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la yi rangs te mngonongs bstod de// 'phags pa stobs po che zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mi rdzogs so//
gar skad du/ Ar+ya badzra h+phakha lA s+ya tanAkalnga/ bod skad du/ 'phags ma rje rnalu gu rgyud ma'i rgyud kyi rtogapa/ dpal 'jig rten dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal l// de nas/
yang dag bshad bya ba// dpal bskyed sdug bsngal sel byed cing// snang ba 'ching tshogs las grol ba// tshog mdzes mas legs par nyon// khrus dang gtsang sbra dang bral zhing// dka'akhrub
spyod pa rnams spangs nas// drag shul sams kyis gsang sngags 'di// brjod pa tsam gyis myur du 'grub// dadapa brtson 'grus kyis brgyan cing// bag yod snying rjechar ldan pa// des ni bla
ma mi spong la// dpa' brtul shes rab des pa che// 'gro la byams sems che ba des// sngags dang ting 'dzin phyag rgya tshogs// brtsams pa tsam la dngos grub 'byug/ dad med le rnam
'tshecan// bum la ni mi gusashadze// shes rab zhanatsape stobs chung la// bag med gzhan la gnod sems bcas// dbang bskur gnang ba ma thob na// das ni bskal pa stong phrag gi/ bye ba du
mar bsgrubs byas kyang// 'bras bu yodapa ma 'gyur te// dper na byas pa blun po 'gas// 'bras 'dod phub mabardungs pa la// sha thang chad pa nyid las ni// nam yang 'bras yod mi 'gyur
ro gsang sngags rgyal po rgyal chen 'di// byin rlabasa rnamamang 'byung ba'o// de nas bcom ldan bde chen po// nges par 'grub pa zhes bya ba// ting nge 'dzin la snyoms zhugs nas// nyid kyi

sku dang gsung dang thugs// rnajibanamed pa las// gsang sngags rgyal po 'ad phyung ngo// na mo b+ha ga bat+yaM/ badza dzrakha le/ han han/ da dad/ ts+tshatsan+da/ b+hany+dzab+ha mA ra ya ma ra la/ lA sa a bitaM

raka ak+Sha badzra gau NaM/ name b+ha ga wa kyi/ badza klobale/ puT+Tadasha/ badzaphru ka ra Na bi d+ha dak+Sha daM shAn prakA re Na bar H pang+gashum dishany+dzal pa kA ri Na badz+ha/ ut+tar disha sa ra pa kA re Na ban//

ag daMshaa pa kA roNaban+d+ha/ nor dkaMkha pa kA ri Na ban+d+ha/ dwa a byudabo bA tapa kareNabatsA// A shA na di sha ti[–]shul pra kA ra Na ban/ pAtAlangashaMnA Ta pA she na b+hAn ur d+hadaMshaMbadza kr-ikha lA pra

kA re Nab+hAn udz+nyAb+hArA/ hU~M hU~M phaT/ i daMbadzra khri kha lA/ mnA Na dasha dngashaM khaM d+ha/ akA rakAsaM ban+d+ha/ bram+makA sA dInA ba d+ha/ b+hu ta pra tapa shAtsA ban+d+ha/ go d+hawaMb+hAn/ gad+harmaku laMb+hAn/ sand ku

mAraMban+tu/ sa nati kumA ra b+hu ba naM ban+d+ha/ bdu snyayaMb+hAn/ nagu shra ma NA b+hAn/ na gu sha ma Na ra naMb/ saN+Datits+tsaM kaM ban+d+ha/ saT+TatIwaMkA dur tshwab+hAn/ saMhabya hU~Mbats+tshA/ maNA b+hAn/ pA saM ban+tu/

b+hu ti ni ban+tu/ pi shAtsa[']lin/ gan+d+hojam+pan+nA/ kA mu nAya nIb+hAn+tA/ ka Ta ki nom+pan+nA/ k+kArAraMb/ kha tsa rIny+tsan+d+ra/ sha ku nib+hAn/ dpaM ba/ dab ku laM b+hAn/ nA ga b+hAn/ nAg ku laMng+g+han+d+ha/

oM su b+hAnaM/ a su ra ku laMb+hAr/ ga ru wanu/ ga ru kulawan+nA/ bkloban+d+ha paDi ga Na bar M/ kirAraMb+hAn+taM/ kirAr b+hu ba naMban+d+ha mAnu9 ban+d+ha/ mA nuN+Da b+hu ba naMbats+tsaM/ amA mu btsu/
a mAnuN banaMpanu/ tsan+d+ra di tub/ tsan+d+ra dpya b+hU banaMkhan// sam+bataMban/ sam+b+hata ta la b+hAn+tsa br-iklu mkharaH/ bri talaM b+hAn+tA// sA ku laM ban+d+ra/ pa ra ku laMb+hA/

nyi mnAkatA 6bad+ha/ sam pA dawaM d+ha/ Anamot+teb/ nimit+taM ba/ saT+TaduwAsat+tanaM/ badzashrakha lA/ man Na ban+da/ kum+b+hiraMban+d+ha/ ma ka rasu sumAraMban+d+ha/ dza l^aban/ sa l^aban+d+ha/ oM namo b+ha

ga ba tibadzra shrakha le/ hU~MhU~MhU~MhAhAhU~M/ sadz+dzapuShAnaMsadzag pa khyog bo d+ha/ dwad sha b+hu dzayaM/ dwad shan tAyi/ bkANakaM shA yaM/ tsanA yo/ a ne ka rasmisha ta/ sa hasu pra dzA la tadIb+ha te dza yi/
chu gra ba bo d+hang ng+kAr Na udz+nyAko yi/ tsa pa la yi/ tathAgata/ a pa kA satwA naMb+hAn/ i maM badzra shi kha lA/ brtse Na/ pany+tsa sha te/ yo dza napa ri btaM badzakhri kha le nab/ bar du

dAts+tshanA ya na ba la galinab+hAn/ u rgya ya nA ban+d+ha/ tsa tuN+Da nim+man+ta/ taMSh+Thati hAhAhU~MphaT swahA/ hu lu hulu na mashA ts+tsham hAkro d+ha/ hU~MhU~Ma mr-i ta hU~MhU~Mb+hAn/ aN+Dasha tadabakoNA naMu tu sha tA/

sa hasaNibadzra krakha la na b+hAnaM/ dri Na pratha pAmu badze Na spo Ta ya ti swAnamA tapA la dAsu ki tAb ya ti/ bAtaMb/ mi grub/ sam+bihU~MpaM d+ha/ i dzra bi d+hu/ oM dra b+hab niTaM d+ha/ ba nasba tilaM/
ba nasba ti di ba bo d+ha/ e ka pAd ban/ dI[']ba d+ha tri pAdaMb+hA tsa t+yaM/ pA dbar/ pany+tsapA de btsa/ Na daM ban/ sha tapA daM na/ sa ha sra pAdaMb+hAn+d+he lakA pA daM ban+d+ha/ sa/

bskrun b+hAn/ sam+ba ba ku la bar H bras+saMbats+tshA/ brah+ma b+hu banaMb+hA/ ba b+hA/ ba b+hu panaM ban+d+ha/ ma hashA raM ban+tu/ ma hasha ra b+ha ba naMg+hAn/ ma hA de paM ban+d+ha/ ma hAd ba dza ta pA ba pA de nA ba tshwab+hA

omo b+ha ga ba rkya badzrab i kha le deshad ngeshi badzrapA kA ra Na ban hU~MhU~M hU~MhA phaT phaT phaT phaT phaT phaT swAhA/ rigaM sngags 'di nyid gsungs tsam gyis// rgya chen 'jig rtakhams 'di rnams//
rnam pa drug tugayos gyur nas// lha dang lha min sran bcas dang// gnod sbyin dritha grul bum dang// mkha' lding lta 'phye lus srul po/klu dang mi 'am cul sogs// tshog sa rnams thamasacang myos
brgyal te// sa stang kha bub tu'agyel nas// dbang po shin tu stor ba la// bde bachen po'i 'od zer gyis// phog pa'i skad cig dem thag/ dran pa slar red gzi mdangs skyes// danas bstod pa'i
rgyal pos bstod// e ma'i bde ba mchog dpal nyid las// rgyas pa stobs skyes bkra shis kyi// lha mos brjod tsam nyid las// nam mkha' khams su grags par 'gyur// bdachan ma
shes mnga' bdag nyid// rdo rje zhes pa'i mtshan ldan pa'i// lha mo lu gu rgyud ma la// bdag cag rnams kyis gus par 'dud// sku yi 'od zer sna tshogs kyis// 'gro ba'i nyon mongs sel byed
pa'i/ 'od kyis bdag la bde ba skyes// lha mo bde ba khyodaphyag 'tshal// stong nyid smon med mtshan ma bral// rgyal ba kun gyi rig pa las// ya mtshan lha mo'i reng bzhin thugs// mi rtog rang
bzhin phyag 'tshal la/ de rjes rgyal ba kun 'dus pagi/ gzugs sogs rig pa lha mo yis// 'khor lo' dal legs mchod nas// mgrin gcib tun 'dus nas
su sangs rgyas rnams kyis gsungs pa yagi dodzatshig gis bstod par byed// rdo rje nam mkha' las byung ba'i// sangs rgyas thams cad skyes pa'i yum// spros bral nam mkha'i rang bzhin
tsha gsal// rdo rje thugs la phyag 'tshal lo// rdo rje gzugs kyi sgra yis ni// lha tshogs ma lus rnam 'chang mdzad// bdud rnams tshar ba byed rdo rje sgra// nam mkha'i gsung la phyag 'tshal bstod//
'gro drug bdud 'joms zhal drug ma// phyi nang rten 'brel dag gi phyag/ sgeg cing cung zad 'jigs par byed// jorje'i sku la phyag 'tshal lo// de skad rdo rje lha mo la// lha la sogs pa thams
kha cad kyis// rmad byung bstod pa'i rgyal po des// bstod pa'i de ma thag tu ni// lha mo gzi mdangs cher skyes nas// rang gi snying po 'di gsungs so// oM badzakr-ikhA le hU~MhUphaN sAhA/
rig pa gzungs kyi 'phreng ba 'am// gsang sngags 'di nyade bshad tsam gyis// rims dang shub g.yan pa dang// lhag pa sha bkra mdzand 'bras// kladand mig nang rnand dang// lkog
nad glo mtshan nang rnams dang// gzer snying nad mkhal nad dang// rkang lag nad dang khyab par na// chuser nad dang khrag nad dang// bad kan rlung dang mkhris pa dang// shin tu'akhrugs
pa'i nad la sogs// yams nad thams cad zhi bar byed// gzhan yang 'byung po brjod byed dang// sha zamakha' 'gro ma mo dang// gza' dang rgyuskar leg 'dren dang// byad stems drag po phyi
rel gyi// rig sngags gtum po la sogs pa// 'jigs pa'i gnod pa thams cad kun// rlung gyis sprin bzhin gtor bar byed// gzhan yang stag gzig dom drang dang// 'phar ba spyang ki gung
pa che// sramong byi ba sprul bya la// sbrang bumachurangs ba tre ka/ lA dang so' byu'u la sogs// 'jigs pa rnam mang jisnyad pa// gsang sngags 'di brjong thos tsam gyis// thag rings su
na skyod par byed// gnod pa rnam mang thams cad kyang// sngags kyi sbyor bas sil bar byed// gnodabyas rnams na ba nod mang byed// gnod med gnod dang ldan byed cing// sbyor pa yang
na sbyor ba 'gas// gzhan gyi sbyor ba 'ching bar byed// dordzalu gu rgyud kyi rtog pa las/ gsang sngags bstanapa'i le'u stadang po'o//gang nas 'di na bshad bya ba/
mdzes mdze rdzakhromo yi// lha yi ting 'dzin sbyor ba rnams// thig le chen mos mnyanapar gyis// o badza dzra lA le/ At+mar rakAhU~MhU~MhU~MpaN sA gsang sngags 'di ni bsrung ba dang//
tha mal rtog pa'i lus sbyong byed// gangakhari zla sa yAyig gi/ 'od kyis rigs kyi gtso mo dang// blam sangs rgyas spyan drangs nas// mdun du legs par dmigs nas ni// snang kha sa bon
'od rtse las// me tog sogasa' dzin lha mos mchod// gzugs sogs rdzas rnams kyis// 'dudatsang so sor legs par mchod// thog ma med pa'i srid brgyud nas//
lus ngag yid kyis spyad pa yi// sdig pa'i tshogs rnams ma lus kun// bgyis dang bgyid du stsal ba dang// bgyid la rjes su yi rang ba// sdig pa'i tshogs rnams ma lus kun// thams cad so
sor bshags par bgyi// slan chad ma bgyid sdom pa yang// rgyatshon bdag gis gzung bar bya// rgyal ba sras bcas mdzad pa dang// 'gro ba'i dge la rjes yi rang// rgyal dang byang chub sems
dpa' dang// rigs ldan rdo rje lha mo dang/ sngags rgyud rgya chen 'khor lo la// kun nas dang bas skyabs su mchi// ma rtag blo gros bskyed pa'i phyir// chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang// gdul bya
ji srid tshim pa ru// mya ngan mi 'da' gsol ba 'debs// rnam pa kun gyi mchog ldan pa'i// byang chub sems ni bskyod par bya// gdod nas ji srid da lta yi// bar du lus 'dis du ma byas//
da ni srid pa'i rlung rtogs nas// rang gi lus 'du dbul bar bgyi// thagachen bla na med pa yi// lam tshan rgya mtshog ng yin pa// theg chen 'bras bu thob bar du// rgyun ma 'chad par bstan par bya/
de ltar dang sems 'dun byas te// bsod nams rgya chen rnams bsags pa'i/ dge ba bla na med pa des// thams cad byang chub phyir bsngo'o// dang po byams pa'i 'od zor gyis// 'gro rnams bde
[4 ]la dgod par bya// gnyis pa snying rje'i 'od zer gyis// 'gro ba sdug bsngal 'bral sems bskyed// gsum pa dga' bas bde ba thob// tha3pa chags bral btang snyoms so// de rjes rags pa'i

stobs spong zhing// bag chags dri ma bsal nas kyang// nam mkha' lta bur sgrub byed pa'o// de nas dag pa rjes dran bya// oM swA b+habashud+d+ha/ saT+Tadz+ha swa b+ha ba shud+d+ho'ahaM/ de yis dag par byas
nas ni// stong nyid rdzes su bsgom par bya// ong+kabar tAdzAn badzrasAb+ha ba At+ma konyahaM/ dngos po thams cad ma lus par// nam mkha' lta bur bsgom par bya// daranil skyas nyi dkyil 'khor//
dmar po 'od zer 'khrigs pa bsgom// dbus hU~Myigo sngon bo ya// 'od kyis 'gro ba'i bdud bsal te// slar yang yi ge la gzhug par// rdo rje khrom yongs su rdzogs// zhal gsum phyag
drugam dpung bzhugs// thugs kar nyimar hUM sngon bsam// 'od kyis srung ba'i ba kher le bya// shar du rdojalcer dbyug pa// nub tu chus byang du mnga'// byang shar rtsa gsum shar lho ma//
lho nub ral gri nub byang rlung// 'og tu sna tshogs rdo rje brag/ steng phyogs rdo rje rtse lnga'i gur// gsang sngags brjod pas bsgom par bya// hU~Mlas 'od zer rab spros pas// 'khor lo bkod pa'i
phyi rol tu// rdo rje rtse gsum rab dang// gur nirab tu bsgom par bya// de rjes jo rdzakhro mo ni// zhu nas rang bzhin med par gyur// dalas nyi ma'i steng gnas pa'i bdud bzhi mnan cing irdzun//
Al la las byung ba'o// bar du stsolas rdo rjen// khromo' reng bzhin 'od kyis bskor// khre mo dang bcas 'od zer rnams// rdorjel bzhugs sku bzhengs te/ zhal drug
phyag drug zhabs drug gam// yang na zhabs bzhis bdud bzhi mnan// zhal kun sngo zhing breganyer can// dmar ser gyen sku thod 'phreng can// rdo rjes lus brgyan nam mkha'i mdog/ bcu gas
phyag stagayasapan// rdo rje zhags pamanga' gsor zhing// sprul dang dgra sta gri gug 'dzin// g.yon pa dril bu sdigs mdzub gzhu// dbyig pa rtsa gsum tho ba'o// yang na phug drug g.yas dang/
pos// rdo rje ganyis pas lcags sgrug ste// gsum pas mdab nagasor ba byed// g.yon gyi dang pos sdigs mdzub ste// gnyis pa sbrul zhags 'dzin pa 'o// gsum pasa gzhu ste 'gangs
