pa'i tshul// rdo rdzolu gu rgyud ma ya// bsam gtan ting 'dzin la gnas na// yon tan kun gyi bdag nyid kyi// sngags kyi rtse bar 'gyur ba'o// sngags kyi bdag nyid yongs su bskyod// lha yi
rang bzhin bsgrub pa yi// rinachen gzungs kyi 'phreng bas na// chos rnams mtha' dag thob 'gyur te// ral gri mig sman ril bu dang// rkang pa byug dang gter chen dang// sa 'og 'gro dang
bcud len dang// nam mkhar 'gro dang gser bsgyur dang// de bzhin sa gzhan 'gro ba dang// zhi dang rgyas dang dbang mngan spyod// rmongs dang rongs dang bsad pa dang// dbye dang dgug dang rig

0/ sngags 'ching// srung dang phyir zlog chen po dang// zha dang lugs dang sems brgyal dang// leng dang snatshogs nad bskyed pa'i// sbyor brgya chen 'grub pa dang// mngon shes drug po yongs skye zhing//
sku gsung thugs kyi dza ya// phyag rgyachen po thob 'gyur na// ltas mthong tsam la sogs pa yi// dngos grub phra mo smos ci dgos// sngags kyi sbyor ba bskyed pa'i lha// dmigs pa'i rtsa bar gyur
pa yaM/ hU~Mlas skyes pa'i lha mo na// sngon mo zhal gsum phyag drug ma// g.yas pa sor zhing g.yon pa ngamar// spyan gsum sdang mig khro gnyer can// dmar ser gyenaskya thed pas brgyan// rus
pa'i rgyan gyis spras shang 'gying// byed pa'i 'phreng can klu yis brgyan// zhabs gnyis brkyang bskumarol brdzas// phyag drug g.yas kyi dang pon// jo rje gnyis pas gri gug ste// gsum pas
sbrul gyi zhags pa 'dzin// g.yon gyi dang po sdags mdzub ste// ga'us pas byed pa gsum pa na// sbrul gyi zhags pa dkarapo'o// yang na zhal kun stobasangs nying// 'dis ni 'ching dang dbang
gi las// mtha' dag rdzogs par byed pa 'o// srid par bram ze las skyes lha mo na// sngon me zhalagacig phyag gnyis ma// phyag g.yas rje rdzagayon lcags sgrog/ gcer bu rus pa'i rgyan ldan pa//
gsad pa'i las rnams thams cangan// jo rdzornal 'byor ma 'dis bsgrub// de nas bcom ldan rdo rjecan// chos rnams thamasacad 'byung byed cing// dngos grub myur du bskyod pa yi// phyag rgya
'byung zhes bya ba ga/ ting nge 'dzin la snyoms zhugs nas// yan lag phyag rgyabaka' stsal pa// lag gnyis thal mo sbyar byas shing// sar la khu tshur bcang byas te//
rgyab gnyis sprad nas mdzub mo dang/ mthe bu chung lcags sgrog bcing byas te// kha ya thad karab zhag nas ni// rig pa 'phreng ba brjod pa yis// 'dod pa thams cad 'grub par byung// phyag rgyu
btsangs nas gsang sngags ni// rjes su dran par byas tshul gyis// lam du 'gro yang bde bar thar// gzhan gyi rig sngags gcod par byed// 'phags ma rdo rje lu gu rgyud pa'i rgyud kyi rig
sngags las lha dang phyag rgyagatan la dbab pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o/ danas yang dag bshad bya ba// rdzas kyi sbyor ba byan med// mtshungs pa'i tshogs kun grub

byed pa// rdo rjemakha' 'gro ma yis nyon// oM sadz+dzata thA ga ta a b+hi kye tumaM/ oM sam+b+hang g+hag ta a b+hi She ka sa ma ya shrI ye hU~M/ dbang bskur ba ni bla na med// dri ma'igs rnams dag byed
cung// dzasrid ye shes tshogs rgyas nas// rig pa'i rgyal po thob par byed// dza/ hU~Mb ho/ o badzrapul+laA/ hU~MswAhA/ rUpa/ dIpa/ gan+d+he/ ni wa ciA/ hU~MswAhA/ mo kA hA/ sa ka la/ gan
ba na wa ra/ bur+yas pa ra wa ra/ a a a/ a b+hi pin+ti/ a b+hi ta ran/ sadz+dzad sha dka/ leka pA la/ lo ka pA la/ i maM ba li kr-iSh+Thatu/ kha danApa ban+tahU~MphaT kha kha khA hilA daM/ myilaM
badzra d+hAk+ka AdzA pa ya ti swAhA/ ye shes sems dpa'i sbyor ba yis// rnam par rtog pa sbyong bar khyad// mchod pa dang ni gter ma yis// bar gcod thams cad sel bar byed/ o kA ya badza

swa b+ha baAt+ma konyahaM/ gang zhig dbang posayula mtshonapa'i// mtshon mtshan nyid rnam shesadang// ye shes nyid ni mngon sum du// skye ba nyid la the tshem mad// de nas rgya chen sbyor ba'i gtsedo//
'khoraleTomyog bshad par bya// gro ga ras sam shing shunal// gur kum ga'u wa tsan dan bcas// pu ka ser pos 'khor lo bra// rtsibs b.ru pad+ma'i stang du bya// mthar nas me yi 'phreng bas
bskor// pad+ma'i 'dab ma bcu la na/phyogs bcu kun tu btsang ba yi// jo rdzal sogs bcu po bri// de yi rgyab tu phyogs bcu rnams// btsangs pa'i sngags na rimabazhin// 'kholo'i
rtsibs rnams bcu po la// hU~Mganyis bar du bsgrub bya'i ming// srung ba bcas pa bri bar bya// phyogs bzhi'i sngags dang phyag rgyu dang// 'khrul 'kher gcod dang 'ching ba dang//
'gugs pa'i sngags su btsos pa bri// gzhan long mtshams rnams drug por ni// lha dang klu dang lha min gyi// gnod sbyin grul bum la sogs pa// bcing ba drug po bri bar bya// 2bar
bsgrub bya'i gzugs bar nani// skyil krung thugs kar thal mo sbyar// mdzes pa'i gos ldan bri bar bya// dang rjes gsang sngags 'phreng ba nyid/ stong phrag gcig tu rjod byas nas//
da bya/ da rjes bstod pas bstar byas te/ gser sogs gral nas lus sam mgul// gang bde'i gnas sugadags par bya// desan rnal 'byor srung don du// jiltar
bsams pa kun 'grub ste// 'jigs pa brgyad po bad ba byed// danas gzhan yang rgyal po'i ras// gsar la tsan dan ga pur dang// drazhim rnams kyis byas nas ni// rgyu skar rgyal
gum gyis ni 'khor lo bra/ dbus su pad+ma 'dab brgyud pa'i// phyi rol mu khyud gsum ldan pa// pad+ma'i lta bar bsgrub bya'i gzugs// yanalag rdo rjes mtshan pa
bri de la snying po'i sngags kyis bskor// de rjes lta ba'i mu khyud la// stong 'og b.rung ba'i sngags kyis bri// phyogs mtshams sngags rnams 'dab ma la'o// phyi rol mu khyud dang per na/
rtsa ba'i sngagasarang dged par pa// gnyis par 'od kyi ra ba bri// dri zhim dkyil 'khor steng bzhag ste// rang nyid lha ya sbyor rdzogs bya// thugs ka'i sa bona'od kyis ni// nam mkhar 'khor
laskyangs byas te// yi ge hU~Mg rnam par bsam// de yongs gyur las sku tshegs bsgom// de dbus shes rab rnam par bsam// zla dbus stangadu las ni// 'khor lo rtsibs ldan
bsgom par bya// daran ya go'i rnam pa ni// mar me lta bu gsal dmigs la// mkha' 'gro ma dang dbyer med bya// rang sangasabon las byung ba'i// gsang sngags stong phrag bzlas
byas nas// gser sogs gril nas lus sam mgu la// btags na 'jags pa brgyad las skyob// thams cad du na srung bar nges// yungs kar nga yi rnam lnga dang// dur ba'i sum
bcas pa la// gsang sngags stong phrag bzlas nas na// rgan mo mang mang sbyor ba yis// gnas gsum thig le byas srung na// tshen stong phrag du mar 'phel// kusha ba mar yungs kar ngol/
gsang sngags stong phrag bzlas byas te// shis par gyur pa'i nyi mal// mchod rten spyi boragangags byas na// 'go ba'i nad rnams 'chad par 'gyur/khrag dang khrochur bcas pa la//
gsang sngags stong phrag gsum bzlas te// zla ba gzis bzung dus su ni// nyabasen rdzogs par byas nas ni/ rdzas ni shin tu snga byas te// lhatshogs gnod pa gang dmigs pa'i// snying
kha sngags ni bsnan byas nas// gangadamags bgegs ni rnam par 'jigs// ras bal gsal bar gyur pa la// shes rab mtshan ldan khrus byas da/ shis pa'i nyame la bkal nas//
b.rungs pa'i drangs kyis mdud byas te// stong phrag gtsagag sngags bzlas nas// lus sam ma shul lam spyi bor gdags// des na lo stong phragag thub// yang na rang lus rnam bsgrims nas/
du yaM tshogs kyis dag byas to// nyashu rtsa gcig grangs ldan par/ gzungs kyi 'phreng ba brjod byas na// sa phyag lag dum blangs shang/ bdar bral pa ril ma song bar// gzhan gyi 'jig
pa ma bsal zhing// tshe lo brgyan rtsa brgyadapar// rims nad tsam yang ma gnod do// gos dang zas dang snod spyad dang// sman la sogs pa'i rdzas rnams ni// mi 'khrug/
[+ ]rgyal po'i phyag rgya yis// bsrungs na rtsis kyang ma shod de// seng chen rngam pa'i stabs kyis ni// 'ub pa'i sgra gsum brjod byas na// phyi rol rig sngags stong phrag na// du mas tsas kyang mi
tshugs so// klu yi dbang po gnas lugs kyis// rtse gcig rdordza'i phyag rgyabacas// de nas gsang sngags gsum brjod na// nad dang gdon la sogs pa sel// ra nga nu ma'i mtshams
byas nas// hU~Mgase mnan pa'i sngags kyis ni// dmigs med ting 'dzin yid bstan zhing// 'das kyang gnod pa las bsrung 'gyur// phyi ril sogs pa kun spangs nas// snang ba yod
kyis bslabs byas te// ma snang ba la mngon dmags nas// srung ba rnams kyi dam pa bshad// de nas gzhan yang sbyor ba bshad// dur khrod la sogs 'jags gnas sam// mtsho dang
mtshe'u dang dgon gnas dang// gnas dang skyed mos tshal chen dang// ma tog tshal lam yul 'kher ljongs// chu yi 'gram mam shing gcig gam// yang na rang ga khyim nyid du// man+tal
legs par byugs pa la// brten nas lham sbyor ba sgrub// ras ris la sogs mdun byas te// bde ba'i stan la skyil krung gis// bsdad nas mnyam gzhag brtsam par bya// tha mal
sbyangs pa'i lus kyis ni// tharapa chen po thob 'gyur te// gzhan du de ltar ma yin no// sa gzhi shin tu nyams dga' zhing// legs par bkod pa'i ri bo la// nags rgyal shin tu sdug pa la//
bsal ba'i chu rgyun 'bab pa'i phyogs// rnam bkod me tog tshal gsab tu// shar du sgo bstan khang pa la// sngags bzhes mtshams bcings chog yis// gsal khung dang bcas brtsigs
pa'i phyogs// snyan ba'i bya yis sgra sgrog cing// dri zhim spos ngad ldan pal// dril busal sel sgrasnyan sgrog/ lnga klugs kyi 'phrang bas dkris// lhag pa'i bdu 'dza rnam spangs nas// spyod
pa mthun pa'i grogs dang ni// bde bar byang chub bsgrub par bya// 'on kyang gnas dang grogs la sogs// rnal 'byor yid 'jug phyir brtsam ste// mtha' dag spangs pa'i pharel na//
lcag pa'i byang chub ma mtshes so// bde dang sdug bsngalo sna tshogs rnams// rang gi sems las 'byung mod kyi// sems rtog ma lus spang ba las// ngas ni ches gzhan 'ga' ma bshad//
de bas sangs rtog sna tshogs rnams// spang bar bya phyir sna tshogs thabs// sngags dang phyag rgya ting 'dzin dang// sbyor ba rgya chen rnams bshad de// drag po sgrub pa'i thabs 'ga' ni/
rig pa'i khre mos mnyan par gyis// sa gzhi bdud rtsi lnga yis byug/ ma yi dkyil 'khongs bon bcas// dur khrod pha gus bri bar bya// der na pho mo thod pa la// phyi rol dmar nag tshono/
gyis byug/ nang du sna tshogs rdo rjen// mu khyud gsum ldan bribar bya// dbus su rdo mkha' 'gro ma'i// snying po sngags bcas bri bar bya// de rje ru na thams cad la//
dzAbri mu khyud gnyis 'phrang sngags// gsum par khro bo'i sngags dra 'i// thod pa kha sbyor nang du na// sa tshayungs kar btsan dug dang// lan cha khrag dngangashachen dang// rkang rjes sa la sogs
pa'i pa khrugs// brtser bu rnal 'byor skra ba shog nas// lha yi sbyor ldan lhor bltas nas// zhabs kyis thod pa'i khor na// mnan te sngags 'phreng brjod par bya// khro bo chen po'i sbyor ba I/
shu mnyam bzha gnas ni stong phrag tu// bzlas pa mtshan phyed bar byas na// gsad pa nyid la the tshom med// dur khrod las la 'khor la na// dbus su ma yi dkyil 'khor can// rnabs brgyad
mu khyud gsum ldan pa// dbus su snying po sngags rnams la// hU~Mganyis bar du bsgrub bya' mong// gsad pa nyid dang ldan par bya// mu khyud gnyis pa 'phrang sngags kyang// ming dang
gsadapa ldan pa'o// gsum pa khro bo' sngags bris te// 'khor lo mchod cing byin brlabs nas// dgra gzugs sor brgyad snying khar gzhug/ nga nying til mar gyis byugs te
thed pa gnyis kyi 'khor lo yaM// bor du bcug nasam steng gzhag/ seng ldeng phur pa sor brgyad pa// mnyam gzhag sbyor bas sngags de gdab// gsadapa'i sbyor ba 'di nyid kyis/ gaM
bar 'gyur la gzhan du min// yang na byang chub yan lag las// dur khrod khrag gis 'khor lo bra// gru gsum brtsegs pa'i gzugs dris ta// dbus su ngagra mang gsang sngags bcas
rtsabasalabcu gnyis bar du na// ming dang gsad pa bcas pa bri// mu khyud dang po'i sngags 'phreng yang// rgyas pa'i yan lag ldan parablo// spratshil gzugs brnyan sor brgyud pa'i// snying
khar bcug nas sku yis dkri// rnal 'byor pa yis nyal ba'i zhabs// mgo bo lhor bstan gzhag par bya// chu shel ma mthong bar du na// nyi shu rtsa gcig sngags brjod nas// mi yi rdo rje'i
ngar gyis brgyan// sdang byed s stang 'diram gnas// klu yi gnas su grags pa 'am// chu lo rdzong la sogs 'gram du// dkyil 'khor ba yi rnam lngas byug/ pad+madamar po'i ri mal//
lte ba rdo rjemakha' 'gro ma// gsar gyi mdog can thal mo sbyar/ klu yi gdengs ka bdun ldan pa// zla ba'i dkyil 'kher stang gnas pa// shin tu bltas pas gnas par bya/ dga' ba
lta dga' 'jog po dang// mtha' yas rung skyong rigs ldan gzugs// par pad chen rnams byas te// dkar pos rangang lta ba dang// dmar dang m+mo sa dang/ dmar ser ljang ser 'dzam
pa'i gzugs// gtsel thal mo sbyar btud nas// rgyu skar 'phrang ba dang ldan gzugs// 'o ma 'bras chan mkhal zho sha/ pus ka tsi la sogs skya4[']khur ba tshogs bu dang ngacas ra da/
ranechen snod du dgram par bya// gza' dang rgyu skar rnams dga' zhing// ku rnams bde ba'i sems thob shog/ lha rnams yid ni mnyam bzhag nas// snying rje'i bla chan skya/
bar shog/ lha klu gnod sbyin dra wa sogs// byang chub sams chan dang ldan nas// thugs rje1bar dgongs nas kyang// dusas char chen 'babs par shog/ smon lam de yi rjes su ni// gzungs/
kyi 'phrang pa brgya rtsa brgyad// brjod pa'i dem thag tun// char gyi rgyun yang 'bab par 'gyur// gal te cung zad mi 'babs na// ma la bsdigs pa tsam gyis ni// glog gi 'phreng ba gtor byadan//
char chen 'bebs la the tshem med// wa yi khrag gis 'grob la// gong gi 'khor 'khaslad pa yi// thabs dang ldan par bri byas nas// dur khrod sa las byas pa yi// jamo' snying khar bcug nas
kyang rkang pa g.yon pas mnan nas ni// lhor bltas bka' yi sbyor ba yis// gsang sngags khri phrag gcig brjod na// bslad pa nyid la the tshe mad// sprul dang sra mo'i khrag gis ni/ rta dang
kha/ ma he'i pags pa la// mnyam du gnyis kyi gzugs bris te// dang ba'i sngags dang bcas pa yi// 'khor lo thod pa'i gzugs bris la// pags pa gnyis kyis dkris byas pa// bla ma bya brag
dkyil 'khor la// brten pas dbye ba'i sbyor ba rdzogs/ mtshel dang tsan dan ga purab sres// zla gam dbyibs kyidakyil 'khor la// snying po dbang gi sbyor bar bcas// nub tu bltas nas

bsgrubs pa yis// lha yi dbang po dbang du 'gyur// rgyud kyi khyad par sbyor ba go/ dri yi rgyal po sna tshogs kyis// shang ga le ma dkar po la// jo rgya gram rjes brtsegs kyis// phyogs u0f7c u0f7a rnams
hU~Mgiso spras// mtshams kyi rje rnams dbu malag/ hU~M pra yi yan lag la// phaT na phyi la bltasapa bri// rgya chen gsol ba gdab par bya// gas bzang ma ni skags shing du// bcug nas rgyalamtshan
rtsor brtags na// rlung dang thog dang bar pa gcod// dman pa rnams dang 'brel ba spang// thal bamyudang yungs karal// sngags kyi 'phreng ba bzlas byas te// sngarnal sogs pa 'khrugasapa'i
tshe gtor ba tsam gyis 'chad par 'gyur// 'bru mar lungs karasar b.lag/ bsngags nas lus l byugs tsam gyis// phran tshegs nad rnams thams cad las// ma hashin tu brtan par byed//
'phags ma rje lu gu rgyud kyi 'khrul 'khor gyi le'u sta gsum pa// ba/ de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// sbyin sreg thab kyi sbyor ba yis// dngos grub thams cad myur
byad da// snatshogs lhachos mnyan par byos// ser sna sngangs shangegayo sgyu med// dul la dpa' brtul bzod pa che// mkhas shing ragi la brtson 'grus bzang// sngags lamakhas pas sbyin
sreg brtsam// thangan nyi shu sor tshadal// phyedabarkos kha phyir don// rtsa gsum dur khrod chen gyis bri// phyi rol phyag rgya rnams bkod nas// dri zhim me tog gcal du bkram// dar maredacing
[z ]/sreg kha'i rdzas// tshegasanas rdzas rnams bsang gtor bya// beng du rdzatsho'i ralam dang// gsal shang cher bcas shing la me// sa bon las skyes sbar bar bya// der mi
lug rgyud// bskyed pa'i tshig rdzogs byas nas// mngod cing bstod nas der rjes su// sku tshe yungs kar btsan dub dang// rus phye chen til nag po// dang bcas sbyin srag stong phrag gcig/
'phreng ba'i sngags kyis sbyor bar bya// thog ma thamaramar chen dang// le mang brgya phrag rar sbyin// sbyor bas sbyin sralag rdzogs pa dang// zhag bdun gyis na bsgrub bya ste// shi bar 'gyur la tha
kA tsem med// glang shastsal sha dri yang ku// sbyin sreg stong gis sgrub bya zhing// ba bla ljong res rud dang// lang ga glang po bas shar bcas// ser por byas lo stong phrag ni// gachig ga sa
'phrul du rangs par byed// sbrul rtane'u li ma ho'isha// byarog 'akosha stong phrag gcig/ sreg pas bsgrub bya 'bye bar nges// bra bo 'bras bu rasha khrag/ stong phrag gcig gis lkugs par
'gyur/ rdza mo bya rog rgan mo'i risha// sA lu dmar tAli dkar po dang// yungs kar ser po la sogs pa/ stong du bsregs pas skyod par byed// 'bru lnga smad 'tshong mang byung gis/ dam phyed
nub tu kha bltas dbyug/ me tog pad dang bcas ba'i/ kha dog dmar dang ldan pa yis// 'od zer dmaraldan stong phrag gis// nges par dgug dang dbang du 'gyur// taM'abacas mar gyi sbyin
srog ni// stong phrag byas na sdug pa 'bying// mar dang dus btsan dan bcas// sbyin srag stong gse tshe 'phel 'gyur/ kusha byang chub shing 'bras bu/ yungs kar dka' lan tshul//
stong bsngags 'go ba'i nad rnams 'achad// chungs kar sha chen phyam dang// dur khrod thal ba dug sna tshogs// (khrochu phyama'i sbyin srog stong/ (bres bas byas na lha tshogs 'jig/ ul
dmar dang yang na dkar// gur kum bzang bo'i spyon sreg na// stong rtsa brgyad tsam bsregs byas pas// gas ldan bu mo dbang du 'gyur// ma ru ra dang yungs karadang// ba yi 'o ma stong
bsregasan// rnam thos rgyal po' gtor tsam gyi// longs spyod chen po 'thob byed rung// o ragyur kiM ku ru haM/ srung ba'i sngags so// oM shAn+tiku ru o/ thams cad du zhi ba'i sngags so//
hawasha ku ru// mtha' dag dbang du byago/ sA pu'u ru swAhA/ thams cad du rgyas par byed pa'i sngags so/ phaT haMmA ra ya ma ra ya hUM phaT/ gsod pa'i sngags so// ba ba disha ya khaM/

dbye bar byed pa'i sngags so// oM uts+tshatsa ya hU~M/ skyodapa'i byed pa'i sngags so// la stab+ha la ste b+ha a laM/ rengs par byed pa'i sngagaMsaso// raM dzar dz+war raM/ rims skyed pa'i sngags so//
dza A ma ya saM dza/ 'gugs pa'i sngags so// o ba sha pa ya pa ta la o/ char pa dbab pa'i sngags so// u0f38kaM laM b+ha so b+ha ma laM/ sar ba gcad pa'i sngags so/ dzedzi tedze tal

ya dzaM/ zhi bar byed pa'i sngags so// hU~Ml yany+tsa maM tra/ taMtra/ ts+tsan+da ts+tshan+ti/ b+han+di b+hin+d+ra/ ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/ zhes pa ni thams cad du rig sngags gcod par byed pa'i sngags so//
sha rig pa'i rgyal po bla med ni/ gsang chen 'dilas 'byung ba'agyur// gsang chen rgyud 'dengomatshar te// rmad byung bas ches rmad byung du// bstan pa saMng pos gsang chen 'di// gsungs pa'i
ma des khag tuni// phyogs bcu'i rig sngags 'chang ba rnams// mtshar bskyed nas thal mo sbyar// bde ba'i snying po shan tu legs// legs solags so rdo rje'adzan// gang la bde bskyed dang la
thob byed// bdag cag rnams la thugs rje yis// rgyud kyi nying ba'ada bshad pa// rje chen legs so ngo mtshar che// 'phags mjo lu gu rgyud kyi rtog pa las sbyin sreg gi le'u ste bzhi pago
bagasamasdo lu gu rgyud kyi rtog pa 'odrananas byung ba rdzogs so//pa /te a khul dA sha badzras zhus nas/ bod kyi btsa ba mar pa chos kyi dbang phyug
kha grags pas bsgyur ba'o// ra @#// rgya gar skad du/ bdun+danAm nA ga sa ma ya/ bod skad du/ de rnamachu zhes bya ba klu'i dam tshig/ thams cad makhyen
pal phyag 'tshal lo// danas bcom ldan 'das grong khyer chen po g.yog 'khor na bzhugs te/ 'khor 'dus pa rinapo 'jog po la sogs pa klu 'khor dang/ lha dang mi'i tshogs kyi 'khor

ba chen po la sems can rnams kyi don chen po phyi te/ bsam pa dang re ba thams cad yongs su skong ba bde bar byed pa chos ston te// de nas grong khyer de nas bram ze'i khya' khyab ma sman zhes bya ba/
byug la/ 'o chab/ longs spyod cha pa/ rdzas dang yo byadamang po phun sum tshogs pa/ rig byed dang rig byed kyi yan lag bde pha rol tu phyin pa/ sngags la 'jug pa/ sngags grub pa zhig 'dug
ste de yang dang yang duklu 'gugs shing me'i sbyin sreg byed do// bram ze de lo tog sman khar char chadapar gyur nas/ des nga rgyal gyi sgras sngags brjod pa dang mthun pas 'daskad ces//
bdag gis char pa'i rgyun dbab cing klu dgug pa cazhas smras te/ des ma'i sbyin sreg bya bar bshamasanas la dang/ 'bras dang/ yungs kar rnams 'bru mar tshab dang bsres te sbyin sreg byed do/
denas klu ma bsrun pa zhig gagazugs bas te/ des lcags kyi phur bu la bsngags nas klu'i spyoborab tab pa dang/ klu'i spyi bo gas nas sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba chen por gyur to// klade'ang chor
'khrugs te khros nas skad cig thang cagi ud tsam de la klus khyab par byed pa 'i shugs kyiso cher gnodatsang rdul 'byung ba'i 'od zer tshab rang ga lus las bkye ste/ gnod pa chen pos khebs par
byas nas bram ze de zhing tshig par byas so// de yang lce 'bab pa'i char gyi rgyun chen po bram ze'i lus la phab nas bram ze de mgon mar/ skyabs med/ dpung gnyen med de/ me'i sbyin
(nag/ sreg byed pa btang nas/ de bcom ldan 'adas la mgon dang/ skyabs dang/ dpung gnyanabatsal te 'bros par bsams nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi drung du brgyugs
te bcom ldan 'dasag la ba der song nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la gtugs te 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das klu khro bas bdag gi srog ma rungs par 'tshol te skyabs
'tho'i su'ang ma mchis na/ bcom ldan 'das bskyab tu gsol/ bad bar gshegs pa bskyab tu gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ bram ze chen pod dbugs phyung nas 'di skad ces bka'
sul te// bram ze chen po ma 'gas shig/ ngas khyod kyi mgon dang/ skyabs dang/ dpung gnyen bya'o zhes bka' stsal nas cang ma gsung bar bzhugs so// donas nga com ldan 'das la//
gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen b.lag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to// btsem ldan 'das gzigs su gsol/ mngon sum du gyur bzhin du'ang klu mi bsrun pas lo tog ma rungs par bgyid na/
bcom ldan 'das khyed yongs su mya ngan las 'das kyi slad na slad ma'i tshe slad ma'i dus nasoms can thams cad kyi rten ni su lags/ ji ltar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das lo tog thams cad kyi don du
khotig rnams tshig par mi 'gyur ba dang/ kun tusrung ba dang/ rab tu 'phel bar bgyid par 'gyur ba la rtog yongs su skyong zhing klu klog pa de bshad du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis

07 gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la bka' stsal te// lag na rdo rje ku rab tu 'gro bar byed pa'i snying po sbas pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i gzungs de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po dang phyag rgya ston gyi//
de bzhinagshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis gsungs pa yod de ngas bshad par bya'o// dzes myur du gnod pa bkag pa'i phyiril tog thams cad myur du
bskyang bar 'gyur ro// legs par bsrungs par 'gyur ro// mo'i ri sul chen pa so so phyogs bcu kun nas klu thams cad kyi mtshams bcad par 'gyur ro// ma lce 'bar ba'i i paN+Di sprani
chen po nam mkha' lding 'dab ma gdengs pa'i shugs zhes bya ba'i sngon gyi mis pas nam mkha' khebs par byed do// la tig dang/ me tog dang/ 'bras bu thams cad kun tu srung ste
gnas par 'gyur ro// des klu la sogs pa thams cad kun tu rab tu 'bar bar 'gyur ro// klu mi 'grungs pa rnams phung bar 'gyur ro// 'dum par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das
la gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen bo lag na rdordzas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das kyis sems can thams cad la sman pa'i slad du gzungs chen pa 'di'i sngags kyi tshig bshad du
gsol/ donas bam ldan 'das kyis snying po 'di bkab stsal to// na mo b+ha ga wa te/ sam+b+habud+d+hanAn/ namo b+ha ga bta shAkya rAdza ya/ oM dzAl la/ ga rIb b+hani/ dAb+ha be ga ma hA ba
de lha ga wa tam hAtsatsA hri da ya sa lan/ tu ru tur/ har par/ da had ha/ pa tsa pa tsa/ sarba sa su nu ya/ nA ku la baH shan ra d+ha ra pra sa ratsats+tshAb bag ma hAb la pa rA ga

ma myur ta re prapAk+Sha/ ma tha ma tha/ pra dz+wa la mA la d+ha ra Ni/ tsatsA be ga ba ti/ prab ra ba mnar Ni hAyAb la pa ti/ de ga ba ti/ sa ra sa ra/ pa sa ra ba sir sa rAn+ti/ sarbas dris+yan ma dri ba na ma

ji phu a pha la paNo/ dra sam+b+ha rA Ni/ a ba sarAn+tas na ga tengasha sarbab b+ha pa lha ni/ be ga te ba ga ba ta swAhA/ hU~M hU~M phaT/ nA ga ba sa ra Ni phaT/ dzA la mA la ni phaT/ la mA la ni phaT/ phaT phaT phaT
AhA/ bcom ldan 'dasakyisaM klu thams cad dang/ klu ma bgrungs pa thams cad ma rungs par byed pa'i rig pa 'di bshad ma thag tu/ klu dang klu chen po thams cad klad pa na bar gyur/ lus la te
lus rnags shing dri ma zhim par gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la gtugs te 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das sngags kyi tshig shin tu ma bzad pa dag bka' stsal to//
bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis nongs pa bgyis pa ma drin du lags kyis kyang/ bcom ldan 'das rig 'a ni gnod pa bgyid pas bdag cag la b.res ba dang/ jig pa dang/ 'ching ba dang/
spyod pa dang/ gnodapa dbcom ldan 'das klu ma bgrungs pa rnams 'khrugs te/ de'i tshe lo tog dang/ me tog dang/ 'bras bum rungs par bgyid/ ser ba 'bab par bgyid/ sad dang
rlung gis 'khrug par bgyid/ ha cang char che ba dang/ chab mi'i bab pa dang/ dusam lags par char 'bab par bgyid do// bcom ldan 'das rig pa 'dzin pa sngags sna khas byams pa la gnas/
par bgyi/ byams pa'i go bgo bar bgyi/ byams pa'i ral gri lag na thogs par bgyi sta/ byams pas gnod pa brgyud pa thams cad zhi bar bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das deng slan chad de bzhinagasheg
ba'i spyan sngar bdag cag dam bca' bar ba tshal te/ gang na rig pa'i rgyal mo 'dirab tu spyod pa der bcom ldan 'das kyi gtse bar mi bgyid do// gang na snying po'i gzungs 'dis nga srung bar bgyis pa
dang yongs su bskyab pa dang/ yongs su bzung ba dang/ yongs su bskyang bar bgyis pa dang/ srad bu bre ba dang maNaMms dgum pa dang/ dkyil 'khor gyis ras bcang par bgyis pa der/
btsem ldan 'das bdag cag gis rtag par rgyun du gnod pa thams cad bzlog par bagyi 'tshal lo// le tog dang/ me tog dang/ 'bras bu thams cad kun tu bsrung bar 'al la// yongs
su bskyang bar 'tshal la// zan rkun po dang/ g.yo can dang/ ri dgas dang/ bya rnams kyang kun tu bsrung bar 'tshal te/ slad kyis kyang ma rungs par ma bgyid de// da nas bcom ldan
'das kyis/ klu'i bdag po de dag la legs so zhes bya ba gnang ste/ klu'i bdag po lags so legs so// khyed kyis de ltar gyis shig/ khyed kyis 'dzam bu'i gling legs par srung
ca @##/ khas srung gol gyisashog/ de nas de'i 'og tu tshog r bya ba las thams cad byed pa dge bar bya ba brjod par bya'o/ lo tog la gnod par byed na de 'a tsharig pa 'dzin pas zhing ge
dbus sam/ khang steng ngam/ gnas ma thon bar dkyi la 'khor gru bzhi pa byas la/ phyogs bzhi'i bum pa bkang ba ba zhig zhag go/ me tog sal mas gcal bkram ste gzhag go/
gzugs 'khyil ba bdun bya'o// 'bras las byas pa'i 'khyil ba bdun byas te/ gzugs rar zhung yang gzugs nyi shu rtsa re bya'o// 'bras dang 'a thug bsras pa dang zho dang 'o ma
gzhag par bgyi 'o/ phyogs bzhir dril bu gzhag par bya// pad+ma lta bur zan gyi gtor ma snga ma bzhin gzhag par bya'o/dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su bum pa chen po bzhag ste ba las
byung ba lnga dang 'o ma dang chus dgang ngo// yungs kar dang 'bras yis blugs par bya'o// sngags lan drug cur yongs su bzlas par bya'o// seng ldeng gi phur bu bzhi dang lcags kyi phur bu
tsha gcig bya ste/ thams cad ser brgyad kyi tshad du bya'o// ba ser skya'i lci ba 'am bag phyi las byas pa'i klu gzugs bzha bya ste/ dkyil 'khor gyi grwa bzhir gzhag par bya'o// sang ldeng gi
phur bu de dag kyang sang khang nub par gzugs so// sngags brgyartsabargyad yongs su bzlas par bya'o// shar phyogs su klu mgo bdun par gzhag par bya'o// nub phyogs su mgo brgyad/
[s]]pa'o[：]lho phyogs su mgo lnga pago/ byang phyogs su mgo gsum pa'o// dkyil 'kher gyi dbus su mgo dgu pa gzhag par bya'o// pog por ra re ste lnga gzhag par bya'o// yungs kar dang bras
yos su bsres pa la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas pa byas te phyogs bzhi'i gtor re// gzungs 'di bris la rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la btags tadakyil 'khor gyi gru bzhi'i gzugs so// zhing gi
dbus su'ang gzugs so// skyed mos tshal gyi dbus su'ang gzugs so// de gtsugs ma thag tu phyogs bzhi kun nas ri sul chen pos mtshams bcad par 'gyur ro// ji sring du phur bu ma byung bde
srid du mtshams bcad pa chen por 'gyur ro// lo tog thams cad dang/ me tog dang/ 'bras bu thams cad legs par bsrungs pa 'gyur ro// kha na 'dab ma gcig kyang bskams par mi
'gyur na/ yal ga dang sdong bu bskams pa 'gyur ba lta ci smos/ srog chags kyi rigs ri dgas dang bya thams cad kyang kha bcings par 'gyur ro// ma rungs par byed kyang ma nus so//
gnas der rlung dang/ sprin dang/ sor ba dang/ sad dang/ dus ma yin pa'i rlung gis kyang ma rungs par byed ma nus so// klu'i gnod pa byas kyang ma rungs par byed mi nus so// ma rungs
zhig tu gyur na de 'ang slar rtas par 'gyur ro// yang stobs dang/ rtas pa dang/ 'ongs yod par 'gyur ro// bum pa chen po'i nang na yod pa de'ang zhing dang/ kun dga' ra ba dang//
skyed mos tshal gyi phyogs bzhi kun tu gtor bar byas na srog chags thams cad med par 'gyur ro// sbrul dang/ bya ba dang/ ne'u le dang/ bya dur dang// dom dang/ stsal pa
a dang/ sha sbrang dang/ sbrang bu dang/ bya ba dang/ 'dab chags rnams med par 'gyur ro// grog spur thams cad med par 'gyur ro// tha na phye ma leb la sogs pa'i ng nam yang ma 'byung ngo//

drod gsher las skyes pa dang/ rdzus te skyes pa dang/ sgo nga las skyes pa'i bar gyis kyang ma rungs par byed mi nus so// dran dang me tog las skyes pa'i srog chags kyi rnam pa dag kyang phur bu ma spyad
gi bar du nam yang ma 'byung ngo// phur bu ma byung ga bar du klu'i nyes pa rnam pa sna tshegs mi 'byung zhing rab tu 'byung bar ma 'gyur ro// bde ba dang/ le legs pa dang/ le tog dang/ ma tog
dang/ 'bras bu thams cad yongs su 'grub par 'gyur ro// re zham pa dang 'jam par 'gyur ro// klu thams cad kyang rtag par rgyun du srung ba dang/ skyob pa dang/ srid pa byed par 'gyur ro//
phyi ma la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas par byas te/ lo tog dang/ me tog dang/ 'dab ma dang/ shing ljon pa rnams la gter na srog chags thams cad lhung zhang med par 'gyur ro// srin bu/
trem bu ka dang/ trel tadang/ sbrul gdug pa dang/ rkang brgyad pa dang/ srog chags kyi rigs gzhan dag kyang phur bu ma byung gi bar du med par 'gyur ro// ma 'byung bar 'gyur ro// zhing gi
phyogs bzhir zhi ba'i las bya ste/ nas dang/ gro dang/ til dang/ yungs kar dang/ 'bras dang/ mar bsras te sbyin sreg byas na zha ba chen por 'gyurar// tha na dud 'gro'i skye gnas su
song ba dag gis kyang ma rungs par byed mi nus so// gzungs 'di dang cho gar bya ba 'byung ba mtha' dag bra bar bya ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang drang srong chen po nyes 'dor dang/ rdo rje
'dzan bris la rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la btags ta gnas mthon por gzugs so// gtor ma dang/ ma tog dang/ bdug pa'i ng dbul lo// sang ldeng gi phur bu ser brgyad pa la lan stong yong
su ba zlas pa byas te khang steng du btsugs na rlung dang/ sad dang/ sngon dang/ ser ba thams cad thub par 'gyur ro// lo tog dang/ me tog dang/ 'bras bu dang/ 'dab ma ma rungs par
byad pa'i srog chags rnams med par 'gyur te/ sha sbrang dang/ sbrang bu dang pa tse la ka dang/ bye ba dung/ sbrang ma dang/ dram bu ka dang/ tral rta dang/ bi sha ki ta ka dang/
nya phyis can dang/ nya dang/ lam ka dang/ sbal pa dang/ ne'u le dang/ phag dang/ kan te ka dang/ sang ge dang/ rkang mangs dang/ rkang gcig pa dang/ rus sbal dang/ grog mo dang/
sbrang rtsi'i sbrang ma dang/ thang gi sbrang ma dang/ bung ba dang/ nag po dang/ shang ga ni ka dang/ sa'i 'og nas byung ba dang/ ma lu shi ka dang/ 'ug pa dang/ bya ba dang/ mchurangs la
sogs pa'i srog chags kyi rigs thams cad kyang med par 'gyur re// mi 'byung bar 'gyur ro// thams cad phung bar 'gyur ro// bya rog dang/ byi'u dang//
khug rtadang/ phug ren dang/ chu du ra ka dang/ 'ug pa dang/ kha na dzan ka dang/ ne tse dang/ ri skegasal sogs pa thams cadu med par 'gyur ro// sngags 'dis phur bu la yongs su
bzlas par bya sta phyogs bcing// na mo buts+tshA ya/ o ki li mi lo tsaN+Di/ ma laM/ tsaN+DitsaN+Di/ ban+d+ha ya sAhA/ da nas drang srong chen po nyas 'dor bcom ldan 'das dang ha cang yang mi ring ba
zhig na 'dug pas gzungs 'di thos nas/ da stan las langs nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis l gtugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das
bdag gis srog chags kyi rigs gnod par sems ba/ rab tu gnod par sems pa/ dug 'chang ba dang/ lo tog dang/ ma tog dang/ 'bras bu dang/ 'dab ma dang sdong bu dang/
rtsa ba ma rungs par brgyud pa thams cad kyi kha bcing bar bgyi'o// bzlog par bgyi'o// bsdigs par bgyi'o// phyogs bzhi kun nas dpag tshad du mtshams gcad pa chen po bgyi'o//
kun tung srung bar bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das slad ma'i tshe sladama'i dus na gnod par sems pa/ rab tu gnod par soms pa thams cad bzlog par 'gyi'o// sngags kyi tshig rjes su stsal
par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das sems can thams cad kyi don dang/ bdag la thugs brtse ba'i slad du de byin gyis brlab tu gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//
drang srong chen po ngas byin gyis brlabs kyis/ sems can thams cad kyi don dang/ lo tog dang/ me tog dang 'bras bu dang/ ldum ra yongs su bsrung ba'i phyir gzungs kyi sngags kyi
tshig smyos shig/ de nas drang srong chen po rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug nas 'di skad ces smras so// na mo b+ha ga wa te shAkya ra dzA ya/ ta thA ga ta ya/ na mo a ka tA ya/

ma Ari Shi ya/ tadu grwa/ mi rulaM/ tsal tsa ra tsar/ ho ma laM/ ban ni/ nAsha ni/ da ha da ha/ sa mu tsi ri sarba duShAn ban+d+ha ban+d+ha na/ dunu b+hAn+tAn/ sa ra sa ra Ni/ klu ShA kA/ ma Ni shu ra ba
sa ra sa ra/ hal tulaM/ chu titu ti/ sa ra ma NaM/ sa ra/ sarba pA paM da na ke tu d+hal swAhA/ drang srong chen po nyes 'degyis bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar rig pa 'ad smos ma thag tu klu dang/
gnod sbyin dang/ srin po gnod par sems pa de dag thams cad ka ba bub tu 'gyel nas bcom ldan 'das la skad kyis gsang mthon pos smre sngags 'donate/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag ma
ngas lags so// drang srong ga dmod pa bab par gyur to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag drang srong ga dmod pa'i mas tshig go/ kun tu tshig go/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa bdag dug
slan chada'adzam bu'i gling du sems can rnanAla rnam par 'tshabar mi bgyid do// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag snyan chad la tog dang/ ma tog dang/ 'bras bu dang/ 'dang
ma ma rungs par mi bgyid do// srog chags kyi rigs thams cad zlog par bgyid de// btsem ldan 'das kyis/ de dag la bka' stsal pa klu'i bdag po dag khyed kyis de ltar gyis shig/
tsa 'dzam bu'i gling pa'i sems can thams cad lo tog dang/ me tog dang/ 'bras bu dang/ 'dab ma dang/ yal ga bde bar kun tu 'phel bar gyur pa rjes su srungs shig/ de nas drang srong
chen po des cho gar bya ba smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das kha shar phyogs su bltas te mchis la/ rig pa drang srong chen po'i snying po 'di rel ba bring gar chab bcus la lanabasgyurtsa brgyud yongs su
bzlas pa bgyi ste/ drang srong ga mi smra bas phyogs bzhireg tor bar bgyi'o// sa pa sar sa ra/ sha pa ta pa da ma hrad ya kro d+ha/ a mu ka ba ya/ pra Na tsa ra/ su mu ru tsi la satwA/ sngags
'di lan bdun stong bzlas pa bgyi ste/ bzlas pa tsam gyis kruganod par sems pa thams cad tshibs gdungs par 'gyur ro// rkang gnyis pa dang rkang bzhi pa'i bar gyi srog chags kyi 'gas
thams cad dmod pas gdungs par gyur te thams cad 'byor ro// slar yang phyogs der lo tog la gnod pa mi bgyidad// srog chags kyi rigs thams cad ma mchis par 'gyur ro// srog
ba chags kyi rigs thams cad phyis kyang ma mchis par 'gyur ro// yang lo tog dang/ me tog dang/ 'bras bu dang/ 'dab ma ma rungs par ma bgyid do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/
drang srong chen po la legs so zhes bya ba gnang ste/ drang srong chen po legs so legs so// khyed kyis ci nas kyang sems can thams cad la legs par srung bar 'gyur ba dang/ lo tog dang/
me tog dang/ 'bras bu thams cad legs par srung bar gyur pa de ltar gyis shig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol te//
slad ma'i tshe slad ma'i dus na rjes su srung bar bgyid/ yongs su srung bar bgyid na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis byin gyis brlab tu gsol/ lag na rdo rjelegs so legs so// sems can thamA
cad longs su srungs shig/ le tog la gnod par byed pa klu'i tshog rdzogs so///de nas de'i 'og tu btsem ldan 'das zham rang chen pe dang/ 'kher 'dus pa chen po/
dang/ bkod pa chen po dang/ yon yod pa'i mthu chen po dang/ cho 'phrul chen po kun tu ston pas rgyal po napo rnam thos kyi bu'i gnas su gshegs so// dunas bcom ldan 'das rnam thes/
kyi bu'i gnas dang bcang yang mi 'ong ba zhig tubyon pa dang/ sa phyogs de na 'brog gi nags nyi shu pa zhes bya ba zhig yod de/ nags de'i mi thongs na rdzing bu zhig yod la/ rdzing bu demathus
lcang lecan gyi pho brang 'khor gyi zhing dang kun dga' dang/ nags dang/ 'dab mdang/ me tog dang/ 'bras bu rnams kun tu tshim par gyur to// skyes pa dang/ bumed/
dang/ khye'u dang/ bu mo dang/ ba lang dang/ rdzudang/ rta rgod mdang/ ma hadang/ glang po che dang/ bong bu dang/ skye bo'i tshogs thams cad bde bas tshim par gyur to// rdzing bu de'ang phyogs
bzhi kun tu rgyar dpag tshad gnyis kyi tshad do// rdzing bu de'ang me tog utA la dang/ pad+madang/ kumu tadang/ puN+Da ka sna tshogs kyis kun tu khebs shing/ nya sna tshogs dang/ chu bran dang/
ta chid dang/ chu srin byis pa gsod dang/ bung ba gzugs sna tshogs can no// de nas de'i 'og tu than pa byung ba de'i tshonags tshal dang/ ma rngog dang/ 'bras bu dang/ 'dab ma dang/ mal
gaThams cad bskams te me tog de dag bar ngs so// chu srin dang/ nya mde dang/ chu srin byis pa gsod dang/ bung bgazugs sna tshogs pa de dag kyang chubri sa mu tshung zad cig lus pas phyogs bcur
rgyag/ kun tu rgyag/ ba chu rgyag ste/ srog 'gags la thug/ srog rmad la thag pasasung 'phar zha rgyag ge pe snas banom lar 'angs pa pe po
don nyadang/ chusrinadang/ chu srin byas pa gsod dang bung ba brgya stong du ma srog 'gags la thug/ srog chad la thug ste phyogs bcur brgyugatsang snying rjeN+Daltar gazigs nas/ bcom
bam ldan 'das kyis byams pa'i dmigs pa snying rjes dbugs byung ste se gol gyi sgras ku rnams 'bod rung/ lan gnyis lan gsum du se gol rnab tsang stong gsum gyi stong chen po 'jig rten gyi kha
su sgra grags par mdzad de// sngon gyi las kyi rkyen 'ga' zhig gis srog chags de dag kyang srog ma tshad do// klu chen po de dag gis sgra de'ang ma thas/ bcom ldan 'das kyang rjes su ma dran na//
de nas bdud kyi ris kyi gnod sbyin rnam par 'thor rlung zhes bya ba des stong gsum gyi stong chen pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams su sgra bsags pa/ zhag bdunagyi nyin par sdug pa'i bskal pa 'byung ste/
'di ni srid pa'i rtse mo nas mnar med pa'i sems can dmyal ba mnar med pa la thug pa'i bar dag las gang yig par ma 'gyur ba bcung zad kyang ma srid do// 'jig rten du 'jigs pa chen po'abyung
zhes sgra grag go/ de nas lha dang klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ dri za dang/ lha ma yin dang/ nam mkha' lding dang/ ma 'am ci dang/ lto 'phyargan po dang/ mi dang/ mi ma yin pa de dag
thams cad kyis smad thos nas/ kyi hud kyi hud 'jig rten ma rungs par gyur to zhes ngu'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis las kyi rkyen gyis 'di myong bar mkhyen mod kyi/ 'on kyang dgongs
par mdzad de/ bcom ldan 'das kyi smon mtshams kyi mdzod spyanas 'od zer byung nas/ 'od zer des klu'i khyim thams cad snang bar byas nas kyang slar log ste spyi bo'i gtsug tu nub par gyur
to de nas klu'i rgyal po kun nas gdugs kyi rnam pas bskor ba zhes bya bas klu thams cad bsdus nas 'di skad ces smras so// kyi klu dang klu chen de dag ci'i phyir 'od zer
byung zhing rkyen gang gis 'jig rten du byung/ de nas klu'i rgyal bo chen po rgyas tshos bsams na/ bcom ldan 'das kyi mthus 'od zer byung bar mthong// de nas klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho dang/
gzhan yang klu'i rgyal po mthu tshe ba bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la gtugs te 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'od zer
rab tu bkye ba'i rgyu gang lags/ rkyen gang lags/ 'od zer rab tu bkyi sta khang pa thams cad snang bar b gyis te slar leg par byed pa'i rgyu gang lags/ rkyen gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das
kyis bka' stsal pa/ kyi klu'i bdag po dag srog chags brgyastong phrag mang po 'gags pas 'gag par 'gyur ba// de nas klu'i rgyal po rgya mtshos skad cig thang cig yud tsam de la rdzong
bu char gyi rgyun gyi chus bkang nas bde bas tshim par byas so// de nas phyogs der go skabs chen po byung ba'agyur nas sa phyogs der bcom ldan 'das 'khor chen pos kun nas bskor te/
mdun du bdar ba'i dbus na bzhugs so// klu'i 'khor chen po 'dus pa ni/ 'di lta ste/ klu'i rgyal bo stong phrag brgyad cu ste/ klu'i rgyal po rgya mtshel sogs pa klu'i rgyal po kun nas
0 gdugs kyi rnam pas bskor ba de stan las langs nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos gtugs te phyag 'tshal nan gsum bskor
ba byas nas me tog dang/ bdug pa dang/ 'phreng ba dang/ spos dang/ byug pa dang/ rgyun dang/ lhab lhub dang/ na bza' sna tshogs kyis bcom ldan 'das la mchod de/ bcom ldan
'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go/ de nas rgyal pa chen po bzhes pa rem ldan 'das gang na ba der logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan
'das 'jigs pa chen po ma bzad pa 'jig rten du byung ste/ 'di ltar yin pa byung zhing mu ge'i dgon par gyur pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das sdug bsngal 'dis sems can thams cad mgon/
ma mchis/ skyabs ma mchis/ dpung gnyen ma mangs par gyur na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de lta bu dang mthun pa'i sngags kyi tshag bshad du gsol/ gang gis slad ma'i tshe slad ma'i
dus na sdug bsngal sna tshogs su lhung ba'i 'jig rten kun tu sgrol ba dang/ tatsang ngar che ba dang/ chur ma mchis pa dang/ dus ma lags pa'i char dang/ sar ba dang/ sad dang/ tshob
ma mchis par bgyid pa dang/ mu go'i dgon pa rab tshum mas par bgyid pa dang/ bzlog pa dang/ yongs su bskyang ba'i slad du gzungs kyi sngags kyi tshig bshad du gsol/ de nas bcom
ra@#// ldan 'das kyis/ rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu dang/ rgyal po tshan pe khul 'khor srung dang/ rgyal po chen po'aphags skyes po dang/ rgyal po chen bem ma bzangal
'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rgyal po chen po dag klu'i snying po'i gzungs kyi sngags kyi tsheg bskul ma 'debs po kun nas 'bar ba'i glog ces bya ba yod de/ de dran pa tsam gyis klu thams cad kyi a
dang/ klu thams cad kyi lus 'bar bor 'gyur ro// klu ma bgrungs pa thams cad kyi snying 'phar bar 'gyur ro// klu thams cad kyi mgo tshal pa bdun du 'gas par 'gyur ro// mig dang mgo rnams
gas nas dum bu dum bur chad cing 'drul bar 'gyur ro// rgyal po chen po dag klu gnod par sems pa dang/ rab tu gnod par sems pa rnams kyi den dang/ sems can thams cad kyi phyir zung zhig/
de nas rgyal po chen po bzhis/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la gtugs nas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das klu'i snying po'i sngags kyi tshig bskul ma 'debs pa kun nas 'bar
ba'i glog ces bgyi ba bshad du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis klu'i lta stangs dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzigs stangs kyis rnam par gzigs nas/ klul 'khor 'dus pa
thams cad la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// klu'i bdag po dag nga las gzungs kyi tshigagi sngags kyi tshig nyon cig/ tad+yathA/ o ba pu le/ pra ba ra/ nA ga ma hAnA ga hrad ya/ A brte/

dz+wa la dz+wa la/ sarba nA ga hridA ya nA/ ka ma ka ma/ na ga ku la ba d+hun sa ni/ ha na ha na/ sarba nu ga dun hur ya ni/ han han/ sam+ba duShAn nu ga ba ba na ni/ pa tsa pa tsa ba tsa ya// sarbadunan/
gnAn/ a kra ma a kra ma/ sa mu dra sA ga ra/ ba mi lo/ bkra ma/ ma hA nA ga ga te dza b.re swAhA/ bcom ldan 'das kyis klu'i snying po' gzud kyi sngagAkyi tshig 'di gsungs pa tsam gyis klu de
dag thams cad 'dar zhing lus rul te dri ma zhim par gyur te/ me 'bar ba bzhin du lus la du bar 'thul zhing 'gre ldog go/ thams cad skad cher bcom ldan 'das la ngu zhing thams cad kyisaM/
bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das sngags kyi tshig shin tu mi bzad pa dag bka' stsal to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag thams cad kyi snying la g.yo ma mchis
par 'gyur le/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag thams cad tshig ste ma rungs par gyur to// bcom ldan 'das dang man chad mthun par bgyid do// bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga ya dam bgyid de//
bcom ldan 'das bdag cag klu'i skye gnas na gnas kyi bar du bcom ldan 'adus yang bdag cag 'dzam bu'i gling du 'tshe bar mi bgyid do// ma rungs par ma bgyid do// ma rtog dang/ yal ga
dang 'bras bu dang/ lo tog thams cad yongs su rgyas par bgyid de// dus dus su char gyi rgyun 'bab par bgyid do// bde ba dang yid bde bar bgyid de// lo tog dang me tog dang/
'bras bu thams cad 'grub par bgyid do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' rjes su skyong bar bgyid de// bden pa'i dam tshig la gnas par bgyid do// bu gcig pa
la bgyi ba bzhin du sems can thams cad rjes su skyong bar bgyid do// bcom ldan 'das phyogs gang dang gang na rag pa'i rgyal mo 'di spyod pa der bcom ldan 'das bdag cag mthun par bgyid
do/ bcom ldan 'das rig pa'i rgyal mo 'dadran pa tsam gyis kyang bdag cag thams cad kyis char gyi rgyun 'bab par bgyid do// dran pa tsam gyis kyang hacang char cha ba zlog par bgyid do//
bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa las log par mi bgyid do// bcom ldan 'das la'ang mnas bsgag pa'i sngags kyi tshag stsal to// de nas klu'i rgyal po de dag thams cad kyis/ bcom
ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la gtugs nas 'di skad ces smras so// tad+ya thA/ o tsa ta tsA tA/ ba ta/ sha tan ta/ pa tsa ratisAhA/ bcom ldan 'das gal te rig pa 'dzin pas gdug
zhag gcig chog bgyis la/ bdag cag gas sems can thams cad yongs su bskyang ba'i don du 'dzam bu'i gling thamasacad du char gyi rgyun ma phab na/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag yang dag
par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la 'khus par 'gyur ro// bdag cag klu'i skye gnas nas 'chi'apho bar gyur tu'ang mtshaste/ btsem ldan 'das de'i tshe rig pa 'dzan pas mnasakhasgag pa'i gzu

kyi sngags kyi tshig 'di thog ma nyid du lan bdun du brjod par bgyi'o// de'i 'og tu sku tshe'i sa bon brgyartsa brgyad klu'i sa bon dumatshe'ur derar// bcom ldan 'das de'i tshe bdag cag thams cad kyi//
khang khyim mtha' dag zhugs 'bar bar gyur/ bdagasha keng rus kyi lhag ma tsam zhig lus nas yongs su thar par ma gyur kyi bar du dum bu dum bur 'chad par 'gyur ro// de'i tshe bdag cag thams
cad kyis myur bar char gyi rgyun 'o bab par bgyid do// gal te myur duchar gyi rgyun ma pab na/ bcom ldan 'das de'i tshe bdag cag thams cad 'gum pa'i dus kyi dbang du mchi'o// bu dang tsha bor
bcas te 'bum par mchi// de nas rnam thos kyi bu la sogs pa rgyal po chen po bzhis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das klu mnas bsgag pa'i sngags kyi tshig
shan tu mi bzad pa dag gi bshad de// snying rdzam mchis pa'i mnas bsgag pa'i tshig dug bshad de// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po dag phyi ma'i tsha phye ma'i dus na klu
ma bgrus pa/ ma rungs pa/ gtum pa/ gnod par byed pa dag 'byung ste/ de'i tshe mna' 'dis 'jigs par 'gyur/ skyag par 'gyur/ dus dus su chang gyi rgyun na lags par 'babasaso//
dus dus su lo tog dang/ me tog dang/ 'bras bu rnams sgrub bo// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bus 'di skad ces gsol te// btsem ldan 'das tshe ga rgya cha
da@#/// bka' stsal du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tsheg bka' stsal pa/ char mi 'bab pa'i dus na des ri 'am/ dgon pa'i gnas sam/ gtsug lag khang ngam/
chu mig gam/ mtshe'u 'am/ mtsho 'am/ lteng ka 'am/ khron pa 'am/ klu'i gnas kyi mtshe'u 'am 'jim pa dang lci bar bsres pa'i dkyil 'khor gru gsum du bya ste/ dkyil 'kheng dbus zab
khru gang brkos la/ kha khyer yang khru gang bar bya'o// shan tu 'jam pa dang/ shin tu phye ba bya'o// spos chus khor yug tu gtor ro// de'i dbus su klu'i rgyal po chen po bzhi bya ste/ ba
ser skya'i lci ba dang 'jim par bsres pas klu'i rgyal po mgo dgu gdengs ka can lus dbyibs dgu bar byas te/ thams cad kyi mgo la'ang yid bzhin gyi nor bu bya'o// shar phyogs su klu'agyel
po rgya mtsho bya'o// lho phyogs su klu'i rgyal po gdugs bya// nub phyogs su klu'i rgyal po chu lha bya'o// byang phyogs su klu'i rgyal po lam bu kar bya'o// de'i g.yog 'kher bdun bdun mgo
ga/ gsum pa mgo gnyis pa/ mgo lnga par bya// lus dag spos sna tshogs kyis byug par bya// tsan dan dkar dmar dang/ su ra ban tsan dan dang/ shug pa dang/ gur kum rnams
phyamar byas te gtor bar byago/ me tog dang me tog 'phreng ba gdagasaso// gnas de'i dbus su 'bras yos dang yungs kar gyis gtor bar bya'o// gru bzhir rgyal po chen po bzhi gzhag
par bya'o// phyogs chen po bzhir sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa'i sku gzugs ring bsrel dang bcas pa dang/ mchodartan rang bsrel dang bcas pa dag gzhag go/ dar dang ba dan gyis brgyan par
bya'o mchod pa lngas mchod do// a ka ru dang/ tsan dan dang/ du ru kas bdug go/ rgyu spos dang/ na la dang/ kun du ru dang/ yungs kar dang/ gamyur sa dang/ sra rtsub pog dang/
pog dkar po rnams dang/ sbrang rtsi dang bsres te sngags lan shu rtsa gcig bzlas te klu rnams la bdug par bya// dkyil 'khor gyi mtha' kun du nas phyis pad+ma bri bar bya'o// sgo bzhi
btod la ngos bzhi re rer yang gtor mas gzhong pa bkang ba bdun bdun gzhag par bya'o// gtor ma dkar po dang ci 'byor pa'i ri rnam pa mang po gzhag go/ me tog sil ma gtor bar bya'o//
bum pa bkang ba bzhi gzhag go/ bum pa gtor mas bkang ba bzha gzhag go/ pog por bsha nas gu gul gyi bdug pas bdug ge ma mar kha brgyad du bud de// rig pa 'dzin pas shar gyi
sgor sbyin sreg shing ka ra wA ra dang/ yungs kar dang/ rtsatsha dmar po bsras te lan brgya rtsa brgyad der gtor to// der ba brgya rtsa brgyad tshang ba dang/ klu thams cad char gyi rgyun 'babs te/
'dzam bu'i gling thams cad du phyogs bzhi kun nas char gyi rgyun 'babs so// klu de dag thams cad 'dir char 'babs so// 'din tshog dang po'o/// yungs kar gyi mar dang/
sbrang rtsi dang/ shang ka ra wIra'i me tog dang/ nA ga ge sar dang btags pa'i ril bu byas la/ danas ril bu la sngags lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas pa byas te/ klu'i mdor bor
na bor ma thag tu klu thams cad dga' bar 'gyur te char gyi rgyun chen po 'bebs so// gal te de ma thag ma phab na klu dadag thams cad lus zhig par 'gyur ro// kladapa na bar 'agyur ro// sdug bsngal
chen po 'byung bar 'gyur ro// 'di na tshig gnyis pa'o/// spyan sngag byas pa'i thal ba dang nub mo dkrugs la sngags len drug cu bzlas pa bya sta/ khyam gyi nang du po na po ma thag tu
ts+tshA klu thams cad 'khrugs par gyur te/ de phyir char gyi rgyun 'debs so// gal te de ma thag tu ma phapa na klu thams cad kyi lus la sha bkra 'byung zhing mdzes btab par 'gyur/ long bar 'gyur ro//
'di na tsheg gsum pa'o//// shug pa dang/ ut+pal sngon po dang/ ba bla dang/ zangs phye dang/ yungs kar dang/ in+d+ra hasta dang/ pal sha bsras da bu ram khu bas sbras la shes
rab can gyis sngags lan brgyad cu bzlas ta/ ril bu rgya shug gi 'bru tsam du byas la char mi 'bab pa'i dus na ril bu bdun klu'i khyim du bar na nyin mtshan bdun char 'babs so// gal te 'phral
du ma phab nade'i phyir klu'i khyim gyi chu thams cad bskams par 'gyur ro// klu'i khyim na gnas pa thams cad gcer bur 'gyur ro// ril bu gcig rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la btags te klu mtshor
[4 ]gzugs so// ba dan sngon po gdags so// sngags 'di bris te der gdags par byas na ji srid du rgyal mtshan ma bsdus pa de srid du klu thams cad char 'bebs so// yang rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la
btags te khang thog mthon por gzugs so// ser ba 'bab pa'i dus na'ang klu rnams ser ba 'babs kyang ma nus so// klu rnams kyis gsar gyi kha dog 'dra ba de 'dra bar mthong ste/ klu thams
cad stangs skrag cing gnas der 'dod pa bzhin char 'bebs so// oM su pra te badzra dun te ma la mi lo swahA/ 'ad ni sngags so// bag phye las klu mgo dgu pa'i gzugasakhyas la lus mtshal
gyis bsku bar bya'o// mgul du ba dan gdags so// dkyil 'khor gru bzhi byas te dbus su klu'i gzugs bzhag la me tog sal mas gter ro// gtor ma dkar po chu 'byor tshad sbyin no//
ma tog dang bdug spos kyang sbyin no// bal po sa'ubashing gi lcag ma la lan nyi[– ]shu rtsa gcig yongs su bzlas pa byas te/ sngags dang bal po sa'u'i shing gi lcag ma la ku'i gzugs byas la
lan brgya rtsa brgyad du byab pa byas na kru gang gi ming bris pa'i klu dbakug bar 'gyur te/ klu de'ang rang gi khyim la dga' bar mi 'gyur ro// gal te char gyi rgyun legs par ma phab na 'phral du
srog ma rungs par 'gyur re// yungs kar la lan stong rtsa brgyad re re la yongs su bzlas pa bya ste/ stong rtsa brgyad du tshang na klu'i gzugs thams cad 'gro zhing mag gdangs ka byed do//
spya// de'i 'og tu pal po sa'i lcag mas bsdigs na ldang zhing lce ston par 'gyur ro// lus kyi bar du ston par 'gyur/ klu thams cad dbang du 'gyur te/ gang bsgo ba de bzhin/
byed do// 'o ma dang yungs karal sngags brgyartsa brgyad yongs su bzlas pa byas te gnas thams cad du gtor na/ thams cad la phyir legs par byas par 'gyur ro// 'di ni tshig bzhi pa'o//
de nas klu'i rgyal po myamatshodang/ gzhan yang klu'i rgyal po mthu che ba klu'i rgyal po brgyasong stan las langs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la gtugs nas 'di skaces gsol to//
bcom ldan 'das sngags kyi tshig shin tu mi bzad pa dag bka' stsal to// las sgrub pa shin tu mi bzad pa dag bka' stsal to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis kyang de dang 'dra bar bshad par
bgyi'o// dus dus su char gyi rgyun 'bebs so// slan chad sems can dag la rnam par 'tshe bar mi bgyid do// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis klu'i ma bgrungs pa rnam par 'tshe bar bgyid pa/
rnams kyi don du dam tshig ma 'tshul ba rnams bzlog pa'i sngags kyi tshig bshad par 'tshal na brjom ldan 'das kyis byin gyis brlab tu gsol// klu'i bdag po dag ngas dam tshig ga sngags

byan gyis brlabs kyis de shed cige/ na mo b+ha ga wa teshAkya mu na le/ ta dzam tAya/ tad+ya thA/ b+hu dzeb+hu dze/ sa ma ya b+hu dze/ tat+tA b+hu dze/ pra ba ra b+hu dze/ sa man+ta A ka ra b+hu dze/ du ru du ru swAhA
sa ma ya ba la ni swAhA/ nAg kha rasats+tse da na sAhA/ bcom ldan 'das slad ma'i tshe slad ma'i dus na klu yi bgrungs pa thams cad slar bzlog pa'i slad du bdag cag gis klu'i dam tshig gi sngags 'di
bshad de// nyatsang char rlaba'i tshe dang/ char dkon pa'i tshe dang/ sad dang/ ser ba dang/ sa ba 'bab pa'i tshe sngags 'di dran par bya// brjod par bgyi// de nas klu thams cad bskul
bar bgyi'o// rig pa 'dzin pa des shin tu khrus bgyis te gtsang mar bgyis la/ gos gsar pa bgos te klu'i gnas su mchi bar bgyi'o// klu'i gnas su 'byor pa'i spos kyi dkyil 'khor
bgyis te/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i sku gzugs sam/ sku gdung dang bcas pa'i mchod rten dkyil 'khor de'i stang du bzhag ste spos chab kyis bkru bar bgyi/ me tog dang bdug pas
mchod par bgyi/ klu kun yang bkru bar bgyi'o// sku bsil ba'i chab de la lan brgyad yongs su bzlas pa bgyis te/ de'i nang du yungs kar stsal nas mtshe'u de'i nang du dbo zhang phyogs bzhi nas
bdug pas bdugs na/ de yo ma thag tu skad cig da la klu'i gnas 'gul zhing du ba lta bu byung nas sprin gyi dkyil 'khor ngan por gyur te/ nam mkha'i dkyil de khebs par char gyi rgyun 'babs
so arab 'bab pa'i dus su yungs karadang til bsras pa la lan nyishu rtsa gcig bzlas pa bgyis te phyogs bzhir bcang bar bya'o// klu'i phyogs su gtor bar bgyi'o// ser ba mi 'bab pa
dang klu thams cad kyang gcod par 'gyur ro// sad dang/ sang ba dang/ dus ma yin pa'i rlung rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro// klu'i mtsho 'gram mam/ khren ba 'am/ lteng ka 'am rdzong
bu'i 'gram mam/ ri'i rtse mor shing an dang/ zhun mar dang/ yungs kar dang/ shing ka ra wIra'i ma tog gis stong rtsa brgyad sbyin srag byas na thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro// sbyin sreg byas ma thag
tu char gyi rgyun chen po 'bab par 'gyur re// tanang yang char ba'i dus na 'bras yos dngayungs karal lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas pa byas te nam mkha' la gtor na char chen po bzlog par 'gyur ro//
bcom ldan 'das gal te bdag cag gis dgung gsum gyis char gyi rgyun ma phab na/ bcom ldan 'das de'i tshongasha bkra 'byung bar 'gyur lags so// la ba dang lus dri mi zhim par 'gyur lags
so sangs rgyas dang/ chos dang/ dge 'dun spu bar bgyid pa lags so// 'jig rten gsum slu bar bgyid pa lags so// bdag cag klu'i skye gnas nas 'pho bar gyur cig/ bcom ldan
'das gzhan thams cad la'ang sbyor bar bgyid na thams cad rung bar 'gyur ro// de nas btsem ldan 'das kyis klu'i rgyal po da dag dbugs phyung/ dam tshig la bkod nas/ rgyal po chen po rnam thos
kyi bu la yongs su gtadade rjes su gtadanas sa phyog de nas gshegs so// rnam thos kyi bu ni bzhi la bzhugs so// klu'i dam tshig ces bya ba char 'bebs pa'i skabs rdzogs so//
nas bcom ldan 'das tshangs pa'i khang pa brtsegs par bzhugs pa dang/ lha'i tshogs du ma lhags/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor chen po'ang lcags/ lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin dang/ tshangs pa
dang khyab 'jug dang/ dbang phyug chen po dang/ klu'i dbang po mthu chab thams cad kyang lhags/ nam mkha' lding gi dbang po dang/ rgyal po chan po gsar mig gi 'dab ma can/ rdo rje'i mchucan//
bdag nyid chen po lus 'a bar zhing khro ba/ 'jigs su rung ba'i rtsal can/ rin po chapha dad pa sna tshogs dang/ mu tig dang/ gser gyis spras pa'i rtsedapan ma la thogs pa/ gsar gyis klubs pa/
drag pa'i gzugs can/ 'gying bar lta ba/ klu'i dbang po gdan du bting ba/ g.yog 'khor mang po thams cad dang lhags so// gnod sbyin gyi dbang po lag na rdo rje gnod sbyin bye ba dang/ rdo rje
'an g.yog 'kher rig 'a dzan stong lhags te/ bcom ldan 'dasan nir bu rin po che sna tshogs kyis spras pa/ mu tig dmar po tha dad pa mang pos brgyan pa'i sang ge'i khri la bzhugs pa/ khang pa
brtsegs pa na nam ring chen po dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs chen pos byin gyis brlabs pa dang ldan pas bzhugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ni 'od zer sna tshogs bye ba khrag ldog brgya
stong gis sku na shin tu brgyan/ gser gyi mchod sdong ltar na'abar/ nyim ltar na snang/ mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang dpa byad bzang po brgyadacu mnga' ba/ 'od 'dom gang bas ni sku legs par
bdun/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku shin tu rnam par dag cing shin tu dri ma dang skyon med pa'i 'od na gsal/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor chan pa 'dus par gyur pa
zhag mkhyen nas sku las 'od zer sna tshogs phyung ste/ 'od zer gyi snang ba des phyogs bcu kun tu khyab par mdzad do// de nas tshangs pa dang/ khyab 'jug dang dbang phyug chen pos dbazhin gshegA
pa' 'od zer la bltas nas 'dzam bu'i glingan klu ma bgrungs pas sad dang/ ser ba dang/ rlung dang/ ser phab ste/ me tog dang/ 'bras bu thams cad dang/ le tog thams cad dang//
shing dang/ rtswa dang/ shang gel ba dang/ sman dang/ nags tshal dang/ sman gyi bar bsrags te ma rungs par byas nas/ yal ga'ang 'dzam bu'i gling na med par byas na/ da nasems can
de dag sdug bsngal chen pos gzir zhing nyam thag pa'i skad phyung ba thos so// de nas tshangs pa dang/ khyab 'jug dang/ dbang phyug chen pos/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la gtugs
nas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das klu gnod par sems pa gtum po rnams kyis 'dzam bu'i gling rnam par bshag ste/ thams cad ma rungs par bgyis nas sems can rnams/
snag bsngal mi bzad pa chen myong// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kyi lha'i dbang po dag 'di ni mngon sum du gyur pa yin te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin rlabs dang/ sangs
'a[d]/ rgyas kyi yashes zab mo dang/ de bzhin gshags pa'i yon tan gyi khyad par gyi byin gyi rlabs la ltos shig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das nam mkha' lding bsgyings pas rnam bar bltas pa zhes bya ba
kun nas me lce 'bar ba'i 'phrang ba can rnam pa 'phrul pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms papazhugs so// snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu sku phrag pa gnyis rab tu 'bar te/ 'bar ma thag tu klu thams cad
kyi lus rab tu 'bar bar gyur to// de nas klu'i rgyal po chen po kun nas gdugs kyi rnam pas bskor bas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la gtugs te 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan
'das tshig lags so// bde bar gshegs pa tshig lags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis cang mi gsung bar gnang nas steng du rnam par gzigs te phyogs bcu kun tu'ang gzigs te/ de
bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag bzhes te nam mkha' lding ga shugs chen pos kun tu 'bar ba nam mkha' lding gi gzi brjid kyi snying po'i dkyil 'khor 'di rjes su dgongs so// oM badzra ba to ga

ru ra be ge hU~MhU~M/ rartsi sri dza hU~M phaT/ danas klu ma bstun pa de dag lung yur por gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug ste 'dang yod med de// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis nga bzhin gshegs

pa'i nam mkha' lding me lce 'bar ba zhes bya ba'i snying po chen po bka' stsal pa/ na mo b+ha ga wa te/ shAkya mu na ye/ tathA ga tAa/ oM badzra dz+wal dz+wa la/ pra dz+wa la/ han han/ sanA ga hri da ya d+hA ra Ni/
ba// har har/ sa ka na nan ba la pAr+ya pa ra kraman/ da ha da ha/ sarbanA ga ha/ zhwar Ni/ pa tsa pa tsa/ sawanag marAN+NaM/ ga ru Da ba ga ba sha ni pa te/ nad pa ta a ba ta ya/ sarba

nAg ba ba na ni/ oM ma ta ma ta/ ma hApi tsa tra ma ni mo hul dar hAm hA mu drab ga da ra pa tse tra/ A ba ra Na ba bu hu shA ta kiya/ sarban gnAn/ kar kar/ sma ra sma ra/ b+ha ga ru Da na paNA gan ban na shAkya

mu na pra a na ma nupa la ya/ terdza ya/ nA ga nan/ pa kI ya/ du na pra ma ta a/ bA yu ba dzag ban/ sbyo ma ya/ mut+tanAnashe pal/ ta du dzul na/ hU~MhU~M phaT phaT/ pra ma ta sarma pa ta angashan ne me
kan/ nAsha ya nAsha ya/ sa nAgi ba lan ba ha ra/ pa tsa dung tun/ Agar ba ya/ sushu nA gAnAn/ gardza gardza ma hA ga ru ra ba ga na/ hU~MhU~M/ phaT pa/ stam+b+ha a ningashA ta pa la dkan/ saM b+ha

ya hU~MhUMphaT phaT/ stam+b+ha ya/ shwa ta ba yu/ mu g+ha na/ sa nA ga b+hi ha ri Ni/ hUM hUM/ phaT phaT/ b+hen ga a pa ti/ mulcathi b+hak+Sha bu yun ga ru Da kro d+ha ma hA ga bar ya bA yu ba la bkan ti ti

ba TaM/ hu hU~M/ phaT phaT/ b+ha sha ya/ ba tashA ta A shi min/ nAsha ya/ tsatitsa te/ phaN+Da phaT swahA/ AshA ya/ nA gA nAn ban+d+hAya/ badzra b+hAne na ta thA ga ta sa man na/ sa t+ya na/ hU~M hU~M hU~M/ phaT ma Ta/

zaphaT swAhA/ ti ti ti ti/ hU~M hU~M/ phaT phaT swahA/ jolaM ba du/ sarba a shan+ta thA ga ta a d+hiSh+Than na hUM phaT/ a mr-i ta ma b+ha ba tu/ sarba shwa ta bA yu be ga A ni hUM hUM/ phaT phaT/ mA ti kra ma spo ya/

[z/ ]nAg mA tikra ma mA te mun+tan+ta/ ya ti[–]shA ti/ du ru guru/ hUM hUM/ phaT phaT swAhA brta ya sAhA/ nAg so Ta ya sAhA/ nA ga bi da ra a swAhA/ oM sAhA/ sA swAhA/ b+hu pa sAhA/ ta thA ga ta sa ma ya swAhA/

dri lokya pa dza tAya swAhA/ o hU~M/ hU~M hU~M hU~M/ phaT phaT phaT/ klu'i bdag po dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i nam mkha' lding ga 'bar ba'i snying po zhes bya ba'i gzungs chen po 'di klu mi bsun pa thams cad
zlog par byed pa'o// sprin dang/ lhags pa dang/ rlung dang/ sor ba thams cad 'jig pa'o// zlog pa'o// le tag yongs su skyong ba'o// me tog dang/ 'bras bu dang/ nags tshal yos su
skyong ba'o// bdud rtsi'i 'bras bu longs su 'grub par byed pa'o// de bas bstabs pa 'phel bar byed pa'o// skye klu'i bdag po dag 'di dran ma thag pa tsam gyis klu'i dkyil 'khor byed pa//
bu dang chung mar bcas pa dang/ blon por bcas pa dang/ mngag gzhug par bcas pa dang/ 'khor dang bcas pa lhags pa'i stobs byed pa/ rlung ba stobs phyed pa/ sdud pa dang stobs
byed pa// kun thams cad mathun pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' gnang ba dang/ dra bzhin gshegs pa'i dam tshig gi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyi ma'i tshaphyi ma'i dus na 'dzam bu'i gling 'dire la
tog thams cad dang/ me tog dang/ 'bras bu thams cad dang/ rdzas dang/ shing dang/ sman thams cad kun tu srung ba gyis shig/ dus dus su char gyi rgyun phob cig// bdag gi
@#// srog ji lta ba de bzhin du 'dzam bu'i gling gsems can thams cad rtas par byed pa// me tog dang 'bras bu dang/ le tog rnams yongs su sbyongs shig/ gal te gzhan du 'gyur
te dbazhin gshegs pa'i bka' lung dge ba ltar ma byas na/ de'i tshe klu thams cad kyi khyim kun tu 'bar/ rab tu 'bar/ kun tu rab tu 'bar te ma rtse gcig tu 'bar bar gyur cig/ klu la mu ge chen po
ma 'byung par gyur cig/ stobs bri zhing brtson 'grus ma rungs bar gyur cig/ rmubaskams par gyur cig/ khyim bskams pa gyur cig/ lus rtsub par gyur cig/ 'dab bzangs kyis 'jigs pa dang
me dang bye ma'i 'jigs pa dang/ rtag tu bkres pa dang skom pas 'jigs pa can du gyur cig/ phar rgyug tshur rgyug cing lus kun tu tshig pa dang/ ma'i dugs kyis yongs su gdungs pas lus
tshig par gyur cig/ nadadang gnod pa dang/ nad 'go ba sna tshogs pa 'dus par gyur cig/ de ltar phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus na bla mi bsun pa/ klu gtus pa/ rab tu gtum pa rnams gal te de
bzhin gshegs pa'i nam mkha' lding 'bar ba zhes bya ba'i snying po'i gzungs 'di las 'gal bar byed na sdug bsngal 'di lta bu myong bar 'gyur te/ klu'i bdag po dag de'i phyir bden pa yi dam gyis
de bzhin gshegs pa dam tshig gi rjes su bsrung bar bya'o// 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can thams cad yongs su bskyang bar bya'o// bsrung bar bya'o// bsgrub par bya// da nas klu'i rgyal kho

kun nas gdugs kyi rnam pas bskor ba dang/ klu'i rgyal po chen po rgya mtshodang/ klu'i rgyal po chen po dga' bo dang/ bsnyen dga' bo dang/ klu'i rgyal po chen po gzi can dang/ klu'i rgyal po chen po hu la pa/
dang / klu'i rgyal po chen po chu lha dang/ klu'i rgyal po chen po 'bar ba kun tu 'dzin pa kha bye rab tu dga' ba'i gtsug ces bya ba dang/ klu'i rgyal po chen po tshangs pa'i mgo dang/ klu'i rgyal po
chen po 'jig rten gsum du grags pa'i rgyal mtshan dang/ klu'i rgyal po chen po dbang phyug 'od dang/ klu'i rgyal po chen po 'od rnam par grags pa zhes bya ba dang/ klu'i rgyal po chen po kun
nas rgyal mtshan gyi rnam pa zhes bya ba dang/ klu'i rgyal po chen po nor bu mgo dang/ kurgyal po chen po rab tu gnas pa tshangs pa'i gtsug dang/ klu'i rgyal po chan po gtsug gi nor bu 'bar dang/
klu'i rgyal po chen po mtsho chen po gnen dang/ klu'i rgyal po chen po kun tulta ba'i mig dang klu'i rgyal po chen po khyab 'jug khor yug dang/ klu'i rgyal po chen po kun nas rnam par bral dang
klu'i rgyal po chen po rab tu dga' bas char 'bebs dang/ klu'i rgyal po chen po rnam dag rab dga' dang/ klu'i rgyal po chen po rab tu gtor ba dang/ klu'i rgyal po chen po glog 'bar dang//
klu'i rgyal po chen po sa srungs kyi bu dang/ klu'i rgyal po chen po chu 'bebs sna tshogs dang/ klu'i rgyal po chen po btang bzung stobs dang/ klu'i rgyal po chen 'jig rten gsum du rab tu char
'bebs dang/ klu'i rgyal po chen po rnam thos bu sna tshogs dang/ de la sogs pa klu'i rgyal po chen po brgyad khri bzhi stong klu'i rgyal po chen po re re'ang g.yog 'khor klu'i
rigs stong phrag bdun cu rtsa bdun yod pa de dag bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song nas/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum du bskor ba byas te mchod pa chen pos mchod nas/ bcom ldan
tsha 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la gtugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das kyis sngags kyi tshag shin tu ma bzad pa drug po tshan po lta dka' ba chen po dag
bka' stsal pas/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag ni phung ngo// tshig go/ lus rab tu 'dar ro// spu zing zhes bgyid do// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag bas par bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga
na mngon sum du gyur par gnas pa lags te/ 'di ltar 'jigs skrag/ ba spu'i bu ga nas skya bung zhes bgyid cing/ 'jigs pa mi bzad pa chen po skyes te/ bas par yang sgyid lug dang
mchis so// bcom 'das slad ma'i tsheslad ma'i dusan de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i slad na dge slong drag shul bgyid pa nor la brkam pa dang mchis pa la/ sad
dang/ rlung dang/ song ba bzlog pa'i slad dugasol ba btab par gyuran/ bcom ldan 'das de la klu ma bgrungs pa de dag gis ji ltar nan tan dukhagyi/ de dag gi srog sla zhing dziltar
0 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gi bu dang tsha ba ja lte bu mang bar 'gyur/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ klu'i bdag po chen po pa dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// klu'i bdag
po dag phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus na byams pa la gnas par bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam tshig dang mthun par bya'o// dus dus su char gyi rgyun phob cig/ dus dus su me tog dang/ 'bras
bu dang/ le tog sgrubs shog/ rlung dang/ spran dang/ ser ba thams cad zlog cig/ chud za bar ma byed cig klu'i bdag po dag de'i phyir khyed phyi ma'i tsho phyi ma'i dus na gnod pa med par
gnas par gyis shig/ klu'i bdag po dag gal te yang dag par dam tshig ma bsrungs na da' phyir klu'i bdag po dag khyed la nyes pa chen por 'gyur ro zhes snya'o// thog mar klu bskul ba'i
rig pa rdzogs so// kade nas de'i 'og tu rtsa ba'i rig pa'i cho ga klu rnams kyi khros pa zhi bar byed pa nam mkha' ldong 'bar ba'i gzi brjid kyi snying po'i dkyil 'khor
'di brjod par bya// theg ma kho nar gnam du bltas te yungs kar dang chu bsres pa phyogs bzhir tsha/ tor na/ sad dung/ rlung dang/ sngon dang/ ser ba thams cad thub par
'gyur ro// btsas par 'gyur ro// klu thams cad 'dar ed yod cing 'khod par 'gyur ro// thal ba dang chur bsras la lan nyi shu rtsa gtsag bzlas pa byas te dbang bskur na bdag
bsrung ba byas par 'gyur ro// 'brug zer ba'i tshe yungs karal lan nyi shu rtsa bdun yongs su bzlas pa byas la/ tshul lan bdun du yongs su bzlas pa byas te gnam
la sngon bcang bar bya'o// de nas sprin la bltas te yungs kar gnam du gtor n me tog dang 'bras bu thams cad bsdus nus sa'i steng du ltung ngo// sngags kyang brjod cing khros pas phaT
tsha ces bya ba brjod par bya ste/ phaT ces bya ba lan gsum gyis klu phrug gu rnams kyang lhung bar 'gyur/ klu rnams kyi lus kyang zhig sto thang la lhung bar 'gyur ro// bal po se'u'i lcag
ba la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig yongs su bzlas pa byas pa 'khor lo'i tshul du lan bdun bskor na/ klu ma bgrungs pa thams cad s dang/ sprin dang/ rlung dang/ ser ba thams cad sa la mi
'bebs so// mgo tshal pa bdun du'ags so// ma 'byung ngo// khros pas brgya rtsa brgyad yongs su bzlas pa byas na klu rnams rigs dang/ sngon da g.yog 'khor kun dang bcas te/
sa'i steng du ltung ngo// klu'i khyim dang/ gzhal yas khang mtha' dag dang/ chudang/ shing dang/ nags tshal du bcas pa mi lce 'bar ba gcig tu 'gyur// klu'i rgyal po chen po gawaM brjid/
ba mthu che ba thams cad kyang klad nad drag pos btab par 'gyur ro// gal te rig pa 'dzin pas myur du ma bskyabs na rigs thams cad phung bar 'gyur ro// bu dang/ tsha bo dang/ 'khor du bcas
[d/ ]pa dang// bzhon par bcas te rnam par med par 'gyur ro// mag med par 'gyur ro// char med pa'i dus na yungs kar la lan stong bzlas te khyab la gtor na/ klu thams cad 'dang yang med cing

khyim dang mtsho me lce 'bar ba gcig tu gyur te/ 'dod pa bzhin du myur du char gyi rgyun 'babs so// yang dang yang char gyi rgyun 'babs so// gangag tshichar dgos pa de'i tshe rig pa 'dzin pas chu dang/
yungs kar la lan brgya rtsa brgyad yongs su bzlas pa byas te gnas mthon por song la/ shar phyogs su bltas te 'dug nas chu snyim pa bdun la sngags lan bdun bdun du yongs su bzlas te shar
phyogs su gtor na/ klu'i rgyal po thams cad 'phral du gcig tu 'dus te char gyi rgyun 'babs so// skya rengs shar ba'i dus na yungs kar dang/ gur kum dang/ chur bsros la lan
bdun bzlas pa byas te phyogs bzhir gtor zhing/ steng dang 'og tu'ang gtor na sad dang/ rlung dang/ sprin dang/ sar ba thams cad la kun nas dpag tshad tshun chad du mtshams cad par
'gyur ro// klu ma bsrun pa thams cad btsangs par 'gyur ro// klu thams rung mi gda' bar 'gyur ro// ba ser skya'i lca ba sa la ma ltung bar blangs pa dang/ nga nyid kyi mar dang/ 'a ma/
dang gcan blangs la sab tu byas ka dang/ bag po dang/ thams cad bsras la lan dgu bcu rtsa gnyis bzlas pa byas te/ de nas klu mgo lA pa bya'o/ dmago gdangs ka can gyi skyol
na// mo krung bcas pa lus banus pa byas te/ tsan dan dkar po dang gur kum gyis lus bkru ba bya'o// stan gtsang ma'i steng du gzhag go/ dar gyi byed pan gyis dbang
bskur ro// me tog gi 'phreng ba gdugs so// dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa byas tem tog sil ma gtor/ bum pa gang ba bzha gzhag go/ mda' bzhi btsugs te dar gyi ba dan dkar po
bzhi gdags so// dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su gtor ma gzhag go/ dkyil 'kher gru bzhire seng ldeng gi phur bu bzhi gzugs so// tshon sna lnga'i skud pas lan lnga bskor ro// kun
la'ang lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te las bya'o// bum pa'i mgul dar gyis btsang nga// na la da dang/ sra rtsa pog dang/ rgyusbos dang kun du ra dang/ sen mo dang nA ga pus pa dang/
yungs kar dkar po dang/ sha kar dang bsras la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas la bdug par bya'o// bdug pa 'di sbyar la/ de nas rig pa 'dzan pas shAn tu khrus byas te gos gtsang ma gyon
la/ sngags 'danyid kyis nye reg dang/ brag bcang ba dang/ mtshams bcing ba dang/ phyogs bcing ba dang/ dkyil 'khor bcing ba dang/ gos gdag pa dang/ bdag bsrung ba dang/
khrus bya ba rnams bya'o// klu kha shar phyogs su bstan te bzhag la/rig pa 'dzan pa klu la bltas te skyil mo krung du 'dug la/ sngags 'di nyid kyis dgug pa dang/ gtor ma dang/
bdug pas slar gtang bar bya'o// de nas rig pa 'dzanibs stong rtsa brgyad brgyad bzlas ta yungs kar re ra la bzlas la klu'i gzugs la bstan par bya'o// mar me kha bzhi bud da// klu'i
mang bri'o// gang bos pa de 'greng bar 'gyur ro// bzlas pa stong rtsa brgyad tshang bar byas na klu' rgyal po chen po thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro// thams cad stong par 'gyur ro// rtsa bsam pa
de thams cad sbyin par 'gyur ro// dbang thams cad zlog par 'gyur ro// dbang ga skya ba dang/ 'khor du bcas pa dang/ bu dang/ tshe bor bcas pa thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro// las
thams cad byed par 'gyur ro// rang gi khyim bzhin du yongs su skyong bar 'gyur ro// klu'i gzugs de gnas dben par bzhag la/ me tog dang bdug pa sbyin no// lang long med par
bzhag cing ma mthong par bya ste/ su la'ang ma bstan no// gos gtsang mas dgab bo// nam dgos pa yod pa de'i tshe yungs kar la lanabargya rtsa brgyad bzlas pa byas te bsnun na dgos pa
thams cad byed par 'gyur ro// gar btab pa der 'gro zhang slar yang 'ong ngo// tshilam du dgos pa thams cad ston tsange las thams cad byed par 'gyur ro// klu'i mngag gzhug pa zhes
bya'o// gangagatshedus ma yin pa'i sprin dang/ rlung dang/ sar ba dang/ sad byung ba de'i tshasku tshe'i 'bru dang yus ka dubasras la lan brgya rtsa gcig khazlas pa byas te// khros pas/
[ni/ ]@#// klu'i gzugs la bsnan na skad cig de la rlung dang/ ser ba dang/ sprin med par 'gyur te/ thams cad bcing bar 'gyur ro// than pa byung ba de'i tshe yi ger bris la
skud pa dmar pos dkris la skud pa la mdud pa nyi shu rtsa gcig bar te/ klu'i mgul du btags la klu'i spyi bor lan 3shu rtsa gcig bzlas pa byas na skad cig de la char gyi rgyun 'babs te/
a/ sgrub pa pos de ltar 'dod pa bzhin char 'bebs so// hacang char chen skud pa sngon po la lan bdun bzlas pa byas te mdud pa bdun bor na char chen po ma 'bab par 'gyur ro// cho ga dang rig pa
sgrub pa gzhan thams cad la'ang sngags 'di thog ma kho nar lan bdun brjod do// 'di kun tu sbyor ba ste/ brjod pa sgrub pa 'grub bo// nam mkha' ldangeng chen po rdo rje shugs 'bar ba nam mkha'
ldong gi snying po dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so//de nas de'i 'og tu rtsa bas snying po ba tsho ga bstan to// gzungs bton ma thag pa tsam gyis klu thams
cad 'dar yod yod do// bal po sa'u'i shing ga lcag ma dang/ shing ka ra wA ra' lcag mas rlung dang sprin bzlog pa byago/ ba'i lci ba sa la ma lhung bas khang steng du dkyil 'khor grwa bzhi re
shin tu rnam par phye ba re'u cha legs par byas te/ seng ldeng gi phur bu sor brgyad pa brgyad phyogs mtshams su gzugs so// mda' la gzugs so// rtsa gsum pa gzugs so// mda' bzhi la
tshon sna lnga'i skud pa bzhas 'khor bar bskor ro// bum pa gang ba bzhi dang/ pog por dang/ gtor ma'i bum pa bzhi gzhag go/ gtor ma dkar pos bkang ba bzhi dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su
gzhag/ ma tog sil mas gang bar gtor/ bra yos dang yungs kar gyis gtor re// thams cad la lan bdun bdun gyi bzlas pa byas pa gzugs sa// yungs kar dang chub sras la bas
pa byas pas phyogs bzhir mtshams gcad do// de nas dpag tshad tshun chad kun tu mtshams chen po bcad par 'gyur ro// der klu mi bsun pa rnams 'phrog mi nus so// klu chen po rnams kyang
rtag tu dus ma yin pa'i rlung dang/ sngan dang/ sar ba 'babs ma nus so// me tog dang 'bras bu thams cad la 'tshe'ang ma nus/ lan 'ga' yang rtsa' la ma la'ang 'tsha ma nus/ bcing
ba lngas bsdams te thams cad btsangs par 'gyur ro// 'di zla ba brgyad du mtshams bcings par 'gyur/ gnod sbyin dang/ 'byung pa dang/ srin po dang/ oM dgas dang/ grul bum
dang gsang ba pa de rnams gnas 'di las ma 'da' 'o// de nas rig pa 'dzin pa dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su 'dug ste/ bal po so'u'ishang ga lcag ma la lan bdunubazlas pas klu bzlog par
bya// shin tu khros pas bzlog par bya ba ni ma yin no// klu'i skyal mo krung ga phyag rgya bcing bar bya sta/ mdzub mo gnyis mgo bo gdangs ka ltar byas la mthe'u chung gnyis brkyang nge//
ka@#// 'di ni gru thams cad kyi phyag rgya'o// brjod m thag tsam gyis klu thams cad kyi sange dag la gnod par 'gyur ro// gal te klu dag phyog/sa de ma rungs par bya bar 'dod na de'i tshe
bya tshan mgo la 'bab bo// mgo dang/ mjug ma dang/ kheg pa jitsem pa de tsam du lus la ral gri'i char gyi rgyun 'bab par 'gyur ro// de nas klu thams cad sngangs skrag par gnas par 'gyur
kha te de'i tshe 'dzam bu'i gling du dus dus su char gyi rgyun 'bebs so// kum bgrungs pa thams cad dpang du 'gyur ro// kha stang du dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa byas te/ me tog sil mas gang bar
gtor la bdug pas bdugs te/ bum pa chus gang ba thams cad la lan bdun du bzlas par bya'o// gtor ma gzhag gi/ seng ldeng gi phur bu la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te/ seng ldeng
gi phur bu dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su btsugs na rlung dang/ sngon dang/ ser ba dang/ sad kyi nyes pa thams cad bcings par 'gyur te/ phur bu ma byung gi bar du thub par 'gyur ro// yungs
kar la lan bdun bzlas la sprin la bltas te gtor nas nig ba thams cad 'chad par 'gyur ro// shing ka ra wAr lceg ma la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te gdu bung byas na thams cad du sar ba
ched par 'gyur ro// shing ka ra wA ra dmar po'i mi rtog la lan nyishu rtsa gcig bzlas te/ glog 'byung ba'i tshon nam mkha' la 'phangasan nam mkha' nyid du 'dug ste bcings par 'gyur ro//
chu la lan bdun bzlas te gtor na grol bar 'gyur ro// 'brug zer ba'i tshe rtse gsum pa la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te/ dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su btsugs na rtse gsum pa ma byung gi bar du/
'brug zer te sprin btsangs par 'gyur ro// phyung nas grol bar 'gyur ro// ral gri la lan bdun bzlas te/ klu'i phyag rgya skyil mo krung gis bzung la sbronal bltas te 'dug na bzung ma thag
du glu mtha' dge 'bar ba 'gyur te/ klu thams cad zhugs par 'gyur re// ral gri thogs la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas te/ gur kum gyis de'i steng du nam mkha' lding bris nas ji lta ji
lta bur bskor ba de lta de lta bu nam mkha' lding ga 'dab gshog klu'i lus la 'bab par 'gyur te/ klu thams cad skragatsang phyogs bcur 'bros par 'gyur to/ phyis rlung dang ser ba 'babs mi
nus so// shang ka ra wIra'i me tog dang lungs kar bsres te/ dkyil 'khor du lan drug chu sbyin srag byas na klu thams cad grang ba'i stobs byed pa dang/ sor ba dang kha ba'i bar la sogs pa thub
par 'gyur ro// gang gi tshe rgyar dgos par 'gyur ba de'i tshechar 'bebs so// sngatshil las klu'i gzugs tshad sor bzhi pa mgo lnga pa byas te/ gsang gyis g.yogs la stang gis dkar pos g.yog
te rtsa ba'i sngags lan stong bzlas pa byas la/ bum pa gsar pa ma spyad pa'i nang du bcug ste lus gos kyis dkri'o// rgyas gdab bo// ba'i lci bas dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa byas la dra
yos dang yungs kar gyis gtor l bdug pas bdug ste/ sngags 'di brjod par bya'o// bal po sakhu'angashang ga lcag ma la lan bdun bzlas te/ bum pa la dal bu
dal bus gzhus na ser ba thams cad bum pa'i nang du 'a'o'i// klu thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro// klu'i rgyal po'i gzugs spra tshil la byas pa la klu thams cad kyi ming bris na gang ga mang chags
rigs brjod pas klu de dbang du 'gyur te/ 'khor dang bcas pa bram ze'i gzugs kyis mdun na 'dug cing ci bsgo ba de thams cad byed do// klu'i rgyal pa smos can ma yin pa yul yongs su
mi skyong ba/ le tog dang 'bras bu chud gzen pa'i klu'i khyim du song ste/ shin tu khrus byas la gos dkar po gtsang ma bgos te rig pa lan li shu rtsa gcig brjod na/ klu'i khyim da nas bud med
rgan mo dag 'byung zhing/ rig pa 'dzan pa cu tshel zhes zer ba dang/ lan ma gdab par jo rdzas la brdab par bya'o// phaT ces bya ba brjod par bya'o// klu rgan mo de ngas nas shi'i sha'i zhes
zer zhing khyim du 'jug go/ de nas klu rnams 'dus te dngangs skrag ste/ khye'u'i gzugs su bsgyur nas rig pa 'dzin pa'i mdun du 'dug ste/ kye rig pa 'dzan pa ci zhig tshol/ rig pa 'dzin
pas sngar sngags brjod la/ khros pas bal po sa'a'ishang ga lcag ma sa la brdabs pa dang/ khye'u'i gzugs can de sa la 'gre ldog cing/ kya rig pa 'dzin pa ci zhig tshol zhes smra'o//
rig pa 'dzin pas song med par bya ste/ bskyel ba'i tshul bskyil ba dang/ 'di skad ces kye rig pa 'dzin pa bsgo ba thams cad gyid do// stsalo// de nas rig pa 'dzin pas 'di skad ces/
brjod do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam tshig srungs shig/ srung ngo/ rig pa ba dzin pas yang 'ad skad ces brjod do// dge ba bcu zung zhig/ 'dzan to// rig pa 'dzin pas yang gsum
la skyabs su gsol/ btang ngo// rjes su 'dzin to// rig pa 'dzin pa phur bu dbyung du gsol/ mi dbyung ngo// 'di skad ces brjod da/ dbazhin gshegs pa'i dam tshig bzlas pa rjes su/
zung zhig/ gdod phur bu dbyung ngo zhes bya'o// 'on kyang klu de 'khor dang bcas te gnyis la gtug go/ gsum la skyabs su 'gro bar bya ba dang/ dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rjes su sbyin par
bya'o// dam tshig rjes su 'dzin du gzhug go/ de nas gdod phul du phyung la de nyid du kha zas kyang byin dang klu thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro// rang ga khyam du 'jug pa bzhin du zhugashang las su bya
ba rnams ci 'dod pa bzhin du bya ba thams cad bsgo ba bzhin du byed par 'gyur ro// gang du btang ba der 'gro// bya ba thams cad byed par 'gyur ro// klu'i khyim der phyis klu ma bsran pa
mi 'byung ngo// dus dus su char gyi rgyun 'babs so// dus dus su lo tog sgrub bo// dar mi tog dang/ 'bras bu dang/ lo ma rnams sgrub bo// phyis gnod pa byed par mi 'gyur ro/
bklags pas 'grub pa'i gzungs chen po las thams cad la sbyar bar bya'o// las thams cad 'grub/ mchog 'grub pa/ bla na med pa'o// rtsa ba'i sngags kyi bya ba'i
cho ga dang bcas pa rdzogs so////de nas nam mkha' lding gi rgyal po des bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di
skad ces gsol to//btsem ldan 'das bdag gis klu thams cad kyi stong 'bar bar bgyid pa/ dus ma lags pa rlung dang/ snganadang/ sar ba thams cad zlog pa/ ma rtog dang
zla 'bras bu dang/ le tag thams cad sgrub pa/ sa'i rdul dang/ snying po dang/ byan 'phel bar bgyid pa/ rdzo'i mchu glog 'bar ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs brjod par bgyi na/ sams
can thams cad kyi re ba thams cad yongasaM su bskang ba'i slad du/ bcom ldan 'das de byin gyis brlung tu ba/sol/ da nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ nam mkha' lding ga da'ang po la 'di
skad ces bka' stsal te// nam mkha' lding gi bdag po rdo rjemachu zhes bya ba'i gzungs byin gyis brlabs to/ dbazhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
rgyas gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyad bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong dag gis kyang byin gyis brlabs kyis/ nam mkha' lding gi bdag po klu mi bsrun pa rnams tshar gcad pa'i phyi'i smos shage/ nga

[ra/]nas nam mkha' ldang ga bdag pos rdo rje mchu zhes bya ba'i gzungs 'ad smras so// na mo rat+na tra pa na mash+tsaN+Da badzra pA Na ye/ ma hAyak+Sha se nA pa ta ya/ na masdu le kya a d+hi pa ta ye/ na ma tsa turan
