gnyen la dga' ba'i sems kyi rnam rtog dag/ bzlog nas dge la bde bar gzhug par bya// dang po zlos nas bzlas ban bar dag tu// bram ze rgyal rigs rje'u rigs zhing pa dang// bud mong ma nang khye'u dang bu
modang// sngags 'chang nam yang smra bar mi bya'o// ci ste dgos pa yodan sngags g.yog dang// bzlas brjod zinanacung zad bar rgyu// sna nas lud pa bshang gci bor nas su/ chu yi nang du zhugs nas

zhus kyang// me tog dri bstod mar me phul ba dang// tshul khrims ban 'grusadaka' thub byas pa yi// dge ba de kun bla na med pa yi// sangs rgyas byang chub blan med pa bsngo// dper na chu klung rgya mtshor phyin
pan/ lanatsA'icor ni gcig tu gyur pa bzhin// de ltar bla med byang chub bsngos pa yi// bsod nams rgyal ba'i yon gcig tu 'gyur// par na skyes bu la las 'bras bu'i phyir// sA lu bskyed kyis sog
ma'i phyir min yang// sA lu red nas bsgrims pa mad par ni// sog ma'i phung po zhar la 'byung ba bzhin// de bzhin byang chub 'bras bu 'dod pa yi// bsod nams sgrub kyis longs spyod phyi yin yang//

gsoma'i phung po dag dang tshus par ni// ma bsgrims bzhin du ma la longs spyod 'grub// tshe ring ba 'di legs par thob pa dang// a bzhin sgrub pa'i sul dag redapa 'am// skyo ba chodabara'agyur zhinga'agro ba
yi// bsamab rnams rtag du rdzogs par bya// thugs dang ma grags rnyed dang ma red dang// bde dang sdugabasngal de bzhin bstod sar dag/ sems kyis 'jig rten tshogs rnams pa bcom ste// sdig pa'i gnas su
gyurapa spang bar bya// dper na rgya mtsho sad cig tsam yang na// mi yi'od ng lhatsag mi gnas ltar// de bzhin rnamartogasems kyis sdig byas pa// sngags bas gad cigatsang mang gnas bya// meranarlung

mod khang ba'inang dun// mar ma btsugs ba mi g.yo 'bar ba ltar/ rtse gcig sems kyis zlos la mngon dgapa'i// lus la chos kyang de bzhin 'bar bar 'gyur// stangs dngam tshong ba dang ni gar byengadang// glu len

rdza rdung skye dpyas 'gyur dang// lhag pa'i nga rgyal 'di dang don chen dang// rgyan pa dngan 'jus la lta 'dod dang// dus chen gnyid dang ma 'grub skya ba dang// bstan chos ngan dang snyan dngags klog 'donadang/ tshegs

dang 'tshog dang dregs dang rgyags pa dang// zhe la 'dzin dang le lo g.yo sgyu spang/ sha chang gi budang btsongadang sgog rdog dang// 'thumaratil dang la thugasur Na// 'byulo'i zas dang lha bshos gtor ma dang// chu lang

mchod byas gtor ma mi za 'o// ngas sngags pas kha zas dkar gsum dang// rtsa ba sdong bu 'bras butshod ma dang// nodang nas dang 'o ma mang dag dang// 'brum tshigs ma darab 'o kon dang/ thug par ni bza' btung
01/ yin par gsungs// sha za sen po dag dang gnon pa dang// lo yangs dang ni 'jig pas sgrub pa dang// lhaman bu mo'i 'khrul 'khor 'dzoms pa'its+tsha// 'bru mar tshigs ma'i bza' ba
mchog tu bsngags// de ltar bzlas brjod byed pa'i sgrub pa po// nyin gcig bzhin du byas nas bzlas pan/ 'phul nas cho ga bzhin du gshegs su gsol// nub mo ku sha bting nas nyal bar bya// byams pa

snying rje dga' ba btang snyoms ldan pa dang// bde gshogs chos dang dge 'dun bas pa dran bya ste// shAri'i bu dang nga la btud nas thal sbyar nyal// de ltar sngags pa'i sdig pa ma tho' dag zad par bya// 'phags
ba bung bzang gis zhus pa'i le'u gsum pa'o//sgrub posan nges par basang ba yi/ rdo rje de dag gang yin bshad par bya/ 2sol ban bcu gnyis bcu drug bco brgyad dang// mchog gi

tshad ni khor yang nyi shu 'o ]/gser gyi rdo rje rig 'dzin nyid dang ni gsa rnams thob par bya phyir rab tu shis// rgyal po'i don du dngul gyi mchog yin te// zangs kyi rin chen 'byung ba'i klu sgrub par// lha min dbang po'
'khrul 'khor gzhig pa dang// phug tu 'gro la rdoyardo rje 'o// don kun grub pa la lcags gsum gyi// gsang ba'i snga gzhom pa la lcags kyi 'o// gdon gzhan la ni seng lding dpal dang tshe// nad med/
mo rdzas lan bal ba 'o// gnod sbyin ma mosgrub la ma du shing/chos kyi don la a shAd las byas shes// gsal shing rtse mo'i dgra rnams gzhig pa la// ma rnams gsad pa la namedus kyi// shel las/

ba byas pa mag 'phrul chen po la// 'byor phyir 'jim pa las byas rab tu shes// gsad nang bsam pa bdud ye shang// sha zasgrub pa la yang rtag tu shes// lha dang gnod sbyin dri za sgrub pa la [） ]/sgron shing

lasan byas pa'i rdo rdzo'o// ci ste kun dbang du byed 'dod na// de tshe klu shing rtsa b.las byas pa'o// gzugs bsgyur ba yis las byas pa ste/ rolangs sgrub pa lan kadam pa'o'abun ka dang radz+dza an dang/

ashwa shang gi rdo rje nor gyi phyir// glu ba a ma bri bskyab yi// ardzu la sogs pa las byas pa dag/ ma rnams g.yul lasargyal bar bya phyir ro// yid du 'ong ba'i 'dod pa thob bya'i phyir// tsan dan dukar

pa dang nadamar po ste// dbyibs legs 'jam zhing ma nyams rma med pa'i// rdo rjertsa lnga sra ba bcang bar bya// dang po zlos tshe de ni thogs nas su// bzlas brjod zin nas chung ba kho nar yang// dang pa'i
sems kyis phyag byas dri sogs kyis// mchod nas rdo rje rgyal ba zhabs drung gzhag/ nga yarigs kyi gsang sngags sgrub pa pos// rdo rje med na 'grub par mi 'gyur ro// de las gcig kyang red par ma gyur
na/ khu tshur bcangasanas rtsa gcig sems kyis bzlas// ldong ros gi'u wang ral gyi a dza na// sbang ma ba bla zhags pal khri btsag/ mar dang shu dga' khor lo rdo rjem dud pags pa go cha mdung rtse
gsum pa// rdzas ni bcu bdun bsgrags pa re rnams kyis/ grub pa rnam pa gsum rnams thob par byed// rang sngags cho ga lhag par bshad pa gang// der yang grub pa rnam pa gsum du mthong/
ba/ @#// bgegs dang log 'dren grub par ma dga' ba// rig pa'i tshog sa rnams kyi mdunanargyu/ rig 'dzani brtson pa'i bdag nyid can dag la// rnam pa sna tshogs glags skabs tshol zhing
rgyu bgegs kyi rigs ni rnam pa bzhi yod de// sa stengs dag nu 'bod pa'i bgegs rnams ni// rnam par 'jig dang wa dang ne'u le dang// de bzhin so gcig pa dang ragasa rnams bzhi// de dang de las
'phros pa mtha' yas so// sa stengs 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi gang yin 2/ de dag g.yog 'khor mya ngan med pa yin// de yi g.yog 'khor bye ba phrug bdun rnams// de dag gsang sngags sgrub la
zhibagegs byed do// wa yi gsan bye ba bco brgyad dag/ dbang phyugachen po'i 'khor te de rnams kyi// sde dpon glang chen gdong ste stobs po che/ sa stongs mtha' dag kun tu bgegs kyang byed// so
gcig dags kyi sde dpon gtsug 'tshang ste/ 'bye ba drug cu'i bgegs la dbang sgyur zhing// tshangs dbang khyab 'jug nyam zla brlung// de rnams kyis bshad sngags la bgegs byed do// ne'u le'ingags

gang yin pa rgya che ste// khrag khrig bye ba ther 'bum phrag stong dang// de dag rnamaMs kyi sde dpon gtsugan 'byung/ gang yarigs dang sngags la bgegs byed do// dga' byed pad+ma 'dra bar dkyusarang mag/

lnga rtse sngags rgyud la ni bgegs kyang byed// nor skyong bu ni gang yin gang pa pha// rang gi rigs kyi rgyud la bgegs kyang byed// sgrub pa po la 'byor par ma dga' ba// brtsi med rang rang rigs la bgags
byed do// rang gagasang sngags gzugs sum sbrul nas// 'phreng ba dang ni gtor ma mngon du len// lha yi log 'dren gyis byas de mthong nas// khros shing 'khrugs nas phyir yang phyogs par 'gyur//
sngonachad sems ni 'dzungs dang gnong pa'i phyir/ lha yis log 'dren bgegs kyi lugs 'di ston// lugs 'di lha dang klu dang grub pa dang// sum cu rtsa gsum lhas kyang bzlog mi nus// bgegs
kyis 'jigs su rung bar byas pa dag/ sngar bshad pas de dag zlog par byed// bzlas brjod zin nas legs par bsrung ba dang// dkyil 'khor mang byas bsgrub la 'jug par bya// gzhan du mchod pa
cho gamed pa dang// bzlas brjod sbyin sreg cho bral ba 'am// gang zhigartag du sems na 'di ltar sams// dge ba gang zhig bdag gis bzlas pa bya// yul dang rgyal tshogs gtam la chags pa de'i
khum la thogs pa med par rab tu 'jug/ 'di ltar bamtshan du ni 'gro ba na// rig pa 'dod pa'i sems dag g.yeng bar byed// dbaran rlu nang grib ma snang ba ltar// de bzhin mi yi lus la 'jug par 'gyur/
'khru tsho gzhan la zlos pan yang gzhan// nyal na gzhan gyi ma tog bdug pa dang// mar ma dbul ba'i tshe na'ang gzhan yin la// sbyin sreg byed na yang bgags gzhan 'jug/ dper na nye zer ma shel
khabab pa yi// rkyen gyis ma bsgrims ye 'byung ba ltar/ de bzhin bgegs kyang lus la zhugs gyur na// 'dod chagasam chen kun tu skyod par byed/ 2g.yo zhing 'gul ba zhes ni bya ba'i bgegs/
tshunang skyes bu 'khrud pa'i tshon 'dzin// bkres shing lus la snyoms shing gnyid kyang che// de bzhin lus lca mchog du khro bar 'gyur// de bzhin dra wa zhes ni bya ba'i bgegs// de ni
dri dbul ba na lus la 'jug/ yul dang rgyal po gnyen dang nor laams// snyoms shing bud med dag la chags par 'gyur nagapo lus che sa ni brtol nas su// bdug pa rab tu 'bul ba'i tshan 'jug
sh+tsa 'jungs dang g.yosgyu byed cing mi bsun la// 'dod chen che la rab ga dum khuchur 'dzag/ mar me gtsug phud gcig pa bgegs byed do// snying khar tsha zhing gzer thabs soms nyams byed// 'greng ba'i
tshan gtsug 'phyang 'jug 'gyur te// rims dang 'khrug skyags drag pos 'debs par byed/ ma tog 'bul tsho ma togacher bkod pa// gang gi gnas skabs rnyed nas lus la 'jug/ rims dang cham
'apa lus tshegasan ba dang// grogs po dag dang rnam par 'brel bar byed// bgegs kyis brlabs pa phyogs namam min lam du ma'ong// sbyod pa sna tshogs byed rung 'dod chags rnams kyis gdungs//
glo bur smra zhing klog 'don med kun tu 'phyan// don du sgrub rnams la sems kyang yang gnyis byed// sems ni log par lta bas non pas na// gsang sngags med cing mtho ris lha la med//
bsod nams med cing sdig pa cung zad med// thar patshod cing 'chi ba'i rgyu yang med// skye bo don med nyon mongs dka' thub ces// sna tshogs bkyal pa'i tshig 'di rtag tu smra// sen mos rtswa gtso
ka bong rdo 'jig pa dang// mtshan mo so yang theg thag 'char ba dang// bu mo bdag 'dod khyod ni mard cing// skyes pa bdag 'dod chung ma gzhar mared// dgos pa'i don ma 'grub cing me dwagos 'grub//gang

yang 'agro dgos gnyis med ma yang bar m// de bzhin stag gzigs seng ge khyi dang phag/ bong bu sngas bya la sha za wa3 'byargod 'ug ba skyang tshomi'u thung sbrul// gcer bu thala'atshacan dang mi nag po/ 'khon skam

thod parus gong phung po dang// lcags dang rdo chung mi gtsang kha shul dang// kha bzhin bsgyur zhing ral gri mdung thogs pa// lam 'di rnams s pa'i mi yang brlams// bgegs dang log 'dren rnam par gzhag
pa'i phyir// bdung rtsa b+hab sbyor drag shul lasacan sbyar// sngag pa de yis gsang sngagasaM lam zhugs pa// bgegs dang log 'dren rnams kyis yongam tshugs// phyugs lhas shang gcig lha yi khang
pa'i m// lam gyi bzhi mdo'am khang stonganags tshal du// dkyil 'khor gru bzhi lham pa khru bzhi'i tsad/ tshon rtsi rnam pa sna tshogs dag gis bris// phyogs kyi lha rnams gnas ni yongs su gzung// sgo

bzhi pa la kushA'i rtswa yang dgram/ de bathab 'dzasha tshang la phug la sogs bcas// 'brasangan 'bras bu mang po'i gtor ma sbyin// bum pa pad dmar po'i mdog 'dra ba// nag po'i ri med cing rin chen baa/
sman dang 'bru dang sbos chus bkang ba bzhi//ldum bus khabakang ras kyis mgul pa dkri/ lus dmar po dang ki li ka la dang// 'gro lding ba la sogs pas brgyar bzlas te/ dkyil 'khor khor yug
tu na gzhag par bya// de nas byugs bdug spos la sogs dbul// bgegs kyis brlams pas shar phyogs kha bstan te// dkyil 'khor dbus su bde ba'i stan la gzhag
bzlos brjod byas shing thum ba re res bkrus// 'on kyang log 'dren rnams las thar bar 'gyur// sgrub pa po yi ming ni 'ba' zhig pa/ 3bgegs rnams gzhig phyir phan par ma zad kyi// rgyal po'i 'khor dang

ts+tshA bud med bud med dang// bum dag dang rol momakhan rnams dang// bud med phal dang tshong pa rnams kyang rung// 'jipa rnams dang dbul zhing 'phongs par ng/ gdon gyis zin cing dmas kyis btab pa dang//
bus pa'i gdon dang me tog 'bras bu 'phrog/ rmilam sbyong dang sems g.yeng ba dang// dug kyang sel te khrus 'dis dag par byed// 'phagasapa dpung bzang gis zhus pa'i le'u bzhi pa'o//
bgegs kyis bsod namasam lus zad par byed// de bsam la gsang sngags 'grub mi 'gyur// ji ltar zla ba sprin las rnam grol ltar// de bzhin bgegs las grol ba rnam par gsal// dper

nas niu dusa rnams bral ba yi// snod gnas 'bras bu me togamyu gumed// de dang ma bral myu gu lo ma dang// sdong bu dag dang me tog 'bras bu skye// chog nyams shang yi ge gug skyed med// mchod pa med cing

mi gtsang bzlas brjod byas/ dgug skyed yi ge lhag par gyur pa yis// gsang sngags dngos grub rgya chen mi ster to// dper na dbyar gyi dus na charany+dzan dag/ skye bo'i skal bzhin char pa legs par 'bebs/
ba de bzhin mi yi skal ba bzigs nas ni// 'dod pa bzhin dugasang sngags dngos grub stsol// yul dang dus dang cog las rnams dang// lhagapa 'byang zhing bsod nams bsags pa dang// gus dang bzlas
brjod kun la gzugs nas ni// de dag gsang sngags 'bras bu rnam par so// ji tsam sdig pa mang pos lab gang zhing// ji tsam las dkar bsod nams ma bsags dang// dza srid cho ga med par 'bras
byas pas// de srid sngags pas dngos grubami 'thob bo// cho gtams sam bar tshad sngags gzhan bzlas// bam ba btangangam gzhan la byin gyur na// dus gsum machod pa la ni brtson byas nas//
slar yang 'bum bzlas bsgrub la 'jug pa bya// stong phrag btsu'am brgyad dam bdunas bzhi/ bzlas mthar de la mar gyi sbyanasrag bya/ 2yang nam rgyugs nas sam tel nag gam// yungs kar
maradang bsus pa'i sbyin srogabya// 'dzam bum du blugasha pa la sha/ ]u dum seng ldeng h+phad mabo mar// smad a sho ka dang rats+tsha ka/ glo bel ba arba sha'i ma yi//yam shing gzhon nu sor ni bcu
gnyis pa// btsal nas zho mar sbrang rtsi la btagasanas// rtag tu lo la spyanasrog bya bar bya// de ltar byas na dngos grub myur du 'thob// gzhan gyi gsang sngags kyis kyang gsangasngags gang
bcad dam bcings am mnan par gyur kyang rung// de yi gzugs brnyanas las byas nas su// nga ya zhabs drung mngon du phyogs bzhag ste// sngagasapas ka la ki la sogs snying pos// mar dang 'o mas/
lus gzugs khananA bkru// de ltar zhag bdunabyas pas gsang sngags drug/ bcings pa dang nimanan las grol bar 'gyur// mchodapa lasogs tshe gang ldan yang ni// ci
gsang sngags 'bras bu ma stor na/ de yi gzugs drug sku tshes byugs nas su// kili ka la 'gro ldang la sogs pas// sngags kyis rdo la yus mar tsha sbyar bas// zhag bdun dus gsum spyan

rgyusrog las byas nas// gsang sngags 'gas masams rtsis/srog las byas nas// gsang sngags 'ongs nas rmi lam dgatun/ cho ga nyams pa'i m yi gi lhag chad ston// sngon ni gsang sngags lugs 'chang bstan mod kyi// ji ltar rgya mtsho dus las
gtsang dang gcad pa nam yang m byed do// dper na byams pa'i m yasamags lamtha nga gzhan la ta ge mo ya khyim 'ad phyin chang khyod// rab gsaugs/
blta ba'i pa'i yang 'gro bar ma bya'o zhes// rigs pa'i tshigs gis rnam par bstan pa dang// des kyang de yi tshig de mnyananas sru// khyim du smra dang blta phyir ma 'gro ba'i// de bzhin gsang sngags

gang yang rung ba'i sngags/ 'bazlas pas gzhan gyi gsang sngags mnan mi byu/[” ]/gsang sngags gsar dang 'atsang ba mi bya zhing// yi ge lhag ma gsang sngags ma sbyin no// lasa rnams spyad ng gzhan du bsgyur
bas ma bya/ gnam rnams gzir ba nam yang mi bya'o// dbab dang bcang dang brdeg dang rmongs bya dang// yan lag ma gzhig rigs kyang ma brlagacing// sngags pas klu dang gdon la sogs pa rnams M//
gzhan du bskrad pa nam yang m bya'o// dgaradang bsad pa dang mi gsad pa dang// byis pa gdon gyis zin pa mi gso zhing// rgyal mo samada'aA dang mtshol bu yis// sems can gnod pa nam yang
ma bya'o// dngos grub phyir ni rnam pa bcur gsungs te// sngags pa dang na ring sngags g.yog dang rdzas// brtson 'grus phyogs dang sa gzhi dus dang ni// yan lag rdzogs pa'i lha dang sems stobs
so/ gzhan dag kha cig raga'adzani grogs shes zer// gzhan dag phyogs dang brtson 'grus dus rnams nyid// gzhan ni rdzas dang gzhi lha dang sngags// khams gsems stobs yin zhes rnam par

bsgrub phyir de ltar bcu dang brgya dang lnga// de bzhin bzhi dang gsum dngagatsag nyid ces/ sngagasarag rang rang blo yis rnam par 'chad// sangs rgyas rgyud la cho ga gnyis kyis 'grub// sgrub ba gang zhig

rang gi yon tan rdzogA/ brtsonagus martog dang yang dag ldan pa dang// gzhan gyis rnyed pa drag la phrag dog med// 'dod la ma chag lus kyi nyon mongs brjod// gug kyang klang ko tshang ba zur phyin la/
gsang sngags dgacashani tu cho gar bcas// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' bstan pa yas/ ]gnasau bsan yid 'ong dngos grub thob// jiltar dgas dbang po bkris pa dag/ mthu stobs

chen pos glang chen gsod pa dang// de bzhin sbyang ka phag dang 'degs dag/ wa rnams kyang namyur du gar sodapa ltar// de bzhin sngags pa seng ge 'i tshul gyisazhu// rab dang 'bring dang thama'i las rnams la

[j]@#// brtson 'grus chen po dang ni ldan pa dang// 'bad pa'i mchog rnams kyis kyang bstan par bya// rdza rnga'i sgra dang dung rnga'i sgra dan// shin tu 'jigs byed skye bo'i sgra dag dang// gur rgyangs spyag

glu dag drang glu gar dang// gling bu pa wang rtswa rdza chen po'i sgra bya bran sna tshogs sgyu dang chu sgra dang// bud med rgyan gyi sel khrol snga rnams dang/ sham+b+ha tsha grang rlung gis gnod pa ya ]/ma ya sems sna
g.yeng zhing g.yo bar byed// bzlas brjod byed tshe ma myur ma dil zhing// sgrachen mi 'byungahatsang chung ma'ang min// smra bzhin ma yin gzhan du g.yengs bzhin in// chug kyang klad kor tshog rnams
nyams par man// ji ltar chu klung nyin mtshan rtag tu ni// rgyun mi 'chad par 'bab par 'gyur ba ltar// de bzhinaphyag bcas bzlas dang brtul zhugs kyis// bsod nams lus can la ni
'phel bar 'gyur// lo la 'dod chags mi dgar ldan pa'i sems/ gang nas gang du g.yeng zhing rgyu ba dag/ de dang de nas myur du bzlog nas ni// gsang sngags yi ge mchod la legs par sgrub/
sna rtsor lta zhing rnam par rtog pa spong// nam zhig bskyod kyang rnam par ma g.yo ba// de tshe dmags lo gnas ba thob pa ste// sems molas su rung bar 'gyur bar nges// rtse gtsag sems dang lda
pa'i mi la ni// yid las 'byung ba'i dga' ba rab tu skyo// dga' bas lus shin tu sbyadwapa 'thob// lus sbyangs pas na bde ba'i skal ldan 'gyur// lus bde rtse gcig soms dang ting 'dzin gyis//
de tsha bzlas brjod dogs pa med pa 'gyur// tshe bas gzhan du gang dang gang byas pas// sdug pa ma lus bzlos brjod byas pas 'byar// bzlas byas sdig pa ma lus byang gyur na// dang ba'i yid kyis dngos
grub rdzob par 'gyur// de phyir bcom ldan rgyal ba'i dbang po yis// chos 'ad kun gyi rtsa ba sems zhes gsungs//samasan dang bas lha mi'abadeb dang// mtho ris dang ni byang grol thob par 'gyur/
sems kyi skyon gyis dud 'gror skye ba dang// sems dmyal bsadatsang ma sdug dbul bor 'gyur// sems ni rab tu dang bar 'gyur ba'i yis// sa chu me rlung sbyargan 'chi sogs// radang
tha mar gnod pa kun bral ba// rnam grol bde zhing zhib thob par 'gyur// gsang sngags dngos kun kun dang thunamong dang// bde ba chung zhingesdug bsngal brgya dang 'brel// nyon mongs dug bcas
rnam par 'jig par 'gyur// dang ba'i sems kyis thob par 'gyur ba An/ 'dod rgyal las las ma byung dus lasaman/ rang bzhin dbang phyug las kyang 'byung bzhin// rgyu med can
min skyes bus ma byas kyang// las dang nyon mos pa las sems can 'byung// gzugs ni 'byung ba chen po bzhi dang ldan/ den bdagaman bdag kyang gzugasam yin// gzugs la
bdag med bdag la gzugs med de// gzugs stong pa'o phung bzhi'apharag bar gyis// gzugs debu ba dag pa 'dra ba ste// tshor ba chu bur bzhin du rtag pa med// de ltar mthong ba lta
[d ]@#// ba bzang pa yin// gang zhig gzhan gyur de ni lta ngan gsungs// de ltar zlos pa'i gsang sngags skye gyur na// mtshan mo nyal na rmi lam 'ad dag mthong// khang bzang ljon

shing rgyal mtshan seng ge rta// ri bo shang rtswasgra ldan sbyin dang glu// stag rung bas dwang glang chen khyu mchog la// rmi laman na dga' bas zhen pa dang// me tog 'phreng ba spos drang dri rnams dang// sha chang

tshe[” ]nya dang 'bras bu glegs bam dang// lha ya gzugs dang urngul mang po dang// shing rta gang bar Mm ba gzhon bo'u phrul can/ gdugs dkar rnga yab lham dang ral gri dang// bsal yab gser yu man dang
'phreng ba dang// nor bu mu tig nya phyis dung dang dngul// cud med gzugs bzang yang 'ong bu mo dang// rin chen sna tshog sa rnams kyis smras pa'i rgyan// mal stan dkar po btang ba red pa dang// blo

rangs khar ni chu bo chu klung dang// 'babachub margya mtsho dang ni rdzong bu dang// lum la ni 'thung ngam rgyalarma dang// de bzhin khrag gis lus khrus byed pa 'am// lha khang mchod rten 'dug nas rgyal ba'i gzugs//
byang chub sems dpa' mchog dang rang sangs rgyas// zag med dge 'dun dgeslong dge slong ma// dge bsnyen rnams dang sa bdag lha rnams dang// mchod gnas bram ze yid 'ong skyes bu dang// me dang ma

ma mchog phyug cing 'byor dang bu// pham mdza' bshes gnyen dang gnod sbyin dang// grub pa'i lha dang mchung tshogs rnams dang// ji snying nyes zla ba za ba dang// sa yi nang 'gro sa bon 'thung ba dang//

[d ]me la rdza zhing shan za ba dang// lus kyi nang nas bud med zhugs pa mthong// rmi lam bzang po 'di dag mthong ba gang// dad dang por ma thogs grub par 'gyur// zla ba gcig dang zla phyed nyin zhag dang//
skad cig gis ni phyi phyir nye bar 'gyur// 'phags pa dpung bzang gis zhus pa'i le'u lnga pa'o// dngos grub nye na zlos la dga' ba dang// sams nanam yang sdug la dga' mi

'gyur// bkres skom tsha grang rlung dang ngal ba yi// sdug bsngal drag pos nyen kyang g.yo mi 'gyur// sbrang bu sha sbrangasmin bu glog sdur dang// sdig sbrul rkang brgya pa dang sbrul dang dred// sha za srul po
rnams kyang de dag gi/ lus dang grib ma la na mi 'gong ngo// tshig ni bzung bar 'os shing yid gzhungs la// snyan dngags dang ni dri ba rnams la mkhas// chos la mngon dga' rten rnams mthong ba dang///
lus kyi nad dang dri ma med par 'gyur// skye bos mthong ngam thos par gyur kyang rung// myur du mno dga' yid du 'ongs bar 'gyur// bud med 'dod lha'i mdangs 'phrog pa rnams kyis// 'dod lha'i long
spyod phyir na 'bod par 'gyur// gangatshe mkhas pas lha dang gnod sbyin dang// dri ba lha yi bu mo'i gzugs dang sgra/ shAms na dga' ba'i yid kyis mthong thosan// de tshe shin tu nye bar gyur ba yin//
lus ni dri med dag par rig pa dang// gso sbyong sdom pa tan ldan pa yis// nyin zhag gcig gam gnyis sam gsum du ni// kho zas spang 'dze smyung bar gnas pa yis// nyin zhag de dag 'das par
[d, g ]/byas nas su// rang gi 'byung phyir bsgrub la 'jug bar bya// gsung de dpung bzang gis thos par gsol pa// zas kyisam 'jug ces sngar gsungs pa dang// mchod 'os khyod
kyis lus dag bgyi phyir mang// ci spar sbyang ba ma bzad bgyi bar gsus// srid pa'i mthar phyin bde bar gshegs pa yis// shing rta'imag bsku'i bza' ba'adzaci phyir gsungs// rdo rje can gyis
ts+tsa dpung bzang tshagi gsan nas/ brug sgra zubro 'dra'i gsung gis bka' stsal pa// bu gtsagro lus dgabya phyir sbyang bya khar// bde gshegs 'dzin nam yang ma gsung yang// lus 'dim gtsang pags pa

sha khraganang// klad rgyas mamache mchanamakhal ma zhag/ mkhris pa bad kan khu chu phyis dang// gson stobs ba lha sku dang nus pa dang// mag dang rna ba sna dang kha dang ni// gang sgo mtshan dang bu
ga dgu pa yi// rma nas dri mo sna tshogs mi gtsang ba// 'dzagapa'irgyunani rtag tu 'byung ba yin// de ltar yan lag thamaso cad 'dus pa dang// sa chu me rlung nam mkha' rnams dang ldan// ji bzhin
las kyi rjes 'brang ma la lus// thams cad ldan pa'i gzugs la gnas pa yi// bshang b.rulcabs dang mchil ma bad kan dang// 'di dag zad par bya phyir sbyang bar gsungs// dri ma zad nas ma ya
lus dag tu// rang gi 'byor phyir bsgrub la bde bar 'jug/ 'dod chags kyis ni gdungs par gyur na yang// lus kyi yan lag 'di dag thams cad la// dran pa tsho gcig mngon du byas nas ni//
ye shes mag gis so sor rnam par brtag/ de ltar gang gis nges par brtags pa na// lus dang srog larjes suchags pa yi// 'dod chags tshud nas yong ye zha gyur te// nyi mas mun nag
gtan nas bsal ba bzhen/ phan yon de yis gsang sngags nye bsnyenanas/ rang gi lus la nye bar rig pa dang// yar gyi tshes brgyad dang ni bcu bzhi 'am// yang na bcol la ni bzlas
brjod bya// lha yi gnas kyi sa dag bstar ba'i phyed// sa dang lci bsres pa la sogs pas byug/ dad pas bde gshegs kun la 'phreng ba dang// lha bshosam tog dri dang mar mas
mchod[） , ]/de nas rdo rje 'dzin pa nga la mchod// dunas rang sngags lha la dbul bar bya// bstod 'os sangs rgyas rnams la'ang bstod nas su/ phyir zhing byang chub sems kyang dran byas te//
sems can skya rgan 'chis gzir ba la// ji ltar rigs par snying rje'ang bsgom par bya// 'dus chen mad sde bklag pa'i m bkrashis kyi// tshegasau bcang pa'i m chos kyi 'khor lo mchog/ de bzhin/
gshegs pa'i gsang ba'am sgronam che/ gang yang rung ba gcig ni rim bzhan bklag/ de nas bla 'og phyogs rnams bcanges nas su// lus la go cha bgo bar byas nas ni// gong du smos pa'i dkyil

'khor de rnams las// gtsag tsagatshon rtsi rnams kyis bri bar bya// rdo rjemi chu rlung dang mdung thung dag/ rim bzhin dkyil 'khor 'dir ni bri bar bya// ra bar bris la lha dang lha min dang// sdang ba'i
[p ]'a@#// bdag nyid sems ni myos par 'gyur// seng ge 'i gdan gyis mngon par bsngags pa'i stan// de nadakyil 'khor dbus su gzhag par bya// bdag nyid bsrung ba byas te der 'dug
nas// rdzas blangs nyung du bzlas brjod byas nas ni// bdug pa'i sbyin sreg stong yang sbyin sreg bya// de nas de na drichus bkrus nas su// bgegs mang rnams kyang rab tu bsal byas nas//
byang chub shing lo gsum gyi stang du gzhag/ bzhi yas bkab nas ji sur grub pa ni// rnam gsum mthong ga bar du gsang sngags bzlas// drod dang dud 'thul me bzhin 'bar ba 'am// rim bzhin
zlag naas 'byung na'ang grub par gsungs// rlobs 'gro ba thams cad dbang gyur te// dud pa 'thul bas lus na mi snar 'gyur// 'bar bas mkha' la shin tu 'gro 'gyur te// mi yi lus ni lha
ltar gsal bar 'gyur// ji ltar lus la grang ba 'jug pa dang// ji ltar mngal du dri za 'jug pa dang// nyi zer meshel zhugs nas ma 'byung ltar// de bzhin dngos grub lus la 'jug par 'gyur/
mar ma mchod cashin tu 'bar ba dag/ snum zhing dkyus ring gser gyi mdog ltar dang// 'brumar zad kyaT 'bar bar gyur na ni// de tshe sngags pas dngos grub thob 'gyur te// de dag rjes las byang
ba'i dngos grub bo// mas na ri mo'i sku gzugs 'gul ba 'am// 'phreng ba nam mig dang rnga yab bam// gal te rgyan rnams g.yo bar gyur pa 'am// mkha' las me togachar ram dzi char 'babagaM
[w]ni myur du g.yo bar gyur pa 'am// lus na snang bar mkha' las tshig du na// bu gtsug rnam pa 'dod skyongs shig ces// lha yi rdza sku'am lus kyi bskyaljang// rgyan gyi char chen ng du 'bab pa 'am/
tsaste mkha'al lha dang lha min dang// gsang sngags gzugs ni mngon du mthong na 'grub/ dam nyam me togadabyig dang chu bsres shing// bstod dang btsal bar mchod yon rgyun sbres nas// rtsa gcig
sems kyis mgo btud phyag byas te// dad dang 'bad pa'i rjes mthun mchog blung ngo// mchog zlob nas ni dga' bas phyag byas te/ dad pas bstod cing mchod yon phul nas su// gsang sngags
brjod tsang phyir yang gshegs su gsol// gsang sngags kun la tshulan 'di yin no// gang zhig sems stobs mchog tu ldan pa de// 'dir ni 'jigs dang bcas pa'i las bya'o// sayas stobs chung/
ba'i mi la sha za mas// glags mthong nas ni phung bar 'gyur// dpa' bo ge bgos mtshon cha'i thabs makhas pa// chos pa'i glang chen mchog zhon gzhu thogs nas// mda' 'phen mthu dang ldan pa gcig
bus kyang// dgra yi tshogs kun las ni rgyal par nus// de bzhin sems stobs chen po'i tshul khrims kyis// go bgos legs bsrungs glang chen zhon nas su// gsang sngags gzhu thogs bzlas
brjod mada' 'dzeban pas// 'byung po la sogs mtshan mo rgyu las rgyal// myur po'am yan lag lhag chad thung ngu dang// de bzhin rang po'am yang na sbom po 'am// smad pa'i mngal las skyes pa'i m
ma ning ngam/ rnam pa de 'dra'i ro dag spang bar bya'o// ma zhu ba dang rims drag tshad pa dang/ 'khru skyug bcanges dang chu dang gsal shing dang// sbrul gyis bsadadam dug gis shi ba'am//
bad kan rlung sogs mthong chen bsad pa la// yan lag tshang zhing kha snam smad pa// lus la rnamed skyes pa'i ro mthongonas// rdul gyi brtson lag na thogs pa yis// nyin par thog thag tu
rgyun bsrung bar bya// dur khrod khang stong dang shang gcig dang// bzhimado'am 'bab chu dag gi chu klung ngam// mtsho'am rgya mtsho 'am ni ri bo la// skad cig gis kyang ro las 'grub par 'gyur//
gang yang rung ba'i gnas gcig brtags naas ni// mdang lci ba la sogs byug par bya// gtsang ma deng nadakar nag dmar po 'am// tshon tshe sna tshogs rnams kyis dam tshig bre// gong du smos pa'i
dkyil 'khor de rnams las/ sems nas 'dod par gang yang rung ba zhig/ dad pa chen pos rigs kyi yum gyi mchog/ zlos shing rab tu bsgrims te bri bar bya// 'jig pa med pa'i g.yog gis de
blangs nas/ 'khyer de 'ongs nas kusha'i steng bzhagaste// skra dang kha spu rnams kyang bregs byas nas// de yi mod la 'brumaradag gis bsku/ de nas bum pa zhabs mi gnagapa bzhi// gtsang ma'i
nus bkang khrus rjes sbyar te bkru// de nas gos gsar phrugs gcig bskon nas u// de nas dkyil 'khor dbusau tshwa stan dang// ma nyams me tog steng du rtogazhag cing// ro yamago bo shar ram
tha byang du bstan// dri mas byug ring bdug pas bdug par bya'o// 'phrang ba bdags shing me tog sil mas gter// sha dang nya sha mar khu til bsus pa'i// 'khur ba la sogs ji snyed bungs bskyod de//

'byung po klu dang sha za gnod sbyin dang// 'dre la bla 'og phyogasausbyin par bya// grogs bomadog ldan bdag nyid bsrung bya ste// rtse gcig sems kyis gsang sngags bzlas brjod bya// ro ni ltang du nye ba'i
tshon na// 'jigs pa'i gzugs can bgagasan sna tshogs 'byung// gtsug tor rgyal po'i sngags kyis thal ba 'am// ma grugs yus kar sogs la bsngags nas su// gtor na phyogs bzhi
d gnas 'ongs pa'i bgegs// gsang sngags mthu las de dag 'byer bar 'gyur// de dag zhi bar byaphyir khro bon// bdud rtsi thab sbyor drag shul las can sbyar// bgegs rnams bcom pas de
nasa'o de yang// gsang sngags mthu yis myur du ldang bar 'gyur// gang zhig gsang sngags cho ga zhib mo las// mthong ba de ni dogs mdu nges par 'grub// gal te ro de langs par gyur pa las//
de la gsang sngags cho gami shes na'ang// gsang sngags gzhan du bstan pa'i cho ga yis// langs pa de la rang ga dngos grub blang// gter gyi phyogs dang phug tu 'gro ba dang// phal gyi any+dzabazhon
pa mngag gzhugadang// 'byung khungs gser 'gyur rtsa dang bcud kyis len// mkha' la 'gro ba'i dngos grub rab tu ster// srung ba'i stobs med sngags kyi stobs med dang// dka' thub stobs
med sems stobs med pa yi// blo zhan gang zhig ro las dngos grub tshel// de na mtshan mo rgyu ba rnams kyis bsad// 'phags pa dpung bzang gis zhus pa'i le'u
drug pa'o/ ma gangam sha ni 'tshong 'dodadis// mar gyi ngo la dur khrod song nas su// shang rdo mtshon dang dug dang dbyug to snyan// bgegs la sogs pas bar
gyur pa yi// byin pa'i m brgya dang mgo dang skye dag dang// 'jigs pa med pas mtshan mo blangs nasasu// gtubs te skon bu'am gyi dus gsar pa'i m// gtsang ma der na mi nyung gzhag
par bya// lus la khrag gis lag rjes bris nas su/ 'tshams mgo dang mgrin pa dkri bar bya// lus la ma lags gsar pa bgos nas kyang// lag ga yo shas bkang gyo me do thogs
nas// khrag gso bsus pa'i ral gri lag g.yas kyis// rab tu bsgrims nas de ni thogs nas kyang// sgra cher 'bod cung tshig dug 'di dag/ khyed cag su zhig nyo bar byed 'dod
cis// shar dang byang dang lho dang nub phyogasau// myur du bskor zhingashan tu brjod par bya// tsa lus n snang ngam ma snang bar/ tshig gis khyod na nor ram rag pa 'am// bcud kyi
len pa'i m grong ngam rgyal srid dam// phug tu 'gro 'am ci 'dod ces zer na// lngar na gang zhig sems kyis bsams pa'i don// de nyid sna zhing gzhan du smra ma bya// rig pa mang pos
bstan pa'i dur khrod 'dir// don 'di la phyir sdug bsngal drag pa yis// bdag kyang gdungs bzhin 'ongs kyi 'di zheng na// yod nasha 'dir khyer la bdag la byin// ci lta sang la bcal te
ma gang na// rang gisha yis de ni dwagang bar bya// gal te dur khrod 'di ni stong paste/ nor med bu khyod gzhan du song zhig ces// mtshan mo rgyu bas de skad bsgo na ni// de la bdag ni gang du
'gro zhes dri// lan thob de ni rang gis brtags nasasu/ sha de bor nas de nas 'gebar bya// sho yi cho ga ngas gsungs de dgan// gsong sngags ma bzlas pas ni bstaname bya//
dga mchog gtsug tor stobs chen la sogs pas// dur khrod du na srung bar ngas gsungs so// gsang sngags drag pos gang zhig sha za ba// de la dur khrod mi sha'i sbyin sreg bya// ral gris
sor gnyis sor gsum tshad tsam du// gtubasanas mo la sbyin sreg stong bya'o// me togam nyams 'bras yos sha khrag nya/ ]chang dang sbrang ma bu ramtshan dang til// bdug pa 'brang ba mang lo
byug pa can// lha bshos gar mdur khrod gtor bar bya// dbab dang bskyed dang gnyis kyis myos bya dang// dmag gzhom grong khyer phung bar bya ba la// ba za ma mo drag mo'am srin mo'i
tshogs/ gnod sbyin rnams la sha yi sbyin sreg bya// ma shan rnyed par ma gyur na// ba langasha a sbyin srogade bzhin shas// ma he'i sha'am khyishamar bsres la// tshes grangs dag
la sbyang byas sbyin srag bya// gnod sbyin mo ya cho ga zhib mor ni// gsang sngags mnyes byas grub pa 'di rnams ltar// ma dang smyugam sku mo grogs mo dang// bu mo chung ma mna'
mar grub par 'gyur/ ma dang skyagamo srum gang yin de// yidibazhirin chen bzhin du grub pa mchog/ yid 'ong grogs mo bu mo grub pa 'brang// chung ma mna' ma grub pa tha mar bsgrags// dus gsum
ts+tsa/ du nam tog 'phreng ba dri// mararam 'bru mar maram tsan dan dang/ ]a kar dri zhim bdug pas mchod pa dang// gtor ma sna tshogs rtag tu mtshan ma sbyin// gnod sbyin mon dga' nas mngon phyogs
nas// red pa rung rung sa bon 'byung bar byed// 'dod chags zil gyisanon ba'i bud med kyang// gnod par byed pa nges par gnas par 'gyur// bud med gnod pa byang tshe 'gro ma bya// rnyed pa mang nyung
la yang 'dod ma skyed// sngagasapa mtshan mo khu ba dgag byas la// brtson 'grus rab tu bskyod de bsgrub par bya// sems rmos gang zhig gzhan du btsam byas nas// gnod sbyin mos na myur du phung

bar byed// bsam na phung bar yang ni 'gyur ba nyid// sha za'i gdong skya na mo la'ang de nyid do// de los cho ga lhag pa 'di rnams bya// sha chang la phug tshod ma cung po dang// nas chanam sha chan dang
'bras chen nya// gtor ma de dag kun tu bdug pa dbul// gnas ni khastong dag gam dur khrod shes// me tog sharesha kun dur arga dang/ 'bil ba briha kusha ra dza/ akas ut+pal a Ta rusha
[4/]ka/se'u than mya ngan tshang sogs me tog dbul// klu la bu ram 'o ma mar sbyar ba'i// bdug pas dri zhim a kar tsan dan dri// 'phrang ma dog dri zhim sna tshogs dang// 'bras chan zho ngang 'as
yom 'bras bu dbul// ba danasngonapa bum pa sngon po dang// gos kyang sngon po lta bshos gtor ma dri// 'phreng ba byug pa me tog sngon po dag/ ji snyad brang gis 'gro ba rnams la dbul// mthe bong
ma long ral gri chu dang shal// mar me sa gzhi bcas dang nam mkha' dang// lhung bzed nor bu dag dang me 'bar ba// 'di la gsal bar ston pa rtag tu 'byung// 'dus pa dang ni ma 'ongs da ltar byung//
mthoras sa stangs jus dang ma ldan yang// lha dang lha min dge dang ma dag pa'i// las rnams thams cad gsal bar ston pa ra rtogs// tshog nyams pa'i m yang na phyed bzlas pa'i m// yi ge ched dam
ya gi lhag pa 'am// bzlas brjod ma byas dad pa med pa dang// mchod pa med cing sa gzhi mi gtsang dang// sprin gyi tshogs kyis de zer bsgribs pa dang/ byis pa yan lag nyams shang lhag pa dang//
de lta bu la ye gsal ston pa// 'bab par ma 'gyur dgos pa yong mi ston// gsal ston dbab phyir sngon du cho ga bzhin// bzlasashing tshes grangs bzang la sngags pa yang// sbyang byas dgongs
karasadang lci ba yis// ba kotsam gyis gzhi legs par byug/ byugs dang nam tog bdug spos dang// lha bshos mar me dag kyang phul nas su// byas pa bzhon nu sta gin gnas pas
rtsa @#// bya/ de nas nang par cho ga 'di kun bya// khrus byas lus la gos dkar btsang bgos te/ shar phyogs kha bltas kusha'i gdan stangasau// 'dug nas gsang sngags rjes
su dran par bya// me long thal ba gtsang mas lan bdumanam// brgyud dam yang na bcur ni phyisanam su// rtse gcig sams kyis gsang sngags zlos bzhin du// byis ba bzhon nu nub tu kha bltan pas
lha la mig gis bltas na 'das pa rung/ de ltar dang ni ma 'ongs mthong bar 'gyur// me long zhes bya'o tsho gamatha' dag ni// jal gyi gsal bar ston pa sbyar bar bya// mthe bong rgya skyegs khu bas bas
tsha nas su// 'bru mar dri zhim dag gis gdab par bya// bum pa gtsang ma chus bkang ma yor gzhag/ sa btsags lhung bzed nor bu chu yi gdab// sku gzugs la ni bdug spos me tog dbul//
de nas byis pa gzhon nus blta bar bya// gsal bar ston nam rmi lam la sogs pas// dngos grub brtags te de nas bzlos brjod bya/ gal te yid ni ches par ma gyur na// de nas
rig sngags ma gdug bzlas brjod bya// nga ya gsang sngags dag pa gang yang rung// gso sbyong byas nas nan tan bzung nas su// rgyal ba'i ring bsrel mchod rten drung du bzlasaM// yang na sku
gzugs ma nyams sbyan sngar bzlas// lus dang ngag yade lag pa mig dang ni// smin mtshams yan lag rnam par g.yo ba dag/ rab tu bsdams nas de la yid gzhol zhing// byams la
ca tha/gnas shang ku sha' khris la 'jug/ ji srid du rtse gcig gnas gyur pa// de srid du ni 'bum mam nyis 'bum bzlas// rnga ye gsang sngags hU~M zhes bya ba 'phel// shing lu'ong 'babanam la
smos ci dgos// de nas dbab pa'i snod rnams brtag par bya// bu mo gzhon nu lo bcu 'am gcu gnyis pa// bcu 'am brgyad dam bdun nam bzhi 'am gsum// yang na khye'u'ang rung ste gnyis
sam lnga/ 'tshigs rus ma mngomatsang gzugs bzung ba// yan lag rdzogs shing mig dkyus rang la dkar// kha bzhin zla 'dra mche ba mnyam la no// sor mo thags bzang mdzes pa long bu nub//
lta ba zab cing mdzes la nu 'jing legs// ba spur re sku yang gnag la stag/ lto ba madro gnyer ma gsum dang ldan// mdog kyang bzang zhang mnga' byed dang yang ldan// gang la yad dga' lta ba brtan/
par 'gyur// blta bas kyang nangoms par mi 'gyur dang// lha gzhan dag la ma phyogs dbab pa'i snod// tshes grangs bzang la nyin zhag gcig dun// skurlung ba byas pas bdug spos 'phang ba dang//
tsan danamar me me tog rnams kyis mchod// bza' dang 'bras chan la sogs gtor ma mang// lha dang lha min gnod sbyin rnams la sbyin// dbab pa'i snod rnams khrus byas gos dkar bskon//
ra phyogs kha b.las rgyun ni rnam par snang// byug spos me tog la sogs de la sbyin// bdug pas bdugatsang gsang sngags bzlas brjod bya// hU~Mgi gsang sngags thog mar bzlas nas su//
[re]// grasgyu a nga sha zhes brjod par bya// mig ni gdangs shing 'dzums par ma byed na/ rdzogs par gyur pajashes par byas nas su// 'jigs pa med de de tshe dri bar bya// mchod pa dang/
cha bdugapa phul nas su// rig pa mchog ga gsang sngags dran byas nas// phyag 'dzal sanI lha tshogs gang yin dra// dus gsum dag gi bdag gi dgos pa gang// de ni legs par
dgongs nas bka' stsol cig/ bde dang sdug bsngal dngos grub thob ma thob/ shes nas de yang de bzhin bzung nasasu// de ma thag du slar yang gtang bar bya// mi gdugasngags bzlas cho ga 'di rnam
kyis// dbab pa'i don la sems na phebs 'gyur gyi// gang zhig blun pas gzhan du brtsams nan// de na mi kun rnams kyis dpyas par 'gyur// zhi zhing gzhungs la rgya cher dkyus kyang ring// brtan zhing
cha gan+de che mdangs ldan dmar bar snang// 'dzums shing 'byed med lha yi mag 'dra ba// dam pa'i snod la lha bab de ltar 'gyur// mig ni rab tu dmar zhing zlum por 'dug/ bgrad cing ma sdug rang
'jags 'dzags lta// 'dzums pa cher tsang 'jigs med lta ba ni// spenapo lto 'phye gnod sbyin babs pa'i mag/ gal te babs pa snod ni mi gtongan// shin du bkra shas tshigs bcad brjong nga/
'am// stobs pa tsho 'am dgod pa 'am lcags kyi bzlas/ yang na rab tu 'dus pa'i mdo sde bklag/ seng ge 'i gdan gyi a na'am pa la sha'i// yam shing mar gyis bskus pa brgya rtsa bsreg
[&]ma gru gas tul nasbyang rtse'am mar gyis bskus// gtum pas sbyin sreg nyi shu tshu gtsage bya/ sngam bzhin du gsang sngags chog dag/ dam tshig cho ga ji bzhin spyad nusan// bdag ge pa sa sa yapa'i
dngos grub thob// sngags pa yun ring nyon mongs mi 'gyur// 'phagasaparnaphubazang gis zhus pa'i le'u bdun pa'o// sangs rgyas kyis gsungs yan lag brgyud lam na dang
dag 'tsho dang las mtha' ting 'dzan dag/ rtsol dang rtog dang dran dang lta ba rnams// so so so sor yang dag bstan par bya// lam 'di rnams kyis gsang sngags dngos grub sang/ de 4 che ngas rnam par
thar pa thob// rgyal sras snonagyi rgyal ba 'dus pa dag/ 'di nas gshegs shange de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur// rtogs med sems kyis lus dang ngag yid kyis// gus par bsonganams gang dag bsags
pa yang// bde gshegs gsungs pa'i bden pa'i lam dmigs na//dge ba'i lam de yang dag bskyod pa yin// yongs su 'dzin pa rnam bar spangs nas su// chos gos dang ni bsong snyoms ngan ngon dang/

sman dang mal stan ngan ngon tsam gyis kyang// chog pa'isims dang ldan pas bsod nams thob// bdag la bstod pa nam yang ma bya zhing// sems can gzhan lasmad par mi bya'o/ su ga ba stsal ngang ma lAdrung

'jig rten dag/ bsams nas spangs te dben la dga' bar bya// bud med mtshan nyid skyes bu'i mtshan nyid dang// sman dang glang chen brtagapa'i m skar ma'i dpyad/ mtshon cha bangag pa'i m ja pa nga rang bzo 'am
bstan bcos nganapa slobacing klog paspyang// glang chen rta dang ba lang bya gag khyi// gang mi srog ba 'ug pa skyes ba dang// bud med bu mo byas par lug sogs// 'thab mo 'gyed pa ma blta mi bya'o//

yul sa'i gtam dung ma dbang bstan pa dang// dmag dang gyod dang na chung gtam dag dang// srung ldebs dang na sngon gyi lo rgyus dang/ 'dod chags dang ni smad 'tshong gtamam/sngagu pa gsang sngags bzlas pa mnos pa ni grong dang grong khyer khyim dang

gtsug lag khang// mchod rten bsti gnasar dang dka' thub gnas// kun dga' lu ma'am rdza nga bur 'gro mi bya// sngar bshad pa yi gnas rnams mared nas// lha khang stong pa dag gam shing drung ngam// de dang chu bo chu klung

ny+nyo 'bab chu dang/ nags tshal stong pa dag dang yul stong dang// gnas gang rung bar bsngags par gnas shing bzlos/ yang na gnas ni nges par ma byas na// zla ba brgyad po 'di yis dus dragatu// gnas 'di gang

zla yang rung pa gcig tu bstan// mtsho dang shing dang ri bo dgon pa'i gnas// mtsho'u dang khang pa gnaa sam chu ngogs su// dgun dpyid zla ba rnams la gnas byas nas// sngags pas dbyar ni gcig tu gnas bya ste//
ji ltar rgyal bas dge slong dbyar zla gsum// tshul zhugs gnas gzhan ma'agro gsungs pa bzhin// de bzhin bcom ldan 'das kyi bsngags pa yang// zla ba gsum du gcig tu gnas par gsungs/ lngags pas
dbyar na sgrub la ma 'jug par// bzlas brjod kyis ni dus kyang 'dus bar bya// dbyar 'das nas gsang sngags gzi bskyed pas// bdag nyid bsrung byas sgrub la'ajug par bya// me thab zlum po gru gsum thu

bzhi dang// pad+ma lta bur byas shing dbyibs legs shing// 'jam zhing shane tu mnyam par byas nas su// de dag sa dang lci bas legs par byug/ zlum por dbang thar bskyad dung nor dgug dang// smanadrang zhi

ba'i cho ga bya bar shis// gru gsum du ni dgar bskrad gsad pa dang/ gshed byed la sogs drag po rnams kyang bya// gru bzhi par na klu dang gsang ba pa'i// srog bskum pa'i m yan lag gzhig par bya// pad+ma'i

dbyibs su bud med bu mo'i grong// yul kun thob pa'i m don kumaslab pashame// me thab lte ba gtsang mas byugs nas kyang// tha ma thog thag ku sha dgram par bya// dkon mchog gsum dang phyag na rdo rje dang

yum la dad pas 'phung ba bdug pa dang/ 'du dang ma nyams me tog ji snyed bas// cho ga bzhin du legs par mchod par bya// yamashang mang po thabakya reng bzhag ste// rlung yab kyis nam naslar nas kyang//

sangs rgyas rnams la phyag byas khro bo ni// bdud rtsi 'khyil bas ma nyamasapad+ma 'am/ mthugs dril nag las ni bdun nam brgyad// bcu 'am zheshur srog blugs me la srog/ ku sha btang ba'am khres sam rtswa
stan la// 'dug nas shar phyogs kha bltasangs rnams na// mar ram sbrang rtsi 'os las bstags nas// rang gi gsang sngags bsgrub phyir sbyin sreg bya// ma yi mtshan nyid nye bar brtag pa na// me stag

du ba me lce sgra rnams las// de bzhin 'grub dang ma 'grub thams cad kyang// sngags kyis byin brlabal me ni ston par byed// du ba med cing gser gyi mdog ltar dngas// me lce rab tu che la g.yas su 'khyil// kha dog gzha
'dra yang na dkar la b.rung// yang na byu ru lug pa'i kha dog 'dra// shin du snum la me lce 'gab nas 'phro// rab tu 'bar ba nyi ma'i 'od zer 'dra// dbyibs na bum pa rgyal mtshan gdugs

'dra// pal be'u dang pad+ma blugs gzar 'ad// me lce re'u la rdo rje ral gri 'dra// yang shing rna mchog dang rdza yab 'dra// rdza rdza rnga chen dang ni gling bu'i sgra// dub ma lci dri zhim mo stag bzang/ yang na ma sa par

yang 'bar gyur na// de tshe dngos grubargya chen thob par 'gyur// du ba che zhing ma stag rgod pa dang/ 'bar bar dka' zhing cung zad cung zad 'bar// me lce rnam par chad tsang ga we mdangs mod// rtsub gnag sbyin dang pa la

k+Sha sha yi mdog/ gsal shing 'dra zhing zhib mo'i gzugs dang 'dra// phyugs kyi mgo 'dra sku yang rab tu ba// me lce 'phro bas sbyin sreg byed pa 'tshig mi'o'i dri nga dngos grub med par ston me la mtshan ma 'di rnams mthong

nas ni// stobs po che yas mar gyi sbyin sreg bya byin pa dag dang mchan khung snu rnams ni// lag pas kyang na btog par mi bya zhing/ ma yal ma srog spu gris breg mi bya// spu med bya phyir snyan gyis ma byug go/

ji ltar 'al gyiso ma 'dzami ba'ims// legs par ma bzung lag pa chod pa ltar// de bzhin sngags kyang legs par ma bzlas na// 'bras bu med pa 'am yang na phung bar 'gyur// ma ni tshul khrims gtsang sbra mi ldan

yang// gsang sngags lha na nam yang gnod me mdzad// lha de'i 'khor du gyur ba gang yin rnams// ma glags mthong nas ni phung bar byed// sgrub pa kun la dang po kho nar na// lha bshosagator ma phal cher dbul

bar bya// sngags pa'i lasagrub nas kyang dzus kun du/rang gis nyams kyis ji snyed dbul bar bya// lha dang lha min gnong sgyun lto 'phye grul// nam mkha' lding dang 'dab bzang lus srul po// dri za 'byung pe
gdon gyi rigs rnams dang// gang dag sa la gnas pa'i rdzu 'phrul can// bu smad g.yog 'khor tshogs dang bcas rnams la/ bdag gis pus mo sa la btsugs nas su// thal mo sbyar nas khyed la gsol/
'debs kyis// gsan nas phan gdags phyir na langos sbyod cig/ 'byung pa gang dag ri rab steng gnas dang// dga' ba'i tshal dang lha yi gnas rnams dang// shar nub dang nyi zla'i khyim rnams dang/ de ri

bo kun la gang dag gnas pa dang/ chu bo kun dang chu bo'i mdo rnams dang// rin chen gnas na lhag par gang gnas dang// mtsho dang rdzing bu lteng ka chu ngogs dang// g.ya' chu sil ma can na gang gnas dang//

grong dang phyugs lhas grong khyer stong pa dang/ khang stong dag dang lha yi khang pa dang// gtsug lag khang ngam mchod rten gnas dag gam// dka' thub gnas dang glang chen bres dag dang// rgyal po'i dkor khong dag na

ganga gnas dang// lam srang 'dun khang dang nibazhimado dang// gang dag lam po che dang shange ga ru ge dang// dur khrod chen po'am nags tshal chen ba dang// seng ge dred dang btsan kazan gnas dag dang// 'brog
chen 'jigs surung bar gang gnas dang// gang dag gleng mchog rnams na gnas pa dang/ lhun po dur khrod dug na gnas pa rnams// rab tu dgyes shing go bar gyur nas su// 'phreng ba me tog dri dang bdug pa
@#// dar bstod dang gtor ma mar me gus 'bul ba// 'di bzhes nas ni bdung zhing bsnams nas su// las 'di rnams kyi 'bras bu mchis par mdzod// de ltar gdon la mchod pa
byas nas su// de nas phyogs skyong rnams la mchod pa bya// dbang po 'byung po'i tshogs dang bcas pa yis// gtor ma phul ba 'di dag bzhes su gsol// ma dang gshin rjen po chu bdag dang// rlung

dang lus ngan 'byung po gnodang bcas stang gi nyi zla tshangs pa chen po dang// lha rnams kun dang sa yi klu rnams dang// ri yi lha dang gnod sbyin tshogs rnams la// so so so'i gtor ma phul 'di rnams/
pa rab tu dgyes pa las na bzhes nas kyang// ranga'ar phyogs su legs par bzhugs nas su/ rang gabu smad mdza' bshes gnyen 'dunangang// nang ma dmag dang dpung bcas thabs gcig tu// ma tog/
dri nga byug pa gtor mar bcas// 'di rnams btung zhing legs par gsol nas kyang// bdagag las 'di 'bras bu mchis par mdzod// de ltar gang zhig mtshan mo rgyu ba la// gtor ma gtong ba'i las rnams
byed pa po'i// dngos grub myur zhing shin tu bgegs kyang med// yid du 'ong ba'i 'dod pa'i ng thob bar 'gyur// 'phags pa dzapung bzang gis zhus pa'i le'u brgyad pa'o///gang

tshal zhig dgra bcom pha ma gsod pa dang// mthun pa'i dge 'dun dbyen byed pa dang// nge ba'an gshegs la sdang ba'i sems kyis su// nam zhig ma dag sku 'tshal 'byin par byed// gam du ma bzang pa a las 'di rnams//

ca rgyal bas mtshams med lnga pa yin par bshad/ gti mukacan gyis sdig pa byas na yang// phung po 'di la grub pa thob ma 'gyur// mchod rten bshig cing byang chub sems dpa' kasad// nyon mos thadapa'i ma
ma sun 'byin dang// slob pa gsod cing dge 'dun mang ba la// gang zhig 'dod pas mang nyung rku 'phrog pa// mtshams med nye ltar de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs// tshulangs ma ni gang zhig 'di byed pa
bskal pa'i bar du mnar med sdug bsngal myong// gsang sngags dngos grub bsgrims kyang yongs 'thob// gang zhig bde gshegs gsung gi glegs bam dag/ chud gson pa dang mes ni sdig pa dang/
bsam pa ngan pas chur ni 'dor ba dang// yang na chos kyi sku ni slong ba 'am// bslab tshig ma lus pas ni brgyan pa yi// dge slong dag gam dge slong ma gsod dam/ dge bsnyen dang ni dge bsnyen ma song

dam// ngan pa'i sems kyis lha khang meg kyang rung/ mi yi yul na sdig pa 'di byas pa/ dkar bar sbyor ba ldan yang grub ma 'thob// gang zhigadakon mchogagasum la gnod pa yi// bsam pas gnod pa cung zad byas

kyang rung// bdag nyid ngan ba dmyal bar btses par 'gyur// de nas shi nas las kyi dbang gis kyang/ rigs ngan mi dang dud 'gror skyob thob// 'di dag a ni khyod la mdor bshad pa'o// gang zhig byang chub sems
thas pa las/ rmongs pas 'jig rten lha tshogs phyag byas na// de dag de la mi dgar gyur nas su// de yi gsang sngags dngom grub nyams par byed// gang gi tshon sems medar ba yis/ mi yi yul na
wa b+hi/chu@#// byang chub sems blangs pa// de ming ni tshad lha dang lha min dang// 'jig rten ma lus rnams kyis phyag byar 'os// mi mngon par mtho ba ma lus pa'i// bslab pa mtha' dag blosapar
gyur pa dang// sems can kun la mi 'jigs sbyin pa dang// dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung yang bsabs pa yis// gang zhig ma bzad las byed thub ba gsod// rig sngags gcod dam gnod par byed pa 'am//
bsam pa ngan pas gsang sngags tshogs mchod// don med bzhin du me mos rtswa gcod rung// rkang pas rkang pa nyed par byed pa dang/ phyugs la sogs pa sna tshogs sna 'bangs dang// 'phags pa'i dge
'dun la ni ma gus pa// 'byung por byani nam lha yi gtor ma 'am// sa la ltung ba sngags pas bza' ma bya// 'dod chags zil gyis non pas dud 'gro dang// bud med bgrod bya min par 'gro ma bya/

glang chen mi gdul sbrul yang ma gzung zhing// rta rgyug glo rdebs lcag gis gzhu mi bya// las de rnams dang ldan bar gyur pa de'i// dngos grub nam yang 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// sems can nad kyis gdungs dang sdug
bsngal la// rtag tu byams pa'i sems ni yid la// dper na nam mkha'amathub thug med pa la// 'dom gyis gzhal tharam tha'artogs ma nus ltar// de bzhin dkon mchog gsum la brtan nas ni// phan gnod

byas pa'i dge sngag mtha' ma rtogs/ rgyadang sI dang bongomyamadzol bu yis// khyi la sogasapa'i sems can bsod pa dang// bya rog la sogs gzeb kyis bcings byas na// 'di dang pha rol tu yang grub ma thob/
bdudangaga'i me togadangs bor ba rnams/ nga pas me kardza mgo la gshags ma bya/ bkus pas gdungs kyang de dga rnams lan// phul ba'i lA bshes rnams kyang bza' mi bya// 'jigs kyi ngo tshangs pa

brgya byin khyab 'jug dang 1/ drang rlung lha sogs la phyugamang// res bshad pa la chos la ma brten zhing// de dag dkar rdung marlung rtags ma mngod// de dag chos la'ang ngan sems la bya zhing/ de nga

rlung la nam yang dag ngam bya// de drag bstod dang ma gdon sngags mi bslus// spyin pa sbyin tsho Ang rje bskyed nas sbyin// bde bar gshegs pa rnams kyis bstan pa yi// gnas dang rgyal sras rnams la phug

bya'o// rongasas rgyas dang rgyal ba'i nyan thos rnams// de dag rtagatu phyugaphyab gams yin no// ji ltar zla ba tshos pa mi rnams ni// phyag 'tshal ta la lus can phyag ma 'tshal// de bzhin dad pasarkyal ba'i thugs

sras la 'phyag bya de ltar bde bar gshegs la min// 'jig rten kun gyi mngomatho ba'ab ba can// snying rje'i bdag nyid 'gro ba'i don dun/ skye ba len pa de la ci yi phyir// bu gcig bdag nyid kun gyis phyag ma
bya skyen du bsam yas rmad byung rdzu 'phrul can// de la ma ngan gang zhig mi 'dud pa// de la rgyal ba thams cad thugs nur nas// de yi gsang sngags dngos grub ma lcal to// dper ma shang gi me tog
dang bor so/ yang 'ong phyi nas 'bras bur 'gyur ba ltar// sems can mchoga rnama' me tog 'dra bar ltos// 'bras bu bzhin du rgyal ba rig par gyis// gang zhig rang bzhin chags sdang rnam bral yang//

@#// brtse la snying brtse khro la khro ba dang// 'dod chags can latshags can ltar ston pa// byang chub tshul gnas de la phyag 'tshal lo// gang zhig las dang rnam smin mkhyen pa yi// 'gro ba kun la ji ltar mthun
ba la/ gsang sngags gzugs kyirjes su 'jug mdzad pa// sngags kyi ma 'dren de la phyag 'tshal lo// 'phags pa dpung bzang gis zhus pa'i le'u dgu pa'o///lha dang lha min ma la phan gdagA

phyag phyir// gsang sngagasarag sngags rnam pa sa tshogs dag/ bye ba phrag gsum dang na 'bumaphrag lnga// rig 'dzani sde snoda bshad par rgyal bas gsungs// ngas ni gsung ba ba rnams gzhom pa dang// dbul ba'i sdugabs la

bsal bar bya ba'i phyir// dkyil 'khor bcas shing phyag rgyur ldan pa yi// gsang sngags bye ba phrag bdun rab tu bshad// phonya bcu dang reg pa'i rgyal po bdun// de bzhin phyag bar n drug cu rtsa bzhi dang// nga ya nga

yapo mapa brgyad rnams dang// khro bo drag po bdud rtsi zab sbyor dang// rig pa mchog la sogs pa mthu bo// rig pa'i bdagapagasang sngags rjes 'brang bcas// de snyed sgra rigs ni gang yin pa// der ni 'a
ga nga yis rgya cher bshad// sbyan ras gzigs kyigasang sngags bye ba phrag/ gsum dang de bzhin 'bumaphrag lnga rnams bshad/ de yi rig sngags bdag po rta mgrin dang// de ya med can dkyil 'khor dam pa
ri rnams rta mgrin dkyil 'khor gsang sngags te// me la mchog skya na 'jig rten gsum gling 'dud// skyel ma dkar mo gos dkar can ma dang// rnam gzigs ral pa kacig ma 8 ka pra shas dang/ grags

ldan khrogater chu dang 'ad de ga rnamar// pad+marI ke sa kyi rig sngags rgyal mo mchog/ derag dkyil 'khor sna tshogs gzugs can dang 2/ phyag rgya rnam pa sna tshogs rnams dang ldan/ rgyas pa'i gsang sngags
rgyud du'od ngang gcan/ rigapa'i ngabang phyug gsang sngags bdag por bsam// de yas kas nga kas mi la grub mchog ster/ de la lngas rtsom yang na mngon par dga'/ gnong ljan yang thug de dang sdug
mo rdzun pas/ de ya bka' yas gsang sngags mchog rnams bshad// lngas rtson gyis stong phrag nyi shu ste// de yi chung ma de yi phyed bshad do// nor gyibangag pas stong phrag sum cu lo// gang po'i
nga yas kyang ma 'bum 'dzango/ b+hU dza lta min la las rgyal ba la// dad pa rnams kyis gsang sngags mthar yas shar// kha cig rnga ya'ags sugatogs pa ste// kha cig kyang nipad+ma'i rigs su 'jog
la chagar gyuragasu gtogs pa ya na// bzhan yang kha cig gas cher rnam par 'khyam// mo spyod rjes byar gyi rigs su gsungs// nga ni rdo rje rigatsha las rab tu bstan/ d+hA ts+tsamangs ga tho ga ra
dbang pad+ma'i raka' yin te// rigs bzhi pa ni 'dir na lngas rtsen yin// gsang sngags mdo sde sa bshad gang yin des// bzhi po 'ding na rnam par gyur bar bya// gzhan yang 'di ni kha cig gnas med
gya/ par bde bar gshegs la brten cing yongs 'khyam pa'i// mdo sde 'dir na de dag thams cad kyang// 'byor pa 'dod pa'imasan rnam par sbyar// lam 'ad 'od du zhugs pa'i
sngags pas na// yid dang mthun pa'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur// srid gsum nang ma rgyal ba dkon mchog ste// de yi 'og tu de las byung ba'i chos// de yi dge 'dun skyes chen brgyad posti//
tshesrid pa gsum na dkona mchog gsum po gtso// sladi gsum bsod nams rnam 'phal [“]rgyu yin pas// das grub 'dodapas gsang sngags mgo la gdon// bsod nams che dang log 'dren rmongs
bya'aphyir// phyag nardo rje gtum mchog phyag 'tshal zhes// gsang sngagasa rnams kyi mgo la skyu ra bar bya/ gnod sbyin mgon po ras na bshad pa yin// nor gyi rigs dang pad+ma'i rigs la yang// rang
gigasang sngags bdag par ldan par bya// bder gshegs pa man nyan thos lam zhugs dang// nga rgyal rnams kyi lam la gnas pa dang// dad pa medatsang tshul khrims 'jungs pa yis// nga ya
rje rnams kyang bcang ma@#[） ]kung zhig theg pa mchog la sdang ba dang// bdud kyis bshad pa yin zhes sna bdu// rmongs nas nga la gnod sbyin zhes smra dang// byang chub sems dpa' la na sa bdud pa'i/
dge slong dge slong ma dang dge bsnyen dang/ dge bstan ma dang 'jajig rten pa rnams kyis// nga yi rigs kyi gsang sngags bzlas brjod na// de dag rnams kyi luman myur du 'jig gang zhig nga'i ngag/
rje su 'dra ba'i gdon phyung po ba nod skyes klu rang sha ba yis// bal lngags klosajo rje rdzogs ba dag/ mthong nas khros nas phung bar byed par 'gyur// gang zhig theg mcho kargya cher klog pa dang//
da la dang/de de ted 'chad bar spro// brtson 'grus che zhing byang chub sems brtan ba/ de la nga pa gsang sngags mchog sbyin mdzad// ngas ni 'gro la phan phyir sas rgyas nga 'i// gsang sngags yang
shing rgyas par bshad pa yan// de nas gzhan yang 'jig rten pa bsdus nas/ ]zhar la bshad pa 'di dag khyod kyis nyon// drag nga yis ni bye ba phrag b.ru bshad// nor lha'i bus nistongaphrag sum cu ste/
ngas pa pas na stong phrag drug cu 'ad// nyi mas kyang ni 'bum phrag gsum bshad do/ nam mkha' lding gis stong phrag bco brgyad de// gtum byed mas ni stong phrag brgyad bshad do// me sa kyang ni brgyu
phrag bdun nyid phur bu gsum pa yang sa songa bshad do/ klu yi rgyal po rnams kyis lnga stong ste// tshatshan margyu bas stong phrag bcu gnyis bshar// 'gro la phan phyir 'jig rten bar ka po bzhis
'bumasdug ba ni rab tu bshad pa a na/lha man ngabang ras 'bum phrag gnyis nying de/ lha la bdag pas kyang na 'bum phrag gsum// gsang sngags phyag rgya sna tshogs cho gar ldan// so so'i gzhung
gi dkyil 'khor rnams dang bcas/ sngags rdo rje'i rjes 'brangs 2ra bskyed na// ma sgrims bzhin du thetshom med par 'grub/ de las bzlog na dngos grub ma thob la// sdug bsnga745pa/ 'thob
par 'gyur// 'phags pa dngung bzang gyis zhus pa'i le'u bcu pa'o//kabcud kyis len dang gter dang phug 'gro dang// nor bskyar 'byung rung sngags dang gser

bskyar rtsa// ba'i thang med pa'i rin chen nor de de// brgyal po bstan pa yongs su bsgrags pa yin// sngags dang phug tu 'gro dang bcud kyis len// sdig pa spong bar byed pa[&]chog tu bstan// rin chen dang

mi go rtar dang 'byung khung 'bring/ gser bsgyur rtsi dang nor bsgyur tha ma'o// ma na sems lto bas ldan 'ang chos la brtson// dka' thub kyis phyug dang par bstan pa'i snod/ rdul shas che ba la ni 'bring por
gsungs// tha ma la na mun pa can gyis bstan// gang zhig mchog du bstan pa bstan 'dod pa// des na tha mar bstan pa rnam par spang// gal te nor la srid cing sdug bsngal gyis// gdungs na 'bring po la
na sder ngar bya// lha ya bden pa dang ni 'byor pa dang// tshe dang stobs gzugs phun sum tshogs pa dang// thos mang mdangs bzang gcig tu yadra gzhus dang// dbang thang che kun dka' thub stobs kyis
'thob// chags dang rnam bral dag la dga' ba dang// rtag tu dkon mchog gsum la sems gzhol dang// sdig pa spangs shing bzlas brjod ldan pa la// ma la lha rdzas dngos grub ring ba med/ rdorje mtshon
me gnam lcags 'du ba ya// gsang sngags ma ya 'jigartena mchog sbyin mdzad// 'jig rten 'di deng pha rol nyid na yang// sdug bat+pal selatsang sdig 'dzoms gzhan med do// gang zhig dbagabasam
ljon pa'i shing lta bu// la 'ang dngos grub la lar bsod nams dang// gzhan lagazugs stobs tshe dang bde ba dzag/ yid mathun 'bras bu 'dod pa mi bstsol// gsang sngags rtsa tshogs gzugs
! su rnamasbrul nas// gang zhig sdug bsngal gang zhig sprug pa 'am// rgyal po tsom rkun thog gas 'jigs skag pa 'di/ 'gro ba'i tshogs chen matha' dag skyobs par mdzad// gang zhig yul dang khyimal
brten kyang rung// dka' thub ma nyams rtse gcag sems kyis ni// nyin zhag gcig kyang thang sngags bzlas na// de la gsang sngags du shaka nani 'akub// tshog bzhin du dang por 'bum bzlas nas// de
nasalngags pa ma bskul la 'jug par bya// des na dngos grub myur du thob 'gyur la// gsang sngags tshogs yumarang nyom mongs// lus las yi dril phyis byas nas su/ chu chen rnyog pa me nga par zhugs

nas kyang// jitsam 'dod pa'i ra du khrus byas te/ byung nas maramang du kha bltams// chu se lag pa rkang pa bkrus nas u0f74 'phur ma phyi ril du na bstan byas te// bar du lag ba nyag tshog tsog bu 'dug

nas/ sku med dbu ba med pas nye regabya// lan gsum bar du chu na 'ju panas kyang// na chu la lanaganyis yongs su phyi bar bya// sa la chags pa lce yis rog ba dang// sbyid pa byungan khayang bkru bar bya//
rang byung mang bud med gzhon nu ngang// gzhon num dang bram zerganamo rnams// de nam ma kyang lags pas reg ma bya/sngags pas de dag rnams lam bsams// brgya la de ngago rnams kyis re rgyun
tam sgrub pa de dag rnams la regagyur na// slar yang khrus dang 'thor 'thung byas nas su/ de nas phyir yang bzlas la 'jug par bya// gtsang sbra la dar zos dga'i sang rje rAn// rtag tu
len pa las ni log pa dang/ slong mo'i zas za lha ya zas la brtson// de as lugs la gsang sngakas 'jug par 'gyur// 'ga' yis bud med gos dang nor rnams dang// bzhon pa rgyan dang byug pa bza'
'dung dang// mal stan rnams nu mang nyung byan gyur na// de la sgrub la gnas pas ma byung ngo// sa phung bshang sgor lnga ste mtshan la gsum/ g.yon la gsum ste lag pa gnyis la bdun// yang nas dang

chu yi rje srid du// dri ma dri bral de srid bar du bya// sos ka'i nagasam mchod pa'i me lce yis/ ma bsgrims bzhin du tshang tshing kun srog ltar// bzlas brjod me la tshul khrims rlung gis sbar// brtson 'grus

chen po'i me lces ldegapa sreg/ ji ltar gang la nyi ma'i 'od zer gyis// gdungs nagazi brjod mi brjod 'ju ba bzhin// tshul khrims nyi ma'i 'od zer gzi brjid kyis// gdung a ma sdigapa'ig kyang zad par 'gyur
mun nag smag la mar me phyung ba yis// mun nag ma lus sel ba byed pa ltar// tshorabs stong nas gnas pa'i sdig pa'i mun// bzlas brjod mang mes myur dusel bar byed// ci ste sbyin theg dang ni bzlas
brjod kyis// gsang sngags bsgrubs kyang dngos grub ma thob na// 'jim pa las ni mchod rten 'bum gdab pa'i m// yang na chu 'gram byem dag la gdab// des ni de yi sdig pa sring gzhan la//
byas pa gang yin de ma zad 'gyur na/ 'desan gsang sngags mthums 'di nying du/mthong ba'i chos la bsod nams 'bras mu thob// sngags kyi rtsa ba dang po tshul khrims te// de nas brtson 'grus dang ni gro
pa dang/ rgyal ba la ni bzod ldabyang chub sems// gsang sngags dang name lo med pa'o// de ltar mi dbang yan lag bdun ldan pa// skyob med par skyo dgu 'dul bar byed// de bzhin sngags pas
yan lag 'di bdun dang// ldan par gyur nasdig pa 'dul bar byed// dang po bzlas brjod phal cher byas nas su/ darje yi 'og tu 'a'i ma spyi mi gtso// sbyin sregs gtsags mchog myur du stsol// yang du

'ong ba'i dod pa 'angasbyin par mdzad// gang gis drang ga tshang brgya yi pha rol nas// gsang sngags mthu mis bud med kun kyang na/ bud med ma yi na gnod sbyin bu mo ste// de bzugs ma byed kyis ni bsngags ba
bsten// 'dod pa 'dzin pa'i bslabs nga rgyalan te/ 'grub na'ang gnod sbyin bu mo nang ra byed// de ni bud med de yi lus su yang// sbrul nas 'tshan mo 'dod pa ston par byed pa'o// ji ltar mi
ngag 'dod phyi bud med la bzhin pa'i mnar na zad 'gyur ltar// de bzhin gnod sbyin m 'am zamo dag/ gsang sngags mthus bkug sten par byed pa'o// gzhan gyis chung mar yal bzhag nas su[']

gang zhigade la 'dang gdungs ste na byang pa/ mnyis ya dza kyis gzhan gyi chung ma la// 'dod pa lcang pam sngagapa mang du thob// rgyal ba la dang gzhan la ba brtson pa'i// lha klu lha mame gnod sbyin dra za dang/ 'grub
par bcas pa'i ljags bshad gang yin pa// de dag rgyal ba'i nyan thos rang sangs rgyas// de bzhin gshegs dang byang chub sems dpa' yis// ma 'ongs sems can mgon skyabs
med rnams la// rab tu gzigs nas byin gyis brlabs pa mdzad M// de dag 'bras bu rab dang 'bring dang na// tha mdzad bye ba rnam pa gsum du bstan// mkha' la 'gro dang dpal gyi phug tu 'jug/ 'dod dgu'i

[” ]gzugs can m snang rnam pa dang// gnod sbyin m ya khyo dang bcud kyis len/ mig 'phrul sgyu ma mtshan ma bsto// de dga mchog yan 'bring nas bdagago/ grong dang nor dang dbye dang dgug pa dang 3/ dgar dang

bskrad pa dang na gsad pa dang// ku ya kangon gyis zin pa gsol ba dang// gang yang 'dolta bu dang mthun pa'i las// de ni mkhas pas phran tshegs yin par bstan// bye brag tu na klu dang gnod sbyin dang// phyis

pa gdon gyis zin dang gang dag tu// lus can rnams la ngomatshar sna tshogs dag/ ston par byed pa phram phran tshigs yin// byab dang khu tshur thal lcag sgra drang dang// rnam par bzlos dang dbang dang bskrad pa dang/

gamadu 8nga bcang la sogs pas tshar gdadang// 'ongadang rig pa'i ges dang ni/ rtog pas bsnun dang rnam par bskyod pa dang// mag tu dug sod lhod ni gzhug pa dang// khab kyis gzugs dang kha cig skyagatu gzhug

par lu phu zhes bud dang yan lag gzhan pa dang// brangags 'gro ba dag dang dgag pa dang// phyir yang bcing dang gnan par bya ba dang// rmongs par bya dang dug zar gzhug pa dang// dugani gzhan la sku u0fb1bar bya ba dang/

[4]/ lcags kyus ldan ng sa drang bar bya ba 'am// lus la zhen pa'i dug ni bslang ba ngam// thos par bza' dang zos pa gcad pa dang// sa bcing ba dang pho nya gtang ba dang// bang pa dang na klu la bstan

pa dang// dung dang rdza rnga'i sgran bsrung ba ste// rnam pa 'di dag dug gi rgyud du bshad// sa yi steng gaphrul na brgyad cu dag/ gzhan la gnod par byed cing rnam par 'khyam// de dag rnam nya ni shu
gdengs ka can// 'khyil ba drug dang dung med bcu gnyis dang// de bzhin sprulani khro bo bcu gsum ste// sum cu gang yin rigs de'i nang du gtogs// rtsal pa'i mgo dang sdig pa kha brgyud dang//

rnam par dbyen rab tu mang po yod// gtsan tu kha chu rig dang mthong ba dang// mchi ba btsugs pa las na dug kyang gtong// de la dugan rgyud la mkhas pa yis// rab 'bring tham rnam pa gsum du dbye// dug

mdo khro ba'angobang sgyur skyag pa dang// de bzhin sngags pa 'am bkres pa'i zas phyir ram// sha khon yod pa 'am gshamarjes bstan pa 'am/ lus labardzis na de dag za bar byed// thos pa de yang rnam pa bzhir 'gyur
de mche bas 'dzin dang sos bcad gtad pa'o// gang du mche ba gcig gis khrag phyung rjes/ de 'dug chung bsan 'dzin par bshad// gang du mche ba gnyis kyis btab nas su/ khrag dag byung bar gyurapa zos/
pa 'o// gal te mche ba gsum gyis shabacad ra// den bcad par gyur pa yin zhes bstan// gang dumache ba bzhi yis btab nas su// sbrul gyis lus n bzlog par gyur pa de// btad nas zos pa yin
[r ︽]bya// zhes bshad pa ste// de nasman rnams kyis kyang bzlog par daka'// me yi rang bzhin gnad rnams bral ba'i dug/ mtshon dang me dang gzi brjid mtshungs pa dge/ rdza ltar sngags kyis rab

du zha 'gyur ba// de ltar snyan ngs sbyor bar ma nus so// ji ltar me dpung chen pos bu shing la// nges par sreg la char 'bab skad cig gis// zhi bar gyur pa de bzhin dugadag gis// me dpung lta bu 'ang sbags

tshe zhi bar byed/ 'jug gimathu stobs gosanas 'babasgrims te// gsang sngags chog ji bzhin bzlasanas na// ba lang khyu na seng ge ji lta bar// dugatsan sbrul dang dogs med lhan cig// lha klu lhaman gnod/

lcan grub pa dang// dri za 'byung po mtshun dang gsang ba pa// yadags sha za dag dang lus srul po// so byed dag dang 'phrog ma grib gnon dag/ sa ya steng na gdon nisna tshogs pa// mi yapisha tshil za zhing
khrag kyang 'thung// mi ngan 'dod gangs khro bas nyam thag pa'i// glagalaskabs red nas lus la 'jug par byed// de dag rnams kyis zin pa'i mi 'byan tsang// glu len gar byed dgod cing bro ba dag/ dgayaM

zhing rngam pa che lasA 'dod dang// spyod pa sna tshogs byed cing lha rnams dang// lcaman ltar bcos skye bo bzhang gang byed// gtor ma 'dod pa'i m rtsed mobyed 'dod pas// gsang pa'i don du lus la 'thab
'au cing 'jug/ gsang ba pa rnams gzhig phyare rags kyi mchog/ mthu can mchog sbyin rdo rje lcags kyu 'am// gzhan yang nga yarigs las byung rig pa'i m// khro bo bdung rtsa thabasbyor sogA
pas gso// ji ltar gsang sngags 'dzan pa'i ma dag la// gdon rnams 'jigs pang gyur pa de ltar ni// mi min rlung min grong khyer sum brtsegs dag/ 'joms byed gzi chen nyi ma me po dang//
chu bdag ma yin lha min rnams kyis min/ ]ra bdag ma yin gnod sbyin rgyal po man// lhag ma mkha' lding bya yi rgyal po dang// sa nus bu zhon khyer 'jig rnams kyis man// 'byung po'irig/
sngags 'dir ni kun mthong dang// gdon gya skyed pa ma lus shes nas su// phyi nas gdon rnams dogs med ngul na// gdon gyis ma 'jigs slar yang tshugs mi 'gyur// jigagasum 'phel
dang sring gsum mthar phyin dang/ dke pa gsum spangs lam gsum thugs su chud// de ya lus dang de'i lam rjes 'gro ba'i// lha dang lha man sogs pas bshad pa'i sngags// bdag nyid chen
pamun pa sol ba ya/gsang sngags kyisan byon gyisabarlabs de la// 'jig rten lha tshogs rnams kyis bsngags pa yi// gsang sngagasamathu yis de la bskyod du med// rdo rje 'chang gi gsung thos lha
de rnams// tshangs sogs lha min gnod sbyin grub pa dang// rig 'dzin klu dang gnod sbyin dri za dang// gsang ba pa dang mtshun dang 'byungapa rnams// dad pas zhabs la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te//
gus pas thal mo sbyar nas tshigs gsol pa// kye ma srog chags rnams la thugs rjes ldan/ dgyema'o khyod kyis spyod pa sna tshogs pas// kha cig gis ni rdo rje 'bar bar mthong// gzhan gyis dbyag
de gzhan gyis 'khor lo can// de bzhin gzhan gyis rtse gsum zhags pa can// gzhan gyis ral gyi gzhu dang be con dang// 'jigs pa'i gzugs can mtshon cha kun thogs dang/ dga'
cha dgags na zhib 'ang du mthong// du ma 'isku mnga' dmags med sku mnga' bar// lha dang gnod sbyin gyis mchod de la 'dud// lha min lha yis zhabs la phyag bgyis pa// byang chub sems dpa' m chog la
@# phyag 'tshal 'dud// rig pa'i dbang phyug kazhu 'gengs khyod la 'dud// khyod la bdag cag thams cad phyag 'tshal 'dud// khyod la bdag rug deng nas skya bas sumacha/khyadakyis ji skang gsungs
pade bzhin du// ma yas legs par sbyad par bgyis nas ni// de dag myur du dbul ba'i mun bsalanas// nyi ma bzhin du shin tu rab 'bar gyur/ yan lag mi nyams sems kyang ma nyams
shing// nad dang sdug bsngal lus nyams ma 'gyur ba// khyod la dad pa'imasin thob par 'gyur// de skad kun gyisatshig du sbas nas kyang/ rdo rje 'dzin la yang yang phyag 'tshal te// gzhal
med khang du mngon par zhugs nas kyang// ji ltar 'ongs pa'i nam mkha'i lam nas dong// lha rnams dong nas phyag na rdo rje yis// dpung bzang la ni tshig tu yang gsungs pa// lha rnams kun gyis
mdo 'dapagis zin kyis/ khyod kyis 'jig rten 'dir na grags par gyis// de skad gsungs nas dpung bzang de yis ni// langs te gus par rab tu phyag 'tshal nas// gtsang byed sbrag 'dzoms dpal
rgyung rdzogs so//@#// rgya gar skad du/ Ar+yamahApa ri Sha ta rA dzaaan ka/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa yongs su sngo ba'i rgyal po chen po sngags dang bcas
pa sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// yon tan rgya mtshopag med pa// sangs rgyas dam chos 'phags pa yi// dge 'dun rus gsum bzhugs pa rnams//
ma lus pa la skyabs su mchi// ma dge thams cad bshags par bgyi// 'gro ba'i dag larjes yarang// chos kyi 'khor lo rab bskor bar// rdzogs sangs rgyas la bskul ma 'tshal//
kun mkhyen spyan gyis gzigs pa ya// bdag dge chung yang gang mchis pa// des na gtan du bral ba dag/ thams cad nye bar zhi gyur cig/ rnam pa kun mchog ldan pa yi// stong pa shes pa'i ting
nge 'dzin// byang chub bar gyi tshe rabs su// rtag tu bde dang ldan par shog/ rnam par ma rtog lhun gyis grubra// rtag tu nyam par gzhag gyur cig/ zla nyanor bu rol mo ltar// sems can ngos la
'jug par shog/ ji ltar rgyal ba mkhas pa rnams// shes rab pha rol phyin thabs bsngo// de ltar bdag ka rakar po rnams// byang chub tu bsngo bar bgyi// dkon mazlog gsum la dmigs pa yi/

na 'jig rten mgon gyis bstan pa la// rang byunga mngon dga' 'bang ldan zhing/ sangs rgyas kun gyi gsung rab kyi// gzhung donatshog lam khris gyur nas// dam chos yongs su 'dzin ba dang// lus dang srog la
tsho dga' meshog/ bdag ni 'gum pa'i dus kyi tshe// phyin n+ya ma log yad kyis su// sangs rgyas tshe dpag med mthong nas// 'di nas bde ba can du mchi// bdud kyi spyod yul mngon gyur tshe// drang
sgyu laan chadang bdakad// tapa tultachapara mdzadu gyur cing// sa bcu thob nas do dgag rnam par dag pa'i rim pa yis// ljang chub ma pa thob par shog/ sangs rgyas kun du bzang po 'di thob na[N 1]
bag chags baa pa nyes bsags rtsa nas bton// ye shes bsgribs med snying rjer ldan nas su// 'gro ba rnams la sman dang bde ba bgyi// phyogs bcu'amatha' yas pa ma shos bya'i don ma lus par khyab pa'i
blo mnga' ba phyogs bcu'isangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho snyed la phyag 'tshal lo// sems kyi rogam yad kanyis bsal nas dang por na shAkya'i rgyal po thub la spyi bos
phyag 'tshal lo// bde ba can na bzhugs pa'i rgyal po 'od dpag med// bla ma la yang dga' dang gus pas gdung bar bgyi// gang zhig phyogs kun dag da ltar byung ba yi// 'gro la byams pa'i
can sangs rgyas nges par bzhugs rnams dang// 'das dang phyis 'byung ba yargyal ba thams cad la// bdag dga' ba'i yid kyis yang dag mchod pa bgyi// 'di lta ste/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs

rgyas nyi zla sgron ma dang// sku mdog gser 'od dang/ bden pa'i dbyangs dang/ lhun po bzang dang/ lcan po chen po dang/ dbang po'i 'byung gnas dang/ pad+ma'i dbyangs dang/ phyag bzang dang/ 'od kyi dog
dang mchog gi 'byung gnas dang/ rin chen zla 'od dang/ dpa' bo'i sde dang/ kun nas snang ba dang/ rnam dag zhal dang/ rin chen tog dang/ mdog bzang 'byung gnas dang/ sA la'i
rgyal po dang/ rnam rtog 'od dang/ bde mdzad rgyal po dang/ kun nas snang ba dang/ lhun pa bzang po gsal ba dang/ 'od kyidakyil 'khoradang/ dkon mchog brtsegs dang/ kun nas 'od
dung dpa' 'tshegs dang/ bkod pa chen pa dang/ sbyangs gsal bo myur dang/ dbang po'i rgyal mtshan dang/ thob pa'i sde dang/ rab tu lhan ne dang/ 'od mdzes dang/ me tog tshoms dang/ sbyan bzang dang/

shin tu bzang po dang/ 'od bzang skyon ma dang/ dgongs pa rnam dag dang/ mos kyi 'od zer dang/ brtson 'grumatshe ldan dang/ pad+ma'i snying po dang/ lhag par dgongs pa brtan dang/ rdo rje'i sde dang/ legs par
'khrus dang/ tshul bzang dang/ dbyangs snyan dang/ yon tan dpal 'od dang 'jig rten rtog dang/ mdog bzang gsal ba dang/ rtag tu brtson dang/ tsan dan zla 'od dang/ rgyas pa'i pa la
rgya mtsho dang/ dbang po chen po dang/ rgyal ba'i dbang po dang/ 'od bkod pa dang/ brtson 'grus sbyangs pa dang/ kun tu sgron ma dang/ gsua ba chen po dang/ rdo rje snying pos rab
du 'joms pa dang/ drang srong lha dang/ me'i 'od dang/ yid du 'ong ba dang/ rnam 'joms dang/ toga chen po dang/ shin du 'thor gshegs dang/ phan par bzhed dang/ drung srong chen pa dang/ rnam
par gzugs dang/ gtsug tor can dang/ thams cad skyob dang/ 'od cus dang gser mdog dang/ gzi brjid mchog dang/ mtho bdang/ bkra shis dang/ rin chen grags pa dang/
gzi brjid 'od dang/ rnam par snang mdzad dang/ don yod gzigs dang/ dbang po'i tog dang/ grags pa dang/ sang mdzad dang/ ba blo gros dang/ skar rgyal dang/ skag dang/ 'od 'thab
dung rin chen mchod sdong dang/ 'bar ba'i tog dang/ thugs gzhungs dang 2 rab zhi dbab pa dang/ spyan dag dang blo mchog rang/ bden pa'i lha dang/ drang srong sras pa dang/ thub pa dang/
tshangs pa'i dbyangs dang/ kun du zhal dang/ ma sad pa dang// bdud 'joms dang/ lha'i rgyal pa dang/ legs son dang/ gzabarjod bzang po dang/ tshogs kyi dbang po dang/ shin tu rnam par
gnon pas gshegs pa dang/ bsam yas 'od dang/ zla ba'i rgyal po dang/ bde ba che thob dang/ snang bar gyur pa dang/ rgya mtshon pa dang/ mi 'khrugs pa dang/ dbang po'i mchog dang/
cham ma tog togodang/ dod dpon chen po dang/ rnam par rgyal byed dang/ me tog bzang po dang/ gshen gnyen bzapo rang/ rgyu skar bzad pa dang/ nyi ma'i snying po dang/ tshogs kyi yal dang/
ra gyi yul dang/ snang ba bzang po dang 'od dpag med dang/ dpal chen dang/ stobs mchogadang/ sgron ma// de dag la sogs pa sngon byung ba dang/ phyis 'byung ba'i rgyal ba gang dag yon tan gyi klung

dpag tu med par gyur pa/ 'khor ba'i chu bo'i 'damardzab las yang dag par brgal ba/ gto ngo ba dang ldan zhing tshul khrims rnam par dag pa/ bzodab chen po'i mchog dang ldan pa/ brtson 'grus smyos shing//
bgayo ba mamanga' ba/ bsam gtanachen po dang ldan pa/ mkhyen barmob/ thog bamed bu ldan s/ sems can la thugasarje dang/ tshogs dang/ rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi thugs skye bar b tu 'byung ba/
'jig rten thams cad la thug brtsa ba/ don la mngon par brtson pa/ sems can gyis nang paskyedasum byams pa/ g.yo ma mnga' ba/ rgya bam mnga' ba/ chags pa mamanga' bo/ byams
pa'i thugs kyi bdag nyid can// lta 'a yang lha dang mi'i mchog gis rjed pa/ lha'i yang lta ste/ rgyal bde rnams la bdag gis lus dang/ ngag dang/ sems gus pa rnam pa du mas phyag
'tshal lo// rgyal ba de rnams kyis bdag sdug pa lasa rnam pa thams cad du bskyab tu gsol/ sdug bsngal dums gdungs pa'i sems can thams cad kyang rab tu brtson pas drang du gsol/
@#// thugs rjechen po dang ldan pas bdag kyang ngan 'gro dag las dang zhing/ de bzhin du rdzogs pa'i byang chub lamyur du gzhag tu gsol/ drang srong rmen po rnams kyi mtshan brjod pa'i//
dge ba bdag gis sgrub pa gang lags pa// de yis bdag ni tshe rabs thams cad du// thub dbang de dag lhan cig 'grogs par shog/ chos dang zang zang mchod pas bde bar gshegs// de la nyon
mongs med par bdag gisamachod// mchod pa bgyis shaji lam gnyis la brten nas// 'gro brdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'di gyuratshag/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi mtshan thos pa dang/ mos pa dang/
'dzin pa dang/ 'chang ba drang/ yongs su bsgrugs pas sgrib pa thams cad zad par 'gyur/ ngan 'gro'i 'jigs pa thams cad las kyang thar par 'gyur/ bla na med pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du'ang nges par
'gyur ro// chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa// nam mkha'i khams kyisamathas gtugs pa'i phyogs thams cad na/ dus gsum lhag ma yod cing lus pa med la ma lus pa'isangs rgyas bcom
ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan lngas thugs su chud pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal bas phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang byang chub sems dpa' de
dgu thams cad bdag la dgongs su gsol/ bdagaming 'di zhes bgyi ba byang chub kyisAngepo la mchis kyi bar du/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
chamasangs rgyas shAkya thub pa thugs rje dang ldan pa/ byams ba dang ldan pa/ phan par bzhed pa/ thugs brtse can/ skye ba med pa dang 'gag pa med pa'i chos dang ldan pa de la lus thams cad kyis/
phyag 'tshal nas/ bsam pa dang lhag pa'i bsam pa rus pa'i khong nas dga' ba dang/ rkung gi khong nas dga' ba'i sems thams cad kyis skyabs sumachi'o// de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das mya ngan
ma mnga' ba de dang/ rtag tu mya ngan las 'das pa dang/ sreg blugs gsol dang/ de bzhin du mchog dga' dang/ mchog gi 'byung gnas dang/ dbang po'i 'byung gnas dang/ mar me/
mdzad dang/ sang ge sgra dang/ mdog bzang 'byung gnas dang/ ranichen 'byung gnas dang/ ramachan bla ma dang/ rin chen zla ba dang/ rin chen 'byung dang/ nachen snang ba dang/ rin chen tog dang/
rin chen 'od gsal la dang/ rin chen rab gsal dang/ ni tshanamang dang/ rin chen khyu gu dang/ achen pad+ma dang/ rin chen pad+mas rnam par gnon dang/ rin chen me dang/ rin chen me'i 'khor
dang/ rin chen kun gyis sku rgyan ldan pa dang/ dgra las rgyal ba dang/ sa'i stobs kyashugs mnga' ba dang/ pad+ma'i mchogadang/ sku mchog dang/ zla mchog dang/ chos mchog dang/ bcom
ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa brjod kyisami lang ba dang/ rnam par rtogamed dang/ dpag tu med pa dang/ rin chen matha' yas dang/ rin chen mtha' yas dri mamed pa dang/ phyag mtha' yas dang/
grags pa mtha' yas dang/ grags pa chen po dang pe byad che thob dang/ mthu chen brtson 'grus nges 'byung rung/ yon tan che bgrang dang/ dpag med dbyangs dang/ bden

pa'i dbyangs dang/ rnam par rgyal ba'i dbyangs dang/ zla ba'i dbyangs dang/ pad+ma'i dbyangs dang/ seng ge 'i dbyangs dang/ seng ge 'i sgra sgrog dang/ rdordzo'i sgra sgrog dang/ rdo rdzo'i snying pos rab tu 'joms pa
tshu dang/ zla 'od dang/ nyi 'od dang/ skar 'od dang/ dag pa'i 'od dang/ bdud rtsi'i 'od dang/ sprul pa'i 'od dang/ rin chen dpag med sprul pa'i 'od dang/ grol ba'i 'od dang/ longs su dag pa'i 'od

dang/ rnam par rtog med skar 'od dang/ skar ma'i sgron ma dang/ 'jig rten sgronam dang/ nam u0f00kha' chos kyi sgron ma dang/ zla nyi'i spronam dang/ zla ba'i skyon ma dang zla 'od dang dri med bla ma dang/
/ drayid gsal ba dang/ gser mdog gsal ba dang/ gsar mdogasnang ba dang/ gsaramadog rin chen gsal ba dang/pag med skyes snang dang/ sbos kyi zhal dang/ kun nas spros dang/
tshangs dbyangs rgyal pa dang/ klu'i dbang phyugargyal po dang/ dpal gyi snying po brtsegs pa sgrab sgragasargyal po dang/ glogs gasgronam tog gargyal po dang dge ba rab gnas gter gi rgyal po/
dang bdud tsadam pa legs bral rgyal po dang/ bzang po tog gi rgyal mtshan rgyal po dang/ me tog kun gyidri'i dbang phyugargyal po dang rdzasku 'irgyal po dang/ sA la'i rgyal po dang/ de bzhin du bcom
ldan 'das ma 'khrugs pa de dang/ 'od chen dang/ snying po zil gyis gnon dang/ ma rtog zil gyis gnon dang/ lhun po dang snyan po chen po dang/ shin tu lcan pa dang/ lhun po bzang po lta bu
dang/ lhun po bzang pos rnam par gnon pa dang/ nam mkha' gsalabadang/ zla nyid gsal ba dang/ me gsal dang/ dpal gyi snying bo tshar bu gsal ba dang/ bdud rtsi spos gsal dang/
tha mchog dpal dang/ mtha' yas dpal dang/ rin po che'i 'dus pa'i dpal dang/ rin po che'i phyi ma ldog pa'i mthu la gnas pa'i dpal dang/ rinapo tsho de dag la 'byung ba'i dpal dang/ bi zura'iAngapo
mchog gi dpal dang khrel yod dpagamed gsala mchog bkod pa 'dapal dang/ ta la'i rgyal bo ltar 'phags pa'i dpal dang/ ljon pa rnam par 'phel ba'i dpal dang/ spyod pa grangasamed pa las
ang dag par 'jus pa'i dpal dang don yod dpal dang/ don kun grub pa'i dbal dang pad+mi mchog gis rnam par 'khrul pa'i dpal dang/ ye shes gtsang sras dpal dang/ tshe dpag med dang/
dbyangs dpag med dang/ pad+ma'i dbyangs dang/ pad+ma'i sde dang/ dpa' sde dang/ mtshon cha dpa' brtan pa'i sde dang/ nyonamos sbyong dang/ shin tu yongs dag rtog dang/ shin du dri med 'bar
ba' rtog dang/ thugs dam kun chub the tshom gcod pa dang/ kumadu rnam par snang mdzad rnam dag bsnyad pa dang/ kun tu yon tan rnam gnon dang/ kun tu yon tan 'byung ba dang/ de bzhin
thazhi/ @#// du bcom ldan 'das rin po che snang ba rnam par gnon pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa de dang/ rin po che gsal ba dang/ rin po mi mang pa dang/ de lasogs pa skye ba med pa dang 'gag pa
