[P•]pa'i sangs rgyas kyi lam dang/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i lam dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i tshogs sogs pa yongs su rdzogs par gyur cig/ bdagamyur du de bzhin gshegs pa'i
stobs bsu dang/ ma 'jig pa bzhi dang/ ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos spobs pa thogs pa med pa dang/ ting nga 'dzan dang/ gzungs dang/ rnam par grol ba'i yon tan dang rdzo

'phrul dang mngon par shes pa dang/ pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par gyur cig 3yang badag bsod nams phun sum tshogs pa thams cad dang ldan par gyur cig/ mchod pa rgya chen po byed pa'i dus su la
'di skad du brjod par bya ste/ yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mthu chen po mnga' ba thams cad dang byang chub sems dwanga' tshogs thams cad bdag la dgongs su gsol/ dang bdagasangs rgyas dang byang

chub sems dang ra byamasacad la mchod pa dang rim gro chen po bgyis te lus 'bul lo// phyogs bcu'i 'jig rtan gyi khams na ja nyid rgyan dang yo byad bzang po thams cad rin pa che'i gzhal med khang rnam pa sna

yu tshigs pa dang/ rinapo che'i rgyan thams cad dang rin po che'i shang dang/ rin po tsho'i ra dang/ rin po che'i ba dan dang/ ni bo che'i dkyil 'khor dang/ rin po che'i dbyig rnam par bkram pa dang/ni po chog[”]
ba ga rdugs dang/ rin po che'i rgyal mtshan dang/ rin po che'i do shal gyi rgyan dang/ mu tig gi dra ba dang/ rin po che'i snod dang/ rin po che'i phung po dang/ rin po tsho'i 'od 'phro ba dang/
rin po che'i gling dgan nor bu rin po che chen po rnam par dag pa'i mar me'i sdong po dang/ rin po che'i dril bu'i sgra 'khrol ba/ gser btso ma'i sbyar thab can gyi dom dom pho long sbyangs pas
yongs su khebs pa/ gsar btsoma'i me tog 'dzam bu'i gser gyi ze ba can gsar gyaphashang ldan pas bkris pa/ gsar gyi pho brang sna tshogs rin po che'i sprigs pa/ rin po che'i
thags pa char du 'bab pa rinapo che'i rnam pa mang po'i mdzod kyi pho brang lha rdzas kyanor bus rtseg ngos sus pa/ rin po che'8shing thams cad rags 'dzani chen po'i skyed mos tshal gyi ra
ba nyid du 'ong ba/ rin po ches ni pho brang dang/ gnas dang/ shang dang/ nags tshal la sogs ba thams cad kyang yid du 'ong ba de lta bu bdag med pa 'dzin pa med pa thams cad
sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la yongs su sngo zhing 'bul lo// 'dzam bu gling na snyan bzang bo ring du 'tsho bar byed pa la sogs pa'i rnam pa ji snyed pa yod pa dang/ nor bu
rin po che sems can thams cad kyiri ba yongs su skong ba dang/ ma g.yos par rang bzhin gyis bda' ba'i zhal zas bzang bo dang/ spos kyi shing ljon pa rnam pa sna tshogs pa dang/ tsan

dan gyi shing dang/ a karu dang/ tsan dan dmar po dang/ lo ma che zhing me tog rtag par bsung gis bzi bar byed pa'i shing rnam pa sna tshogs pa nga/ yid du 'ong ba'i lha rdzas kyi sbos yongs su ma bzung

ba yongs su gzung ba med pa/ yag bsam gyi shing rnam pa sna tshogs pa dang/ rgya mtsho chen po'i nan gnas byung ba nor bu rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs yid bzhin gyi nor bu'an po che la sogs pa dang/ rarab lhun po dang/

tshul ri ti se dang/ spos kyir dang/ rim la ya dang/ ra btang bzung dang/ ri ma ha la dang rdo rje'i ra la sogs te/ rin po che'i rnam pa de dag gi ran po che'i them sna tshogs dang/ rin po che'i stegs dang/

rdo ba ran pa tsho dang/ rin po che'i phug dang/ na po che'i pho brang dang/ rin po che'i rgyan dang/ rin po tsho'i zhogs ma dang/ rin pa che'i lam srungamang po dang/ nor bu rin boril masrang mang po dang/ nor bu rin po che'i kab pa/ rin

po che sgron ma'i 'khor lomang po dang/ bai DUr la sogs to ra bu'i rigs rnam pa mang bo dang/ ji tsam du lha'i gnas na bdag po yod pa'i lha'i pho brang dang/ lha'i nor rnam pa mang po yang du 'ong zhing blta bar

mos pa dang 2 lha'i rol mo'i yo byang rnam pamang po rlung gi ngad kyis bskyod pa tsam gyis sgra snyan pa 'byin pa dang// nam mkha'i gnas kyi pho brangs rol mo 'aglo 'byin pa dang/ lha'i rol mo rnam pa mang po ma bskyod

par sgra snyan par ng 'byin pa dang lha'i lokhyad sna tshogs nam mkha'i gnas kyi pho brang nas snyan pa'i sgra sna tshogs 'byin pa dang/ rin po che'i sprin sna tshogs las snyan pa'i sgra 'byung ba dang/ lha'i nor bu

ca 0rin po che dbyangs snyan pa'i sgra 'byin pa dang/ gzhan yang lha'i dri shing dang/ me tog gi shang mang bo dang/ 'phreng ba'i shing dang/ byug pa mang po dang/ bdug pa'i spos kyi shing dang 2 sgronoma'ashing dang/ rgyal

mtshan gyashang dang ba dan gyi shang dang/ rin po che'i shang la sogs pa de dag thams cad ma bzung ba/ yongs su gzung ba med pa de dag thams cad kyang sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la 'bul lo//

jatshemadu de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyan gyis gzigs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing dag namangod pa'ispunachen po me tog gi mdang 2 sa kyi sbyin dang/ 'phreng ba'i sbyin dang/ bdug spos kyi sprin dang/ byug spos

kyi sprin dang/ rin po che'i gdugs kyi sbyin dang rin po che'i rgyalamtshan gyi sprin dang/ na po tshe'i ba dan gyi skran dang/ rin po che'i gos kyi sprin dang/ rin po che'i rnam pa'i sman dang/ rin po che'i phung po'i sprin la sog

te rin po che chen po'i sprin rnam pa de dug dang/ gzhan yang sbyos kyi 'bru mar gyis mar me'i snod chen po bkang ba stong gi 'jig rten gyi tshad dang mnyam pa/ mar me'i snying po ri rab kyi tshod tsam pa sgromamar byas te/ sangae rgyas

bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad dang byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams lam tshod tsang 'bul lo// de bzhin du mchod pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyis mchod pa'i bsod nams rnam pa ji tsam pa de dag thams cad bla na med pa'i byang chub

du yongs su bsngo'o// gang 'dus pa'i saargyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis ge khamang po brtsams te dmigs su med pab tshul rgyas byang chub tu yongs su bsngos pa de bzhin du/ bdag gis kyang bsod nams de dag thams cad

bla na med pa'i byang chub tu longs su bsngo'o// yang sasargyas bam ldan 'das byang chub kyi snya por mngon par rdzogs pa las rgyas nas chos kyi 'khor lo tshin po ni bskor/ bdud kyi sde rnams ni pham par byas nas/ mya ngan

las 'da' bar gshegs par dgos ba la/ sems can thams cad la ya pa dang bde ba'i phyir bskal pa chen po gcig tshang bar bzhugs par gsol zhes gsolab btab bo// sangs rgyas dang/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang/ sems

tshe na thams cad kyis bsod nams ci bsgrubs pa de dag thams cad la rjes su yi rang ngo// dus gsum de bzhin gshegs pa dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis sdig pa dang mdage ba'i las kyi sgribab thams cad bshagasapa de bzhin du/ bdag

gas kyang las kyi sgrib pa bshags shing yongs usmyung8// de bzhin dumachod pa dang bshags pa la sogs pa byas nas/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad mngon sum du dmigs pa'i sman sngar gsang sngags 'di bskyartsa brgyad bzlas se/

oMsaM b+ha ra saMb+har bilan maramahAdzabats+tso/ gang gsaljags de bsapas dang 'dod pa de thams cad 'grub cing lha'i mchod pa'i mi chen po dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyang mngon sum du 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu ram/ rigs kyi bu mo gang

la la zhig gis de bzhin gshegs pa ya la byed cing/ nyin mo'ang rung mtshan mo'ang zhung/ yos su lnga ba'i 'khor lo chen po 'di klog cing 'dom na de'i sdig pa mi dge ba'i las 'byang zhing/ nyon mongs pa thams cad khad kyis sbyong bar 'gyur ba dang/

[«]3 bsod nyams kyi tshigs sngam de dag thams cad thob par 'gyur ro// jacag bklags pa tsam gyis kyang tshaapha brgya'i dpal dang ldan zhing/ rmilama'akhang rtag dusasargyas mthong bar 'gyur ro// tshe 'das nas kyang yongs udag pa'i zhing du skye'o

pa bcom ldan 'das kyis de skabs bkalastsalanas/ byang dugems dpa'i tshog sam pod dag thamasacad/ bcom ldan 'dzas kyis gsungs ba la mgopar bstod do// yongs su sngo ba'i 'khor lo zhes bya batheg pa chen po'iyi do rdzogs so/
la'i rig slob sde snod gsum dang ldan pa shA lad+harmas rgya gar gyi rma rgya'i yi ge las/ ban d+he rnam par mi rtog gi bskyar ba'o/gtso/ skyogam/gnu/ pa ta b+hag tamaM ga la ga

tha bod skad du/ de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i bkra shis tshigs su bcad pa/ dzAkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal M lo// ma pang snyam dzad ye shes dam pa mtshon ldan// zlab nya 'dra'asumanga'asrid pa'i mthar phyin pa// dgos pa mtha' dag rdzogasapa'i

bkra shis gang yin pa/ bkra shis des ni skye dgu rnams la zhi byed shog mi 'khrugs rgyal po de dang gad mugatsam sbyong ba// mgon po yon tan thams cad rdzogs pas bkra shasis pa// dge mnyam bsam sems ldan pa'i bkra shis gang yin pa// bkra shis

des na skyodagu rnams la zhi byed shog/ saa rgyas yon tan kun gyi rgyan gyis brgya mdzad cing// yang dag bden pa'i 'byor pa spyan mdzad m snyub/ min chen 'byung ldan zhes bya'i bkra shis gang yin pa// bkra shis des ni skye dgu rnams la zhi byeshog/ bsam gtan

ting 'dzin ye shes dam pa parol phyin pa'i gnas// ye shes pad+ma'i steng bzhugs dpag med tshe ldan zhing// tshegs med par byin gyis slob pa'i bkra shis gang yin pa// bkra shis des ni skye dgu rnams la zhi byed shog/ rimasacan don gyi las la thugasazhi

sbyor mdzad pa'i// 'gro ba kun gyi 'ang bas bcings ma grol mdzad pa// thub mchog don yon grub pa'ibokra shis gang yin pa// bkra shis des na skye dgu rnams la zhi byed shog/ de bzhin gshegasapa lnga'i bkra shis tshigs su bcad pa
tha @#// rdzogs so//@#// rgya gar skad du/ rat+ta ji sAn+ti gA tha/ bod skad du/ dkon mchog gsum gyi bkra sa kyi tshigs su bcad/
pa dkona mchog gsum 'tshal lo// ba'i rta mchog ston mchog bla na med// chos rje nyi ma sprul ba'i byin rlabs kyis// bdud dang bgegs rigs gnod pa'i dgra zhi ste// rtag tu dpal
gnas nyin mtshan bkras shog/ chos nyid bden pa'i chos mchog bla na med// dam chos bdud rtsi bden pa'i byin rlabs kyis// nyes pa'i skyon bral dge tshogs rnams 'phel ba/ rtag tu dpal
gnas nyin mtshan bkra shis shog/ dge 'dun yon tan rin chen dpal 'bar ba// rgyal sras phan mdzad bden pa'i byin rlabs kyis// nyon mongs lcagabasngal gdung ba'i dgra zhi ste// rtag tu dpal
yaM gnas nyin mtshan bkra shis shog/ tshangs dang lha dbang srung ma'i phyirlabs kyis// bana mdzad lha yi bkra shis gnas gyur te// bde legs bsam pa yid bzhin 'grub pa dang/ darang nad med
bde skyid ldan par shog/ dkon mchog gsum gyi bkra shis kyi tshigs su bcad pa bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag des ba la gsungs ba rdzogs so// rgya gar gyi
mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang/ zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban d+he ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o//
